<p>"Certainly, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>; and it has the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> also of being in vogue amongst the less polished societies of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. Every savage can dance."
<p>Sir William only smiled."Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> performs delightfully,"he continued after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>, on seeing Bingley join the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>group</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="group" newWord="curiosity" score="0.631">curiosity</span>;"and I doubt not that you are an adept in the science yourself, Mr. Darcy."
<p>"You saw me <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span> at Meryton, I believe, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>."
<p>"Yes, indeed, and received no inconsiderable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span>. <p>"Never, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>."
<p>"Do you not think it would be a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>?"
<p>"It is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> which I never pay to any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> if I can avoid it."
<p>"You have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, I conclude?"
<p>Mr. Darcy bowed. 
<p>"I had once had some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> of fixing in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> myself - - for I am fond of superior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>; but I did not feel quite certain that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of London would agree with Lady Lucas."
<p>He paused in hopes of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> was not disposed to make any; and Elizabeth at that instant moving towards them, he was struck with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>action</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.493" formerWord="action" newWord="minute" score="0.493">minute</span> of doing a very gallant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, and called out to her: 
<p>"My dear Miss Eliza, why are you not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span>? Mr. Darcy, you must allow me to present this young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> to you as a very desirable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span>. You cannot refuse to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span>, I am sure when so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> is before you."And, taking her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, he would have given it to Mr. Darcy who, though extremely surprised, was not unwilling to receive it, when she instantly drew back, and said with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discomposure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.279" formerWord="discomposure" newWord="agitation" score="0.279">agitation</span> to Sir William: 
<p>"Indeed, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, I have not the least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span>. I entreat you not to suppose that I moved this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>order</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="order" newWord="way" score="0.909">way</span> to beg for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span>."
<p>Mr. Darcy, with grave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>propriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="propriety" newWord="none" score="0.837">none</span>, requested to be allowed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, but in vain. Elizabeth was determined; nor did Sir William at all shake her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span>. 
<p>"You excel so much in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span>, Miss Eliza, that it is cruel to deny me the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of seeing you; and though this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> dislikes the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span> in general, he can have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>, I am sure, to oblige us for one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.532" formerWord="half-hour" newWord="partner" score="0.532">partner</span>."
<p>"Mr. Darcy is all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>,"said Elizabeth, smiling. 
<p>"He is, indeed; but, considering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inducement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="inducement" newWord="matrimony" score="0.315">matrimony</span>, my dear Miss Eliza, we cannot wonder at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complaisance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="complaisance" newWord="cart" score="0.23">cart</span> - - for who would object to such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span>?"
<p>Elizabeth looked archly, and turned away. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.373" formerWord="resistance" newWord="injury" score="0.373">injury</span> had not injured her with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>, and he was thinking of her with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complacency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="complacency" newWord="ma'am" score="0.522">ma'am</span>, when thus accosted by Miss Bingley: 
<p>"I can guess the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reverie</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="reverie" newWord="portion" score="0.448">portion</span>."
<p>"I should imagine not."
<p>"You are considering how insupportable it would be to pass many evenings in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> - - in such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>; and indeed I am quite of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>. I was never more annoyed! The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insipidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="insipidity" newWord="heard" score="0.329">heard</span>, and yet the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>noise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.804" formerWord="noise" newWord="minute" score="0.804">minute</span> - - the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothingness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.792" formerWord="nothingness" newWord="life" score="0.792">life</span>, and yet the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.844" formerWord="self-importance" newWord="way" score="0.844">way</span> of all those people! What would I give to hear your strictures on them!"
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conjecture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="conjecture" newWord="wit" score="0.283">wit</span> is totally wrong, I assure you. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> was more agreeably engaged. I have been meditating on the very great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> which a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.215" formerWord="pair" newWord="bent" score="0.215">bent</span> of fine eyes in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> of a pretty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> can bestow."
<p>Miss Bingley immediately fixed her eyes on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, and desired he would tell her what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> of inspiring such reflections. Mr. Darcy replied with great intrepidity: 
<p>"Miss Elizabeth Bennet."
<p>"Miss Elizabeth Bennet!"repeated Miss Bingley."I am all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>. How long has she been such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span>? - - and pray, when am I to wish you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span>?"
<p>"That is exactly the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> which I expected you to ask. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imagination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="imagination" newWord="happiness" score="0.938">happiness</span> is very rapid; it jumps from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> to love, from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matrimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="matrimony" newWord="heart" score="0.858">heart</span>, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>. I knew you would be wishing me <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span>."
<p>"Nay, if you are serious about it, I shall consider the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> is absolutely settled. You will be having a charming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.78" formerWord="mother-in-law" newWord="everything" score="0.78">everything</span>, indeed; and, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>, she will always be at Pemberley with you."
<p>He listened to her with perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span> while she chose to entertain herself in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>; and as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span> convinced her that all was safe, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.579" formerWord="wit" newWord="observation" score="0.579">observation</span> flowed long. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 7 
<p>
<p>Mr. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>property</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="property" newWord="degree" score="0.737">degree</span> consisted almost entirely in an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> of two thousand a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>, which, unfortunately for his daughters, was entailed, in default of heirs <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>male</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="male" newWord="fright" score="0.242">fright</span>, on a distant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span>; and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, though ample for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, could but ill <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supply</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="supply" newWord="attempt" score="0.601">attempt</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deficiency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="deficiency" newWord="man" score="0.851">man</span> of his. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had been an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attorney</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.6" formerWord="attorney" newWord="mother" score="0.6">mother</span> in Meryton, and had left her four thousand pounds. 
<p>She had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> married to a Mr. Phillips, who had been a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clerk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="clerk" newWord="listener" score="0.255">listener</span> to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and succeeded him in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> settled in London in a respectable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trade</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="trade" newWord="avoidance" score="0.326">avoidance</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>village</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="village" newWord="heart" score="0.893">heart</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> was only one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.801" formerWord="mile" newWord="minute" score="0.801">minute</span> from Meryton; a most convenient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> for the young ladies, who were usually tempted thither three or four times a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>, to pay their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> and to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>milliner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="milliner" newWord="class" score="0.244">class</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="shop" newWord="minute" score="0.67">minute</span> just over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. The two youngest of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, Catherine and Lydia, were particularly frequent in these attentions; their minds were more vacant than their sisters ', and when <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> better offered, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> to Meryton was necessary to amuse their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> hours and furnish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; and however bare of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>general</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="general" newWord="brought" score="0.326">brought</span> might be, they always contrived to learn some from their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. At present, indeed, they were well supplied both with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> by the recent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>militia</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.706" formerWord="militia" newWord="kind" score="0.706">kind</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>; it was to remain the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>, and Meryton was the headquarters. 
<p>Their visits to Mrs. Phillips were now productive of the most interesting <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>. Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> added <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of the officers ' names and connections. Their lodgings were not long a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="secret" newWord="minute" score="0.749">minute</span>, and at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> they began to know the officers themselves. Mr. Phillips visited them all, and this opened to his nieces a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>store</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="store" newWord="terror" score="0.303">terror</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unknown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="unknown" newWord="park" score="0.522">park</span> before. They could talk of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but officers; and Mr. Bingley's large <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="mention" newWord="sister" score="0.888">sister</span> of which gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>animation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.416" formerWord="animation" newWord="minute" score="0.416">minute</span> to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, was worthless in their eyes when opposed to the regimentals of an ensign. 
<p>After listening one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to their effusions on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, Mr. Bennet coolly observed: 
<p>"From all that I can collect by your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of talking, you must be two of the silliest girls in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>. I have suspected it some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, but I am now convinced."
<p>Catherine was disconcerted, and made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; but Lydia, with perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>, continued to express her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of Captain Carter, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of seeing him in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, as he was going the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to London. 
<p>"I am astonished, my dear,"said Mrs. Bennet,"that you should be so ready to think your own children silly. If I wished to think slightingly of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>'s children, it should not be of my own, however."
<p>"If my children are silly, I must hope to be always <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> of it."
<p>"Yes - - but as it happens, they are all of them very clever."
<p>"This is the only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>, I flatter myself, on which we do not agree. I had hoped that our sentiments coincided in every particular, but I must so far differ from you as to think our two youngest daughters uncommonly foolish."
<p>"My dear Mr. Bennet, you must not expect such girls to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. When they get to our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>, I dare say they will not think about officers any more than we do. I remember the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> when I liked a red <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="coat" newWord="chair" score="0.516">chair</span> myself very well - - and, indeed, so I do still at my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; and if a smart young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colonel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="colonel" newWord="midst" score="0.326">midst</span>, with five or six thousand a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>, should want one of my girls I shall not say nay to him; and I thought Colonel Forster looked very becoming the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> at Sir William's in his regimentals."
<p>"Mamma,"cried Lydia,"my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> says that Colonel Forster and Captain Carter do not go so often to Miss Watson's as they did when they first came; she sees them now very often <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>standing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.696" formerWord="standing" newWord="horror" score="0.696">horror</span> in Clarke's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>."
<p>Mrs. Bennet was prevented replying by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>footman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="footman" newWord="month" score="0.266">month</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> for Miss Bennet; it came from Netherfield, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> waited for an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. Mrs. Bennet's eyes sparkled with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and she was eagerly calling out, while her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> read, 
<p>"Well, Jane, who is it from? What is it about? What does he say? Well, Jane, make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>haste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="haste" newWord="minute" score="0.843">minute</span> and tell us; make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>haste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="haste" newWord="minute" score="0.843">minute</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>."
<p>"It is from Miss Bingley,"said Jane, and then read it aloud. 
<p>"MY DEAR FRIEND, - - 
<p>"If you are not so compassionate as to dine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span> with Louisa and me, we shall be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of hating each other for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of our lives, for a whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tete-a-tete</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="tete-a-tete" newWord="ingenuity" score="0.322">ingenuity</span> between two women can never end without a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarrel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="quarrel" newWord="scheme" score="0.685">scheme</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Come</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="Come" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.659">Acquaintance</span> as soon as you can on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>receipt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="receipt" newWord="shakespeare" score="0.255">shakespeare</span> of this. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> and the gentlemen are to dine with the officers. - - Yours ever, 
<p>"CAROLINE BINGLEY"
<p>"With the officers!"cried Lydia."I wonder my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> did not tell us of that."
<p>"Dining out,"said Mrs. Bennet,"that is very unlucky."
<p>"Can I have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>?"said Jane. 
<p>"No, my dear, you had better go on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horseback</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.399" formerWord="horseback" newWord="eye" score="0.399">eye</span>, because it seems likely to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.688" formerWord="rain" newWord="scheme" score="0.688">scheme</span>; and then you must stay all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>."
<p>"That would be a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>,"said Elizabeth,"if you were sure that they would not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> to send her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>."
<p>"Oh! but the gentlemen will have Mr. Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span> to go to Meryton, and the Hursts have no horses to theirs."
<p>"I had much rather go in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>."
<p>"But, my dear, your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> cannot spare the horses, I am sure. They are wanted in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>farm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="farm" newWord="foregoing" score="0.236">foregoing</span>, Mr. Bennet, are they not?"
<p>"They are wanted in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>farm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="farm" newWord="foregoing" score="0.236">foregoing</span> much oftener than I can get them."
<p>"But if you have got them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span>,"said Elizabeth,"my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> will be answered."
<p>She did at last extort from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acknowledgment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="acknowledgment" newWord="silence" score="0.528">silence</span> that the horses were engaged. Jane was therefore obliged to go on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horseback</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.399" formerWord="horseback" newWord="eye" score="0.399">eye</span>, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> attended her to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> with many cheerful prognostics of a bad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. Her hopes were answered; Jane had not been gone long before it rained hard. Her sisters were uneasy for her, but her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> was delighted. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.688" formerWord="rain" newWord="scheme" score="0.688">scheme</span> continued the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intermission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.8" formerWord="intermission" newWord="anybody" score="0.8">anybody</span>; Jane certainly could not come back. 
<p>"This was a lucky <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>, indeed!"said Mrs. Bennet more than once, as if the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> of making it <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.688" formerWord="rain" newWord="scheme" score="0.688">scheme</span> were all her own. Till the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, however, she was not aware of all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contrivance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="contrivance" newWord="chuse" score="0.257">chuse</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="Breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">Influence</span> was scarcely over when a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> from Netherfield brought the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> for Elizabeth: 
<p>"MY DEAREST LIZZY, - - 
<p>"I find myself very unwell this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, which, I suppose, is to be imputed to my getting wet through <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> friends will not hear of my returning till I am better. They insist also on my seeing Mr. Jones - - therefore do not be alarmed if you should hear of his having been to me - - and, excepting a sore <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>throat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="throat" newWord="condition" score="0.275">condition</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>headache</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="headache" newWord="tea" score="0.588">tea</span>, there is not much the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> with me. - - Yours, etc."
<p>"Well, my dear,"said Mr. Bennet, when Elizabeth had read the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> aloud,"if your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> should have a dangerous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="fit" newWord="wink" score="0.333">wink</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>illness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="illness" newWord="woman" score="0.788">woman</span> - - if she should die, it would be a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to know that it was all in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pursuit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="pursuit" newWord="fireside" score="0.25">fireside</span> of Mr. Bingley, and under your orders."
<p>"Oh! I am not afraid of her dying. People do not die of little trifling colds. She will be taken good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of. As long as she stays there, it is all very well. I would go and see her if I could have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>."
<p>Elizabeth, feeling really anxious, was determined to go to her, though the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was not to be had; and as she was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horsewoman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.324" formerWord="horsewoman" newWord="page" score="0.324">page</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span> was her only alternative. She declared her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span>. 
<p>"How can you be so silly,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>,"as to think of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, in all this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dirt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.842" formerWord="dirt" newWord="minute" score="0.842">minute</span>! You will not be fit to be seen when you get there."
<p>"I shall be very fit to see Jane - - which is all I want."
<p>"Is this a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span> to me, Lizzy,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>,"to send for the horses?"
<p>"No, indeed, I do not wish to avoid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> when <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> has a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>; only three miles. I shall be back by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>."
<p>"I admire the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>activity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="activity" newWord="aunt" score="0.891">aunt</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benevolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.377" formerWord="benevolence" newWord="length" score="0.377">length</span>,"observed Mary,"but every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impulse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.418" formerWord="impulse" newWord="necessity" score="0.418">necessity</span> of feeling should be guided by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>; and, in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="exertion" newWord="course" score="0.956">course</span> should always be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proportion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.472" formerWord="proportion" newWord="tea" score="0.472">tea</span> to what is required."
<p>"We will go as far as Meryton with you,"said Catherine and Lydia. Elizabeth accepted their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and the three young ladies set off together. 
<p>"If we make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>haste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="haste" newWord="minute" score="0.843">minute</span>,"said Lydia, as they walked along,"perhaps we may see <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> of Captain Carter before he goes."
<p>In Meryton they parted; the two youngest repaired to the lodgings of one of the officers ' wives, and Elizabeth continued her walk alone, crossing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>field</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.772" formerWord="field" newWord="year" score="0.772">year</span> after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>field</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.772" formerWord="field" newWord="year" score="0.772">year</span> at a quick <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.195" formerWord="pace" newWord="remembrance" score="0.195">remembrance</span>, jumping over stiles and springing over puddles with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatient</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.742" formerWord="impatient" newWord="news" score="0.742">news</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>activity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="activity" newWord="aunt" score="0.891">aunt</span>, and finding herself at last within <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, with weary ankles, dirty stockings, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> glowing with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exercise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="exercise" newWord="minute" score="0.713">minute</span>. 
<p>She was shown into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast-parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.265" formerWord="breakfast-parlour" newWord="thoughtfulness" score="0.265">thoughtfulness</span>, where all but Jane were assembled, and where her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> created a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. That she should have walked three miles so early in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, in such dirty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="weather" newWord="sister" score="0.954">sister</span>, and by herself, was almost incredible to Mrs. Hurst and Miss Bingley; and Elizabeth was convinced that they held her in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> for it. She was received, however, very politely by them; and in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s manners there was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> better than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>; there was good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span>. Mr. Darcy said very little, and Mr. Hurst <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all. The former was divided between <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brilliancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="brilliancy" newWord="minute" score="0.674">minute</span> which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exercise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="exercise" newWord="minute" score="0.713">minute</span> had given to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>'s justifying her coming so far alone. The latter was thinking only of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>. 
<p>Her inquiries after her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> were not very favourably answered. Miss Bennet had slept <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span>, and though up, was very feverish, and not well enough to leave her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Elizabeth was glad to be taken to her immediately; and Jane, who had only been withheld by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of giving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inconvenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="inconvenience" newWord="affection" score="0.911">affection</span> from expressing in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> how much she longed for such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span>, was delighted at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span>. She was not equal, however, to much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, and when Miss Bingley left them together, could attempt little besides expressions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> for the extraordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> she was treated with. Elizabeth silently attended her. 
<p>When <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> was over they were joined by the sisters; and Elizabeth began to like them herself, when she saw how much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solicitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.615" formerWord="solicitude" newWord="minute" score="0.615">minute</span> they showed for Jane. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apothecary</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="apothecary" newWord="communication" score="0.471">communication</span> came, and having examined his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patient</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.384" formerWord="patient" newWord="gleam" score="0.384">gleam</span>, said, as might be supposed, that she had caught a violent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cold</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="cold" newWord="return" score="0.787">return</span>, and that they must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to get the better of it; advised her to return to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bed</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="bed" newWord="whip" score="0.249">whip</span>, and promised her some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>draughts</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="draughts" newWord="furniture" score="0.303">furniture</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> was followed readily, for the feverish symptoms increased, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> ached acutely. Elizabeth did not quit her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>; nor were the other ladies often absent; the gentlemen being out, they had, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to do elsewhere. 
<p>When the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clock</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.678" formerWord="clock" newWord="distress" score="0.678">distress</span> struck three, Elizabeth felt that she must go, and very unwillingly said so. Miss Bingley offered her the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, and she only wanted a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pressing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.538" formerWord="pressing" newWord="walking" score="0.538">walking</span> to accept it, when Jane testified such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> in parting with her, that Miss Bingley was obliged to convert the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span> to an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> to remain at Netherfield for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span>. Elizabeth most thankfully consented, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> was dispatched to Longbourn to acquaint the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> with her stay and bring back a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supply</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="supply" newWord="attempt" score="0.601">attempt</span> of clothes. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 8 
<p>
<p>At five o'clock the two ladies retired to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="dress" newWord="pain" score="0.832">pain</span>, and at half-past six Elizabeth was summoned to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>. To the civil inquiries which then poured in, and amongst which she had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of distinguishing the much superior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solicitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.615" formerWord="solicitude" newWord="minute" score="0.615">minute</span> of Mr. Bingley ' s, she could not make a very favourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. Jane was by no means better. The sisters, on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> this, repeated three or four times how much they were grieved, how shocking it was to have a bad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cold</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="cold" newWord="return" score="0.787">return</span>, and how excessively they disliked being <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> themselves; and then thought no more of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>: and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span> towards Jane when not immediately before them restored Elizabeth to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> of all her former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span>. 
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, indeed, was the only one of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> whom she could regard with any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complacency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="complacency" newWord="ma'am" score="0.522">ma'am</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> for Jane was evident, and his attentions to herself most pleasing, and they prevented her feeling herself so much an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intruder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="intruder" newWord="insolence" score="0.239">insolence</span> as she believed she was considered by the others. She had very little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> from any but him. Miss Bingley was engrossed by Mr. Darcy, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> scarcely less so; and as for Mr. Hurst, by whom Elizabeth sat, he was an indolent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, who lived only to eat, drink, and play at cards; who, when he found her to prefer a plain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="dish" newWord="inability" score="0.25">inability</span> to a ragout, had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to say to her. 
<p>When <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> was over, she returned directly to Jane, and Miss Bingley began abusing her as soon as she was out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Her manners were pronounced to be very bad indeed, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mixture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.612" formerWord="mixture" newWord="gallery" score="0.612">gallery</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span>; she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span>, no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>. Mrs. Hurst thought the same, and added: 
<p>"She has <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>, in short, to recommend her, but being an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walker</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="walker" newWord="company" score="0.729">company</span>. I shall never forget her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. She really looked almost wild."
<p>"She did, indeed, Louisa. I could hardly keep my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>. Very nonsensical to come at all! Why must she be scampering about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>, because her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> had a cold? Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="hair" newWord="carriage" score="0.903">carriage</span>, so untidy, so blowsy!"
<p>"Yes, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>petticoat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="petticoat" newWord="separation" score="0.307">separation</span>; I hope you saw her petticoat, six inches deep in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mud</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.314" formerWord="mud" newWord="representation" score="0.314">representation</span>, I am absolutely certain; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.657" formerWord="gown" newWord="minute" score="0.657">minute</span> which had been let down to hide it not doing its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>office</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="office" newWord="sir" score="0.764">sir</span>."
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span> may be very exact, Louisa,"said Bingley;"but this was all lost upon me. I thought Miss Elizabeth Bennet looked remarkably well when she came into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. Her dirty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>petticoat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="petticoat" newWord="separation" score="0.307">separation</span> quite escaped my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>."
<p>"You observed it, Mr. Darcy, I am sure,"said Miss Bingley;"and I am inclined to think that you would not wish to see your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> make such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exhibition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="exhibition" newWord="candle" score="0.328">candle</span>."
<p>"Certainly not."
<p>"To walk three miles, or four miles, or five miles, or whatever it is, above her ankles in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dirt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.842" formerWord="dirt" newWord="minute" score="0.842">minute</span>, and alone, quite alone! What could she mean by it?
