It seems to me to show an abominable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of conceited <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>independence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="independence" newWord="encouragement" score="0.631">encouragement</span>, a most country-town <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decorum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="decorum" newWord="none" score="0.733">none</span>."
<p>"It shows an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> that is very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="pleasing" newWord="relationship" score="0.321">relationship</span>,"said Bingley. 
<p>"I am afraid, Mr. Darcy,"observed Miss Bingley in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span>,"that this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>adventure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.221" formerWord="adventure" newWord="discouragement" score="0.221">discouragement</span> has rather affected your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of her fine eyes."
<p>"Not at all,"he replied;"they were brightened by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exercise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="exercise" newWord="minute" score="0.713">minute</span>."A short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> followed this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>, and Mrs. Hurst began again: 
<p>"I have an excessive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> for Miss Jane Bennet, she is really a very sweet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>, and I wish with all my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> she were well settled. But with such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, and such low connections, I am afraid there is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of it."
<p>"I think I have heard you say that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> is an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attorney</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.6" formerWord="attorney" newWord="mother" score="0.6">mother</span> in Meryton."
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Yes</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="Yes" newWord="honour" score="0.883">Honour</span>; and they have another, who lives somewhere near Cheapside."
<p>"That is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>capital</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="capital" newWord="doubt" score="0.871">doubt</span>,"added her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and they both laughed heartily. 
<p>"If they had uncles enough to fill all Cheapside,"cried Bingley,"it would not make them one jot less agreeable."
<p>"But it must very materially lessen their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of marrying men of any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>,"replied Darcy. 
<p>To this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span> Bingley made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; but his sisters gave it their hearty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="assent" newWord="remonstrance" score="0.412">remonstrance</span>, and indulged their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mirth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.657" formerWord="mirth" newWord="voice" score="0.657">voice</span> for some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.869" formerWord="expense" newWord="part" score="0.869">part</span> of their dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>'s vulgar relations. 
<p>With a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>renewal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.224" formerWord="renewal" newWord="culture" score="0.224">culture</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tenderness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="tenderness" newWord="day" score="0.791">day</span>, however, they returned to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> on leaving the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="dining-parlour" newWord="gown" score="0.366">gown</span>, and sat with her till summoned to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coffee</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="coffee" newWord="hurry" score="0.345">hurry</span>. She was still very poorly, and Elizabeth would not quit her at all, till late in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, when she had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> of seeing her sleep, and when it seemed to her rather right than pleasant that she should go <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>downstairs</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="downstairs" newWord="day" score="0.713">day</span> herself. On entering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span> she found the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> at loo, and was immediately invited to join them; but suspecting them to be playing high she declined it, and making her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" newWord="experience" score="0.41">experience</span>, said she would amuse herself for the short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> she could stay below, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>. Mr. Hurst looked at her with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>. 
<p>"Do you prefer reading to cards?"said he;"that is rather singular."
<p>"Miss Eliza Bennet,"said Miss Bingley,"despises cards. She is a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reader</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.73" formerWord="reader" newWord="evening" score="0.73">evening</span>, and has no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> else."
<p>"I deserve neither such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> nor such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>censure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="censure" newWord="discussion" score="0.659">discussion</span>,"cried Elizabeth;"I am not a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reader</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.73" formerWord="reader" newWord="evening" score="0.73">evening</span>, and I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in many things."
<p>"In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nursing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="nursing" newWord="anything" score="0.684">anything</span> your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> I am sure you have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>,"said Bingley;"and I hope it will be soon increased by seeing her quite well."
<p>Elizabeth thanked him from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and then walked towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> where a few books were lying. He immediately offered to fetch her others - - all that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> afforded. 
<p>"And I wish my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>collection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="collection" newWord="observation" score="0.65">observation</span> were larger for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benefit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.654" formerWord="benefit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.654">astonishment</span> and my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span>; but I am an idle <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fellow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="fellow" newWord="happiness" score="0.784">happiness</span>, and though I have not many, I have more than I ever looked into."
<p>Elizabeth assured him that she could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span> herself perfectly with those in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>"I am astonished,"said Miss Bingley,"that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> should have left so small a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>collection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="collection" newWord="observation" score="0.65">observation</span> of books. What a delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> you have at Pemberley, Mr. Darcy!"
<p>"It ought to be good,"he replied,"it has been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> of many generations."
<p>"And then you have added so much to it yourself, you are always buying books."
<p>"I cannot comprehend the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> in such days as these."
<p>"Neglect! I am sure you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> that can add to the beauties of that noble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>. Charles, when you build your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, I wish it may be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> as delightful as Pemberley."
<p>"I wish it may."
<p>"But I would really advise you to make your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purchase</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.306" formerWord="purchase" newWord="dining" score="0.306">dining</span> in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, and take Pemberley for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>model</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="model" newWord="hazard" score="0.219">hazard</span>. There is not a finer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>county</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="county" newWord="innocence" score="0.275">innocence</span> in England than Derbyshire."
<p>"With all my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; I will buy Pemberley itself if Darcy will sell it."
<p>"I am talking of possibilities, Charles."
<p>"Upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, Caroline, I should think it more possible to get Pemberley by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purchase</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.306" formerWord="purchase" newWord="dining" score="0.306">dining</span> than by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="imitation" newWord="slumber" score="0.275">slumber</span>."
<p>Elizabeth was so much caught with what passed, as to leave her very little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>; and soon laying it wholly aside, she drew near the card-table, and stationed herself between Mr. Bingley and his eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, to observe the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span>. 
<p>"Is Miss Darcy much grown since the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spring</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="spring" newWord="time" score="0.959">time</span>?"said Miss Bingley;"will she be as tall as I am?"
<p>"I think she will. She is now about Miss Elizabeth Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>height</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.273" formerWord="height" newWord="fashion" score="0.273">fashion</span>, or rather taller."
<p>"How I long to see her again! I never met with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> who delighted me so much. Such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, such manners! And so extremely accomplished for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>! Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>performance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="performance" newWord="though" score="0.309">though</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pianoforte</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="pianoforte" newWord="day" score="0.859">day</span> is exquisite."
<p>"It is amazing to me,"said Bingley,"how young ladies can have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="patience" newWord="aunt" score="0.938">aunt</span> to be so very accomplished as they all are."
<p>"All young ladies accomplished! My dear Charles, what do you mean?"
<p>"Yes, all of them, I think. They all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="paint" newWord="noise" score="0.322">noise</span> tables, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cover</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.415" formerWord="cover" newWord="furniture" score="0.415">furniture</span> screens, and net purses. I scarcely know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> who cannot do all this, and I am sure I never heard a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> spoken of for the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, without being informed that she was very accomplished."
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>list</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.485" formerWord="list" newWord="spite" score="0.485">spite</span> of the common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="extent" newWord="hand" score="0.79">hand</span> of accomplishments,"said Darcy,"has too much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> is applied to many a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> who deserves it no otherwise than by netting a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.562" formerWord="purse" newWord="dirt" score="0.562">dirt</span> or covering a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>screen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="screen" newWord="weather" score="0.542">weather</span>. But I am very far from agreeing with you in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estimation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="estimation" newWord="vacancy" score="0.216">vacancy</span> of ladies in general. I cannot boast of knowing more than half-a-dozen, in the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>range</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="range" newWord="offering" score="0.247">offering</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, that are really accomplished."
<p>"Nor I, I am sure,"said Miss Bingley. 
<p>"Then,"observed Elizabeth,"you must comprehend a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of an accomplished <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>"Yes, I do comprehend a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in it."
<p>"Oh! certainly,"cried his faithful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="assistant" newWord="match" score="0.25">match</span>,"no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> can be really esteemed accomplished who does not greatly surpass what is usually met with. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> must have a thorough <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>singing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="singing" newWord="round" score="0.31">round</span>, drawing, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span>, and the modern languages, to deserve the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>; and besides all this, she must possess a certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span> and expressions, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> will be but half-deserved."
<p>"All this she must possess,"added Darcy,"and to all this she must yet add <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> more substantial, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> by extensive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reading</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="reading" newWord="portion" score="0.297">portion</span>."
<p>"I am no longer surprised at your knowing only six accomplished women. I rather wonder now at your knowing any."
<p>"Are you so severe upon your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sex</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="sex" newWord="compassion" score="0.52">compassion</span> as to doubt the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of all this?"
<p>"I never saw such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>. I never saw such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>capacity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="capacity" newWord="phoo" score="0.302">phoo</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span>, as you describe united."
<p>Mrs. Hurst and Miss Bingley both cried out against the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>injustice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="injustice" newWord="give" score="0.326">give</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> implied <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, and were both protesting that they knew many women who answered this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>description</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="description" newWord="wish" score="0.731">wish</span>, when Mr. Hurst called them to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>order</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="order" newWord="way" score="0.909">way</span>, with bitter complaints of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inattention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="inattention" newWord="tongue" score="0.26">tongue</span> to what was going forward. As all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> was thereby at an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span>, Elizabeth soon afterwards left the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>"Elizabeth Bennet,"said Miss Bingley, when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> was closed on her,"is one of those young ladies who seek to recommend themselves to the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sex</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="sex" newWord="compassion" score="0.52">compassion</span> by undervaluing their own; and with many men, I dare say, it succeeds. But, in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, it is a paltry <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>device</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="device" newWord="fact" score="0.339">fact</span>, a very mean art."
<p>"Undoubtedly,"replied Darcy, to whom this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remark</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.379" formerWord="remark" newWord="ridicule" score="0.379">ridicule</span> was chiefly addressed,"there is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meanness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.218" formerWord="meanness" newWord="roll" score="0.218">roll</span> in all the arts which ladies sometimes condescend to employ for captivation. Whatever bears <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affinity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="affinity" newWord="seemed" score="0.23">seemed</span> to cunning is despicable."
<p>Miss Bingley was not so entirely satisfied with this reply as to continue the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth joined them again only to say that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was worse, and that she could not leave her. Bingley urged Mr. Jones being sent for immediately; while his sisters, convinced that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> could be of any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>service</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="service" newWord="time" score="0.851">time</span>, recommended an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>express</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="express" newWord="marianne" score="0.23">marianne</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> for one of the most eminent physicians. This she would not hear of; but she was not so unwilling to comply with their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span>; and it was settled that Mr. Jones should be sent for early in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, if Miss Bennet were not decidedly better. Bingley was quite uncomfortable; his sisters declared that they were miserable. They solaced their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wretchedness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.479" formerWord="wretchedness" newWord="tender" score="0.479">tender</span>, however, by duets after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span>, while he could find no better <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span> to his feelings than by giving his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> directions that every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> might be paid to the sick <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 9 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth passed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of being able to send a tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to the inquiries which she very early received from Mr. Bingley by a housemaid, and some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> afterwards from the two elegant ladies who waited on his sisters. In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amendment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.274" formerWord="amendment" newWord="use" score="0.274">use</span>, however, she requested to have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> sent to Longbourn, desiring her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> to visit Jane, and form her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> was immediately dispatched, and its contents as quickly complied with. Mrs. Bennet, accompanied by her two youngest girls, reached Netherfield soon after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>. 
<p>Had she found Jane in any apparent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span>, Mrs. Bennet would have been very miserable; but being satisfied on seeing her that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>illness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="illness" newWord="woman" score="0.788">woman</span> was not alarming, she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of her recovering immediately, as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restoration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="restoration" newWord="income" score="0.35">income</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> would probably remove her from Netherfield. She would not listen, therefore, to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span> of being carried <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; neither did the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apothecary</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="apothecary" newWord="communication" score="0.471">communication</span>, who arrived about the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, think it at all advisable. After sitting a little while with Jane, on Miss Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and three daughters all attended her into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.338" formerWord="parlour" newWord="distance" score="0.338">distance</span>. Bingley met them with hopes that Mrs. Bennet had not found Miss Bennet worse than she expected. 
<p>"Indeed I have, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>,"was her answer."She is a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> too ill to be moved. Mr. Jones says we must not think of moving her. We must trespass a little longer on your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span>."
<p>"Removed!"cried Bingley."It must not be thought of. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, I am sure, will not hear of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span>."
<p>"You may depend upon it, Madam,"said Miss Bingley, with cold <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>,"that Miss Bennet will receive every possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> while she remains with us."
<p>Mrs. Bennet was profuse in her acknowledgments. 
<p>"I am sure,"she added,"if it was not for such good friends I do not know what would become of her, for she is very ill indeed, and suffers a vast <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, though with the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="patience" newWord="aunt" score="0.938">aunt</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, which is always the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> with her, for she has, without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="exception" newWord="excellence" score="0.259">excellence</span>, the sweetest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> I have ever met with. I often tell my other girls they are <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to her. You have a sweet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> here, Mr. Bingley, and a charming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.32" formerWord="gravel" newWord="dirt" score="0.32">dirt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>. I do not know a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> that is equal to Netherfield. You will not think of quitting it in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span>, I hope, though you have but a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="lease" newWord="nephew" score="0.318">nephew</span>."
<p>"Whatever I do is done in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span>,"replied he;"and therefore if I should resolve to quit Netherfield, I should probably be off in five minutes. At present, however, I consider myself as quite fixed here."
<p>"That is exactly what I should have supposed of you,"said Elizabeth. 
<p>"You begin to comprehend me, do you?"cried he, turning towards her. 
<p>"Oh! yes - - I understand you perfectly."
<p>"I wish I might take this for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span>; but to be so easily seen through I am afraid is pitiful."
<p>"That is as it happens. It does not follow that a deep, intricate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> is more or less estimable than such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> as yours."
<p>"Lizzy,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>,"remember where you are, and do not run on in the wild <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> that you are suffered to do at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>."
<p>"I did not know before,"continued Bingley immediately,"that you were a studier of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>. It must be an amusing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>study</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.54" formerWord="study" newWord="curiosity" score="0.54">curiosity</span>."
<p>"Yes, but intricate characters are the most amusing. They have at least that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>."
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>,"said Darcy,"can in general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supply</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="supply" newWord="attempt" score="0.601">attempt</span> but a few subjects for such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>study</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.54" formerWord="study" newWord="curiosity" score="0.54">curiosity</span>. In a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> you move in a very confined and unvarying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>."
<p>"But people themselves alter so much, that there is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> new to be observed in them for ever."
<p>"Yes, indeed,"cried Mrs. Bennet, offended by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of mentioning a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>."I assure you there is quite as much of that going on in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> as in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."
<p><span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="Everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">Word</span> was surprised, and Darcy, after looking at her for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, turned silently away. Mrs. Bennet, who fancied she had gained a complete <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>victory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.607" formerWord="victory" newWord="attempt" score="0.607">attempt</span> over him, continued her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span>. 
<p>"I cannot see that London has any great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>, for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, except the shops and public places. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> is a vast <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasanter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="pleasanter" newWord="question" score="0.549">question</span>, is it not, Mr. Bingley?"
<p>"When I am in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>,"he replied,"I never wish to leave it; and when I am in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> it is pretty much the same. They have each their advantages, and I can be equally happy in either."
<p>"Aye - - that is because you have the right <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>. But that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>,"looking at Darcy,"seemed to think the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all."
<p>"Indeed, Mamma, you are mistaken,"said Elizabeth, blushing for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>."You quite mistook Mr. Darcy. He only meant that there was not such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of people to be met with in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> as in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, which you must acknowledge to be true."
<p>"Certainly, my dear, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> said there were; but as to not meeting with many people in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, I believe there are few neighbourhoods larger. I know we dine with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>four-and-twenty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.262" formerWord="four-and-twenty" newWord="stroll" score="0.262">stroll</span> families."
<p><span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> for Elizabeth could enable Bingley to keep his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was less delicate, and directed her eyes towards Mr. Darcy with a very expressive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>. Elizabeth, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of saying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> that might turn her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s thoughts, now asked her if Charlotte Lucas had been at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> since her coming away. 
<p>"Yes, she called <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>. What an agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> Sir William is, Mr. Bingley, is not he? So much the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fashion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.531" formerWord="fashion" newWord="persuasion" score="0.531">persuasion</span>! So genteel and easy! He has always <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to say to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>. That is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breeding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.783" formerWord="breeding" newWord="countenance" score="0.783">countenance</span>; and those persons who fancy themselves very important, and never open their mouths, quite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="mistake" newWord="time" score="0.949">time</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>."
<p>"Did Charlotte dine with you?"
<p>"No, she would go <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. I fancy she was wanted about the mince-pies. For my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, Mr. Bingley, I always keep servants that can do their own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span>; my daughters are brought up very differently. But <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> is to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span> for themselves, and the Lucases are a very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of girls, I assure you. It is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="pity" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> they are not handsome! Not that I think Charlotte so very plain - - but then she is our particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>."
<p>"She seems a very pleasant young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>"Oh! dear, yes; but you must own she is very plain. Lady Lucas herself has often said so, and envied me Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>. I do not like to boast of my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, but to be sure, Jane - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> does not often see <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> better looking. It is what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> says. I do not trust my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span>. When she was only fifteen, there was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> at my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> Gardiner's in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> so much in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with her that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="sister-in-law" newWord="stranger" score="0.297">stranger</span> was sure he would make her an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> before we came away. But, however, he did not. Perhaps he thought her too young. However, he wrote some verses on her, and very pretty they were."
<p>"And so ended his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>,"said Elizabeth impatiently."There has been many a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>, I fancy, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>overcome</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.317" formerWord="overcome" newWord="tea" score="0.317">tea</span> in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. I wonder who first discovered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>efficacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.276" formerWord="efficacy" newWord="complaint" score="0.276">complaint</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poetry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.727" formerWord="poetry" newWord="minute" score="0.727">minute</span> in driving away love!"
<p>"I have been used to consider <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poetry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.727" formerWord="poetry" newWord="minute" score="0.727">minute</span> as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>food</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.396" formerWord="food" newWord="tea" score="0.396">tea</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>,"said Darcy. 
<p>"Of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span>, stout, healthy love it may. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="Everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">Brother</span> nourishes what is strong already. But if it be only a slight, thin <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>, I am convinced that one good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sonnet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.525" formerWord="sonnet" newWord="expense" score="0.525">expense</span> will starve it entirely away."
<p>Darcy only smiled; and the general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> which ensued made Elizabeth tremble lest her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> should be exposing herself again. She longed to speak, but could think of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to say; and after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> Mrs. Bennet began repeating her thanks to Mr. Bingley for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> to Jane, with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apology</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="apology" newWord="character" score="0.793">character</span> for troubling him also with Lizzy. Mr. Bingley was unaffectedly civil in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and forced his younger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> to be civil also, and say what the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> required. She performed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> indeed without much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>graciousness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="graciousness" newWord="dining" score="0.302">dining</span>, but Mrs. Bennet was satisfied, and soon afterwards ordered her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. Upon this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>signal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="signal" newWord="ingenuity" score="0.36">ingenuity</span>, the youngest of her daughters put herself forward. The two girls had been whispering to each other during the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>result</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="result" newWord="observation" score="0.402">observation</span> of it was, that the youngest should <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tax</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="tax" newWord="principle" score="0.283">principle</span> Mr. Bingley with having promised on his first coming into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> to give a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> at Netherfield. 
<p>Lydia was a stout, well-grown <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> of fifteen, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span> and good-humoured <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>; a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> had brought her into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>public</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.507" formerWord="public" newWord="housekeeper" score="0.507">housekeeper</span> at an early <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>. She had high animal spirits, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.479" formerWord="self-consequence" newWord="minute" score="0.479">minute</span>, which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> of the officers, to whom her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s good dinners, and her own easy manners recommended her, had increased into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span>. She was very equal, therefore, to address Mr. Bingley on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>, and abruptly reminded him of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span>; adding, that it would be the most shameful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> if he did not keep it. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to this sudden <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attack</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.641" formerWord="attack" newWord="arrival" score="0.641">arrival</span> was delightful to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="ear" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span>: 
<p>"I am perfectly ready, I assure you, to keep my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span>; and when your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> is recovered, you shall, if you please, name the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>. But you would not wish to be dancing when she is ill."
<p>Lydia declared herself satisfied."Oh! yes - - it would be much better to wait till Jane was well, and by that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> most likely Captain Carter would be at Meryton again. And when you have given your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>,"she added,"I shall insist on their giving one also. I shall tell Colonel Forster it will be quite a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> if he does not."
<p>Mrs. Bennet and her daughters then departed, and Elizabeth returned instantly to Jane, leaving her own and her relations ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to the remarks of the two ladies and Mr. Darcy; the latter of whom, however, could not be prevailed on to join in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>censure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="censure" newWord="discussion" score="0.659">discussion</span> of her, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of all Miss Bingley's witticisms on fine eyes. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 10 
<p>
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> passed much as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before had done. Mrs. Hurst and Miss Bingley had spent some hours of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> with the invalid, who continued, though slowly, to mend; and in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> Elizabeth joined their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>. The loo-table, however, did not appear.
