Mr. Darcy was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span>, and Miss Bingley, seated near him, was watching the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>progress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.773" formerWord="progress" newWord="heart" score="0.773">heart</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> and repeatedly calling off his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> by messages to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. Mr. Hurst and Mr. Bingley were at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>piquet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.294" formerWord="piquet" newWord="curse" score="0.294">curse</span>, and Mrs. Hurst was observing their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth took up some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>needlework</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.365" formerWord="needlework" newWord="proverb" score="0.365">proverb</span>, and was sufficiently amused in attending to what passed between Darcy and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span>. The perpetual commendations of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>, either on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>handwriting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="handwriting" newWord="minute" score="0.387">minute</span>, or on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evenness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="evenness" newWord="minute" score="0.673">minute</span> of his lines, or on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, with the perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unconcern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="unconcern" newWord="spirit" score="0.601">spirit</span> with which her praises were received, formed a curious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dialogue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.492" formerWord="dialogue" newWord="work" score="0.492">work</span>, and was exactly in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>union</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="union" newWord="air" score="0.327">air</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of each. 
<p>"How delighted Miss Darcy will be to receive such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>!"
<p>He made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. 
<p>"You write uncommonly fast."
<p>"You are mistaken. I write rather slowly."
<p>"How many letters you must have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> to write in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>! Letters of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, too! How odious I should think them!"
<p>"It is fortunate, then, that they fall to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.401" formerWord="lot" newWord="volume" score="0.401">volume</span> instead of yours."
<p>"Pray tell your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> that I long to see her."
<p>"I have already told her so once, by your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span>."
<p>"I am afraid you do not like your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.584" formerWord="pen" newWord="answer" score="0.584">answer</span>. Let me mend it for you. I mend pens remarkably well."
<p>"Thank you - - but I always mend my own."
<p>"How can you contrive to write so even?"
<p>He was silent. 
<p>"Tell your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> I am delighted to hear of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>harp</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.537" formerWord="harp" newWord="truth" score="0.537">truth</span>; and pray let her know that I am quite in raptures with her beautiful little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, and I think it infinitely superior to Miss Grantley ' s."
<p>"Will you give me leave to defer your raptures till I write again? At present I have not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> to do them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>."
<p>"Oh! it is of no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>. I shall see her in January. But do you always write such charming long letters to her, Mr. Darcy?"
<p>"They are generally long; but whether always charming it is not for me to determine."
<p>"It is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.648" formerWord="rule" newWord="scheme" score="0.648">scheme</span> with me, that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> who can write a long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span>, cannot write ill."
<p>"That will not do for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> to Darcy, Caroline,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>,"because he does not write with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span>. He studies too much for words of four syllables. Do not you, Darcy?"
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span> is very different from yours."
<p>"Oh!"cried Miss Bingley,"Charles writes in the most careless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> imaginable. He leaves out <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> his words, and blots the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span>."
<p>"My ideas <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="flow" newWord="horror" score="0.318">horror</span> so rapidly that I have not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to express them - - by which means my letters sometimes convey no ideas at all to my correspondents."
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.501" formerWord="humility" newWord="plenty" score="0.501">plenty</span>, Mr. Bingley,"said Elizabeth,"must disarm <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.847" formerWord="reproof" newWord="family" score="0.847">family</span>."
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> is more deceitful,"said Darcy,"than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.501" formerWord="humility" newWord="plenty" score="0.501">plenty</span>. <p>"And which of the two do you call my little recent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>piece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="piece" newWord="longbourn" score="0.754">longbourn</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>modesty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="modesty" newWord="portionless" score="0.283">portionless</span>?"
<p>"The indirect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>boast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="boast" newWord="horror" score="0.464">horror</span>; for you are really proud of your defects in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span>, because you consider them as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proceeding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.364" formerWord="proceeding" newWord="conscience" score="0.364">conscience</span> from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rapidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.727" formerWord="rapidity" newWord="pain" score="0.727">pain</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carelessness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.531" formerWord="carelessness" newWord="notice" score="0.531">notice</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>execution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.494" formerWord="execution" newWord="worth" score="0.494">worth</span>, which, if not estimable, you think at least highly interesting. <p>"Nay,"cried Bingley,"this is too much, to remember at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> all the foolish things that were said in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. And yet, upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>, I believe what I said of myself to be true, and I believe it at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>. <p>"I dare say you believed it; but I am by no means convinced that you would be gone with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>celerity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="celerity" newWord="pang" score="0.248">pang</span>. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> would be quite as dependent on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> as that of any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> I know; and if, as you were mounting your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="horse" newWord="pleasure" score="0.851">pleasure</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> were to say, ' Bingley, you had better stay till next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>, ' you would probably do it, you would probably not go - - and at another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, might stay a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span>."
<p>"You have only proved by this,"cried Elizabeth,"that Mr. Bingley did not do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span> to his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>. <p>"I am exceedingly gratified,"said Bingley,"by your converting what my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> says into a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sweetness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.803" formerWord="sweetness" newWord="minute" score="0.803">minute</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>. <p>"Would Mr. Darcy then consider the rashness of your original intentions as atoned for by your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>obstinacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="obstinacy" newWord="shoulder" score="0.248">shoulder</span> in adhering to it?"
<p>"Upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, I cannot exactly explain the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>; Darcy must speak for himself."
<p>"You expect me to account for opinions which you choose to call <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>, but which I have never acknowledged. / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span>, has merely desired it, asked it without offering one <span class="color" title="Was: <span <p>"To yield readily - - easily - - to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>merit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="merit" newWord="attitude" score="0.205">attitude</span> with you."
<p>"To yield without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> of either."
<p>"You appear to me, Mr. Darcy, to allow <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>influence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="influence" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> for the requester would often make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> readily <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yield</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.381" formerWord="yield" newWord="road" score="0.381">road</span> to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span>, without waiting for arguments to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> into it. I am not particularly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> as you have supposed about Mr. Bingley. We may as well wait, perhaps, till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> occurs before we discuss the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discretion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.865" formerWord="discretion" newWord="arrival" score="0.865">arrival</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> thereupon. But in general and ordinary cases between <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, where one of them is desired by the other to change a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> of no very great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, should you think <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> for complying with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span>, without waiting to be argued into it?"
<p>"Will it not be advisable, before we proceed on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, to arrange with rather more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>precision</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.444" formerWord="precision" newWord="impatient" score="0.444">impatient</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> which is to appertain to this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span>, as well as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span> subsisting between the parties?"
<p>"By all means,"cried Bingley;"let us hear all the particulars, not forgetting their comparative <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>height</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.273" formerWord="height" newWord="fashion" score="0.273">fashion</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>size</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.812" formerWord="size" newWord="longbourn" score="0.812">longbourn</span>; for that will have more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.744" formerWord="weight" newWord="sense" score="0.744">sense</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>argument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="argument" newWord="surprise" score="0.796">surprise</span>, Miss Bennet, than you may be aware of. I assure you, that if Darcy were not such a great tall <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fellow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="fellow" newWord="happiness" score="0.784">happiness</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> with myself, I should not pay him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="deference" newWord="way" score="0.729">way</span>. I declare I do not know a more awful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> than Darcy, on particular occasions, and in particular places; at his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> especially, and of a Sunday <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, when he has <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to do."
<p>Mr. Darcy smiled; but Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> she could perceive that he was rather offended, and therefore checked her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span>. Miss Bingley warmly resented the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="indignity" newWord="yellow" score="0.216">yellow</span> he had received, in an expostulation with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> for talking such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nonsense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="nonsense" newWord="person" score="0.722">person</span>. 
<p>"I see your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span>, Bingley,"said his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>."You dislike an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>argument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="argument" newWord="surprise" score="0.796">surprise</span>, and want to silence this."
<p>"Perhaps I do. Arguments are too much like disputes. If you and Miss Bennet will defer yours till I am out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, I shall be very thankful; and then you may say whatever you like of me."
<p>"What you ask,"said Elizabeth,"is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sacrifice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="sacrifice" newWord="g" score="0.232">g</span> on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>; and Mr. Darcy had much better finish his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."
<p>Mr. Darcy took her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span>, and did finish his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. 
<p>When that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> was over, he applied to Miss Bingley and Elizabeth for an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indulgence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="indulgence" newWord="error" score="0.429">error</span> of some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>. Miss Bingley moved with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alacrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.813" formerWord="alacrity" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.813">acquaintance</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pianoforte</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="pianoforte" newWord="day" score="0.859">day</span>; and, after a polite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span> that Elizabeth would lead the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> which the other as politely and more earnestly negatived, she seated herself. 
<p>Mrs. Hurst sang with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and while they were thus employed, Elizabeth could not help observing, as she turned over some music-books that lay on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span>, how frequently Mr. Darcy's eyes were fixed on her. She hardly knew how to suppose that she could be an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> to so great a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; and yet that he should look at her because he disliked her, was still more strange. She could only imagine, however, at last that she drew his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> because there was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> more wrong and reprehensible, according to his ideas of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>right</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="right" newWord="nothing" score="0.843">nothing</span>, than in any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="supposition" newWord="gravity" score="0.327">gravity</span> did not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> her. She liked him too little to care for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="approbation" newWord="paint" score="0.232">paint</span>. 
<p>After playing some Italian songs, Miss Bingley varied the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="charm" newWord="sister" score="0.891">sister</span> by a lively Scotch <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span>; and soon afterwards Mr. Darcy, drawing near Elizabeth, said to her: 
<p>"Do not you feel a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>, Miss Bennet, to seize such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of dancing a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="reel" newWord="fable" score="0.319">fable</span>?"
<p>She smiled, but made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. He repeated the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span>, with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. 
<p>"Oh!"said she,"I heard you before, but I could not immediately determine what to say in reply. You wanted me, I know, to say ' Yes, ' that you might have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of despising my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>; but I always <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> in overthrowing those <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of schemes, and cheating a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> of their premeditated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span>. I have, therefore, made up my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> to tell you, that I do not want to dance a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="reel" newWord="fable" score="0.319">fable</span> at all - - and now despise me if you dare."
<p>"Indeed I do not dare."
<p>Elizabeth, having rather expected to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affront</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="affront" newWord="person" score="0.637">person</span> him, was amazed at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.884" formerWord="gallantry" newWord="end" score="0.884">end</span>; but there was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mixture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.612" formerWord="mixture" newWord="gallery" score="0.612">gallery</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sweetness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.803" formerWord="sweetness" newWord="minute" score="0.803">minute</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>archness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.377" formerWord="archness" newWord="step" score="0.377">step</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> which made it difficult for her to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affront</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="affront" newWord="person" score="0.637">person</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>; and Darcy had never been so bewitched by any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> as he was by her. He really believed, that were it not for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inferiority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.863" formerWord="inferiority" newWord="course" score="0.863">course</span> of her connections, he should be in some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span>. 
<p>Miss Bingley saw, or suspected enough to be jealous; and her great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.802" formerWord="recovery" newWord="character" score="0.802">character</span> of her dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Jane received some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span> from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> of getting rid of Elizabeth. 
<p>She often tried to provoke Darcy into disliking her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="guest" newWord="mode" score="0.349">mode</span>, by talking of their supposed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, and planning his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alliance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="alliance" newWord="aunt" score="0.784">aunt</span>. 
<p>"I hope,"said she, as they were walking together in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shrubbery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.596" formerWord="shrubbery" newWord="person" score="0.596">person</span> the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>,"you will give your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.78" formerWord="mother-in-law" newWord="everything" score="0.78">everything</span> a few hints, when this desirable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> takes <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of holding her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tongue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.32" formerWord="tongue" newWord="drive" score="0.32">drive</span>; and if you can <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compass</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="compass" newWord="accessory" score="0.205">accessory</span> it, do cure the younger girls of running after officers. And, if I may mention so delicate a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to check that little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span>, bordering on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conceit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="conceit" newWord="park" score="0.628">park</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span>, which your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> possesses."
<p>"Have you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> else to propose for my domestic <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span>?"
<p>"Oh! yes. Do let the portraits of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> Phillips be placed in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.928" formerWord="gallery" newWord="pleasure" score="0.928">pleasure</span> at Pemberley. Put them next to your great-uncle the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span>. They are in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>, you know, only in different lines. As for your Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span>, you must not have it taken, for what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>painter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="painter" newWord="justice" score="0.409">justice</span> could do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span> to those beautiful eyes?"
<p>"It would not be easy, indeed, to catch their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>, but their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="colour" newWord="party" score="0.87">party</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shape</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="shape" newWord="round" score="0.406">round</span>, and the eyelashes, so remarkably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span>, might be copied."
<p>At that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> they were met from another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> by Mrs. Hurst and Elizabeth herself. 
<p>"I did not know that you intended to walk,"said Miss Bingley, in some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span>, lest they had been overheard. 
<p>"You used us abominably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span>,"answered Mrs. Hurst,"running away without telling us that you were coming out."
<p>Then taking the disengaged <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="arm" newWord="course" score="0.974">course</span> of Mr. Darcy, she left Elizabeth to walk by herself. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>path</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.71" formerWord="path" newWord="matter" score="0.71">matter</span> just admitted three. Mr. Darcy felt their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rudeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.438" formerWord="rudeness" newWord="sigh" score="0.438">sigh</span>, and immediately said: 
<p>"This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> is not wide enough for our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>. We had better go into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>avenue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="avenue" newWord="disposition" score="0.257">disposition</span>."
<p>But Elizabeth, who had not the least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> to remain with them, laughingly answered: 
<p>"No, no; stay where you are. You are charmingly grouped, and appear to uncommon <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>. The picturesque would be spoilt by admitting a fourth. Good-bye."
<p>She then ran gaily off, rejoicing as she rambled about, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of being at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> again in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> or two. Jane was already so much recovered as to intend leaving her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>couple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="couple" newWord="sat" score="0.244">sat</span> of hours that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 11 
<p>
<p>When the ladies removed after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, Elizabeth ran up to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and seeing her well guarded from cold, attended her into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>, where she was welcomed by her two friends with many professions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; and Elizabeth had never seen them so agreeable as they were during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> which passed before the gentlemen appeared. Their powers of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> were considerable. They could describe an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entertainment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="entertainment" newWord="maid" score="0.391">maid</span> with accuracy, relate an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anecdote</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.382" formerWord="anecdote" newWord="round" score="0.382">round</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span> at their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span>. 
<p>But when the gentlemen entered, Jane was no longer the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>; Miss Bingley's eyes were instantly turned toward Darcy, and she had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to say to him before he had advanced many steps. He addressed himself to Miss Bennet, with a polite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>congratulation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.227" formerWord="congratulation" newWord="notion" score="0.227">notion</span>; Mr. Hurst also made her a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span>, and said he was"very glad;"but diffuseness and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span> remained for Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>salutation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.313" formerWord="salutation" newWord="service" score="0.313">service</span>. He was full of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. The first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.532" formerWord="half-hour" newWord="partner" score="0.532">partner</span> was spent in piling up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="fire" newWord="self" score="0.239">self</span>, lest she should suffer from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>; and she removed at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> to the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fireplace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.313" formerWord="fireplace" newWord="water" score="0.313">water</span>, that she might be further from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>. He then sat down by her, and talked scarcely to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> else. Elizabeth, at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> in the opposite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>corner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.414" formerWord="corner" newWord="one" score="0.414">one</span>, saw it all with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>. 
<p>When <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span> was over, Mr. Hurst reminded his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="sister-in-law" newWord="stranger" score="0.297">stranger</span> of the card-table - - but in vain. She had obtained private <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> that Mr. Darcy did not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> for cards; and Mr. Hurst soon found even his open <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>petition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="petition" newWord="discovery" score="0.26">discovery</span> rejected. She assured him that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> intended to play, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> of the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> seemed to justify her. Mr. Hurst had therefore <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to do, but to stretch himself on one of the sofas and go to sleep. Darcy took up a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>; Miss Bingley did the same; and Mrs. Hurst, principally occupied in playing with her bracelets and rings, joined now and then in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with Miss Bennet. 
<p>Miss Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> was quite as much engaged in watching Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>progress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.773" formerWord="progress" newWord="heart" score="0.773">heart</span> through his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>, as in reading her own; and she was perpetually either making some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span>, or looking at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>page</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.518" formerWord="page" newWord="chance" score="0.518">chance</span>. She could not win him, however, to any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>; he merely answered her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span>, and read on. At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, quite exhausted by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to be amused with her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>, which she had only chosen because it was the second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>volume</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="volume" newWord="house" score="0.857">house</span> of his, she gave a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yawn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.367" formerWord="yawn" newWord="aggravation" score="0.367">aggravation</span> and said,"How pleasant it is to spend an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>! I declare after all there is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> like reading! How much sooner one tires of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> than of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>! When I have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>."
<p>No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> made any reply. She then yawned again, threw aside her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>, and cast her eyes round the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.47" formerWord="quest" newWord="behaviour" score="0.47">behaviour</span> for some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>; when hearing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> mentioning a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> to Miss Bennet, she turned suddenly towards him and said: 
<p>"By the bye, Charles, are you really serious in meditating a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span> at Netherfield? I would advise you, before you determine on it, to consult the wishes of the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>; I am much mistaken if there are not some among us to whom a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> would be rather a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>punishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.433" formerWord="punishment" newWord="promise" score="0.433">promise</span> than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>"If you mean Darcy,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>,"he may go to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bed</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="bed" newWord="whip" score="0.249">whip</span>, if he chooses, before it begins - - but as for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>, it is quite a settled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>; and as soon as Nicholls has made white <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>soup</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.457" formerWord="soup" newWord="cause" score="0.457">cause</span> enough, I shall send <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> my cards."
<p>"I should like balls infinitely better,"she replied,"if they were carried on in a different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>; but there is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> insufferably tedious in the usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>process</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.245" formerWord="process" newWord="mine" score="0.245">mine</span> of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span>. It would surely be much more rational if <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> instead of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span> were made the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>order</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="order" newWord="way" score="0.909">way</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>."
<p>"Much more rational, my dear Caroline, I dare say, but it would not be near so much like a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>."
<p>Miss Bingley made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and soon afterwards she got up and walked about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>figure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="figure" newWord="week" score="0.834">week</span> was elegant, and she walked well; but Darcy, at whom it was all aimed, was still inflexibly studious. In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desperation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="desperation" newWord="principal" score="0.257">principal</span> of her feelings, she resolved on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="effort" newWord="excursion" score="0.239">excursion</span> more, and, turning to Elizabeth, said: 
<p>"Miss Eliza Bennet, let me persuade you to follow my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>example</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="example" newWord="rumour" score="0.336">rumour</span>, and take a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. I assure you it is very refreshing after sitting so long in one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="attitude" newWord="harangue" score="0.31">harangue</span>."
<p>Elizabeth was surprised, but agreed to it immediately. Miss Bingley succeeded no less in the real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>; Mr. Darcy looked up. He was as much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>awake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="awake" newWord="ridge" score="0.249">ridge</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>novelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="novelty" newWord="way" score="0.834">way</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span> as Elizabeth herself could be, and unconsciously closed his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>. He was directly invited to join their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, but he declined it, observing that he could imagine but two motives for their choosing to walk up and down the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> together, with either of which motives his joining them would interfere."What could he mean? She was dying to know what could be his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span>?"- - and asked Elizabeth whether she could at all understand him? 
<p>"Not at all,"was her answer;"but depend upon it, he means to be severe on us, and our surest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of disappointing him will be to ask <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> about it."
<p>Miss Bingley, however, was incapable of disappointing Mr. Darcy in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>, and persevered therefore in requiring an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>explanation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.92" formerWord="explanation" newWord="mother" score="0.92">mother</span> of his two motives. 
<p>"I have not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span> to explaining them,"said he, as soon as she allowed him to speak."You either choose this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>method</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="method" newWord="field" score="0.298">field</span> of passing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> because you are in each other's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.877" formerWord="confidence" newWord="heart" score="0.877">heart</span>, and have secret affairs to discuss, or because you are conscious that your figures appear to the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span>; if the first, I would be completely in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and if the second, I can admire you much better as I sit by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="fire" newWord="self" score="0.239">self</span>."
<p>"Oh! shocking!"cried Miss Bingley."I never heard <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> so abominable. How shall we punish him for such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>?"
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> so easy, if you have but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>,"said Elizabeth."We can all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plague</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="plague" newWord="bottle" score="0.368">bottle</span> and punish one another. Tease him - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span> at him. Intimate as you are, you must know how it is to be done."
<p>"But upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>, I do not. I do assure you that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span> has not yet taught me that. Tease <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>calmness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="calmness" newWord="brother" score="0.895">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.209" formerWord="presence" newWord="decay" score="0.209">decay</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>! No, no; I feel he may defy us there. And as to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="laughter" newWord="consciousness" score="0.36">consciousness</span>, we will not expose ourselves, if you please, by attempting to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span> without a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. Mr. Darcy may <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hug</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="hug" newWord="entertainment" score="0.281">entertainment</span> himself."
<p>"Mr. Darcy is not to be laughed at!"cried Elizabeth."That is an uncommon <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>, and uncommon I hope it will continue, for it would be a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> to me to have many such acquaintances. I dearly love a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span>."
<p>"Miss Bingley,"said he,"has given me more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> than can be. The wisest and the best of men - - nay, the wisest and best of their actions - - may be rendered ridiculous by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> whose first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joke</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.3" formerWord="joke" newWord="venture" score="0.3">venture</span>."
<p>"Certainly,"replied Elizabeth - -"there are such people, but I hope I am not one of them.
