I hope I never <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ridicule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.639" formerWord="ridicule" newWord="park" score="0.639">park</span> what is wise and good. Follies and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nonsense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="nonsense" newWord="person" score="0.722">person</span>, whims and inconsistencies, do divert me, I own, and I laugh at them whenever I can. But these, I suppose, are precisely what you are without."
<p>"Perhaps that is not possible for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span>. But it has been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>study</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.54" formerWord="study" newWord="curiosity" score="0.54">curiosity</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> to avoid those weaknesses which often expose a strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ridicule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.639" formerWord="ridicule" newWord="park" score="0.639">park</span>."
<p>"Such as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>."
<p>"Yes, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span> is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weakness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.755" formerWord="weakness" newWord="husband" score="0.755">husband</span> indeed. But <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> - - where there is a real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>superiority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.864" formerWord="superiority" newWord="brother" score="0.864">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> will be always under good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regulation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.381" formerWord="regulation" newWord="eagerness" score="0.381">eagerness</span>."
<p>Elizabeth turned away to hide a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>. 
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>examination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.228" formerWord="examination" newWord="copse" score="0.228">copse</span> of Mr. Darcy is over, I presume,"said Miss Bingley;"and pray what is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>result</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="result" newWord="observation" score="0.402">observation</span>?"
<p>"I am perfectly convinced by it that Mr. Darcy has no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="defect" newWord="minute" score="0.605">minute</span>. He owns it himself without disguise."
<p>"No,"said Darcy,"I have made no such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pretension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="pretension" newWord="trinket-box" score="0.225">trinket-box</span>. I have faults enough, but they are not, I hope, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> I dare not vouch for. It is, I believe, too little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yielding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.536" formerWord="yielding" newWord="evil" score="0.536">evil</span> - - certainly too little for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>convenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="convenience" newWord="family" score="0.915">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. I cannot forget the follies and vices of others so soon as I ought, nor their offenses against myself. My feelings are not puffed about with every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to move them. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> would perhaps be called resentful. My good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> once lost, is lost forever."
<p>"That is a failing indeed!"cried Elizabeth."Implacable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shade</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="shade" newWord="attempt" score="0.731">attempt</span> in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>. But you have chosen your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fault</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="fault" newWord="deal" score="0.893">deal</span> well. I really cannot laugh at it. You are safe from me."
<p>"There is, I believe, in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tendency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.306" formerWord="tendency" newWord="dirt" score="0.306">dirt</span> to some particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span> - - a natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="defect" newWord="minute" score="0.605">minute</span>, which not even the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span> can overcome."
<p>"And your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="defect" newWord="minute" score="0.605">minute</span> is to hate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>."
<p>"And yours,"he replied with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>,"is willfully to misunderstand them."
<p>"Do let us have a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>,"cried Miss Bingley, tired of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> in which she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span>."Louisa, you will not mind my waking Mr. Hurst?"
<p>Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> had not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pianoforte</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="pianoforte" newWord="day" score="0.859">day</span> was opened; and Darcy, after a few moments ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span>, was not sorry for it. He began to feel the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of paying Elizabeth too much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 12 
<p>
<p>In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agreement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.682" formerWord="agreement" newWord="horror" score="0.682">horror</span> between the sisters, Elizabeth wrote the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, to beg that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> might be sent for them in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. But Mrs. Bennet, who had calculated on her daughters remaining at Netherfield till the following Tuesday, which would exactly finish Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>, could not bring herself to receive them with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> before. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, therefore, was not propitious, at least not to Elizabeth's wishes, for she was impatient to get <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. Mrs. Bennet sent them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> that they could not possibly have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> before Tuesday; and in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>postscript</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.611" formerWord="postscript" newWord="nobody" score="0.611">nobody</span> it was added, that if Mr. Bingley and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> pressed them to stay longer, she could spare them very well. Against staying longer, however, Elizabeth was positively resolved - - nor did she much expect it would be asked; and fearful, on the contrary, as being considered as intruding themselves needlessly long, she urged Jane to borrow Mr. Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> immediately, and at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> it was settled that their original <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> of leaving Netherfield that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> should be mentioned, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span> made. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> excited many professions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>; and enough was said of wishing them to stay at least till the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> to work on Jane; and till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="morrow" newWord="half" score="0.39">half</span> their going was deferred. Miss Bingley was then sorry that she had proposed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="delay" newWord="affection" score="0.977">affection</span>, for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>jealousy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="jealousy" newWord="tea-table" score="0.239">tea-table</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> of one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> much exceeded her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for the other. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> heard with real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="sorrow" newWord="pleasure" score="0.651">pleasure</span> that they were to go so soon, and repeatedly tried to persuade Miss Bennet that it would not be safe for her - - that she was not enough recovered; but Jane was firm where she felt herself to be right. 
<p>To Mr. Darcy it was welcome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> - - Elizabeth had been at Netherfield long enough. She attracted him more than he liked - - and Miss Bingley was uncivil to her, and more teasing than usual to himself. He wisely resolved to be particularly careful that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sign</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.596" formerWord="sign" newWord="profession" score="0.596">profession</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> should now escape him, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> that could elevate her with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of influencing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span>; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> that if such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> had been suggested, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> during the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> must have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>material</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="material" newWord="landing-place" score="0.253">landing-place</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.744" formerWord="weight" newWord="sense" score="0.744">sense</span> in confirming or crushing it. Steady to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span>, he scarcely spoke ten words to her through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of Saturday, and though they were at one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> left by themselves for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-an-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="half-an-hour" newWord="regret" score="0.477">regret</span>, he adhered most conscientiously to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>, and would not even look at her. 
<p>On Sunday, after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>service</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="service" newWord="time" score="0.851">time</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>separation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="separation" newWord="company" score="0.866">company</span>, so agreeable to almost all, took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>. Miss Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> to Elizabeth increased at last very rapidly, as well as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for Jane; and when they parted, after assuring the latter of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> it would always give her to see her either at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> or Netherfield, and embracing her most tenderly, she even shook hands with the former. Elizabeth took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> of the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> in the liveliest of spirits. 
<p>They were not welcomed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> very cordially by their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. Mrs. Bennet wondered at their coming, and thought them very wrong to give so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>, and was sure Jane would have caught <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cold</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="cold" newWord="return" score="0.787">return</span> again. But their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, though very laconic in his expressions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, was really glad to see them; he had felt their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.774" formerWord="circle" newWord="home" score="0.774">home</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, when they were all assembled, had lost much of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>animation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.416" formerWord="animation" newWord="minute" score="0.416">minute</span>, and almost all its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of Jane and Elizabeth. 
<p>They found Mary, as usual, deep in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>study</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.54" formerWord="study" newWord="curiosity" score="0.54">curiosity</span> of thorough-bass and human <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span>; and had some extracts to admire, and some new observations of threadbare <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.392" formerWord="morality" newWord="barouche" score="0.392">barouche</span> to listen to. Catherine and Lydia had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> for them of a different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span>. Much had been done and much had been said in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> since the preceding Wednesday; several of the officers had dined lately with their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>, a private had been flogged, and it had actually been hinted that Colonel Forster was going to be married. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 13 
<p>
<p>"I hope, my dear,"said Mr. Bennet to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, as they were at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>,"that you have ordered a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span>, because I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to expect an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>addition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.876" formerWord="addition" newWord="mother" score="0.876">mother</span> to our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>."
<p>"Who do you mean, my dear? I know of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> that is coming, I am sure, unless Charlotte Lucas should happen to call in - - and I hope my dinners are good enough for her. I do not believe she often sees such at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>."
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> of whom I speak is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span>."
<p>Mrs. Bennet's eyes sparkled."A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span>! It is Mr. Bingley, I am sure! Well, I am sure I shall be extremely glad to see Mr. Bingley. But - - good Lord! how unlucky! There is not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.512" formerWord="bit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.512">astonishment</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.519" formerWord="fish" newWord="year" score="0.519">year</span> to be got <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span>. Lydia, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>, ring the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bell</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.204" formerWord="bell" newWord="varnish" score="0.204">varnish</span> - - I must speak to Hill this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>."
<p>"It is not Mr. Bingley,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>;"it is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> whom I never saw in the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>."
<p>This roused a general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>; and he had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of being eagerly questioned by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> and his five daughters at once. 
<p>After amusing himself some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> with their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>, he thus explained: 
<p>"About a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span> ago I received this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; and about a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> ago I answered it, for I thought it a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> of some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span>, and requiring early <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. It is from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, Mr. Collins, who, when I am dead, may turn you all out of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> as soon as he pleases."
<p>"Oh! my dear,"cried his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>,"I cannot bear to hear that mentioned. Pray do not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span> of that odious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. I do think it is the hardest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> should be entailed away from your own children; and I am sure, if I had been you, I should have tried long ago to do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> or other about it."
<p>Jane and Elizabeth tried to explain to her the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> of an entail. They had often attempted to do it before, but it was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> on which Mrs. Bennet was beyond the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.389" formerWord="reach" newWord="office" score="0.389">office</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>, and she continued to rail bitterly against the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cruelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="cruelty" newWord="native" score="0.298">native</span> of settling an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> away from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> of five daughters, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> whom <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> cared <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> about. 
<p>"It certainly is a most iniquitous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>,"said Mr. Bennet,"and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> can clear Mr. Collins from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guilt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="guilt" newWord="kind" score="0.86">kind</span> of inheriting Longbourn. But if you will listen to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, you may perhaps be a little softened by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of expressing himself."
<p>"No, that I am sure I shall not; and I think it is very impertinent of him to write to you at all, and very hypocritical. I hate such false friends. Why could he not keep on quarreling with you, as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> did before him?"
<p>"Why, indeed; he does seem to have had some filial scruples on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, as you will hear."
<p>"Hunsford, near Westerham, Kent, 15th October. 
<p>"Dear Sir, - - 
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disagreement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.222" formerWord="disagreement" newWord="amount" score="0.222">amount</span> subsisting between yourself and my late honoured <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> always gave me much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uneasiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="uneasiness" newWord="disquiet" score="0.229">disquiet</span>, and since I have had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span> to lose him, I have frequently wished to heal the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.714" formerWord="breach" newWord="spring" score="0.714">spring</span>; but for some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> I was kept back by my own doubts, fearing lest it might seem disrespectful to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>memory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="memory" newWord="deficiency" score="0.462">deficiency</span> for me to be on good terms with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> with whom it had always pleased him to be at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="variance" newWord="wavering" score="0.217">wavering</span>. - - ' There, Mrs. Bennet. ' - - My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, however, is now made up on the <span title="Was: <span class='purple'>ordination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="ordination" newWord="cheese" score="0.327">cheese</span> at Easter, I have been so fortunate as to be distinguished by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patronage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="patronage" newWord="wall" score="0.303">wall</span> of the Right formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, and be ever ready to perform those rites and ceremonies which are instituted by the Church of England. As a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span>, moreover, I feel it my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> to promote and establish the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blessing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.913" formerWord="blessing" newWord="town" score="0.913">town</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>peace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="peace" newWord="anything" score="0.817">anything</span> in all families within the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.389" formerWord="reach" newWord="office" score="0.389">office</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>influence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="influence" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>; and on these grounds I flatter myself that my present overtures are highly commendable, and that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> of my being next in the entail of Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> will be kindly overlooked on your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, and not lead you to reject the offered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>olive-branch</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.314" formerWord="olive-branch" newWord="butcher" score="0.314">butcher</span>. I cannot be otherwise than concerned at being the means of injuring your amiable daughters, and beg leave to apologise for it, as well as to assure you of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>readiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="readiness" newWord="engagement" score="0.846">engagement</span> to make them every possible amends - - but of this hereafter. If you should have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span> to
