
<p>"WILLIAM COLLINS"
<p>"At four o'clock, therefore, we may expect this peace-making <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>,"said Mr. Bennet, as he folded up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."He seems to be a most conscientious and polite young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, and I doubt not will prove a valuable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, especially if Lady Catherine should be so indulgent as to let him come to us again."
<p>"There is some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> in what he says about the girls, however, and if he is disposed to make them any amends, I shall not be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> to discourage him."
<p>"Though it is difficult,"said Jane,"to guess in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> he can mean to make us the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>atonement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.672" formerWord="atonement" newWord="rest" score="0.672">rest</span> he thinks our due, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> is certainly to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span>."
<p>Elizabeth was chiefly struck by his extraordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="deference" newWord="way" score="0.729">way</span> for Lady Catherine, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of christening, marrying, and burying his parishioners whenever it were required. 
<p>"He must be an oddity, I think,"said she."I cannot make him out. - - There is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> very pompous in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span>. - - And what can he mean by apologising for being next in the entail? - - We cannot suppose he would help it if he could. - - Could he be a sensible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>?"
<p>"No, my dear, I think not. I have great hopes of finding him quite the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reverse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.469" formerWord="reverse" newWord="bottle" score="0.469">bottle</span>. There is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mixture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.612" formerWord="mixture" newWord="gallery" score="0.612">gallery</span> of servility and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.844" formerWord="self-importance" newWord="way" score="0.844">way</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, which promises well. I am <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatient</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.742" formerWord="impatient" newWord="news" score="0.742">news</span> to see him."
<p>"In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.286" formerWord="composition" newWord="desertion" score="0.286">desertion</span>,"said Mary,"the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> does not seem defective. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of the olive-branch perhaps is not wholly new, yet I think it is well expressed."
<p>To Catherine and Lydia, neither the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> nor its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="writer" newWord="conquest" score="0.421">conquest</span> were in any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> interesting. It was next to impossible that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> should come in a scarlet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="coat" newWord="chair" score="0.516">chair</span>, and it was now some weeks since they had received <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="colour" newWord="party" score="0.87">party</span>. As for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> had done away much of her ill-will, and she was preparing to see him with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span> which astonished her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> and daughters. 
<p>Mr. Collins was punctual to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, and was received with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span> by the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Mr. Bennet indeed said little; but the ladies were ready enough to talk, and Mr. Collins seemed neither in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>need</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="need" newWord="reply" score="0.27">reply</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span>, nor inclined to be silent himself. He was a tall, heavy-looking young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of five-and-twenty. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> was grave and stately, and his manners were very formal. He had not been long seated before he complimented Mrs. Bennet on having so fine a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> of daughters; said he had heard much of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, but that in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="instance" newWord="minute" score="0.464">minute</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="fame" newWord="despair" score="0.233">despair</span> had fallen short of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>; and added, that he did not doubt her seeing them all in due <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> disposed of in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.884" formerWord="gallantry" newWord="end" score="0.884">end</span> was not much to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span> of some of his hearers; but Mrs. Bennet, who quarreled with no compliments, answered most readily. 
<p>"You are very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>, I am sure; and I wish with all my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> it may prove so, for else they will be destitute enough. Things are settled so oddly."
<p>"You allude, perhaps, to the entail of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span>."
<p>"Ah! <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, I do indeed. It is a grievous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> to my poor girls, you must confess. Not that I mean to find <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fault</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="fault" newWord="deal" score="0.893">deal</span> with you, for such things I know are all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. There is no knowing how estates will go when once they come to be entailed."
<p>"I am very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hardship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.527" formerWord="hardship" newWord="dinner" score="0.527">dinner</span> to my fair cousins, and could say much on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, but that I am cautious of appearing forward and precipitate. But I can assure the young ladies that I come prepared to admire them. At present I will not say more; but, perhaps, when we are better acquainted - -"
<p>He was interrupted by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summons</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="summons" newWord="mutton" score="0.298">mutton</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>; and the girls smiled on each other. They were not the only objects of Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span>, and all its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span>, were examined and praised; and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="commendation" newWord="hush" score="0.256">hush</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> would have touched Mrs. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, but for the mortifying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="supposition" newWord="gravity" score="0.327">gravity</span> of his viewing it all as his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>future</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="future" newWord="aunt" score="0.943">aunt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>property</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="property" newWord="degree" score="0.737">degree</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> too in its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> was highly admired; and he begged to know to which of his fair cousins the excellency of its cooking was owing. But he was set right there by Mrs. Bennet, who assured him with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>asperity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.227" formerWord="asperity" newWord="rectitude" score="0.227">rectitude</span> that they were very well able to keep a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cook</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="cook" newWord="route" score="0.266">route</span>, and that her daughters had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to do in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kitchen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.691" formerWord="kitchen" newWord="party" score="0.691">party</span>. He begged pardon for having displeased her. In a softened <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span> she declared herself not at all offended; but he continued to apologise for about a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 14 
<p>
<p>During <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, Mr. Bennet scarcely spoke at all; but when the servants were withdrawn, he thought it <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to have some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="guest" newWord="mode" score="0.349">mode</span>, and therefore started a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> in which he expected him to shine, by observing that he seemed very fortunate in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span>. Lady Catherine de Bourgh's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> to his wishes, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span>, appeared very remarkable. Mr. Bennet could not have chosen better. Mr. Collins was eloquent in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> elevated him to more than usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solemnity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="solemnity" newWord="return" score="0.776">return</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, and with a most important <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aspect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="aspect" newWord="curiosity" score="0.443">curiosity</span> he protested that"he had never in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> witnessed such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> - - such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="affability" newWord="absence" score="0.588">absence</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, as he had himself experienced from Lady Catherine. She had been graciously pleased to approve of both of the discourses which he had already had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of preaching before her. She had also asked him twice to dine at Rosings, and had sent for him only the Saturday before, to make up her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pool</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="pool" newWord="circulation" score="0.263">circulation</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quadrille</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="quadrille" newWord="capital" score="0.319">capital</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. Lady Catherine was reckoned proud by many people he knew, but he had never seen <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="affability" newWord="absence" score="0.588">absence</span> in her. She had always spoken to him as she would to any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>; she made not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span> to his joining in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> nor to his leaving the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span> occasionally for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> or two, to visit his relations. She had even condescended to advise him to marry as soon as he could, provided he chose with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discretion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.865" formerWord="discretion" newWord="arrival" score="0.865">arrival</span>; and had once paid him a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> in his humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parsonage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.223" formerWord="parsonage" newWord="villain" score="0.223">villain</span>, where she had perfectly approved all the alterations he had been making, and had even vouchsafed to suggest some herself - - some shelves in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>closet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="closet" newWord="dining" score="0.309">dining</span> up stairs."
<p>"That is all very proper and civil, I am sure,"said Mrs. Bennet,"and I dare say she is a very agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>. It is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="pity" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> that great ladies in general are not more like her. Does she live near you, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>?"
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> in which stands my humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="abode" newWord="minute" score="0.817">minute</span> is separated only by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span> from Rosings Park, her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>residence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.804" formerWord="residence" newWord="letter" score="0.804">letter</span>."
<p>"I think you said she was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>widow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.739" formerWord="widow" newWord="attention" score="0.739">attention</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>? Has she any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>?"
<p>"She has only one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heiress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="heiress" newWord="bear" score="0.298">bear</span> of Rosings, and of very extensive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>property</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="property" newWord="degree" score="0.737">degree</span>."
<p>"Ah!"said Mrs. Bennet, shaking her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>,"then she is better off than many girls. And what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> is she? Is she handsome?"
<p>"She is a most charming young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> indeed. Lady Catherine herself says that, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of true <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, Miss de Bourgh is far superior to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>handsomest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="handsomest" newWord="fascination" score="0.247">fascination</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sex</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="sex" newWord="compassion" score="0.52">compassion</span>, because there is that in her features which marks the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> of distinguished <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>birth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="birth" newWord="sign" score="0.289">sign</span>. She is unfortunately of a sickly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>constitution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="constitution" newWord="sublimity" score="0.22">sublimity</span>, which has prevented her from making that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>progress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.773" formerWord="progress" newWord="heart" score="0.773">heart</span> in many accomplishments which she could not have otherwise failed of, as I am informed by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> who superintended her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span>, and who still resides with them. But she is perfectly amiable, and often condescends to drive by my humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="abode" newWord="minute" score="0.817">minute</span> in her little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>phaeton</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="phaeton" newWord="magistrate" score="0.281">magistrate</span> and ponies."
<p>"Has she been presented? I do not remember her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> among the ladies at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>court</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="court" newWord="society" score="0.649">society</span>."
<p>"Her indifferent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> unhappily prevents her being in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; and by that means, as I told Lady Catherine one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, has deprived the British <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>court</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="court" newWord="society" score="0.649">society</span> of its brightest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ornament</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="ornament" newWord="inferiority" score="0.322">inferiority</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> seemed pleased with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>; and you may imagine that I am happy on every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> to offer those little delicate compliments which are always acceptable to ladies. I have more than once observed to Lady Catherine, that her charming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> seemed born to be a duchess, and that the most elevated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span>, instead of giving her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>, would be adorned by her. These are the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of little things which please her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, and it is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> which I conceive myself peculiarly bound to pay."
<p>"You <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span> very properly,"said Mr. Bennet,"and it is happy for you that you possess the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="talent" newWord="debasement" score="0.233">debasement</span> of flattering with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span>. May I ask whether these <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="pleasing" newWord="relationship" score="0.321">relationship</span> attentions proceed from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impulse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.418" formerWord="impulse" newWord="necessity" score="0.418">necessity</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, or are the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>result</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="result" newWord="observation" score="0.402">observation</span> of previous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>study</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.54" formerWord="study" newWord="curiosity" score="0.54">curiosity</span>?"
<p>"They arise chiefly from what is passing at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, and though I sometimes amuse myself with suggesting and arranging such little elegant compliments as may be adapted to ordinary occasions, I always <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> to give them as unstudied an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> as possible."
<p>Mr. Bennet's expectations were fully answered. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> was as absurd as he had hoped, and he listened to him with the keenest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span>, maintaining at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> the most resolute <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, and, except in an occasional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="glance" newWord="idea" score="0.849">idea</span> at Elizabeth, requiring no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. 
<p>By tea-time, however, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.269" formerWord="dose" newWord="abruptness" score="0.269">abruptness</span> had been enough, and Mr. Bennet was glad to take his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="guest" newWord="mode" score="0.349">mode</span> into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span> again, and, when <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span> was over, glad to invite him to read aloud to the ladies. Mr. Collins readily assented, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span> was produced; but, on beholding it ( for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> announced it to be from a circulating <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> ), he started back, and begging pardon, protested that he never read novels. Kitty stared at him, and Lydia exclaimed. Other books were produced, and after some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deliberation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.431" formerWord="deliberation" newWord="choice" score="0.431">choice</span> he chose Fordyce's Sermons. Lydia gaped as he opened the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>volume</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="volume" newWord="house" score="0.857">house</span>, and before he had, with very monotonous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solemnity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="solemnity" newWord="return" score="0.776">return</span>, read three pages, she interrupted him with: 
<p>"Do you know, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mamma</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.89" formerWord="mamma" newWord="friend" score="0.89">friend</span>, that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> Phillips talks of turning away Richard; and if he does, Colonel Forster will hire him. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> told me so herself on Saturday. I shall walk to Meryton to-morrow to hear more about it, and to ask when Mr. Denny comes back from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."
<p>Lydia was bid by her two eldest sisters to hold her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tongue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.32" formerWord="tongue" newWord="drive" score="0.32">drive</span>; but Mr. Collins, much offended, laid aside his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>, and said: 
<p>"I have often observed how little young ladies are interested by books of a serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stamp</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="stamp" newWord="courtier" score="0.243">courtier</span>, though written solely for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benefit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.654" formerWord="benefit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.654">astonishment</span>. It amazes me, I confess; for, certainly, there can be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> so advantageous to them as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instruction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.564" formerWord="instruction" newWord="nobody" score="0.564">nobody</span>. But I will no longer importune my young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>."
<p>Then turning to Mr. Bennet, he offered himself as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>antagonist</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="antagonist" newWord="punctuality" score="0.241">punctuality</span> at backgammon. Mr. Bennet accepted the challenge, observing that he acted very wisely in leaving the girls to their own trifling amusements. Mrs. Bennet and her daughters apologised most civilly for Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span>, and promised that it should not occur again, if he would resume his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>; but Mr. Collins, after assuring them that he bore his young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-will</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.544" formerWord="ill-will" newWord="respectability" score="0.544">respectability</span>, and should never resent her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> as any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affront</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="affront" newWord="person" score="0.637">person</span>, seated himself at another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> with Mr. Bennet, and prepared for backgammon. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 15 
<p>
<p>Mr. Collins was not a sensible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deficiency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="deficiency" newWord="man" score="0.851">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> had been but little assisted by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>; the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> having been spent under the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guidance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="guidance" newWord="harm" score="0.336">harm</span> of an illiterate and miserly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>; and though he belonged to one of the universities, he had merely kept the necessary terms, without forming at it any useful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subjection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.537" formerWord="subjection" newWord="knowledge" score="0.537">knowledge</span> in which his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had brought him up had given him originally great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.501" formerWord="humility" newWord="plenty" score="0.501">plenty</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>; but it was now a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> counteracted by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-conceit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.223" formerWord="self-conceit" newWord="hesitate" score="0.223">hesitate</span> of a weak <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, living in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>retirement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.277" formerWord="retirement" newWord="cheerfulness" score="0.277">cheerfulness</span>, and the consequential feelings of early and unexpected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prosperity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.66" formerWord="prosperity" newWord="countenance" score="0.66">countenance</span>. A fortunate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> had recommended him to Lady Catherine de Bourgh when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> of Hunsford was vacant; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> which he felt for her high <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span>, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>veneration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.444" formerWord="veneration" newWord="horror" score="0.444">horror</span> for her as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span>, mingling with a very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of himself, of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>authority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="authority" newWord="aunt" score="0.859">aunt</span> as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span>, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>right</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="right" newWord="nothing" score="0.843">nothing</span> as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rector</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="rector" newWord="profession" score="0.659">profession</span>, made him altogether a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mixture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.612" formerWord="mixture" newWord="gallery" score="0.612">gallery</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> and obsequiousness, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.844" formerWord="self-importance" newWord="way" score="0.844">way</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.501" formerWord="humility" newWord="plenty" score="0.501">plenty</span>. 
<p>Having now a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> and a very sufficient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>, he intended to marry; and in seeking a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reconciliation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="reconciliation" newWord="attempt" score="0.594">attempt</span> with the Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> he had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>, as he meant to choose one of the daughters, if he found them as handsome and amiable as they were represented by common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span>. This was his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span> of amends - - of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>atonement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.672" formerWord="atonement" newWord="rest" score="0.672">rest</span> - - for inheriting their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span>; and he thought it an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>, full of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eligibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="eligibility" newWord="sit" score="0.248">sit</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suitableness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="suitableness" newWord="tender" score="0.359">tender</span>, and excessively generous and disinterested on his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>. 
<p>His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span> did not vary on seeing them. Miss Bennet's lovely <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> confirmed his views, and established all his strictest notions of what was due to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seniority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="seniority" newWord="ceiling" score="0.232">ceiling</span>; and for the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> she was his settled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>. The next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, however, made an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alteration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="alteration" newWord="family" score="0.834">family</span>; for in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tete-a-tete</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="tete-a-tete" newWord="ingenuity" score="0.322">ingenuity</span> with Mrs. Bennet before <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> beginning with his parsonage-house, and leading naturally to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>avowal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="avowal" newWord="hour" score="0.266">hour</span> of his hopes, that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span> might be found for it at Longbourn, produced from her, amid very complaisant smiles and general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>caution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="caution" newWord="anything" score="0.933">anything</span> against the very Jane he had fixed on."As to her younger daughters, she could not take upon her to say - - she could not positively answer - - but she did not know of any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prepossession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.254" formerWord="prepossession" newWord="acquittal" score="0.254">acquittal</span>; her eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, she must just mention - - she felt it incumbent on her to hint, was likely to be very soon engaged."
<p>Mr. Collins had only to change from Jane to Elizabeth - - and it was soon done - - done while Mrs. Bennet was stirring the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="fire" newWord="self" score="0.239">self</span>. Elizabeth, equally next to Jane in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>birth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="birth" newWord="sign" score="0.289">sign</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, succeeded her of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>. 
<p>Mrs. Bennet treasured up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span>, and trusted that she might soon have two daughters married; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> whom she could not bear to speak of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before was now high in her good graces. 
<p>Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span> to Meryton was not forgotten; every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> except Mary agreed to go with her; and Mr. Collins was to attend them, at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span> of Mr. Bennet, who was most anxious to get rid of him, and have his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> to himself; for thither Mr. Collins had followed him after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>; and there he would continue, nominally engaged with one of the largest folios in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>collection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="collection" newWord="observation" score="0.65">observation</span>, but really talking to Mr. Bennet, with little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cessation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="cessation" newWord="chasm" score="0.308">chasm</span>, of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> at Hunsford. Such doings discomposed Mr. Bennet exceedingly. In his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> he had been always sure of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tranquillity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.408" formerWord="tranquillity" newWord="melancholy" score="0.408">melancholy</span>; and though prepared, as he told Elizabeth, to meet with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conceit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="conceit" newWord="park" score="0.628">park</span> in every other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, he was used to be free from them there; his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, therefore, was most prompt in inviting Mr. Collins to join his daughters in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>; and Mr. Collins, being in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> much better fitted for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walker</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="walker" newWord="company" score="0.729">company</span> than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reader</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.73" formerWord="reader" newWord="evening" score="0.73">evening</span>, was extremely pleased to close his large <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>, and go. 
<p>In pompous nothings on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, and civil assents on that of his cousins, their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> passed till they entered Meryton. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> of the younger ones was then no longer to be gained by him. Their eyes were immediately wandering up in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>street</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="street" newWord="time" score="0.951">time</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.47" formerWord="quest" newWord="behaviour" score="0.47">behaviour</span> of the officers, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> less than a very smart <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bonnet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="bonnet" newWord="park" score="0.658">park</span> indeed, or a really new <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>muslin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="muslin" newWord="acquisition" score="0.488">acquisition</span> in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="shop" newWord="minute" score="0.67">minute</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span>, could recall them. 
<p>But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> was soon caught by a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, whom they had never seen before, of most gentlemanlike <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span>, walking with another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span> on the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span> was the very Mr. Denny concerning whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> from London Lydia came to inquire, and he bowed as they passed. All were struck with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span>, all wondered who he could be; and Kitty and Lydia, determined if possible to find out, led the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> across the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>street</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="street" newWord="time" score="0.951">time</span>, under pretense of wanting <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> in an opposite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="shop" newWord="minute" score="0.67">minute</span>, and fortunately had just gained the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pavement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.262" formerWord="pavement" newWord="rent" score="0.262">rent</span> when the two gentlemen, turning back, had reached the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span>. This was exactly as it should be; for the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> wanted only regimentals to make him completely charming. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> was greatly in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span>; he had all the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>figure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="figure" newWord="week" score="0.834">week</span>, and very pleasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span> was followed up on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> by a happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>readiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="readiness" newWord="engagement" score="0.846">engagement</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> - - a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>readiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="readiness" newWord="engagement" score="0.846">engagement</span> at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> perfectly correct and unassuming; and the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> were still standing and talking together very agreeably, when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sound</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.726" formerWord="sound" newWord="object" score="0.726">object</span> of horses drew their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>, and Darcy and Bingley were seen riding down the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>street</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="street" newWord="time" score="0.951">time</span>. On distinguishing the ladies of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>group</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="group" newWord="curiosity" score="0.631">curiosity</span>, the two gentlemen came directly towards them, and began the usual civilities. Bingley was the principal spokesman, and Miss Bennet the principal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>. He was then, he said, on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to Longbourn on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> to inquire after her. It was impossible to imagine; it was impossible not to long to know. 
<p>In another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>minute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="minute" newWord="round" score="0.875">round</span>, Mr. Bingley, but without seeming to have noticed what passed, took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> and rode on with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. 
<p>Mr. Denny and Mr. Wickham walked with the young ladies to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> of Mr. Phillip's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, and then made their bows, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of Miss Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pressing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.538" formerWord="pressing" newWord="walking" score="0.538">walking</span> entreaties that they should come in, and even in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of Mrs. Phillips's throwing up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.338" formerWord="parlour" newWord="distance" score="0.338">distance</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> and loudly seconding the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>. 
<p>Mrs. Phillips was always glad to see her nieces; and the two eldest, from their recent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span>, were particularly welcome, and she was eagerly expressing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span> of him. This was agreed to, and Mrs. Phillips protested that they would have a nice comfortable noisy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lottery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="lottery" newWord="bone" score="0.241">bone</span> tickets, and a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.512" formerWord="bit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.512">astonishment</span> of hot <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span> afterwards. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of such delights was very cheering, and they parted in mutual good spirits. Mr. Collins repeated his apologies in quitting the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and was assured with unwearying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> that they were perfectly needless. 
<p>As they walked <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, Elizabeth related to Jane what she had seen pass between the two gentlemen; but though Jane would have defended either or both, had they appeared to be in the wrong, she could no more explain such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> than her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. 
<p>Mr. Collins on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> highly gratified Mrs. Bennet by admiring Mrs. Phillips's manners and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>. He protested that, except Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, he had never seen a more elegant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>;
