for she had not only received him with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>utmost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="utmost" newWord="brother" score="0.947">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, but even pointedly included him in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> for the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, although utterly unknown to her before. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="Something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">Mind</span>, he supposed, might be attributed to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> with them, but yet he had never met with so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> in the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 16 
<p>
<p>As no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span> was made to the young people's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> with their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and all Mr. Collins's scruples of leaving Mr. and Mrs. Bennet for a single <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> during his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> were most steadily resisted, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span> conveyed him and his five cousins at a suitable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> to Meryton; and the girls had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span>, as they entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>, that Mr. Wickham had accepted their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>, and was then in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. 
<p>When this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> was given, and they had all taken their seats, Mr. Collins was at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to look around him and admire, and he was so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>struck</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="struck" newWord="palate" score="0.298">palate</span> with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>size</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.812" formerWord="size" newWord="longbourn" score="0.812">longbourn</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apartment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.734" formerWord="apartment" newWord="minute" score="0.734">minute</span>, that he declared he might almost have supposed himself in the small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.338" formerWord="parlour" newWord="distance" score="0.338">distance</span> at Rosings; a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> that did not at first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>convey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.252" formerWord="convey" newWord="rectory" score="0.252">rectory</span> much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.492" formerWord="gratification" newWord="horror" score="0.492">horror</span>; but when Mrs. Phillips <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="understood" newWord="life" score="0.788">life</span> from him what Rosings was, and who was its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proprietor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="proprietor" newWord="justice" score="0.545">justice</span> - - when she had listened to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>description</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="description" newWord="wish" score="0.731">wish</span> of only one of Lady Catherine's drawing-rooms, and found that the chimney-piece alone had cost eight hundred pounds, she felt all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>force</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="force" newWord="arch" score="0.333">arch</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span>, and would hardly have resented a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>In describing to her all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grandeur</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.363" formerWord="grandeur" newWord="haste" score="0.363">haste</span> of Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mansion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.292" formerWord="mansion" newWord="glimpse" score="0.292">glimpse</span>, with occasional digressions in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> of his own humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="abode" newWord="minute" score="0.817">minute</span>, and the improvements it was receiving, he was happily employed until the gentlemen joined them; and he found in Mrs. Phillips a very attentive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>listener</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="listener" newWord="future" score="0.586">future</span>, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> increased with what she heard, and who was resolving to retail it all among her neighbours as soon as she could. To the girls, who could not listen to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, and who had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to do but to wish for an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span>, and examine their own indifferent imitations of china on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mantelpiece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="mantelpiece" newWord="heaven" score="0.28">heaven</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interval</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="interval" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.788">acquaintance</span> of waiting appeared very long. It was over at last, however. The gentlemen did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="approach" newWord="country" score="0.761">country</span>, and when Mr. Wickham walked into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, Elizabeth felt that she had neither been seeing him before, nor thinking of him since, with the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of unreasonable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span>. The officers of the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> were in general a very creditable, gentlemanlike <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>set</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.919" formerWord="set" newWord="idea" score="0.919">idea</span>, and the best of them were of the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>; but Mr. Wickham was as far beyond them all in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, as they were superior to the broad-faced, stuffy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> Phillips, breathing port <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.445" formerWord="wine" newWord="horror" score="0.445">horror</span>, who followed them into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>Mr. Wickham was the happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> towards whom almost every female <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> was turned, and Elizabeth was the happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> by whom he finally seated himself; and the agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> in which he immediately fell into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, though it was only on its being a wet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, made her feel that the commonest, dullest, most threadbare <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>topic</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.287" formerWord="topic" newWord="thankfulness" score="0.287">thankfulness</span> might be rendered interesting by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>skill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.353" formerWord="skill" newWord="devotion" score="0.353">devotion</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaker</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.347" formerWord="speaker" newWord="haste" score="0.347">haste</span>. 
<p>With such rivals for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> of the fair as Mr. Wickham and the officers, Mr. Collins seemed to sink into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insignificance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="insignificance" newWord="glow" score="0.312">glow</span>; to the young ladies he certainly was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>; but he had still at intervals a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>listener</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="listener" newWord="future" score="0.586">future</span> in Mrs. Phillips, and was by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>watchfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="watchfulness" newWord="apprehension" score="0.375">apprehension</span>, most abundantly supplied with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coffee</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="coffee" newWord="hurry" score="0.345">hurry</span> and muffin. When the card-tables were placed, he had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of obliging <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span>, by sitting down to whist. 
<p>"I know little of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span>,"said he,"but I shall be glad to improve myself, for in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> - -"Mrs. Phillips was very glad for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.271" formerWord="compliance" newWord="everybody" score="0.271">everybody</span>, but could not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wait</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="wait" newWord="answer" score="0.892">answer</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>. 
<p>Mr. Wickham did not play at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whist</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.474" formerWord="whist" newWord="judgment" score="0.474">judgment</span>, and with ready <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> was he received at the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> between Elizabeth and Lydia. At first there seemed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of Lydia's engrossing him entirely, for she was a most determined <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talker</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.479" formerWord="talker" newWord="length" score="0.479">length</span>; but being likewise extremely fond of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lottery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="lottery" newWord="bone" score="0.241">bone</span> tickets, she soon grew too much interested in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span>, too eager in making bets and exclaiming after prizes to have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> in particular. Allowing for the common demands of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span>, Mr. Wickham was therefore at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to talk to Elizabeth, and she was very willing to hear him, though what she chiefly wished to hear she could not hope to be told - - the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>history</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="history" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> with Mr. Darcy. She dared not even mention that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>, however, was unexpectedly relieved. Mr. Wickham began the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> himself. He inquired how far Netherfield was from Meryton; and, after receiving her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, asked in a hesitating <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> how long Mr. Darcy had been staying there. 
<p>"About a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span>,"said Elizabeth; and then, unwilling to let the subject <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.735" formerWord="drop" newWord="eye" score="0.735">eye</span>, added,"He is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of very large <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>property</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="property" newWord="degree" score="0.737">degree</span> in Derbyshire, I understand."
<p>"Yes,"replied Mr. Wickham;"his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> there is a noble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>. A clear ten thousand per <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>annum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.251" formerWord="annum" newWord="trade" score="0.251">trade</span>. You could not have met with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> more capable of giving you certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> than myself, for I have been connected with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> in a particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>infancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="infancy" newWord="engagement" score="0.761">engagement</span>."
<p>Elizabeth could not but look surprised. 
<p>"You may well be surprised, Miss Bennet, at such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.636" formerWord="assertion" newWord="situation" score="0.636">situation</span>, after seeing, as you probably might, the very cold <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span>. Are you much acquainted with Mr. Darcy?"
<p>"As much as I ever wish to be,"cried Elizabeth very warmly."I have spent four days in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> with him, and I think him very disagreeable."
<p>"I have no right to give my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>,"said Wickham,"as to his being agreeable or otherwise. I am not qualified to form one. I have known him too long and too well to be a fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span>. It is impossible for me to be impartial. But I believe your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of him would in general astonish - - and perhaps you would not express it quite so strongly anywhere else. Here you are in your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>."
<p>"Upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, I say no more here than I might say in any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, except Netherfield. He is not at all liked in Hertfordshire. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="Everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">Word</span> is disgusted with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>. You will not find him more favourably spoken of by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span>."
<p>"I cannot pretend to be sorry,"said Wickham, after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span>,"that he or that any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> should not be estimated beyond their deserts; but with him I believe it does not often happen. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> is blinded by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>, or frightened by his high and imposing manners, and sees him only as he chooses to be seen."
<p>"I should take him, even on my slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, to be an ill-tempered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>."Wickham only shook his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. 
<p>"I wonder,"said he, at the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>,"whether he is likely to be in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> much longer."
<p>"I do not at all know; but I heard <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of his going away when I was at Netherfield. I hope your plans in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> of the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> will not be affected by his being in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>."
<p>"Oh! no - - it is not for me to be driven away by Mr. Darcy. If he wishes to avoid seeing me, he must go. We are not on friendly terms, and it always gives me <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> to meet him, but I have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> for avoiding him but what I might proclaim before all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of very great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-usage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.231" formerWord="ill-usage" newWord="prompter" score="0.231">prompter</span>, and most painful regrets at his being what he is. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, Miss Bennet, the late Mr. Darcy, was one of the best men that ever breathed, and the truest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> I ever had; and I can never be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> with this Mr. Darcy without being grieved to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>soul</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="soul" newWord="eloquence" score="0.249">eloquence</span> by a thousand <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tender</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="tender" newWord="thing" score="0.907">thing</span> recollections. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to myself has been scandalous; but I verily believe I could forgive him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, rather than his disappointing the hopes and disgracing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>memory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="memory" newWord="deficiency" score="0.462">deficiency</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>."
<p>Elizabeth found the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> of the subject <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>increase</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.461" formerWord="increase" newWord="sooner" score="0.461">sooner</span>, and listened with all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span> of it prevented further <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span>. 
<p>Mr. Wickham began to speak on more general topics, Meryton, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, appearing highly pleased with all that he had yet seen, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of the latter with gentle but very intelligible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.884" formerWord="gallantry" newWord="end" score="0.884">end</span>. 
<p>"It was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, and good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>,"he added,"which was my chief <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inducement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="inducement" newWord="matrimony" score="0.315">matrimony</span> to enter the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span>. I knew it to be a most respectable, agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>corps</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="corps" newWord="yesterday" score="0.546">yesterday</span>, and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Denny tempted me further by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of their present quarters, and the very great attentions and excellent acquaintances Meryton had procured them. Society, I own, is necessary to me. I have been a disappointed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and my spirits will not bear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="solitude" newWord="arrival" score="0.838">arrival</span>. I must have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>employment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="employment" newWord="answer" score="0.916">answer</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>. A military <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> is not what I was intended for, but circumstances have now made it eligible. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span> ought to have been my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> - - I was brought up for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span>, and I should at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> have been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="possession" newWord="retirement" score="0.275">retirement</span> of a most valuable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>, had it pleased the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> we were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of just now."
<p>"Indeed!"
<p>"Yes - - the late Mr. Darcy bequeathed me the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presentation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="presentation" newWord="learning" score="0.23">learning</span> of the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gift</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.735" formerWord="gift" newWord="end" score="0.735">end</span>. He was my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>godfather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="godfather" newWord="sonnet" score="0.253">sonnet</span>, and excessively attached to me. I cannot do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span>. He meant to provide for me amply, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> he had done it; but when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> fell, it was given elsewhere."
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Good</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="Good" newWord="mother" score="0.858">Mother</span> heavens!"cried Elizabeth;"but how could that be? How could his will be disregarded? Why did you not seek legal redress?"
<p>"There was just such an informality in the terms of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bequest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="bequest" newWord="good-nature" score="0.366">good-nature</span> as to give me no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.445" formerWord="law" newWord="conduct" score="0.445">conduct</span>. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> could not have doubted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span>, but Mr. Darcy chose to doubt it - - or to treat it as a merely conditional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recommendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.689" formerWord="recommendation" newWord="conviction" score="0.689">conviction</span>, and to assert that I had forfeited all claim to it by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extravagance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.603" formerWord="extravagance" newWord="minute" score="0.603">minute</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">self</span> - - in short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>. Certain it is, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> became vacant two years ago, exactly as I was of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span> to hold it, and that it was given to another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; and no less certain is it, that I cannot accuse myself of having really done <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> to deserve to lose it. I have a warm, unguarded <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>, and I may have spoken my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of him, and to him, too freely. I can recall <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> worse. But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> is, that we are very different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of men, and that he hates me."
<p>"This is quite shocking! He deserves to be publicly disgraced."
<p>"Some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> or other he will be - - but it shall not be by me. Till I can forget his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, I can never defy or expose him."
<p>Elizabeth honoured him for such feelings, and thought him handsomer than ever as he expressed them. 
<p>"But what,"said she, after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>,"can have been his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>? What can have induced him to behave so cruelly?"
<p>"A thorough, determined <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> of me - - a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> which I cannot but attribute in some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>measure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="measure" newWord="expediency" score="0.275">expediency</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>jealousy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="jealousy" newWord="tea-table" score="0.239">tea-table</span>. Had the late Mr. Darcy liked me less, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> might have borne with me better; but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s uncommon <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to me irritated him, I believe, very early in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. He had not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> to bear the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>competition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="competition" newWord="heaven" score="0.281">heaven</span> in which we stood - - the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of preference which was often given me."
<p>"I had not thought Mr. Darcy so bad as this - - though I have never liked him. I had not thought so very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of him. I had supposed him to be despising his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fellow-creatures</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="fellow-creatures" newWord="disgust" score="0.31">disgust</span> in general, but did not suspect him of descending to such malicious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>revenge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.49" formerWord="revenge" newWord="minute" score="0.49">minute</span>, such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>injustice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="injustice" newWord="give" score="0.326">give</span>, such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inhumanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.618" formerWord="inhumanity" newWord="park" score="0.618">park</span> as this."
<p>After a few minutes ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">billiard-room</span>, however, she continued,"I do remember his boasting one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, at Netherfield, of the implacability of his resentments, of his having an unforgiving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> must be dreadful."
<p>"I will not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> myself on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>,"replied Wickham;"I can hardly be just to him."
<p>Elizabeth was again deep in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span>, and after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> exclaimed,"To treat in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>godson</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="godson" newWord="gayer" score="0.266">gayer</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>!"She could have added,"A young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, too, like you, whose very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> may vouch for your being amiable"- - but she contented herself with,"and one, too, who had probably been his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>childhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.48" formerWord="childhood" newWord="number" score="0.48">number</span>, connected together, as I think you said, in the closest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>!"
<p>"We were born in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span>, within the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>; the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> was passed together; inmates of the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, sharing the same amusements, objects of the same parental <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> began <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> which your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>, Mr. Phillips, appears to do so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> to - - but he gave up <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> to the late Mr. Darcy and devoted all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of the Pemberley <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>property</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="property" newWord="degree" score="0.737">degree</span>. He was most highly esteemed by Mr. Darcy, a most intimate, confidential <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. Mr. Darcy often acknowledged himself to be under the greatest obligations to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s active superintendence, and when, immediately before my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span>, Mr. Darcy gave him a voluntary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> of providing for me, I am convinced that he felt it to be as much a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>debt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="debt" newWord="route" score="0.243">route</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> to him, as of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> to myself."
<p>"How strange!"cried Elizabeth."How abominable! I wonder that the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> of this Mr. Darcy has not made him just to you! If from no better <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>, that he should not have been too proud to be dishonest - - for dishonesty I must call it."
<p>"It is wonderful,"replied Wickham,"for almost all his actions may be traced to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> had often been his best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. It has connected him nearer with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span> than with any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>. But we are <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of us consistent, and in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to me there were stronger impulses even than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>."
<p>"Can such abominable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>have</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="have" newWord="description" score="0.284">description</span> ever done him good?"
<p>"Yes. It has often led him to be liberal and generous, to give his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> freely, to display <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hospitality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="hospitality" newWord="chair" score="0.55">chair</span>, to assist his tenants, and relieve the poor. Family <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>, and filial <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> - - for he is very proud of what his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> was - - have done this. Not to appear to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span> his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, to degenerate from the popular qualities, or lose the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>influence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="influence" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of the Pemberley House, is a powerful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>. He has also brotherly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>, which, with some brotherly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, makes him a very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> and careful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guardian</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.417" formerWord="guardian" newWord="judge" score="0.417">judge</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and you will hear him generally cried up as the most attentive and best of brothers."
<p>"What <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> is Miss Darcy?"
<p>He shook his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>."I wish I could call her amiable. It gives me <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> to speak <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of a Darcy. But she is too much like her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> - - very, very proud. As a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, she was affectionate and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="pleasing" newWord="relationship" score="0.321">relationship</span>, and extremely fond of me; and I have devoted hours and hours to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>. But she is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to me now. She is a handsome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>, about fifteen or sixteen, and, I understand, highly accomplished. Since her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> has been London, where a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> lives with her, and superintends her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span>."
<p>After many pauses and many trials of other subjects, Elizabeth could not help reverting once more to the first, and saying: 
<p>"I am astonished at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span> with Mr. Bingley! How can Mr. Bingley, who seems good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> itself, and is, I really believe, truly amiable, be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> with such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>? How can they <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span> each other? Do you know Mr. Bingley?"
<p>"Not at all."
<p>"He is a sweet-tempered, amiable, charming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. He cannot know what Mr. Darcy is."
<p>"Probably not; but Mr. Darcy can please where he chooses. He does not want abilities. He can be a conversible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> if he thinks it worth his while. Among those who are at all his equals in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>, he is a very different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> from what he is to the less prosperous. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> never deserts him; but with the rich he is liberal-minded, just, sincere, rational, honourable, and perhaps agreeable - - allowing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>figure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="figure" newWord="week" score="0.834">week</span>."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whist</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.474" formerWord="whist" newWord="judgment" score="0.474">judgment</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> soon afterwards breaking up, the players gathered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> and Mr. Collins took his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>station</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="station" newWord="carriage" score="0.549">carriage</span> between his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> Elizabeth and Mrs. Phillips. The usual inquiries as to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> was made by the latter. It had not been very great; he had lost every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>; but when Mrs. Phillips began to express her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> thereupon, he assured her with much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="earnest" newWord="compunction" score="0.261">compunction</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.506" formerWord="gravity" newWord="horror" score="0.506">horror</span> that it was not of the least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>, that he considered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> as a mere <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trifle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.861" formerWord="trifle" newWord="friend" score="0.861">friend</span>, and begged that she would not make herself uneasy. 
<p>"I know very well, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"said he,"that when persons sit down to a card-table, they must take their chances of these things, and happily I am not in such circumstances as to make five shillings any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>. There are undoubtedly many who could not say the same, but thanks to Lady Catherine de Bourgh, I am removed far beyond the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> of regarding little matters."
<p>Mr. Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> was caught; and after observing Mr. Collins for a few moments, he asked Elizabeth in a low <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> whether her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> was very intimately acquainted with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> of de Bourgh. 
<p>"Lady Catherine de Bourgh,"she replied,"has very lately given him a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>. I hardly know how Mr. Collins was first introduced to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>, but he certainly has not known her long."
<p>"You know of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> that Lady Catherine de Bourgh and Lady Anne Darcy were sisters; consequently that she is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to the present Mr. Darcy."
<p>"No, indeed, I did not. I knew <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all of Lady Catherine's connections. I never heard of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>existence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.587" formerWord="existence" newWord="countenance" score="0.587">countenance</span> till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span>."
<p>"Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, Miss de Bourgh, will have a very large <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, and it is believed that she and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> will unite the two estates."
<p>This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> made Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, as she thought of poor Miss Bingley. Vain indeed must be all her attentions, vain and useless her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> of himself, if he were already self-destined for another. 
<p>"Mr. Collins,"said she,"speaks highly both of Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>; but from some particulars that he has related of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, I suspect his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> misleads him, and that in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of her being his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span>, she is an arrogant, conceited <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>"I believe her to be both in a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span>,"replied Wickham;"I have not seen her for many years, but I very well remember that I never liked her, and that her manners were dictatorial and insolent. She has the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reputation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.292" formerWord="reputation" newWord="three-and-twenty" score="0.292">three-and-twenty</span> of being remarkably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> and clever;
