but I rather believe she derives <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of her abilities from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> from her authoritative <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, who chooses that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.392" formerWord="everyone" newWord="value" score="0.392">value</span> connected with him should have an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> of the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>class</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.427" formerWord="class" newWord="education" score="0.427">education</span>."
<p>Elizabeth allowed that he had given a very rational <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of it, and they continued talking together, with mutual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> till <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span> put an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> to cards, and gave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the ladies their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> of Mr. Wickham's attentions. There could be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>noise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.804" formerWord="noise" newWord="minute" score="0.804">minute</span> of Mrs. Phillips's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, but his manners recommended him to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>. Whatever he said, was said well; and whatever he did, done gracefully. Elizabeth went away with her head full of him. She could think of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but of Mr. Wickham, and of what he had told her, all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; but there was not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for her even to mention his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> as they went, for neither Lydia nor Mr. Collins were once silent. Lydia talked incessantly of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lottery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="lottery" newWord="bone" score="0.241">bone</span> tickets, of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.519" formerWord="fish" newWord="year" score="0.519">year</span> she had lost and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.519" formerWord="fish" newWord="year" score="0.519">year</span> she had won; and Mr. Collins in describing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of Mr. and Mrs. Phillips, protesting that he did not in the least regard his losses at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whist</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.474" formerWord="whist" newWord="judgment" score="0.474">judgment</span>, enumerating all the dishes at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span>, and repeatedly fearing that he crowded his cousins, had more to say than he could well manage before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> stopped at Longbourn House. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 17 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth related to Jane the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> what had passed between Mr. Wickham and herself. Jane listened with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>; she knew not how to believe that Mr. Darcy could be so unworthy of Mr. Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>; and yet, it was not in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> to question the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>veracity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="veracity" newWord="conduct" score="0.403">conduct</span> of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of such amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> as Wickham. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of his having endured such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unkindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="unkindness" newWord="grandeur" score="0.241">grandeur</span>, was enough to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tender</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="tender" newWord="thing" score="0.907">thing</span> feelings; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> remained therefore to be done, but to think well of them both, to defend the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> of each, and throw into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accident</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="accident" newWord="point" score="0.679">point</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="mistake" newWord="time" score="0.949">time</span> whatever could not be otherwise explained. 
<p>"They have both,"said she,"been deceived, I dare say, in some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> or other, of which we can form no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>. Interested people have perhaps misrepresented each to the other. It is, in short, impossible for us to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conjecture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="conjecture" newWord="wit" score="0.283">wit</span> the causes or circumstances which may have alienated them, without actual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.59" formerWord="blame" newWord="anger" score="0.59">anger</span> on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>."
<p>"Very true, indeed; and now, my dear Jane, what have you got to say on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behalf</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.792" formerWord="behalf" newWord="kind" score="0.792">kind</span> of the interested people who have probably been concerned in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>? Do clear them too, or we shall be obliged to think <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>somebody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="somebody" newWord="yesterday" score="0.649">yesterday</span>."
<p>"Laugh as much as you choose, but you will not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span> me out of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>. My dearest Lizzy, do but consider in what a disgraceful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span> it places Mr. Darcy, to be treating his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> whom his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had promised to provide for. It is impossible. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="humanity" newWord="anybody" score="0.707">anybody</span>, no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, could be capable of it. Can his most intimate friends be so excessively deceived in him? Oh! no."
<p>"I can much more easily believe Mr. Bingley's being imposed on, than that Mr. Wickham should invent such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>history</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="history" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span> of himself as he gave me last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>; names, facts, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> mentioned without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ceremony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.539" formerWord="ceremony" newWord="curiosity" score="0.539">curiosity</span>. If it be not so, let Mr. Darcy contradict it. Besides, there was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> in his looks."
<p>"It is difficult indeed - - it is distressing. One does not know what to think."
<p>"I beg your pardon; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> knows exactly what to think."
<p>But Jane could think with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>certainty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="certainty" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span> on only one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> - - that Mr. Bingley, if he had been imposed on, would have much to suffer when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> became public. 
<p>The two young ladies were summoned from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shrubbery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.596" formerWord="shrubbery" newWord="person" score="0.596">person</span>, where this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> passed, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the very persons of whom they had been speaking; Mr. Bingley and his sisters came to give their personal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> for the long-expected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> at Netherfield, which was fixed for the following Tuesday. The two ladies were delighted to see their dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> again, called it an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span> since they had met, and repeatedly asked what she had been doing with herself since their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>separation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="separation" newWord="company" score="0.866">company</span>. To the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> they paid little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>; avoiding Mrs. Bennet as much as possible, saying not much to Elizabeth, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all to the others. They were soon gone again, rising from their seats with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>activity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="activity" newWord="aunt" score="0.891">aunt</span> which took their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and hurrying off as if eager to escape from Mrs. Bennet's civilities. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of the Netherfield <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> was extremely agreeable to every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>female</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="female" newWord="faint" score="0.282">faint</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Mrs. Bennet chose to consider it as given in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> to her eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, and was particularly flattered by receiving the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> from Mr. Bingley himself, instead of a ceremonious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>card</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="card" newWord="brother" score="0.936">brother</span>. Jane pictured to herself a happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> of her two friends, and the attentions of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>; and Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of dancing a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> with Mr. Wickham, and of seeing a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confirmation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.648" formerWord="confirmation" newWord="surprise" score="0.648">surprise</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> anticipated by Catherine and Lydia depended less on any single <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span>, or any particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>, for though they each, like Elizabeth, meant to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> with Mr. Wickham, he was by no means the only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> who could satisfy them, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> was, at any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="rate" newWord="absence" score="0.368">absence</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>. And even Mary could assure her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> that she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disinclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="disinclination" newWord="trash" score="0.312">trash</span> for it. 
<p>"While I can have my mornings to myself,"said she,"it is enough - - I think it is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sacrifice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="sacrifice" newWord="g" score="0.232">g</span> to join occasionally in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> engagements. Society has claims on us all; and I profess myself one of those who consider intervals of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recreation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="recreation" newWord="entertainment" score="0.247">entertainment</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span> as desirable for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>."
<p>Elizabeth's spirits were so high on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, that though she did not often speak unnecessarily to Mr. Collins, she could not help asking him whether he intended to accept Mr. Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>, and if he did, whether he would think it proper to join in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>; and she was rather surprised to find that he entertained no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scruple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.221" formerWord="scruple" newWord="dinner-party" score="0.221">dinner-party</span> whatever on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, and was very far from dreading a rebuke either from the Archbishop, or Lady Catherine de Bourgh, by venturing to dance. 
<p>"I am by no means of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, I assure you,"said he,"that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>, given by a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, to respectable people, can have any evil <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tendency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.306" formerWord="tendency" newWord="dirt" score="0.306">dirt</span>; and I am so far from objecting to dancing myself, that I shall hope to be honoured with the hands of all my fair cousins in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; and I take this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of soliciting yours, Miss Elizabeth, for the two first dances especially, a preference which I trust my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> Jane will attribute to the right <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span>, and not to any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disrespect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="disrespect" newWord="absence" score="0.305">absence</span> for her."
<p>Elizabeth felt herself completely taken in. She had fully proposed being engaged by Mr. Wickham for those very dances; and to have Mr. Collins instead! her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liveliness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.397" formerWord="liveliness" newWord="chair" score="0.397">chair</span> had never been worse timed. There was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>help</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="help" newWord="duration" score="0.29">duration</span> for it, however. Mr. Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> and her own were perforce delayed a little longer, and Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span> accepted with as good a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.809" formerWord="grace" newWord="country" score="0.809">country</span> as she could. She was not the better pleased with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.884" formerWord="gallantry" newWord="end" score="0.884">end</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> it suggested of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> more. It now first struck her, that she was selected from among her sisters as worthy of being <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span> of Hunsford Parsonage, and of assisting to form a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quadrille</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="quadrille" newWord="capital" score="0.319">capital</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> at Rosings, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of more eligible visitors. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> soon reached to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span>, as she observed his increasing civilities toward herself, and heard his frequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.579" formerWord="wit" newWord="observation" score="0.579">observation</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vivacity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.285" formerWord="vivacity" newWord="beat" score="0.285">beat</span>; and though more astonished than gratified herself by this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> of her charms, it was not long before her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> gave her to understand that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>probability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="probability" newWord="family" score="0.849">family</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was extremely agreeable to her. Elizabeth, however, did not choose to take the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span>, being well aware that a serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dispute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="dispute" newWord="tenderest" score="0.249">tenderest</span> must be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of any reply. Mr. Collins might never make the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span>, and till he did, it was useless to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarrel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="quarrel" newWord="scheme" score="0.685">scheme</span> about him. 
<p>If there had not been a Netherfield <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> to prepare for and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span> of, the younger Miss Bennets would have been in a very pitiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, for from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>, to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>, there was such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>succession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="succession" newWord="disposition" score="0.403">disposition</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.688" formerWord="rain" newWord="scheme" score="0.688">scheme</span> as prevented their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span> to Meryton once. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, no officers, no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> could be sought after - - the very shoe-roses for Netherfield were got by proxy. Even Elizabeth might have found some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trial</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="trial" newWord="country" score="0.715">country</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="patience" newWord="aunt" score="0.938">aunt</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="weather" newWord="sister" score="0.954">sister</span> which totally suspended the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> with Mr. Wickham; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> less than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span> on Tuesday, could have made such a Friday, Saturday, Sunday, and Monday endurable to Kitty and Lydia. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 18 
<p>
<p>Till Elizabeth entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span> at Netherfield, and looked in vain for Mr. Wickham among the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cluster</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="cluster" newWord="pocket-book" score="0.236">pocket-book</span> of red coats there assembled, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of his being <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> had never occurred to her. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>certainty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="certainty" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span> of meeting him had not been checked by any of those recollections that might not unreasonably have alarmed her. She had dressed with more than usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span>, and prepared in the highest spirits for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conquest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.636" formerWord="conquest" newWord="pleasure" score="0.636">pleasure</span> of all that remained unsubdued of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, trusting that it was not more than might be won in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. But in an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="instant" newWord="observation" score="0.683">observation</span> arose the dreadful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span> of his being purposely omitted for Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in the Bingleys ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> to the officers; and though this was not exactly the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, the absolute <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> was pronounced by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Denny, to whom Lydia eagerly applied, and who told them that Wickham had been obliged to go to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before, and was not yet returned; adding, with a significant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>,"I do not imagine his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> would have called him away just now, if he had not wanted to avoid a certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> here."
<p>This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>, though unheard by Lydia, was caught by Elizabeth, and, as it assured her that Darcy was not less answerable for Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> than if her first surmise had been just, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>, that she could hardly reply with tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec
