/ Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="forbearance" newWord="sort" score="0.515">sort</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="patience" newWord="aunt" score="0.938">aunt</span> with Darcy, was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>injury</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.836" formerWord="injury" newWord="pain" score="0.836">pain</span> to Wickham. She was resolved against any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with him, and turned away with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of ill-humour which she could not wholly surmount even in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> to Mr. Bingley, whose blind <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span> provoked her. 
<p>But Elizabeth was not formed for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.574" formerWord="ill-humour" newWord="dirt" score="0.574">dirt</span>; and though every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of her own was destroyed for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, it could not dwell long on her spirits; and having told all her griefs to Charlotte Lucas, whom she had not seen for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>, she was soon able to make a voluntary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>transition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.407" formerWord="transition" newWord="civility" score="0.407">civility</span> to the oddities of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, and to point him out to her particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>. The first two dances, however, brought a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>; they were dances of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mortification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="mortification" newWord="answer" score="0.658">answer</span>. Mr. Collins, awkward and solemn, apologising instead of attending, and often moving wrong without being aware of it, gave her all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> which a disagreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>couple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="couple" newWord="sat" score="0.244">sat</span> of dances can give. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>release</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.343" formerWord="release" newWord="pardon" score="0.343">pardon</span> from him was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ecstasy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="ecstasy" newWord="partner" score="0.665">partner</span>. 
<p>She danced next with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span>, and had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refreshment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.661" formerWord="refreshment" newWord="minute" score="0.661">minute</span> of talking of Wickham, and of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> that he was universally liked. When those dances were over, she returned to Charlotte Lucas, and was in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with her, when she found herself suddenly addressed by Mr. Darcy who took her so much by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, that, without knowing what she did, she accepted him. He walked away again immediately, and she was left to fret over her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.209" formerWord="presence" newWord="decay" score="0.209">decay</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>; Charlotte tried to console her: 
<p>"I dare say you will find him very agreeable."
<p>"Heaven forbid! That would be the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span> of all! To find a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> agreeable whom <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> is determined to hate! Do not wish me such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span>."
<p>When the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span> recommenced, however, and Darcy approached to claim her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, Charlotte could not help cautioning her in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span>, not to be a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>simpleton</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.64" formerWord="simpleton" newWord="ease" score="0.64">ease</span>, and allow her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="fancy" newWord="family" score="0.949">family</span> for Wickham to make her appear unpleasant in the eyes of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> ten times his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>. Elizabeth made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and took her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>set</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.919" formerWord="set" newWord="idea" score="0.919">idea</span>, amazed at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dignity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.694" formerWord="dignity" newWord="idea" score="0.694">idea</span> to which she was arrived in being allowed to stand opposite to Mr. Darcy, and reading in her neighbours ' looks, their equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span> in beholding it. They stood for some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> without speaking a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>; and she began to imagine that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> was to last through the two dances, and at first was resolved not to break it; till suddenly fancying that it would be the greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>punishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.433" formerWord="punishment" newWord="promise" score="0.433">promise</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> to oblige him to talk, she made some slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span>. He replied, and was again silent. After a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> of some minutes, she addressed him a second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> with: - -"It is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> to say <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> now, Mr. Darcy. I talked about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span>, and you ought to make some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remark</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.379" formerWord="remark" newWord="ridicule" score="0.379">ridicule</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>size</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.812" formerWord="size" newWord="longbourn" score="0.812">longbourn</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>number</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="number" newWord="kind" score="0.875">kind</span> of couples."
<p>He smiled, and assured her that whatever she wished him to say should be said. 
<p>"Very well. That reply will do for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span>. Perhaps by and by I may observe that private balls are much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasanter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="pleasanter" newWord="question" score="0.549">question</span> than public ones. But now we may be silent."
<p>"Do you talk by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.648" formerWord="rule" newWord="scheme" score="0.648">scheme</span>, then, while you are dancing?"
<p>"Sometimes. One must speak a little, you know. It would look odd to be entirely silent for half an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> together; and yet for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of some, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> ought to be so arranged, as that they may have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of saying as little as possible."
<p>"Are you consulting your own feelings in the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, or do you imagine that you are gratifying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>?"
<p>"Both,"replied Elizabeth archly;"for I have always seen a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>similarity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="similarity" newWord="trifle" score="0.329">trifle</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> of our minds. We are each of an unsocial, taciturn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>, unwilling to speak, unless we expect to say <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> that will amaze the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and be handed down to posterity with all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eclat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="eclat" newWord="gentleman" score="0.308">gentleman</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proverb</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.618" formerWord="proverb" newWord="minute" score="0.618">minute</span>."
<p>"This is no very striking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resemblance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="resemblance" newWord="minute" score="0.675">minute</span> of your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, I am sure,"said he."How near it may be to mine, I cannot pretend to say. You think it a faithful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>portrait</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.455" formerWord="portrait" newWord="abode" score="0.455">abode</span> undoubtedly."
<p>"I must not decide on my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>performance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="performance" newWord="though" score="0.309">though</span>."
<p>He made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and they were again silent till they had gone down the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span>, when he asked her if she and her sisters did not very often walk to Meryton. She answered in the affirmative, and, unable to resist the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temptation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="temptation" newWord="weakness" score="0.387">weakness</span>, added,"When you met us there the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, we had just been forming a new <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> was immediate. A deeper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shade</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="shade" newWord="attempt" score="0.731">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hauteur</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="hauteur" newWord="communication" score="0.406">communication</span> overspread his features, but he said not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, and Elizabeth, though blaming herself for her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weakness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.755" formerWord="weakness" newWord="husband" score="0.755">husband</span>, could not go on. At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> Darcy spoke, and in a constrained <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> said,"Mr. Wickham is blessed with such happy manners as may ensure his making friends - - whether he may be equally capable of retaining them, is less certain."
<p>"He has been so unlucky as to lose your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span>,"replied Elizabeth with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emphasis</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="emphasis" newWord="want" score="0.383">want</span>,"and in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> which he is likely to suffer from all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>."
<p>Darcy made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and seemed desirous of changing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. At that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, Sir William Lucas appeared close to them, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span> to pass through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>set</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.919" formerWord="set" newWord="idea" score="0.919">idea</span> to the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>; but on perceiving Mr. Darcy, he stopped with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span> of superior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courtesy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="courtesy" newWord="horror" score="0.523">horror</span> to compliment him on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span> and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span>. 
<p>"I have been most highly gratified indeed, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>. Such very superior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span> is not often seen. It is evident that you belong to the first circles. Allow me to say, however, that your fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> does not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span> you, and that I must hope to have this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> often repeated, especially when a certain desirable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span>, my dear Eliza ( glancing at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and Bingley ) shall take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>. What congratulations will then <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="flow" newWord="horror" score="0.318">horror</span> in! I appeal to Mr. Darcy: - - but let me not interrupt you, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>. You will not thank me for detaining you from the bewitching converse of that young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>, whose bright eyes are also upbraiding me."
<p>The latter <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span> was scarcely heard by Darcy; but Sir William's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>allusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="allusion" newWord="haste" score="0.332">haste</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> seemed to strike him forcibly, and his eyes were directed with a very serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> towards Bingley and Jane, who were dancing together. Recovering himself, however, shortly, he turned to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span>, and said,"Sir William's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span> has made me forget what we were talking of."
<p>"I do not think we were speaking at all. Sir William could not have interrupted two people in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> who had less to say for themselves. We have tried two or three subjects already without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span>, and what we are to talk of next I cannot imagine."
<p>"What think you of books?"said he, smiling. 
<p>"Books - - oh! no. I am sure we never read the same, or not with the same feelings."
<p>"I am sorry you think so; but if that be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, there can at least be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. We may compare our different opinions."
<p>"No - - I cannot talk of books in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.396" formerWord="ball-room" newWord="though" score="0.396">though</span>; my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> is always full of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> else."
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> always occupies you in such scenes - - does it?"said he, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>. 
<p>"Yes, always,"she replied, without knowing what she said, for her thoughts had wandered far from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, as soon afterwards appeared by her suddenly exclaiming,"I remember <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> you once say, Mr. Darcy, that you hardly ever forgave, that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> once created was unappeasable. You are very cautious, I suppose, as to its being created."
<p>"I am,"said he, with a firm <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>. 
<p>"And never allow yourself to be blinded by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prejudice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.751" formerWord="prejudice" newWord="arrival" score="0.751">arrival</span>?"
<p>"I hope not."
<p>"It is particularly incumbent on those who never change their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, to be secure of judging properly at first."
<p>"May I ask to what these questions tend?"
<p>"Merely to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>illustration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.271" formerWord="illustration" newWord="discernment" score="0.271">discernment</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>,"said she, endeavouring to shake off her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.506" formerWord="gravity" newWord="horror" score="0.506">horror</span>."I am trying to make it out."
<p>"And what is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span>?"
<p>She shook her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>."I do not get on at all. I hear such different accounts of you as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>puzzle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.277" formerWord="puzzle" newWord="member" score="0.277">member</span> me exceedingly."
<p>"I can readily believe,"answered he gravely,"that reports may vary greatly with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> to me; and I could wish, Miss Bennet, that you were not to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sketch</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.614" formerWord="sketch" newWord="minute" score="0.614">minute</span> my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> at the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, as there is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to fear that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>performance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="performance" newWord="though" score="0.309">though</span> would reflect no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> on either."
<p>"But if I do not take your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="likeness" newWord="cabinet" score="0.26">cabinet</span> now, I may never have another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span>."
<p>"I would by no means suspend any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of yours,"he coldly replied. She said no more, and they went down the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span> and parted in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>; and on each <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> dissatisfied, though not to an equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span>, for in Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.21" formerWord="breast" newWord="meanness" score="0.21">meanness</span> there was a tolerable powerful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> towards her, which soon procured her pardon, and directed all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> against another. 
<p>They had not long separated, when Miss Bingley came towards her, and with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of civil <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disdain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="disdain" newWord="park" score="0.402">park</span> accosted her: 
<p>"So, Miss Eliza, I hear you are quite delighted with George Wickham! Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> has been talking to me about him, and asking me a thousand questions; and I find that the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> quite forgot to tell you, among his other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span>, that he was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of old Wickham, the late Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>steward</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="steward" newWord="sister" score="0.85">sister</span>. Let me recommend you, however, as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, not to give implicit <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.877" formerWord="confidence" newWord="heart" score="0.877">heart</span> to all his assertions; for as to Mr. Darcy's using him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span>, it is perfectly false; for, on the contrary, he has always been remarkably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> to him, though George Wickham has treated Mr. Darcy in a most infamous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>. I do not know the particulars, but I know very well that Mr. Darcy is not in the least to blame, that he cannot bear to hear George Wickham mentioned, and that though my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> thought that he could not well avoid including him in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> to the officers, he was excessively glad to find that he had taken himself out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. His coming into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> at all is a most insolent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, indeed, and I wonder how he could presume to do it. I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="pity" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> you, Miss Eliza, for this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="discovery" newWord="trouble" score="0.588">trouble</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guilt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="guilt" newWord="kind" score="0.86">kind</span>; but really, considering his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>descent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="descent" newWord="sister" score="0.761">sister</span>, one could not expect much better."
<p>"His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guilt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="guilt" newWord="kind" score="0.86">kind</span> and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>descent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="descent" newWord="sister" score="0.761">sister</span> appear by your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> to be the same,"said Elizabeth angrily;"for I have heard you accuse him of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> worse than of being the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>steward</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="steward" newWord="sister" score="0.85">sister</span>, and of that, I can assure you, he informed me himself."
<p>"I beg your pardon,"replied Miss Bingley, turning away with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sneer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.227" formerWord="sneer" newWord="disrespect" score="0.227">disrespect</span>."Excuse my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> - - it was kindly meant."
<p>"Insolent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>!"said Elizabeth to herself."You are much mistaken if you expect to influence me by such a paltry <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attack</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.641" formerWord="attack" newWord="arrival" score="0.641">arrival</span> as this. I see <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> in it but your own wilful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ignorance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.642" formerWord="ignorance" newWord="horror" score="0.642">horror</span> and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>malice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="malice" newWord="error" score="0.421">error</span> of Mr. Darcy."She then sought her eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, who has undertaken to make inquiries on the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of Bingley. Jane met her with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> of such sweet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complacency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="complacency" newWord="ma'am" score="0.522">ma'am</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.765" formerWord="glow" newWord="evening" score="0.765">evening</span> of such happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>, as sufficiently marked how well she was satisfied with the occurrences of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. Elizabeth instantly read her feelings, and at that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solicitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.615" formerWord="solicitude" newWord="minute" score="0.615">minute</span> for Wickham, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> against his enemies, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> else, gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of Jane's being in the fairest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. 
<p>"I want to know,"said she, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> no less smiling than her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> ' s,"what you have learnt about Mr. Wickham. But perhaps you have been too pleasantly engaged to think of any third <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>; in which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> you may be sure of my pardon."
<p>"No,"replied Jane,"I have not forgotten him; but I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> satisfactory to tell you. Mr. Bingley does not know the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>history</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="history" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span>, and is quite ignorant of the circumstances which have principally offended Mr. Darcy; but he will vouch for the good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>, the probity, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, and is perfectly convinced that Mr. Wickham has deserved much less <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> from Mr. Darcy than he has received; and I am sorry to say by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> as well as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> ' s, Mr. Wickham is by no means a respectable young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. I am afraid he has been very imprudent, and has deserved to lose Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>."
<p>"Mr. Bingley does not know Mr. Wickham himself?"
<p>"No; he never saw him till the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> at Meryton."
<p>"This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> then is what he has received from Mr. Darcy. I am satisfied. But what does he say of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>?"
<p>"He does not exactly recollect the circumstances, though he has heard them from Mr. Darcy more than once, but he believes that it was left to him conditionally only."
<p>"I have not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of Mr. Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sincerity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="sincerity" newWord="manuscript" score="0.339">manuscript</span>,"said Elizabeth warmly;"but you must excuse my not being convinced by assurances only. Mr. Bingley's defense of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> was a very able <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>, I dare say; but since he is unacquainted with several parts of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>story</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="story" newWord="letter" score="0.837">letter</span>, and has learnt the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> from that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> himself, I shall <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>venture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="venture" newWord="doubt" score="0.637">doubt</span> to still think of both gentlemen as I did before."
<p>She then changed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="discourse" newWord="century" score="0.264">century</span> to one more gratifying to each, and on which there could be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="difference" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="sentiment" newWord="haste" score="0.645">haste</span>. On their being joined by Mr. Bingley himself, Elizabeth withdrew to Miss Lucas; to whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span> after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasantness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="pleasantness" newWord="sooner" score="0.528">sooner</span> of her last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> she had scarcely replied, before Mr. Collins came up to them, and told her with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exultation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="exultation" newWord="surprise" score="0.683">surprise</span> that he had just been so fortunate as to make a most important <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="discovery" newWord="trouble" score="0.588">trouble</span>. 
<p>"I have found out,"said he,"by a singular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accident</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="accident" newWord="point" score="0.679">point</span>, that there is now in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> a near <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span>. How wonderfully these <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of things occur! Who would have thought of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> with, perhaps, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span> of Lady Catherine de Bourgh in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assembly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.441" formerWord="assembly" newWord="horror" score="0.441">horror</span>! I am most thankful that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="discovery" newWord="trouble" score="0.588">trouble</span> is made in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for me to pay my respects to him, which I am now going to do, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> he will excuse my not having done it before. My total <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ignorance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.642" formerWord="ignorance" newWord="horror" score="0.642">horror</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> must plead my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apology</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="apology" newWord="character" score="0.793">character</span>."
<p>"You are not going to introduce yourself to Mr. Darcy!"
<p>"Indeed I am. I shall entreat his pardon for not having done it earlier. I believe him to be Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>. It will be in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to assure him that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> was quite well <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>se'nnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.671" formerWord="se'nnight" newWord="silence" score="0.671">silence</span>."
<p>Elizabeth tried hard to dissuade him from such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>, assuring him that Mr. Darcy would consider his addressing him without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span> as an impertinent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>freedom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="freedom" newWord="defence" score="0.297">defence</span>, rather than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; that it was not in the least necessary there should be any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>; and that if it were, it must belong to Mr. Darcy, the superior in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>, to begin the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>. Mr. Collins listened to her with the determined <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of following his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>, and, when she ceased <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, replied thus: 
<p>"My dear Miss Elizabeth, I have the highest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> in your excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> in all matters within the scope of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span>; but permit me to say, that there must be a wide <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="difference" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> between the established forms of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ceremony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.539" formerWord="ceremony" newWord="curiosity" score="0.539">curiosity</span> amongst the laity, and those which regulate the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.427" formerWord="clergy" newWord="curiosity" score="0.427">curiosity</span>; for, give me leave to observe that I consider the clerical <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>office</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="office" newWord="sir" score="0.764">sir</span> as equal in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dignity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.694" formerWord="dignity" newWord="idea" score="0.694">idea</span> with the highest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kingdom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="kingdom" newWord="child" score="0.412">child</span> - - provided that a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.501" formerWord="humility" newWord="plenty" score="0.501">plenty</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> is at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> maintained. <span class='purple'>reception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="reception" newWord="plain" score="0.346">plain</span> of his advances she eagerly watched, and whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> at being so addressed was very evident. Mr. Collins then returned to Elizabeth. 
<p>"I have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>, I assure you,"said he,"to be dissatisfied with my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="reception" newWord="plain" score="0.346">plain</span>. It was really a very handsome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span>. Upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, I am much pleased with him."
<p>As Elizabeth had no longer any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> of her own to pursue, she turned her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> almost entirely on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and Mr. Bingley; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>train</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.285" formerWord="train" newWord="counter" score="0.285">counter</span> of agreeable reflections which her observations gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>birth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="birth" newWord="sign" score="0.289">sign</span> to, made her perhaps almost as happy as Jane. She saw her in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> settled in that very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, in all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> which a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of true <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> could bestow; and she felt capable, under such circumstances, of endeavouring even to like Bingley's two sisters. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s thoughts she plainly saw were bent the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and she determined not to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>venture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="venture" newWord="doubt" score="0.637">doubt</span> near her, lest she might hear too much. When they sat down to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span>, therefore, she considered it a most unlucky <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perverseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="perverseness" newWord="look" score="0.477">look</span> which placed them within one of each other; and deeply was she vexed to find that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> was talking to that one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> ( Lady Lucas ) freely, openly, and of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else but her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> that Jane would soon be married to Mr. Bingley. It was an animating <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, and Mrs. Bennet seemed incapable of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fatigue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="fatigue" newWord="fortnight" score="0.542">fortnight</span> while enumerating the advantages of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>. His being such a charming young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and so rich, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> but three miles from them, were the first points of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-gratulation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="self-gratulation" newWord="inability" score="0.24">inability</span>; and then it was such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to think how fond the two sisters were of Jane, and to be certain that they must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> as much as she could do. It was, moreover, such a promising <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> for her younger daughters, as Jane's marrying so greatly must throw them in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of other rich men; and lastly, it was so pleasant at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> to be able to consign her single daughters to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, that she might not be obliged to go into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> more than she liked. It was necessary to make this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, because on such occasions it is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>etiquette</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="etiquette" newWord="urgency" score="0.217">urgency</span>; but no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> was less likely than Mrs. Bennet to find <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> in staying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> at any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. She concluded with many good wishes that Lady Lucas might soon be equally fortunate, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>though</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="though" newWord="life" score="0.866">life</span> evidently and triumphantly believing there was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of it. 
<p>In vain did Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to check the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rapidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.727" formerWord="rapidity" newWord="pain" score="0.727">pain</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s words, or persuade her to describe her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> in a less audible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span>; for, to her inexpressible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span>, she could perceive that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of it was overheard by Mr. Darcy, who sat opposite to them. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> only scolded her for being nonsensical. 
<p>"What is Mr. Darcy to me, pray, that I should be afraid of him? I am sure we owe him no such particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> as to be obliged to say <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> he may not like to hear."
<p>"For <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heaven</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="heaven" newWord="haste" score="0.728">haste</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, speak lower. You will never recommend yourself to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> by so doing!"
<p><span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> that she could say, however, had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>influence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="influence" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> would talk of her views in the same intelligible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>. Elizabeth blushed and blushed again with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span>. She could not help frequently glancing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> at Mr. Darcy, though every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="glance" newWord="idea" score="0.849">idea</span> convinced her of what she dreaded; for though he was not always looking at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, she was convinced that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> was invariably fixed by her. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> changed gradually from indignant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> to a composed and steady <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.506" formerWord="gravity" newWord="horror" score="0.506">horror</span>. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, however, Mrs. Bennet had no more to say; and Lady Lucas, who had been long yawning at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repetition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="repetition" newWord="man-servant" score="0.303">man-servant</span> of delights which she saw no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likelihood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="likelihood" newWord="inn" score="0.289">inn</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sharing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="sharing" newWord="proprietor" score="0.302">proprietor</span>, was left to the comforts of cold <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ham</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.252" formerWord="ham" newWord="fluency" score="0.252">fluency</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chicken</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.251" formerWord="chicken" newWord="god-daughter" score="0.251">god-daughter</span>. Elizabeth now began to revive.
