But not long was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interval</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="interval" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.788">acquaintance</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tranquillity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.408" formerWord="tranquillity" newWord="melancholy" score="0.408">melancholy</span>; for, when <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span> was over, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>singing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="singing" newWord="round" score="0.31">round</span> was talked of, and she had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mortification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="mortification" newWord="answer" score="0.658">answer</span> of seeing Mary, after very little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entreaty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="entreaty" newWord="card" score="0.361">card</span>, preparing to oblige the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. By many significant looks and silent entreaties, did she <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to prevent such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="proof" newWord="nothing" score="0.855">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complaisance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="complaisance" newWord="cart" score="0.23">cart</span>, but in vain; Mary would not understand them; such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of exhibiting was delightful to her, and she began her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>song</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="song" newWord="card" score="0.471">card</span>. Elizabeth's eyes were fixed on her with most painful sensations, and she watched her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>progress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.773" formerWord="progress" newWord="heart" score="0.773">heart</span> through the several stanzas with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span> which was very ill rewarded at their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>close</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="close" newWord="man" score="0.818">man</span>; for Mary, on receiving, amongst the thanks of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> that she might be prevailed on to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> them again, after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>minute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="minute" newWord="round" score="0.875">round</span> began another. Mary's powers were by no means fitted for such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>display</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.816" formerWord="display" newWord="family" score="0.816">family</span>; her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> was weak, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> affected. Elizabeth was in agonies. She looked at Jane, to see how she bore it; but Jane was very composedly talking to Bingley. She looked at his two sisters, and saw them making signs of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>derision</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="derision" newWord="mass" score="0.259">mass</span> at each other, and at Darcy, who continued, however, imperturbably grave. She looked at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> to entreat his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span>, lest Mary should be singing all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>. He took the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span>, and when Mary had finished her second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>song</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="song" newWord="card" score="0.471">card</span>, said aloud,"That will do extremely well, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>. You have delighted us long enough. Let the other young ladies have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to exhibit."
<p>Mary, though pretending not to hear, was somewhat disconcerted; and Elizabeth, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="sorry" newWord="perfection" score="0.329">perfection</span> for her, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="sorry" newWord="perfection" score="0.329">perfection</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>, was afraid her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> had done no good. Others of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> were now applied to. 
<p>"If I,"said Mr. Collins,"were so fortunate as to be able to sing, I should have great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, I am sure, in obliging the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span>; for I consider <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span> as a very innocent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diversion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="diversion" newWord="continuance" score="0.293">continuance</span>, and perfectly compatible with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span>. I do not mean, however, to assert that we can be justified in devoting too much of our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>, for there are certainly other things to be attended to. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rector</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="rector" newWord="profession" score="0.659">profession</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span> has much to do. In the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, he must make such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agreement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.682" formerWord="agreement" newWord="horror" score="0.682">horror</span> for tithes as may be beneficial to himself and not offensive to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patron</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="patron" newWord="fault" score="0.37">fault</span>. He must write his own sermons; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> that remains will not be too much for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span> duties, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span>, which he cannot be excused from making as comfortable as possible. And I do not think it of light <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> that he should have attentive and conciliatory manners towards <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>, especially towards those to whom he owes his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>preferment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="preferment" newWord="complaint" score="0.298">complaint</span>. I cannot acquit him of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span>; nor could I think well of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who should omit an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of testifying his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> towards <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> connected with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>."And with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span> to Mr. Darcy, he concluded his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>, which had been spoken so loud as to be heard by half the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Many stared - - many smiled; but no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> looked more amused than Mr. Bennet himself, while his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> seriously commended Mr. Collins for having spoken so sensibly, and observed in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.222" formerWord="half-whisper" newWord="gentility" score="0.222">gentility</span> to Lady Lucas, that he was a remarkably clever, good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. 
<p>To Elizabeth it appeared that, had her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> made an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agreement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.682" formerWord="agreement" newWord="horror" score="0.682">horror</span> to expose themselves as much as they could during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, it would have been impossible for them to play their parts with more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span> or finer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span>; and happy did she think it for Bingley and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> that some of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exhibition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="exhibition" newWord="candle" score="0.328">candle</span> had escaped his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>, and that his feelings were not of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> to be much distressed by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span> which he must have witnessed. That his two sisters and Mr. Darcy, however, should have such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of ridiculing her relations, was bad enough, and she could not determine whether the silent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>, or the insolent smiles of the ladies, were more intolerable. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> brought her little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>. She was teased by Mr. Collins, who continued most perseveringly by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, and though he could not prevail on her to dance with him again, put it out of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to dance with others. In vain did she entreat him to stand up with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>somebody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="somebody" newWord="yesterday" score="0.649">yesterday</span> else, and offer to introduce him to any young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. He assured her, that as to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span>, he was perfectly indifferent to it; that his chief <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> was by delicate attentions to recommend himself to her and that he should therefore make a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remaining</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.265" formerWord="remaining" newWord="violence" score="0.265">violence</span> close to her the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. There was no arguing upon such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>project</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.436" formerWord="project" newWord="dressing-room" score="0.436">dressing-room</span>. She owed her greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Miss Lucas, who often joined them, and good-naturedly engaged Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> to herself. 
<p>She was at least free from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.277" formerWord="offense" newWord="rate" score="0.277">rate</span> of Mr. Darcy's further <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>; though often standing within a very short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> of her, quite disengaged, he never came near enough to speak. She felt it to be the probable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of her allusions to Mr. Wickham, and rejoiced in it. 
<p>The Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> were the last of all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to depart, and, by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manoeuvre</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="manoeuvre" newWord="comprehension" score="0.282">comprehension</span> of Mrs. Bennet, had to wait for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> else was gone, which gave them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to see how heartily they were wished away by some of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Mrs. Hurst and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> scarcely opened their mouths, except to complain of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fatigue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="fatigue" newWord="fortnight" score="0.542">fortnight</span>, and were evidently impatient to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> to themselves. They repulsed every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> of Mrs. Bennet at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, and by so doing threw a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>languor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.427" formerWord="languor" newWord="appearance" score="0.427">appearance</span> over the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, which was very little relieved by the long speeches of Mr. Collins, who was complimenting Mr. Bingley and his sisters on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entertainment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="entertainment" newWord="maid" score="0.391">maid</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hospitality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="hospitality" newWord="chair" score="0.55">chair</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span> which had marked their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to their guests. Darcy said <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all. Mr. Bennet, in equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>, was enjoying the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>. Mr. Bingley and Jane were standing together, a little detached from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span>, and talked only to each other. Elizabeth preserved as steady a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> as either Mrs. Hurst or Miss Bingley; and even Lydia was too much fatigued to utter more than the occasional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exclamation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="exclamation" newWord="father" score="0.514">father</span> of"Lord, how tired I am!"accompanied by a violent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yawn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.367" formerWord="yawn" newWord="aggravation" score="0.367">aggravation</span>. 
<p>When at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> they arose to take leave, Mrs. Bennet was most pressingly civil in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of seeing the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> soon at Longbourn, and addressed herself especially to Mr. Bingley, to assure him how happy he would make them by eating a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> with them at any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, without the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ceremony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.539" formerWord="ceremony" newWord="curiosity" score="0.539">curiosity</span> of a formal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>. Bingley was all grateful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and he readily engaged for taking the earliest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of waiting on her, after his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> from London, whither he was obliged to go the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> for a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. 
<p>Mrs. Bennet was perfectly satisfied, and quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> under the delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span> that, allowing for the necessary preparations of settlements, new carriages, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span> clothes, she should undoubtedly see her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> settled at Netherfield in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of three or four months. Of having another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> married to Mr. Collins, she thought with equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>certainty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="certainty" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span>, and with considerable, though not equal, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. Elizabeth was the least dear to her of all her children; and though the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> were quite good enough for her, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>worth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="worth" newWord="man" score="0.953">man</span> of each was eclipsed by Mr. Bingley and Netherfield. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 19 
<p>
<p>The next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> opened a new <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span> at Longbourn. Mr. Collins made his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>declaration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="declaration" newWord="indignation" score="0.359">indignation</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>form</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="form" newWord="aunt" score="0.832">aunt</span>. Having resolved to do it without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> extended only to the following Saturday, and having no feelings of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diffidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="diffidence" newWord="act" score="0.322">act</span> to make it distressing to himself even at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, he set about it in a very orderly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, with all the observances, which he supposed a regular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>. On finding Mrs. Bennet, Elizabeth, and one of the younger girls together, soon after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>, he addressed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> in these words: 
<p>"May I hope, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> with your fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> Elizabeth, when I solicit for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of a private <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>audience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="audience" newWord="interview" score="0.253">interview</span> with her in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>?"
<p>Before Elizabeth had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> but a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blush</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.271" formerWord="blush" newWord="bathing" score="0.271">bathing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, Mrs. Bennet answered instantly,"Oh dear! - - yes - - certainly. I am sure Lizzy will be very happy - - I am sure she can have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>. Come, Kitty, I want you up stairs."And, gathering her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> together, she was hastening away, when Elizabeth called out: 
<p>"Dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, do not go. I beg you will not go. Mr. Collins must excuse me. He can have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to say to me that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> need not hear. I am going away myself."
<p>"No, no, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nonsense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="nonsense" newWord="person" score="0.722">person</span>, Lizzy. I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> you to stay where you are."And upon Elizabeth's seeming really, with vexed and embarrassed looks, about to escape, she added:"Lizzy, I insist upon your staying and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> Mr. Collins."
<p>Elizabeth would not oppose such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>injunction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.234" formerWord="injunction" newWord="eloquence" score="0.234">eloquence</span> - - and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> making her also sensible that it would be wisest to get it over as soon and as quietly as possible, she sat down again and tried to conceal, by incessant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>employment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="employment" newWord="answer" score="0.916">answer</span> the feelings which were divided between <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diversion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="diversion" newWord="continuance" score="0.293">continuance</span>. Mrs. Bennet and Kitty walked off, and as soon as they were gone, Mr. Collins began. 
<p>"Believe me, my dear Miss Elizabeth, that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>modesty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="modesty" newWord="portionless" score="0.283">portionless</span>, so far from doing you any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disservice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="disservice" newWord="tune" score="0.241">tune</span>, rather adds to your other perfections. You would have been less amiable in my eyes had there not been this little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unwillingness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.226" formerWord="unwillingness" newWord="imprudence" score="0.226">imprudence</span>; but allow me to assure you, that I have your respected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>permission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="permission" newWord="newspaper" score="0.267">newspaper</span> for this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span>. You can hardly doubt the purport of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="discourse" newWord="century" score="0.264">century</span>, however your natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span> may lead you to dissemble; my attentions have been too marked to be mistaken. Almost as soon as I entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, I singled you out as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> of my future <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. But before I am run away with by my feelings on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, perhaps it would be advisable for me to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> my reasons for marrying - - and, moreover, for coming into Hertfordshire with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> of selecting a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, as I certainly did."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of Mr. Collins, with all his solemn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>, being run away with by his feelings, made Elizabeth so near laughing, that she could not use the short pause he allowed in any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to stop him further, and he continued: 
<p>"My reasons for marrying are, first, that I think it a right <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> for every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span> in easy circumstances ( like myself ) to set the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>example</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="example" newWord="rumour" score="0.336">rumour</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matrimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="matrimony" newWord="heart" score="0.858">heart</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span>; secondly, that I am convinced that it will add very greatly to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; and thirdly - - which perhaps I ought to have mentioned earlier, that it is the particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recommendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.689" formerWord="recommendation" newWord="conviction" score="0.689">conviction</span> of the very noble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> whom I have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of calling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span>. Twice has she condescended to give me her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> ( unasked too! ) on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>; and it was but the very Saturday <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> before I left Hunsford - - between our pools at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quadrille</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="quadrille" newWord="capital" score="0.319">capital</span>, while Mrs. Jenkinson was arranging Miss de Bourgh's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>footstool</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="footstool" newWord="worship" score="0.253">worship</span>, that she said, ' Mr. Collins, you must marry. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span> like you must marry. Choose properly, choose a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentlewoman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.313" formerWord="gentlewoman" newWord="traveller" score="0.313">traveller</span> for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>; and for your own, let her be an active, useful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>, not brought up high, but able to make a small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span> go a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. This is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span>. Find such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> as soon as you can, bring her to Hunsford, and I will visit her. ' Allow me, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, to observe, my fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, that I do not reckon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> of Lady Catherine de Bourgh as among the least of the advantages in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to offer. You will find her manners beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> I can describe; and your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.579" formerWord="wit" newWord="observation" score="0.579">observation</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vivacity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.285" formerWord="vivacity" newWord="beat" score="0.285">beat</span>, I think, must be acceptable to her, especially when tempered with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> will inevitably excite. Thus much for my general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matrimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="matrimony" newWord="heart" score="0.858">heart</span>; it remains to be told why my views were directed towards <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> instead of my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, where I can assure you there are many amiable young women. But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> is, that being, as I am, to inherit this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span> of your honoured <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> ( who, however, may live many years longer ), I could not satisfy myself without resolving to choose a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> from among his daughters, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> to them might be as little as possible, when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>melancholy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="melancholy" newWord="heart" score="0.917">heart</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> takes <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> - - which, however, as I have already said, may not be for several years. This has been my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>, my fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, and I flatter myself it will not sink me in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>esteem</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.718" formerWord="esteem" newWord="circumstance" score="0.718">circumstance</span>. And now <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> remains for me but to assure you in the most animated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>language</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="language" newWord="fuss" score="0.216">fuss</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>violence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="violence" newWord="inspection" score="0.328">inspection</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. To <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> I am perfectly indifferent, and shall make no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>demand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.424" formerWord="demand" newWord="mamma" score="0.424">mamma</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> on your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, since I am well aware that it could not be complied with; and that one thousand pounds in the four per cents, which will not be yours till after your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="decease" newWord="period" score="0.412">period</span>, is all that you may ever be entitled to. On that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, therefore, I shall be uniformly silent; and you may assure yourself that no ungenerous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="reproach" newWord="face" score="0.255">face</span> shall ever pass my lips when we are married."
<p>It was absolutely necessary to interrupt him now. 
<p>"You are too hasty, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>,"she cried."You forget that I have made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. Let me do it without further <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. Accept my thanks for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> you are paying me. I am very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of your proposals, but it is impossible for me to do otherwise than to decline them."
<p>"I am not now to learn,"replied Mr. Collins, with a formal wave of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>,"that it is usual with young ladies to reject the addresses of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> whom they secretly mean to accept, when he first applies for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span>; and that sometimes the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span> is repeated a second, or even a third <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. I am therefore by no means discouraged by what you have just said, and shall hope to lead you to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>altar</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.276" formerWord="altar" newWord="surgeon" score="0.276">surgeon</span> ere long."
<p>"Upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>,"cried Elizabeth,"your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> is a rather extraordinary one after my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>declaration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="declaration" newWord="indignation" score="0.359">indignation</span>. I do assure you that I am not one of those young ladies ( if such young ladies there are ) who are so daring as to risk their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of being asked a second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. I am perfectly serious in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span>. You could not make me happy, and I am convinced that I am the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> who could make you so. Nay, were your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Lady Catherine to know me, I am persuaded she would find me in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> qualified for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>."
<p>"Were it certain that Lady Catherine would think so,"said Mr. Collins very gravely - -"but I cannot imagine that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> would at all disapprove of you. And you may be certain when I have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of seeing her again, I shall speak in the very highest terms of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>modesty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="modesty" newWord="portionless" score="0.283">portionless</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>economy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.407" formerWord="economy" newWord="word" score="0.407">word</span>, and other amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>qualification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.474" formerWord="qualification" newWord="horror" score="0.474">horror</span>."
<p>"Indeed, Mr. Collins, all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> of me will be unnecessary. You must give me leave to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span> for myself, and pay me the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> of believing what I say. I wish you very happy and very rich, and by refusing your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, do all in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to prevent your being otherwise. In making me the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span>, you must have satisfied the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span> of your feelings with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, and may take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="possession" newWord="retirement" score="0.275">retirement</span> of Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> whenever it falls, without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="self-reproach" newWord="fault" score="0.462">fault</span>. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> may be considered, therefore, as finally settled."And rising as she thus spoke, she would have quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, had Mr. Collins not thus addressed her: 
<p>"When I do myself the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> to you next on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, I shall hope to receive a more favourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> than you have now given me; though I am far from accusing you of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cruelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="cruelty" newWord="native" score="0.298">native</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span>, because I know it to be the established <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>custom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.652" formerWord="custom" newWord="carriage" score="0.652">carriage</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sex</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="sex" newWord="compassion" score="0.52">compassion</span> to reject a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> on the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span>, and perhaps you have even now said as much to encourage my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span> as would be consistent with the true <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span> of the female <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>."
<p>"Really, Mr. Collins,"cried Elizabeth with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span>,"you puzzle me exceedingly. If what I have hitherto said can appear to you in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>form</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="form" newWord="aunt" score="0.832">aunt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span>, I know not how to express my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span> in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> as to convince you of its being one."
<p>"You must give me leave to flatter myself, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span> of my addresses is merely words of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>. My reasons for believing it are briefly these: It does not appear to me that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> is unworthy your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acceptance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.347" formerWord="acceptance" newWord="se'nnight" score="0.347">se'nnight</span>, or that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>establishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="establishment" newWord="satisfaction" score="0.477">satisfaction</span> I can offer would be any other than highly desirable. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, my connections with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> of de Bourgh, and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span> to your own, are circumstances highly in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span>; and you should take it into further <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span>, that in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of your manifold attractions, it is by no means certain that another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> may ever be made you. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>portion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="portion" newWord="everything" score="0.854">everything</span> is unhappily so small that it will in all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likelihood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="likelihood" newWord="inn" score="0.289">inn</span> undo the effects of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loveliness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.441" formerWord="loveliness" newWord="suspicion" score="0.441">suspicion</span> and amiable qualifications. As I must therefore conclude that you are not serious in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rejection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="rejection" newWord="ostler" score="0.349">ostler</span> of me, I shall choose to attribute it to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of increasing my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="suspense" newWord="selfishness" score="0.572">selfishness</span>, according to the usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>practice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.58" formerWord="practice" newWord="horror" score="0.58">horror</span> of elegant females."
<p>"I do assure you, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, that I have no pretensions whatever to that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span> which consists in tormenting a respectable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. I would rather be paid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> of being believed sincere. I thank you again and again for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> you have done me in your proposals, but to accept them is absolutely impossible. My feelings in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> forbid it. Can I speak plainer? Do not consider me now as an elegant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>female</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="female" newWord="faint" score="0.282">faint</span>, intending to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plague</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="plague" newWord="bottle" score="0.368">bottle</span> you, but as a rational <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span>, speaking the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>"You are uniformly charming!"cried he, with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of awkward <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.884" formerWord="gallantry" newWord="end" score="0.884">end</span>;"and I am persuaded that when sanctioned by the express <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>authority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="authority" newWord="aunt" score="0.859">aunt</span> of both your excellent parents, my proposals will not fail of being acceptable."
<p>To such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perseverance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="perseverance" newWord="delay" score="0.749">delay</span> in wilful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-deception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="self-deception" newWord="bowling-green" score="0.248">bowling-green</span> Elizabeth would make no reply, and immediately and in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> withdrew; determined, if he persisted in considering her repeated refusals as flattering <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span>, to apply to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, whose negative might be uttered in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> as to be decisive, and whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> at least could not be mistaken for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="affectation" newWord="doubt" score="0.594">doubt</span> and coquetry of an elegant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>female</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="female" newWord="faint" score="0.282">faint</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 20 
<p>
