<p>Mr. Collins was not left long to the silent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contemplation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="contemplation" newWord="brother" score="0.902">brother</span> of his successful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>; for Mrs. Bennet, having dawdled about in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vestibule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="vestibule" newWord="self-importance" score="0.437">self-importance</span> to watch for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="conference" newWord="dancing" score="0.846">dancing</span>, no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sooner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="sooner" newWord="town" score="0.892">town</span> saw Elizabeth open the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> and with quick <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> pass her towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>staircase</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="staircase" newWord="family" score="0.814">family</span>, than she entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="breakfast-room" newWord="title" score="0.325">title</span>, and congratulated both him and herself in warm terms on the happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> or their nearer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span>. Mr. Collins received and returned these felicitations with equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and then proceeded to relate the particulars of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interview</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="interview" newWord="horror" score="0.633">horror</span>, with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>result</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="result" newWord="observation" score="0.402">observation</span> of which he trusted he had every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to be satisfied, since the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span> which his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> had steadfastly given him would naturally flow from her bashful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>modesty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="modesty" newWord="portionless" score="0.283">portionless</span> and the genuine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>. 
<p>This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>, however, startled Mrs. Bennet; she would have been glad to be equally satisfied that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> had meant to encourage him by protesting against his proposals, but she dared not believe it, and could not help saying so. 
<p>"But, depend upon it, Mr. Collins,"she added,"that Lizzy shall be brought to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>. I will speak to her about it directly. She is a very headstrong, foolish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>, and does not know her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> but I will make her know it."
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Pardon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.656" formerWord="Pardon" newWord="happiness" score="0.656">Happiness</span> me for interrupting you, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"cried Mr. Collins;"but if she is really headstrong and foolish, I know not whether she would altogether be a very desirable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, who naturally looks for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span>. If therefore she actually persists in rejecting my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span>, perhaps it were better not to force her into accepting me, because if liable to such defects of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>, she could not contribute much to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span>."
<p>"Sir, you quite misunderstand me,"said Mrs. Bennet, alarmed."Lizzy is only headstrong in such matters as these. In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> else she is as good-natured a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> as ever lived. I will go directly to Mr. Bennet, and we shall very soon settle it with her, I am sure."
<p>She would not give him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to reply, but hurrying instantly to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, called out as she entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>,"Oh! Mr. Bennet, you are wanted immediately; we are all in an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uproar</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.235" formerWord="uproar" newWord="aptitude" score="0.235">aptitude</span>. You must come and make Lizzy marry Mr. Collins, for she vows she will not have him, and if you do not make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>haste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="haste" newWord="minute" score="0.843">minute</span> he will change his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> and not have her."
<p>Mr. Bennet raised his eyes from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span> as she entered, and fixed them on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> with a calm <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unconcern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="unconcern" newWord="spirit" score="0.601">spirit</span> which was not in the least altered by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span>. 
<p>"I have not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> you,"said he, when she had finished her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>."Of what are you talking?"
<p>"Of Mr. Collins and Lizzy. Lizzy declares she will not have Mr. Collins, and Mr. Collins begins to say that he will not have Lizzy."
<p>"And what am I to do on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>? It seems an hopeless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>."
<p>"Speak to Lizzy about it yourself. Tell her that you insist upon her marrying him."
<p>"Let her be called down. She shall hear my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>."
<p>Mrs. Bennet rang the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bell</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.204" formerWord="bell" newWord="varnish" score="0.204">varnish</span>, and Miss Elizabeth was summoned to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>. 
<p>"Come here, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> as she appeared."I have sent for you on an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>. I understand that Mr. Collins has made you an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. Is it true?"Elizabeth replied that it was."Very well - - and this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> you have refused?"
<p>"I have, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>."
<p>"Very well. We now come to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> insists upon your accepting it. Is it not so, Mrs. Bennet?"
<p>"Yes, or I will never see her again."
<p>"An unhappy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alternative</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.258" formerWord="alternative" newWord="escape" score="0.258">escape</span> is before you, Elizabeth. From this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> you must be a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span> to one of your parents. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> will never see you again if you do not marry Mr. Collins, and I will never see you again if you do."
<p>Elizabeth could not but smile at such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="conclusion" newWord="happiness" score="0.902">happiness</span> of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span>, but Mrs. Bennet, who had persuaded herself that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> regarded the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> as she wished, was excessively disappointed. 
<p>"What do you mean, Mr. Bennet, in talking this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>? You promised me to insist upon her marrying him."
<p>"My dear,"replied her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>,"I have two small favours to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span>. First, that you will allow me the free <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> on the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>; and secondly, of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. I shall be glad to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> to myself as soon as may be."
<p>Not yet, however, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, did Mrs. Bennet give up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>. She talked to Elizabeth again and again; coaxed and threatened her by turns. She endeavoured to secure Jane in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span>; but Jane, with all possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mildness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.223" formerWord="mildness" newWord="mouth" score="0.223">mouth</span>, declined interfering; and Elizabeth, sometimes with real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnestness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="earnestness" newWord="xxxiv" score="0.255">xxxiv</span>, and sometimes with playful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gaiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.457" formerWord="gaiety" newWord="civility" score="0.457">civility</span>, replied to her attacks. Though her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> varied, however, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>determination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.426" formerWord="determination" newWord="side" score="0.426">side</span> never did. 
<p>Mr. Collins, meanwhile, was meditating in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="solitude" newWord="arrival" score="0.838">arrival</span> on what had passed. He thought too well of himself to comprehend on what motives his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> could refuse him; and though his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> was hurt, he suffered in no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> for her was quite imaginary; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of her deserving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="reproach" newWord="face" score="0.255">face</span> prevented his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> any regret. 
<p>While the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span>, Charlotte Lucas came to spend the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> with them. She was met in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vestibule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="vestibule" newWord="self-importance" score="0.437">self-importance</span> by Lydia, who, flying to her, cried in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span>,"I am glad you are come, for there is such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span> here! What do you think has happened this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>? Mr. Collins has made an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> to Lizzy, and she will not have him."
<p>Charlotte hardly had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to answer, before they were joined by Kitty, who came to tell the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>; and no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sooner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="sooner" newWord="town" score="0.892">town</span> had they entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="breakfast-room" newWord="title" score="0.325">title</span>, where Mrs. Bennet was alone, than she likewise began on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, calling on Miss Lucas for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span>, and entreating her to persuade her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Lizzy to comply with the wishes of all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>."Pray do, my dear Miss Lucas,"she added in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>melancholy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="melancholy" newWord="heart" score="0.917">heart</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>,"for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> is on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> takes <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> with me. I am cruelly used, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> feels for my poor nerves."
<p>Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reply</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="reply" newWord="brother" score="0.811">brother</span> was spared by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span> of Jane and Elizabeth. 
<p>"Aye, there she comes,"continued Mrs. Bennet,"looking as unconcerned as may be, and caring no more for us than if we were at York, provided she can have her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. But I tell you, Miss Lizzy - - if you take it into your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> to go on refusing every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, you will never get a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> at all - - and I am sure I do not know who is to maintain you when your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> is dead. I shall not be able to keep you - - and so I warn you. I have done with you from this very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. I told you in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>, you know, that I should never speak to you again, and you will find me as good as my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. I have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in talking to undutiful children. Not that I have much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, indeed, in talking to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>. People who suffer as I do from nervous complaints can have no great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> for talking. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="Nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">Family</span> can tell what I suffer! But it is always so. Those who do not complain are never pitied."
<p>Her daughters listened in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> to this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.447" formerWord="effusion" newWord="fortune" score="0.447">fortune</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> that any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> with her or soothe her would only increase the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>irritation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.593" formerWord="irritation" newWord="respect" score="0.593">respect</span>. She talked on, therefore, without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span> from any of them, till they were joined by Mr. Collins, who entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> more stately than usual, and on perceiving whom, she said to the girls,"Now, I do insist upon it, that you, all of you, hold your tongues, and let me and Mr. Collins have a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> together."
<p>Elizabeth passed quietly out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, Jane and Kitty followed, but Lydia stood her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>, determined to hear all she could; and Charlotte, detained first by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of Mr. Collins, whose inquiries after herself and all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were very minute, and then by a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>, satisfied herself with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> and pretending not to hear. In a doleful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> Mrs. Bennet began the projected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>:"Oh! Mr. Collins!"
<p>"My dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"replied he,"let us be for ever silent on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>. Far be it from me,"he presently continued, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> that marked his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>displeasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.747" formerWord="displeasure" newWord="return" score="0.747">return</span>,"to resent the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Resignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="Resignation" newWord="work" score="0.545">Work</span> to inevitable evils is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> of us all; the peculiar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who has been so fortunate as I have been in early <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>preferment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="preferment" newWord="complaint" score="0.298">complaint</span>; and I trust I am resigned. Perhaps not the less so from feeling a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of my positive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> had my fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> honoured me with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>; for I have often observed that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="resignation" newWord="work" score="0.545">work</span> is never so perfect as when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blessing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.913" formerWord="blessing" newWord="town" score="0.913">town</span> denied begins to lose somewhat of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> in our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estimation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="estimation" newWord="vacancy" score="0.216">vacancy</span>. You will not, I hope, consider me as showing any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disrespect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="disrespect" newWord="absence" score="0.305">absence</span> to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, by thus withdrawing my pretensions to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span>, without having paid yourself and Mr. Bennet the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> of requesting you to interpose your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>authority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="authority" newWord="aunt" score="0.859">aunt</span> in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behalf</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.792" formerWord="behalf" newWord="kind" score="0.792">kind</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> may, I fear, be objectionable in having accepted my dismission from your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>'s lips instead of your own. But we are all liable to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>error</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.732" formerWord="error" newWord="minute" score="0.732">minute</span>. I have certainly meant well through the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> has been to secure an amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> for myself, with due <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of all your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, and if my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> has been at all reprehensible, I here beg leave to apologise."
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 21 
<p>
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discussion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.905" formerWord="discussion" newWord="day" score="0.905">day</span> of Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> was now nearly at an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span>, and Elizabeth had only to suffer from the uncomfortable feelings necessarily attending it, and occasionally from some peevish allusions of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. As for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> himself, his feelings were chiefly expressed, not by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embarrassment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="embarrassment" newWord="shortness" score="0.369">shortness</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dejection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="dejection" newWord="artlessness" score="0.264">artlessness</span>, or by trying to avoid her, but by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stiffness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="stiffness" newWord="consciousness" score="0.383">consciousness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> and resentful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. He scarcely ever spoke to her, and the assiduous attentions which he had been so <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> of himself were transferred for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> to Miss Lucas, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> in listening to him was a seasonable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span> to them all, and especially to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="morrow" newWord="half" score="0.39">half</span> produced no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abatement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="abatement" newWord="quietness" score="0.233">quietness</span> of Mrs. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.574" formerWord="ill-humour" newWord="dirt" score="0.574">dirt</span> or ill <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span>. Mr. Collins was also in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of angry <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>. Elizabeth had hoped that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> might shorten his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span>, but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span> did not appear in the least affected by it. He was always to have gone on Saturday, and to Saturday he meant to stay. 
<p>After <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>, the girls walked to Meryton to inquire if Mr. Wickham were returned, and to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lament</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="lament" newWord="downstairs" score="0.293">downstairs</span> over his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> from the Netherfield <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>. He joined them on their entering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, and attended them to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s where his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>, was well talked over. To Elizabeth, however, he voluntarily acknowledged that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> had been self-imposed. 
<p>"I found,"said he,"as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> drew near that I had better not meet Mr. Darcy; that to be in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> with him for so many hours together, might be more than I could bear, and that scenes might arise unpleasant to more than myself."
<p>She highly approved his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forbearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="forbearance" newWord="sort" score="0.515">sort</span>, and they had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> for a full <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discussion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.905" formerWord="discussion" newWord="day" score="0.905">day</span> of it, and for all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="commendation" newWord="hush" score="0.256">hush</span> which they civilly bestowed on each other, as Wickham and another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span> walked back with them to Longbourn, and during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> he particularly attended to her. His accompanying them was a double <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>; she felt all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> it offered to herself, and it was most acceptable as an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of introducing him to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. 
<p>Soon after their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was delivered to Miss Bennet; it came from Netherfield. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>envelope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="envelope" newWord="church" score="0.233">church</span> contained a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sheet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.252" formerWord="sheet" newWord="counter" score="0.252">counter</span> of elegant, little, hot-pressed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="paper" newWord="hearing" score="0.645">hearing</span>, well covered with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>'s fair, flowing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>; and Elizabeth saw her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> as she read it, and saw her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span> intently on some particular passages. Jane recollected herself soon, and putting the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> away, tried to join with her usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cheerfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="cheerfulness" newWord="absence" score="0.542">absence</span> in the general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>; but Elizabeth felt an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> which drew off her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> even from Wickham; and no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sooner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="sooner" newWord="town" score="0.892">town</span> had he and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> taken leave, than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="glance" newWord="idea" score="0.849">idea</span> from Jane invited her to follow her up stairs. When they had gained their own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, Jane, taking out the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, said: 
<p>"This is from Caroline Bingley; what it contains has surprised me a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. The whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> have left Netherfield by this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, and are on their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> - - and without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of coming back again. You shall hear what she says."
<p>She then read the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> aloud, which comprised the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> of their having just resolved to follow their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> directly, and of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span> to dine in Grosvenor Street, where Mr. Hurst had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. The next was in these words:"I do not pretend to regret <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> I shall leave in Hertfordshire, except your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, my dearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>; but we will hope, at some future <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span>, to enjoy many returns of that delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intercourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.896" formerWord="intercourse" newWord="account" score="0.896">account</span> we have known, and in the meanwhile may lessen the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>separation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="separation" newWord="company" score="0.866">company</span> by a very frequent and most unreserved <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>correspondence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.246" formerWord="correspondence" newWord="entree" score="0.246">entree</span>. I depend on you for that."To these highflown expressions Elizabeth listened with all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insensibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="insensibility" newWord="danger" score="0.403">danger</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distrust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="distrust" newWord="engagement" score="0.737">engagement</span>; and though the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suddenness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="suddenness" newWord="dancing" score="0.731">dancing</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span> surprised her, she saw <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> in it really to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lament</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="lament" newWord="downstairs" score="0.293">downstairs</span>; it was not to be supposed that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> from Netherfield would prevent Mr. Bingley's being there; and as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, she was persuaded that Jane must cease to regard it, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> of his. 
<p>"It is unlucky,"said she, after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>,"that you should not be able to see your friends before they leave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>. But may we not hope that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> of future <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to which Miss Bingley looks forward may arrive earlier than she is aware, and that the delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intercourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.896" formerWord="intercourse" newWord="account" score="0.896">account</span> you have known as friends will be renewed with yet greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> as sisters? Mr. Bingley will not be detained in London by them."
<p>"Caroline decidedly says that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> will return into Hertfordshire this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>. I will read it to you:"
<p>"When my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> left us <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span>, he imagined that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> which took him to London might be concluded in three or four days; but as we are certain it cannot be so, and at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> convinced that when Charles gets to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> he will be in no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span> to leave it again, we have determined on following him thither, that he may not be obliged to spend his vacant hours in a comfortless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hotel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.417" formerWord="hotel" newWord="disgust" score="0.417">disgust</span>. Many of my acquaintances are already there for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>; I wish that I could hear that you, my dearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of making one of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>crowd</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.622" formerWord="crowd" newWord="visit" score="0.622">visit</span> - - but of that I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>despair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.238" formerWord="despair" newWord="island" score="0.238">island</span>. I sincerely hope your Christmas in Hertfordshire may abound in the gaieties which that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>season</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.634" formerWord="season" newWord="card" score="0.634">card</span> generally brings, and that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beaux</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.453" formerWord="beaux" newWord="discussion" score="0.453">discussion</span> will be so numerous as to prevent your feeling the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of the three of whom we shall deprive you."
<p>"It is evident by this,"added Jane,"that he comes back no more this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>."
<p>"It is only evident that Miss Bingley does not mean that he should."
<p>"Why will you think so? It must be his own doing. He is his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>. But you do not know all. I will read you the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>passage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.66" formerWord="passage" newWord="subject" score="0.66">subject</span> which particularly hurts me. I will have no reserves from you."
<p>"Mr. Darcy is impatient to see his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>; and, to confess the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>, we are scarcely less eager to meet her again. I really do not think Georgiana Darcy has her equal for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span>, and accomplishments; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> she inspires in Louisa and myself is heightened into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> still more interesting, from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> we dare entertain of her being hereafter our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. I do not know whether I ever before mentioned to you my feelings on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>; but I will not leave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> without confiding them, and I trust you will not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>esteem</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.718" formerWord="esteem" newWord="circumstance" score="0.718">circumstance</span> them unreasonable. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> admires her greatly already; he will have frequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> now of seeing her on the most intimate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>footing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.56" formerWord="footing" newWord="furniture" score="0.56">furniture</span>; her relations all wish the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> as much as his own; and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span> is not misleading me, I think, when I call Charles most capable of engaging any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. With all these circumstances to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to prevent it, am I wrong, my dearest Jane, in indulging the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> which will secure the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of so many?"
<p>"What do you think of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span>, my dear Lizzy?"said Jane as she finished it."Is it not clear enough? Does it not expressly declare that Caroline neither expects nor wishes me to be her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>; that she is perfectly convinced of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>; and that if she suspects the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> of my feelings for him, she means ( most kindly! ) to put me on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="guard" newWord="effect" score="0.569">effect</span>? Can there be any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>?"
<p>"Yes, there can; for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span> is totally different. Will you hear it?"
<p>"Most willingly."
<p>"You shall have it in a few words. Miss Bingley sees that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> is in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with you, and wants him to marry Miss Darcy. She follows him to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of keeping him there, and tries to persuade you that he does not care about you."
<p>Jane shook her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. 
<p>"Indeed, Jane, you ought to believe me. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> who has ever seen you together can doubt his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. Miss Bingley, I am sure, cannot. She is not such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>simpleton</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.64" formerWord="simpleton" newWord="ease" score="0.64">ease</span>. Could she have seen <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> as much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> in Mr. Darcy for herself, she would have ordered her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span> clothes. But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> is this: We are not rich enough or grand <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enough</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="enough" newWord="rash" score="0.239">rash</span> for them; and she is the more anxious to get Miss Darcy for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="notion" newWord="intermission" score="0.312">intermission</span> that when there has been one intermarriage, she may have less <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> in achieving a second; in which there is certainly some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ingenuity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.668" formerWord="ingenuity" newWord="doubt" score="0.668">doubt</span>, and I dare say it would succeed, if Miss de Bourgh were out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. But, my dearest Jane, you cannot seriously imagine that because Miss Bingley tells you her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> greatly admires Miss Darcy, he is in the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> less sensible of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>merit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="merit" newWord="attitude" score="0.205">attitude</span> than when he took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> of you on Tuesday, or that it will be in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to persuade him that, instead of being in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with you, he is very much in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>."
<p>"If we thought alike of Miss Bingley,"replied Jane,"your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>representation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.757" formerWord="representation" newWord="moment" score="0.757">moment</span> of all this might make me quite easy. But I know the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>foundation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="foundation" newWord="suspicion" score="0.319">suspicion</span> is unjust. Caroline is incapable of wilfully deceiving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span>; and all that I can hope in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> is that she is deceiving herself."
<p>"That is right.
