You could not have started a more happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>, since you will not take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>. Believe her to be deceived, by all means. You have now done your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> by her, and must fret no longer."
<p>"But, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, can I be happy, even supposing the best, in accepting a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> whose sisters and friends are all wishing him to marry elsewhere?"
<p>"You must decide for yourself,"said Elizabeth;"and if, upon <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="mature" newWord="fortitude" score="0.261">fortitude</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deliberation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.431" formerWord="deliberation" newWord="choice" score="0.431">choice</span>, you find that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> of disobliging his two sisters is more than equivalent to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of being his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, I advise you by all means to refuse him."
<p>"How can you talk so?"said Jane, faintly smiling."You must know that though I should be exceedingly grieved at their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disapprobation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="disapprobation" newWord="volume" score="0.26">volume</span>, I could not hesitate."
<p>"I did not think you would; and that being the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, I cannot consider your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> with much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span>."
<p>"But if he returns no more this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> will never be required. A thousand things may arise in six months!"
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of his returning no more Elizabeth treated with the utmost <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span>. It appeared to her merely the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suggestion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="suggestion" newWord="gratitude" score="0.403">gratitude</span> of Caroline's interested wishes, and she could not for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> suppose that those wishes, however openly or artfully spoken, could influence a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> so totally independent of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.392" formerWord="everyone" newWord="value" score="0.392">value</span>. 
<p>She represented to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> as forcibly as possible what she felt on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, and had soon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of seeing its happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span>. Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> was not desponding, and she was gradually led to hope, though the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diffidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="diffidence" newWord="act" score="0.322">act</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> sometimes overcame the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span>, that Bingley would return to Netherfield and answer every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. 
<p>They agreed that Mrs. Bennet should only hear of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>departure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="departure" newWord="news" score="0.808">news</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, without being alarmed on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>score</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.394" formerWord="score" newWord="poetry" score="0.394">poetry</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>; but even this partial <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> gave her a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>, and she bewailed it as exceedingly unlucky that the ladies should happen to go away just as they were all getting so intimate together. After lamenting it, however, at some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, she had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> that Mr. Bingley would be soon down again and soon dining at Longbourn, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="conclusion" newWord="happiness" score="0.902">happiness</span> of all was the comfortable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>declaration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="declaration" newWord="indignation" score="0.359">indignation</span>, that though he had been invited only to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, she would take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> to have two full courses. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 22 
<p>
<p>The Bennets were engaged to dine with the Lucases and again during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> was Miss Lucas so <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> as to listen to Mr. Collins. Elizabeth took an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of thanking her."It keeps him in good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span>,"said she,"and I am more obliged to you than I can express."Charlotte assured her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> in being useful, and that it amply repaid her for the little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sacrifice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="sacrifice" newWord="g" score="0.232">g</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. This was very amiable, but Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> extended farther than Elizabeth had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="conception" newWord="appeal" score="0.284">appeal</span> of; its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else than to secure her from any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> of Mr. Collins's addresses, by engaging them towards herself. Such was Miss Lucas's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>; and appearances were so favourable, that when they parted at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, she would have felt almost <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="secure" newWord="tenderness" score="0.488">tenderness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> if he had not been to leave Hertfordshire so very soon. But here she did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>injustice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="injustice" newWord="give" score="0.326">give</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="fire" newWord="self" score="0.239">self</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>independence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="independence" newWord="encouragement" score="0.631">encouragement</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, for it led him to escape out of Longbourn House the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> with admirable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>slyness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.224" formerWord="slyness" newWord="antagonist" score="0.224">antagonist</span>, and hasten to Lucas Lodge to throw himself at her feet. He was anxious to avoid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> of his cousins, from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> that if they saw him depart, they could not fail to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conjecture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="conjecture" newWord="wit" score="0.283">wit</span> his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span>, and he was not willing to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> known till its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> might be known likewise; for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>though</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="though" newWord="life" score="0.866">life</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> almost secure, and with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>, for Charlotte had been tolerably encouraging, he was comparatively <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diffident</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="diffident" newWord="repeating" score="0.261">repeating</span> since the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>adventure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.221" formerWord="adventure" newWord="discouragement" score="0.221">discouragement</span> of Wednesday. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="reception" newWord="plain" score="0.346">plain</span>, however, was of the most flattering <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. Miss Lucas perceived him from an upper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> as he walked towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, and instantly set out to meet him accidentally in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span>. <p>In as short a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> as Mr. Collins's long speeches would allow, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> was settled between them to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> of both; <p>Sir William and Lady Lucas were speedily applied to for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>; and it was bestowed with a most joyful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alacrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.813" formerWord="alacrity" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.813">acquaintance</span>. Mr. Collins's present circumstances made it a most eligible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, to whom they could give little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>; and his prospects of future <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wealth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="wealth" newWord="country" score="0.715">country</span> were exceedingly fair. Lady Lucas began directly to calculate, with more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> had ever excited before, how many years longer Mr. Bennet was likely to live; and Sir William gave it as his decided <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, that whenever Mr. Collins should be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="possession" newWord="retirement" score="0.275">retirement</span> of the Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span>, it would be highly expedient that both he and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> should make their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> at St. James ' s. The whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, in short, were properly overjoyed on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>. The younger girls formed hopes of coming out a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span> or two sooner than they might otherwise have done; and the boys were relieved from their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> of Charlotte's dying an old <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>maid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="maid" newWord="round" score="0.733">round</span>. Charlotte herself was tolerably composed. She had gained her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>, and had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to consider of it. Her reflections were in general satisfactory. Mr. Collins, to be sure, was neither <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> nor agreeable; his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> was irksome, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to her must be imaginary. But still he would be her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>. Without thinking highly either of men or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matrimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="matrimony" newWord="heart" score="0.858">heart</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> had always been her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>; it was the only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>provision</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="provision" newWord="exist" score="0.244">exist</span> for well-educated young women of small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, and however uncertain of giving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, must be their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasantest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="pleasantest" newWord="improvement" score="0.322">improvement</span> preservative from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span>. This preservative she had now obtained; and at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span> of twenty-seven, without having ever been handsome, she felt all the good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>luck</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.535" formerWord="luck" newWord="order" score="0.535">order</span> of it. The least agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> it must occasion to Elizabeth Bennet, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> she valued beyond that of any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>. Elizabeth would wonder, and probably would blame her; and though her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> was not to be shaken, her feelings must be hurt by such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disapprobation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="disapprobation" newWord="volume" score="0.26">volume</span>. She resolved to give her the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> herself, and therefore charged Mr. Collins, when he returned to Longbourn to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, to drop no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span> of what had passed before any of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span> was of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> very dutifully given, but it could not be kept without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span>; for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> excited by his long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> burst forth in such very direct questions on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> as required some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ingenuity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.668" formerWord="ingenuity" newWord="doubt" score="0.668">doubt</span> to evade, and he was at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> exercising great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-denial</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="self-denial" newWord="dancing" score="0.583">dancing</span>, for he was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>longing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="longing" newWord="everything" score="0.805">everything</span> to publish his prosperous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>. 
<p>As he was to begin his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> too early on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="morrow" newWord="half" score="0.39">half</span> to see any of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ceremony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.539" formerWord="ceremony" newWord="curiosity" score="0.539">curiosity</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave-taking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.48" formerWord="leave-taking" newWord="round" score="0.48">round</span> was performed when the ladies moved for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>; and Mrs. Bennet, with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cordiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.478" formerWord="cordiality" newWord="impression" score="0.478">impression</span>, said how happy they should be to see him at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> again, whenever his engagements might allow him to visit them. 
<p>"My dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"he replied,"this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> is particularly gratifying, because it is what I have been hoping to receive; and you may be very certain that I shall <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>avail</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.277" formerWord="avail" newWord="error" score="0.277">error</span> myself of it as soon as possible."
<p>They were all astonished; and Mr. Bennet, who could by no means <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> for so speedy a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, immediately said: 
<p>"But is there not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disapprobation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="disapprobation" newWord="volume" score="0.26">volume</span> here, my good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>? You had better <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> your relations than run the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>risk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.625" formerWord="risk" newWord="affair" score="0.625">affair</span> of offending your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span>."
<p>"My dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>,"replied Mr. Collins,"I am particularly obliged to you for this friendly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>caution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="caution" newWord="anything" score="0.933">anything</span>, and you may depend upon my not taking so <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>material</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="material" newWord="landing-place" score="0.253">landing-place</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> without her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concurrence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="concurrence" newWord="superfluity" score="0.248">superfluity</span>."
<p>"You cannot be too much upon your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="guard" newWord="effect" score="0.569">effect</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Risk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.625" formerWord="Risk" newWord="affair" score="0.625">Affair</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> rather than her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>displeasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.747" formerWord="displeasure" newWord="return" score="0.747">return</span>; and if you find it likely to be raised by your coming to us again, which I should think exceedingly probable, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="stay" newWord="point" score="0.787">point</span> quietly at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, and be satisfied that we shall take no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.73" formerWord="offence" newWord="compassion" score="0.73">compassion</span>."
<p>"Believe me, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> is warmly excited by such affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>; and depend upon it, you will speedily receive from me a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of thanks for this, and for every other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mark</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="mark" newWord="enlargement" score="0.205">enlargement</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> during my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="stay" newWord="point" score="0.787">point</span> in Hertfordshire. As for my fair cousins, though my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> may not be long enough to render it necessary, I shall now take the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liberty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="liberty" newWord="part" score="0.724">part</span> of wishing them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, not excepting my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> Elizabeth."
<p>With proper civilities the ladies then withdrew; all of them equally surprised that he meditated a quick <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>. Mrs. Bennet wished to understand by it that he thought of paying his addresses to one of her younger girls, and Mary might have been prevailed on to accept him. She rated his abilities much higher than any of the others; there was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="solidity" newWord="sunk" score="0.23">sunk</span> in his reflections which often struck her, and though by no means so clever as herself, she thought that if encouraged to read and improve himself by such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>example</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="example" newWord="rumour" score="0.336">rumour</span> as hers, he might become a very agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span>. But on the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> was done away. Miss Lucas called soon after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>, and in a private <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="conference" newWord="dancing" score="0.846">dancing</span> with Elizabeth related the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of Mr. Collins's fancying himself in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> had once occurred to Elizabeth within the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> or two; but that Charlotte could encourage him seemed almost as far from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> as she could encourage him herself, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> was consequently so great as to overcome at first the bounds of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decorum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="decorum" newWord="none" score="0.733">none</span>, and she could not help crying out: 
<p>"Engaged to Mr. Collins! My dear Charlotte - - impossible!"
<p>The steady <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> which Miss Lucas had commanded in telling her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>story</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="story" newWord="letter" score="0.837">letter</span>, gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to a momentary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span> here on receiving so direct a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="reproach" newWord="face" score="0.255">face</span>; though, as it was no more than she expected, she soon regained her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>, and calmly replied: 
<p>"Why should you be surprised, my dear Eliza? Do you think it incredible that Mr. Collins should be able to procure any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>'s good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, because he was not so happy as to succeed with you?"
<p>But Elizabeth had now recollected herself, and making a strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="effort" newWord="excursion" score="0.239">excursion</span> for it, was able to assure with tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>firmness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.629" formerWord="firmness" newWord="furniture" score="0.629">furniture</span> that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span> was highly grateful to her, and that she wished her all imaginable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. 
<p>"I see what you are feeling,"replied Charlotte."You must be surprised, very much surprised - - so lately as Mr. Collins was wishing to marry you. But when you have had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to think it over, I hope you will be satisfied with what I have done. I am not romantic, you know; I never was. I ask only a comfortable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; and considering Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, I am convinced that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> with him is as fair as most people can boast on entering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span>."
<p>Elizabeth quietly answered"Undoubtedly;"and after an awkward <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>, they returned to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Charlotte did not stay much longer, and Elizabeth was then left to reflect on what she had heard. It was a long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> before she became at all reconciled to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of so unsuitable a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>strangeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="strangeness" newWord="fender" score="0.232">fender</span> of Mr. Collins's making two offers of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> within three days was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> of his being now accepted. She had always felt that Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matrimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="matrimony" newWord="heart" score="0.858">heart</span> was not exactly like her own, but she had not supposed it to be possible that, when called into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>action</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.493" formerWord="action" newWord="minute" score="0.493">minute</span>, she would have sacrificed every better feeling to worldly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>. Charlotte the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> of Mr. Collins was a most humiliating <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span>! And to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pang</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.381" formerWord="pang" newWord="wall" score="0.381">wall</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> disgracing herself and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sunk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="sunk" newWord="rudeness" score="0.266">rudeness</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>esteem</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.718" formerWord="esteem" newWord="circumstance" score="0.718">circumstance</span>, was added the distressing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> that it was impossible for that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> to be tolerably happy in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.401" formerWord="lot" newWord="volume" score="0.401">volume</span> she had chosen. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 23 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth was sitting with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and sisters, reflecting on what she had heard, and doubting whether she was authorised to mention it, when Sir William Lucas himself appeared, sent by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, to announce her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. With many compliments to them, and much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-gratulation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="self-gratulation" newWord="inability" score="0.24">inability</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> between the houses, he unfolded the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> - - to an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>audience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="audience" newWord="interview" score="0.253">interview</span> not merely wondering, but incredulous; for Mrs. Bennet, with more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perseverance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="perseverance" newWord="delay" score="0.749">delay</span> than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>, protested he must be entirely mistaken; and Lydia, always unguarded and often uncivil, boisterously exclaimed: 
<p>"Good Lord! Sir William, how can you tell such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>story</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="story" newWord="letter" score="0.837">letter</span>? Do not you know that Mr. Collins wants to marry Lizzy?"
<p><span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> less than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complaisance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="complaisance" newWord="cart" score="0.23">cart</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courtier</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="courtier" newWord="decree" score="0.28">decree</span> could have borne without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>treatment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="treatment" newWord="dressing" score="0.27">dressing</span>; but Sir William's good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breeding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.783" formerWord="breeding" newWord="countenance" score="0.783">countenance</span> carried him through it all; and though he begged <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> to be positive as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>, he listened to all their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span> with the most forbearing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courtesy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="courtesy" newWord="horror" score="0.523">horror</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth, feeling it incumbent on her to relieve him from so unpleasant a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, now put herself forward to confirm his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span>, by mentioning her prior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of it from Charlotte herself; and endeavoured to put a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.218" formerWord="stop" newWord="compromise" score="0.218">compromise</span> to the exclamations of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and sisters by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnestness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="earnestness" newWord="xxxiv" score="0.255">xxxiv</span> of her congratulations to Sir William, in which she was readily joined by Jane, and by making a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of remarks on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> that might be expected from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>, the excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> of Mr. Collins, and the convenient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> of Hunsford from London. 
<p>Mrs. Bennet was in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> too much overpowered to say a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> while Sir William remained; but no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sooner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="sooner" newWord="town" score="0.892">town</span> had he left them than her feelings found a rapid <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="vent" newWord="mass" score="0.22">mass</span>. In the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, she persisted in disbelieving the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>; secondly, she was very sure that Mr. Collins had been taken in; thirdly, she trusted that they would never be happy together; and fourthly, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> might be broken off. Two inferences, however, were plainly deduced from the whole: one, that Elizabeth was the real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mischief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="mischief" newWord="love" score="0.585">love</span>; and the other that she herself had been barbarously misused by them all; and on these two points she principally dwelt during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> could console and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> could appease her. Nor did that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> wear out her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span>. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> elapsed before she could see Elizabeth without scolding her, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span> passed away before she could speak to Sir William or Lady Lucas without being rude, and many months were gone before she could at all forgive their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. 
<p>Mr. Bennet's emotions were much more tranquil on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, and such as he did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>experience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.783" formerWord="experience" newWord="horror" score="0.783">horror</span> he pronounced to be of a most agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span>; for it gratified him, he said, to discover that Charlotte Lucas, whom he had been used to think tolerably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span>, was as foolish as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, and more foolish than his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>! 
<p>Jane confessed herself a little surprised at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>; but she said less of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> than of her earnest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; nor could Elizabeth persuade her to consider it as improbable. Kitty and Lydia were far from envying Miss Lucas, for Mr. Collins was only a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span>; and it affected them in no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> than as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>piece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="piece" newWord="longbourn" score="0.754">longbourn</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> to spread at Meryton. 
<p>Lady Lucas could not be insensible of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span> on being able to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>retort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.311" formerWord="retort" newWord="instance" score="0.311">instance</span> on Mrs. Bennet the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> of having a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> well married; and she called at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> rather oftener than usual to say how happy she was, though Mrs. Bennet's sour looks and ill-natured remarks might have been enough to drive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> away. 
<p>Between Elizabeth and Charlotte there was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restraint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="restraint" newWord="account" score="0.786">account</span> which kept them mutually silent on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>; and Elizabeth felt persuaded that no real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.877" formerWord="confidence" newWord="heart" score="0.877">heart</span> could ever subsist between them again. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> in Charlotte made her turn with fonder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to her <span Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> could never be shaken, and for whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span <p>Jane had sent Caroline an early <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, and was counting the days till she might reasonably hope to hear again.
