He could tell her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> new of the wonders of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presentation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="presentation" newWord="learning" score="0.23">learning</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knighthood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.499" formerWord="knighthood" newWord="park" score="0.499">park</span>; and his civilities were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>worn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="worn" newWord="diffidence" score="0.239">diffidence</span> out, like his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>. 
<p>It was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of only twenty-four miles, and they began it so early as to be in Gracechurch Street by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>noon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.201" formerWord="noon" newWord="partnership" score="0.201">partnership</span>. As they drove to Mr. Gardiner's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>, Jane was at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> watching their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>; when they entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>passage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.66" formerWord="passage" newWord="subject" score="0.66">subject</span> she was there to welcome them, and Elizabeth, looking earnestly in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, was pleased to see it healthful and lovely as ever. On the stairs were a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>troop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.231" formerWord="troop" newWord="refinement" score="0.231">refinement</span> of little boys and girls, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eagerness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="eagerness" newWord="nothing" score="0.862">nothing</span> for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> would not allow them to wait in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>, and whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shyness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.356" formerWord="shyness" newWord="absence" score="0.356">absence</span>, as they had not seen her for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>twelvemonth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.723" formerWord="twelvemonth" newWord="answer" score="0.723">answer</span>, prevented their coming lower. All was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> passed most pleasantly away; the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bustle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.222" formerWord="bustle" newWord="discomposure" score="0.222">discomposure</span> and shopping, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> at one of the theatres. 
<p>Elizabeth then contrived to sit by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. Their first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> was her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>; and she was more grieved than astonished to hear, in reply to her minute inquiries, that though Jane always struggled to support her spirits, there were periods of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dejection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="dejection" newWord="artlessness" score="0.264">artlessness</span>. It was reasonable, however, to hope that they would not continue long. Mrs. Gardiner gave her the particulars also of Miss Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> in Gracechurch Street, and repeated conversations occurring at different times between Jane and herself, which proved that the former had, from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, given up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>. 
<p>Mrs. Gardiner then rallied her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> on Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.517" formerWord="desertion" newWord="conduct" score="0.517">conduct</span>, and complimented her on bearing it so well. 
<p>"But my dear Elizabeth,"she added,"what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> is Miss King? I should be sorry to think our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> mercenary."
<p>"Pray, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, what is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="difference" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> in matrimonial affairs, between the mercenary and the prudent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>? Where does <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discretion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.865" formerWord="discretion" newWord="arrival" score="0.865">arrival</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>avarice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.277" formerWord="avarice" newWord="chapel" score="0.277">chapel</span> begin? Last Christmas you were afraid of his marrying me, because it would be imprudent; and now, because he is trying to get a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> with only ten thousand pounds, you want to find out that he is mercenary."
<p>"If you will only tell me what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> Miss King is, I shall know what to think."
<p>"She is a very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>, I believe. I know no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>harm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="harm" newWord="night" score="0.674">night</span> of her."
<p>"But he paid her not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> till her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grandfather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="grandfather" newWord="fan" score="0.233">fan</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span> made her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>."
<p>"No - - why should he? If it were not allowable for him to gain my affections because I had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> could there be for making <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> whom he did not care about, and who was equally poor?"
<p>"But there seems an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indelicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="indelicacy" newWord="mistress" score="0.305">mistress</span> in directing his attentions towards her so soon after this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span>."
<p>"A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in distressed circumstances has not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for all those elegant decorums which other people may observe. If she does not object to it, why should we?"
<p>"Her not objecting does not justify him. It only shows her being deficient in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> herself - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> or feeling."
<p>"Well,"cried Elizabeth,"have it as you choose. He shall be mercenary, and she shall be foolish."
<p>"No, Lizzy, that is what I do not choose. I should be sorry, you know, to think <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who has lived so long in Derbyshire."
<p>"Oh! if that is all, I have a very poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of young men who live in Derbyshire; and their intimate friends who live in Hertfordshire are not much better. I am sick of them all. Thank Heaven! I am going to-morrow where I shall find a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who has not one agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.526" formerWord="quality" newWord="money" score="0.526">money</span>, who has neither <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> nor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> to recommend him. Stupid men are the only ones worth knowing, after all."
<p>"Take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span>, Lizzy; that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span> savours strongly of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>."
<p>Before they were separated by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="conclusion" newWord="happiness" score="0.902">happiness</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>play</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.558" formerWord="play" newWord="encouragement" score="0.558">encouragement</span>, she had the unexpected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> to accompany her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="tour" newWord="satisfying" score="0.275">satisfying</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> which they proposed taking in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>. 
<p>"We have not determined how far it shall carry us,"said Mrs. Gardiner,"but, perhaps, to the Lakes."
<p>No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> could have been more agreeable to Elizabeth, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acceptance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.347" formerWord="acceptance" newWord="se'nnight" score="0.347">se'nnight</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> was most ready and grateful."Oh, my dear, dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>,"she rapturously cried,"what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>! what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span>! You give me fresh <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vigour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="vigour" newWord="sensibility" score="0.483">sensibility</span>. Adieu to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spleen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.198" formerWord="spleen" newWord="crossness" score="0.198">crossness</span>. What are young men to rocks and mountains? Oh! what hours of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>transport</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.227" formerWord="transport" newWord="angel" score="0.227">angel</span> we shall spend! And when we do return, it shall not be like other travellers, without being able to give one accurate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>. We will know where we have gone - - we will recollect what we have seen. Lakes, mountains, and rivers shall not be jumbled together in our imaginations; nor when we attempt to describe any particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>, will we begin quarreling about its relative <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>. Let our first effusions be less insupportable than those of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>generality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="generality" newWord="suspense" score="0.239">suspense</span> of travellers."
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 28 
<p>
<p>Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> in the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was new and interesting to Elizabeth; and her spirits were in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span>; for she had seen her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> looking so well as to banish all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of her northern <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="tour" newWord="satisfying" score="0.275">satisfying</span> was a constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>source</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="source" newWord="happiness" score="0.883">happiness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>. 
<p>When they left the high <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span> to Hunsford, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> was in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>search</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.734" formerWord="search" newWord="part" score="0.734">part</span> of the Parsonage, and every turning expected to bring it in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>. The palings of Rosings Park was their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>boundary</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="boundary" newWord="cake" score="0.249">cake</span> on one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>. Elizabeth smiled at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> of all that she had heard of its inhabitants. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> the Parsonage was discernible. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> sloping to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>standing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.696" formerWord="standing" newWord="horror" score="0.696">horror</span> in it, the green pales, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laurel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="laurel" newWord="dear" score="0.249">dear</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hedge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.519" formerWord="hedge" newWord="haste" score="0.519">haste</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> declared they were arriving. Mr. Collins and Charlotte appeared at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> stopped at the small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="gate" newWord="her" score="0.829">her</span> which led by a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.32" formerWord="gravel" newWord="dirt" score="0.32">dirt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, amidst the nods and smiles of the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>. In a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> they were all out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span>, rejoicing at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span> of each other. Mrs. Collins welcomed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> with the liveliest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and Elizabeth was more and more satisfied with coming when she found herself so affectionately received. She saw instantly that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s manners were not altered by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; his formal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> was just what it had been, and he detained her some minutes at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="gate" newWord="her" score="0.829">her</span> to hear and satisfy his inquiries after all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. They were then, with no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="delay" newWord="affection" score="0.977">affection</span> than his pointing out the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neatness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="neatness" newWord="acquisition" score="0.383">acquisition</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span>, taken into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>; and as soon as they were in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.338" formerWord="parlour" newWord="distance" score="0.338">distance</span>, he welcomed them a second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, with ostentatious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>formality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.709" formerWord="formality" newWord="life" score="0.709">life</span> to his humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="abode" newWord="minute" score="0.817">minute</span>, and punctually repeated all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>'s offers of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refreshment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.661" formerWord="refreshment" newWord="minute" score="0.661">minute</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth was prepared to see him in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.581" formerWord="glory" newWord="minute" score="0.581">minute</span>; and she could not help in fancying that in displaying the good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proportion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.472" formerWord="proportion" newWord="tea" score="0.472">tea</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aspect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="aspect" newWord="curiosity" score="0.443">curiosity</span> and its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span>, he addressed himself particularly to her, as if wishing to make her feel what she had lost in refusing him. But though <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> seemed neat and comfortable, she was not able to gratify him by any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sigh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="sigh" newWord="day" score="0.917">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repentance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="repentance" newWord="effect" score="0.522">effect</span>, and rather looked with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wonder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="wonder" newWord="heart" score="0.914">heart</span> at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> that she could have so cheerful an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> with such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span>. When Mr. Collins said <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> of which his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> might reasonably be ashamed, which certainly was not unseldom, she involuntarily turned her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> on Charlotte. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Once</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="Once" newWord="father" score="0.644">Father</span> or twice she could discern a faint <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blush</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.271" formerWord="blush" newWord="bathing" score="0.271">bathing</span>; but in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>general</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="general" newWord="brought" score="0.326">brought</span> Charlotte wisely did not hear. After sitting long enough to admire every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>article</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="article" newWord="love" score="0.633">love</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sideboard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.227" formerWord="sideboard" newWord="show" score="0.227">show</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fender</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.541" formerWord="fender" newWord="certainty" score="0.541">certainty</span>, to give an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, and of all that had happened in London, Mr. Collins invited them to take a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stroll</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.604" formerWord="stroll" newWord="age" score="0.604">age</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span>, which was large and well laid out, and to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cultivation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.285" formerWord="cultivation" newWord="soliloquy" score="0.285">soliloquy</span> of which he attended himself. To work in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> was one of his most respectable pleasures; and Elizabeth admired the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>command</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.81" formerWord="command" newWord="thing" score="0.81">thing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> with which Charlotte talked of the healthfulness of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exercise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="exercise" newWord="minute" score="0.713">minute</span>, and owned she encouraged it as much as possible. Here, leading the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> through every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> and cross walk, and scarcely allowing them an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interval</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="interval" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.788">acquaintance</span> to utter the praises he asked for, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span> was pointed out with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>minuteness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="minuteness" newWord="establishment" score="0.237">establishment</span> which left <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> entirely behind. He could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>number</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="number" newWord="kind" score="0.875">kind</span> the fields in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span>, and could tell how many trees there were in the most distant clump. But of all the views which his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span>, or which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kingdom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="kingdom" newWord="child" score="0.412">child</span> could boast, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> were to be compared with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> of Rosings, afforded by an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="opening" newWord="subject" score="0.685">subject</span> in the trees that bordered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span> nearly opposite the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>front</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="front" newWord="yield" score="0.225">yield</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. It was a handsome modern <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>building</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="building" newWord="xxxvii" score="0.249">xxxvii</span>, well situated on rising <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>. 
<p>From his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span>, Mr. Collins would have led them round his two meadows; but the ladies, not having shoes to encounter the remains of a white <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>frost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="frost" newWord="mind" score="0.464">mind</span>, turned back; and while Sir William accompanied him, Charlotte took her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, extremely well pleased, probably, to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of showing it without her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>help</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="help" newWord="duration" score="0.29">duration</span>. It was rather small, but well built and convenient; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> was fitted up and arranged with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neatness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="neatness" newWord="acquisition" score="0.383">acquisition</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consistency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="consistency" newWord="coarseness" score="0.243">coarseness</span> of which Elizabeth gave Charlotte all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span>. When Mr. Collins could be forgotten, there was really an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> throughout, and by Charlotte's evident <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> of it, Elizabeth supposed he must be often forgotten. 
<p>She had already learnt that Lady Catherine was still in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>. It was spoken of again while they were at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, when Mr. Collins joining in, observed: 
<p>"Yes, Miss Elizabeth, you will have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of seeing Lady Catherine de Bourgh on the ensuing Sunday at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span>, and I need not say you will be delighted with her. She is all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="affability" newWord="absence" score="0.588">absence</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, and I doubt not but you will be honoured with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>portion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="portion" newWord="everything" score="0.854">everything</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> when <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>service</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="service" newWord="time" score="0.851">time</span> is over. I have scarcely any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hesitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="hesitation" newWord="fashion" score="0.31">fashion</span> in saying she will include you and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> Maria in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> with which she honours us during your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="stay" newWord="point" score="0.787">point</span> here. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to my dear Charlotte is charming. We dine at Rosings twice every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>, and are never allowed to walk <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> is regularly ordered for us. I should say, one of her ladyship's carriages, for she has several."
<p>"Lady Catherine is a very respectable, sensible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> indeed,"added Charlotte,"and a most attentive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.762" formerWord="neighbour" newWord="way" score="0.762">way</span>."
<p>"Very true, my dear, that is exactly what I say. She is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> whom one cannot regard with too much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="deference" newWord="way" score="0.729">way</span>."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> was spent chiefly in talking over Hertfordshire <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>, and telling again what had already been written; and when it closed, Elizabeth, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="solitude" newWord="arrival" score="0.838">arrival</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chamber</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.279" formerWord="chamber" newWord="middle" score="0.279">middle</span>, had to meditate upon Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.436" formerWord="contentment" newWord="discussion" score="0.436">discussion</span>, to understand her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span> in guiding, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span> in bearing with, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, and to acknowledge that it was all done very well. She had also to anticipate how her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> would pass, the quiet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tenor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="tenor" newWord="evenness" score="0.281">evenness</span> of their usual employments, the vexatious interruptions of Mr. Collins, and the gaieties of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intercourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.896" formerWord="intercourse" newWord="account" score="0.896">account</span> with Rosings. A lively <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imagination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="imagination" newWord="happiness" score="0.938">happiness</span> soon settled it all. 
<p>About the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>middle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.525" formerWord="middle" newWord="gratitude" score="0.525">gratitude</span> of the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, as she was in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> getting ready for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, a sudden <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>noise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.804" formerWord="noise" newWord="minute" score="0.804">minute</span> below seemed to speak the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span>; and, after listening a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, she heard <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>somebody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="somebody" newWord="yesterday" score="0.649">yesterday</span> running up stairs in a violent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span>, and calling loudly after her. She opened the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> and met Maria in the landing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, who, breathless with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="agitation" newWord="difference" score="0.722">difference</span>, cried out - - 
<p>"Oh, my dear Eliza! pray make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>haste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="haste" newWord="minute" score="0.843">minute</span> and come into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span>, for there is such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span> to be seen! I will not tell you what it is. Make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>haste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="haste" newWord="minute" score="0.843">minute</span>, and come down this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>."
<p>Elizabeth asked questions in vain; Maria would tell her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> more, and down they ran into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span>, which fronted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.47" formerWord="quest" newWord="behaviour" score="0.47">behaviour</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wonder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="wonder" newWord="heart" score="0.914">heart</span>; It was two ladies stopping in a low <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>phaeton</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="phaeton" newWord="magistrate" score="0.281">magistrate</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="gate" newWord="her" score="0.829">her</span>. 
<p>"And is this all?"cried Elizabeth."I expected at least that the pigs were got into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span>, and here is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>."
<p>"La! my dear,"said Maria, quite shocked at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="mistake" newWord="time" score="0.949">time</span>,"it is not Lady Catherine. The old <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> is Mrs. Jenkinson, who lives with them; the other is Miss de Bourgh. Only look at her. She is quite a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span>. Who would have thought that she could be so thin and small?"
<p>"She is abominably rude to keep Charlotte out of doors in all this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="wind" newWord="course" score="0.888">course</span>. Why does she not come in?"
<p>"Oh, Charlotte says she hardly ever does. It is the greatest of favours when Miss de Bourgh comes in."
<p>"I like her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span>,"said Elizabeth, struck with other ideas."She looks sickly and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cross</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.204" formerWord="cross" newWord="dear" score="0.204">dear</span>. Yes, she will do for him very well. She will make him a very proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>."
<p>Mr. Collins and Charlotte were both standing at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="gate" newWord="her" score="0.829">her</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with the ladies; and Sir William, to Elizabeth's high <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diversion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="diversion" newWord="continuance" score="0.293">continuance</span>, was stationed in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doorway</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="doorway" newWord="coach" score="0.339">coach</span>, in earnest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contemplation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="contemplation" newWord="brother" score="0.902">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>greatness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.317" formerWord="greatness" newWord="conquest" score="0.317">conquest</span> before him, and constantly bowing whenever Miss de Bourgh looked that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> there was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> more to be said; the ladies drove on, and the others returned into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. Mr. Collins no sooner saw the two girls than he began to congratulate them on their good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, which Charlotte explained by letting them know that the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> was asked to dine at Rosings the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 29 
<p>
<p>Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>, was complete. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of displaying the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grandeur</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.363" formerWord="grandeur" newWord="haste" score="0.363">haste</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patroness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.214" formerWord="patroness" newWord="ebony" score="0.214">ebony</span> to his wondering visitors, and of letting them see her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> towards himself and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, was exactly what he had wished for; and that an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of doing it should be given so soon, was such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="instance" newWord="minute" score="0.464">minute</span> of Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, as he knew not how to admire enough. 
<p>"I confess,"said he,"that I should not have been at all surprised by her ladyship's asking us on Sunday to drink <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span> and spend the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> at Rosings. I rather expected, from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="affability" newWord="absence" score="0.588">absence</span>, that it would happen. But who could have foreseen such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> as this? Who could have imagined that we should receive an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> to dine there ( an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>, moreover, including the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> ) so immediately after your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>!"
<p>"I am the less surprised at what has happened,"replied Sir William,"from that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of what the manners of the great really are, which my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> has allowed me to acquire. About the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>court</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="court" newWord="society" score="0.649">society</span>, such instances of elegant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breeding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.783" formerWord="breeding" newWord="countenance" score="0.783">countenance</span> are not uncommon."
<p>Scarcely <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> was talked of the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> or next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> but their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> to Rosings. Mr. Collins was carefully instructing them in what they were to expect, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span> of such rooms, so many servants, and so splendid a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, might not wholly overpower them. 
<p>When the ladies were separating for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>toilette</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.661" formerWord="toilette" newWord="happiness" score="0.661">happiness</span>, he said to Elizabeth - - 
<p>"Do not make yourself uneasy, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, about your apparel. Lady Catherine is far from requiring that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="dress" newWord="pain" score="0.832">pain</span> in us which becomes herself and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. I would advise you merely to put on whatever of your clothes is superior to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> - - there is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> more. Lady Catherine will not think the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>worse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="worse" newWord="water" score="0.328">water</span> of you for being simply dressed. She likes to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distinction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.533" formerWord="distinction" newWord="weather" score="0.533">weather</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> preserved."
<p>While they were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dressing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.401" formerWord="dressing" newWord="wait" score="0.401">wait</span>, he came two or three times to their different doors, to recommend their being quick, as Lady Catherine very much objected to be kept waiting for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>. Such formidable accounts of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>, quite frightened Maria Lucas who had been little used to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and she looked forward to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span> at Rosings with as much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had done to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presentation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="presentation" newWord="learning" score="0.23">learning</span> at St. James ' s. 
<p>As the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="weather" newWord="sister" score="0.954">sister</span> was fine, they had a pleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> of about half a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.801" formerWord="mile" newWord="minute" score="0.801">minute</span> across the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>. Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span> has its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> and its prospects; and Elizabeth saw much to be pleased with, though she could not be in such raptures as Mr. Collins expected the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span> to inspire, and was but slightly affected by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enumeration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.245" formerWord="enumeration" newWord="baby" score="0.245">baby</span> of the windows in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>front</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="front" newWord="yield" score="0.225">yield</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> of what the glazing altogether had originally <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.323" formerWord="cost" newWord="perfection" score="0.323">perfection</span> Sir Lewis de Bourgh. 
<p>When they ascended the steps to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span>, Maria's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span> was every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> increasing, and even Sir William did not look perfectly calm. Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> did not fail her. She had heard <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of Lady Catherine that spoke her awful from any extraordinary talents or miraculous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span>, and the mere stateliness of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> she thought she could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>witness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.752" formerWord="witness" newWord="rest" score="0.752">rest</span> without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trepidation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.363" formerWord="trepidation" newWord="dozen" score="0.363">dozen</span>. 
<p>From the entrance-hall, of which Mr. Collins pointed out, with a rapturous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span>, the fine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proportion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.472" formerWord="proportion" newWord="tea" score="0.472">tea</span> and the finished ornaments, they followed the servants through an ante-chamber, to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> where Lady Catherine, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, and Mrs. Jenkinson were sitting. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, arose to receive them; and as Mrs. Collins had settled it with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>office</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="office" newWord="sir" score="0.764">sir</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span> should be hers, it was performed in a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, without any of those apologies and thanks which he would have thought necessary. 
<p>In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of having been at St. James's Sir William was so completely awed by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grandeur</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.363" formerWord="grandeur" newWord="haste" score="0.363">haste</span> surrounding him, that he had but just <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> enough to make a very low <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span>, and take his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.704" formerWord="seat" newWord="sort" score="0.704">sort</span> without saying a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>; and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, frightened almost out of her senses, sat on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>edge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="edge" newWord="minute" score="0.41">minute</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="chair" newWord="haste" score="0.793">haste</span>, not knowing which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to look. Elizabeth found herself quite equal to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>, and could observe the three ladies before her composedly. Lady Catherine was a tall, large <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, with strongly-marked features, which might once have been handsome.
