Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> was not conciliating, nor was her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of receiving them such as to make her visitors forget their inferior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span>. She was not rendered formidable by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>; but whatever she said was spoken in so authoritative a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>, as marked <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.844" formerWord="self-importance" newWord="way" score="0.844">way</span>, and brought Mr. Wickham immediately to Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>; and from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> altogether, she believed Lady Catherine to be exactly what he represented. 
<p>When, after examining the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, in whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deportment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.447" formerWord="deportment" newWord="horror" score="0.447">horror</span> she soon found some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resemblance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="resemblance" newWord="minute" score="0.675">minute</span> of Mr. Darcy, she turned her eyes on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, she could almost have joined in Maria's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> at her being so thin and so small. There was neither in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>figure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="figure" newWord="week" score="0.834">week</span> nor face any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="likeness" newWord="cabinet" score="0.26">cabinet</span> between the ladies. Miss de Bourgh was pale and sickly; her features, though not plain, were insignificant; and she spoke very little, except in a low <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>, to Mrs. Jenkinson, in whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> there was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> remarkable, and who was entirely engaged in listening to what she said, and placing a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>screen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="screen" newWord="weather" score="0.542">weather</span> in the proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span> before her eyes. 
<p>After sitting a few minutes, they were all sent to one of the windows to admire the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>, Mr. Collins attending them to point out its beauties, and Lady Catherine kindly informing them that it was much better worth looking at in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> was exceedingly handsome, and there were all the servants and all the articles of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.265" formerWord="plate" newWord="helplessness" score="0.265">helplessness</span> which Mr. Collins had promised; and, as he had likewise <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>foretold</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.518" formerWord="foretold" newWord="anxiety" score="0.518">anxiety</span>, he took his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.704" formerWord="seat" newWord="sort" score="0.704">sort</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bottom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.693" formerWord="bottom" newWord="minute" score="0.693">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, by her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span>, and looked as if he felt that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> could furnish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> greater. He carved, and ate, and praised with delighted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alacrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.813" formerWord="alacrity" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.813">acquaintance</span>; and every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="dish" newWord="inability" score="0.25">inability</span> was commended, first by him and then by Sir William, who was now enough recovered to echo whatever his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.215" formerWord="son-in-law" newWord="diligence" score="0.215">diligence</span> said, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> which Elizabeth wondered Lady Catherine could bear. But Lady Catherine seemed gratified by their excessive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span>, and gave most gracious smiles, especially when any dish on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> proved a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>novelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="novelty" newWord="way" score="0.834">way</span> to them. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> did not supply much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>. Elizabeth was ready to speak whenever there was an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="opening" newWord="subject" score="0.685">subject</span>, but she was seated between Charlotte and Miss de Bourgh - - the former of whom was engaged in listening to Lady Catherine, and the latter said not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> to her all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner-time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.671" formerWord="dinner-time" newWord="visit" score="0.671">visit</span>. Mrs. Jenkinson was chiefly employed in watching how little Miss de Bourgh ate, pressing her to try some other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="dish" newWord="inability" score="0.25">inability</span>, and fearing she was indisposed. Maria thought speaking out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span>, and the gentlemen did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but eat and admire. 
<p>When the ladies returned to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>, there was little to be done but to hear Lady Catherine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span>, which she did without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intermission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.8" formerWord="intermission" newWord="anybody" score="0.8">anybody</span> till <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coffee</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="coffee" newWord="hurry" score="0.345">hurry</span> came in, delivering her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> on every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> in so decisive a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, as proved that she was not used to have her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> controverted. She inquired into Charlotte's domestic concerns familiarly and minutely, gave her a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>management</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="management" newWord="journey" score="0.65">journey</span> of them all; told her how <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> ought to be regulated in so small a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> as hers, and instructed her as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of her cows and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poultry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.692" formerWord="poultry" newWord="minute" score="0.692">minute</span>. Elizabeth found that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> was beneath this great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>, which could furnish her with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of dictating to others. In the intervals of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="discourse" newWord="century" score="0.264">century</span> with Mrs. Collins, she addressed a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of questions to Maria and Elizabeth, but especially to the latter, of whose connections she knew the least, and who she observed to Mrs. Collins was a very genteel, pretty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>. She asked her, at different times, how many sisters she had, whether they were older or younger than herself, whether any of them were likely to be married, whether they were handsome, where they had been educated, what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> kept, and what had been her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s maiden <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span>? Elizabeth felt all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span> of her questions but answered them very composedly. Lady Catherine then observed, 
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> is entailed on Mr. Collins, I think. For your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>,"turning to Charlotte,"I am glad of it; but otherwise I see no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for entailing estates from the female <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span>. It was not thought necessary in Sir Lewis de Bourgh's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Do you play and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="sing" newWord="standing" score="0.264">standing</span>, Miss Bennet?"
<p>"A little."
<p>"Oh! then - - some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> or other we shall be happy to hear you. Our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span> is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>capital</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="capital" newWord="doubt" score="0.871">doubt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>, probably superior to - - - - You shall try it some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. Do your sisters play and sing?"
<p>"One of them does."
<p>"Why did not you all learn? You ought all to have learned. The Miss Webbs all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>play</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.558" formerWord="play" newWord="encouragement" score="0.558">encouragement</span>, and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> has not so good an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span> as yours. Do you draw?"
<p>"No, not at all."
<p>"What, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of you?"
<p>"Not one."
<p>"That is very strange. But I suppose you had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span>. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> should have taken you to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spring</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="spring" newWord="time" score="0.959">time</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benefit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.654" formerWord="benefit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.654">astonishment</span> of masters."
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> would have had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>, but my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> hates London."
<p>"Has your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span> left you?"
<p>"We never had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span>."
<p>"No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span>! How was that possible? Five daughters brought up at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> without a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span>! I never heard of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> must have been quite a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>slave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.372" formerWord="slave" newWord="dining" score="0.372">dining</span> to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span>."
<p>Elizabeth could hardly help smiling as she assured her that had not been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>. 
<p>"Then, who taught you? who attended to you? Without a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span>, you must have been neglected."
<p>"Compared with some families, I believe we were; but such of us as wished to learn never wanted the means. We were always encouraged to read, and had all the masters that were necessary. Those who chose to be idle, certainly might."
<p>"Aye, no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>; but that is what a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span> will prevent, and if I had known your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, I should have advised her most strenuously to engage one. I always say that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> is to be done in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span> without steady and regular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instruction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.564" formerWord="instruction" newWord="nobody" score="0.564">nobody</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> but a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>governess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="governess" newWord="animal" score="0.253">animal</span> can give it. It is wonderful how many families I have been the means of supplying in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. I am always glad to get a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> well placed out. Four nieces of Mrs. Jenkinson are most delightfully situated through my means; and it was but the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> that I recommended another young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>, who was merely accidentally mentioned to me, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> are quite delighted with her. Mrs. Collins, did I tell you of Lady Metcalf's calling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span> to thank me? She finds Miss Pope a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>treasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="treasure" newWord="ball" score="0.597">ball</span>. ' Lady Catherine, ' said she, ' you have given me a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>treasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="treasure" newWord="ball" score="0.597">ball</span>. ' Are any of your younger sisters out, Miss Bennet?"
<p>"Yes, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ma'am</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="ma'am" newWord="family" score="0.966">family</span>, all."
<p>"All! What, all five out at once? Very odd! And you only the second. The younger ones out before the elder ones are married! Your younger sisters must be very young?"
<p>"Yes, my youngest is not sixteen. Perhaps she is full young to be much in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. But really, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ma'am</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="ma'am" newWord="family" score="0.966">family</span>, I think it would be very hard upon younger sisters, that they should not have their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>, because the elder may not have the means or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> to marry early. The last-born has as good a right to the pleasures of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> at the first. And to be kept back on such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>! I think it would not be very likely to promote sisterly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>."
<p>"Upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>,"you give your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> very decidedly for so young a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>. Pray, what is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>?"
<p>"With three younger sisters grown up,"replied Elizabeth, smiling,"your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> can hardly expect me to own it."
<p>Lady Catherine seemed quite astonished at not receiving a direct <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; and Elizabeth suspected herself to be the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span> who had ever dared to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trifle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.861" formerWord="trifle" newWord="friend" score="0.861">friend</span> with so much dignified <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span>. 
<p>"You cannot be more than twenty, I am sure, therefore you need not conceal your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>."
<p>"I am not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one-and-twenty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="one-and-twenty" newWord="playfulness" score="0.239">playfulness</span>."
<p>When the gentlemen had joined them, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span> was over, the card-tables were placed. Lady Catherine, Sir William, and Mr. and Mrs. Collins sat down to quadrille; and as Miss de Bourgh chose to play at cassino, the two girls had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of assisting Mrs. Jenkinson to make up her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>. Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> was superlatively stupid. Scarcely a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>syllable</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.378" formerWord="syllable" newWord="chair" score="0.378">chair</span> was uttered that did not relate to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>game</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.597" formerWord="game" newWord="fortnight" score="0.597">fortnight</span>, except when Mrs. Jenkinson expressed her fears of Miss de Bourgh's being too hot or too cold, or having too much or too little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span>. A great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> more passed at the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>. Lady Catherine was generally speaking - - stating the mistakes of the three others, or relating some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anecdote</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.382" formerWord="anecdote" newWord="round" score="0.382">round</span> of herself. Mr. Collins was employed in agreeing to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> said, thanking her for every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.519" formerWord="fish" newWord="year" score="0.519">year</span> he won, and apologising if he thought he won too many. Sir William did not say much. He was storing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>memory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="memory" newWord="deficiency" score="0.462">deficiency</span> with anecdotes and noble names. 
<p>When Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> had played as long as they chose, the tables were broken up, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was offered to Mrs. Collins, gratefully accepted and immediately ordered. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> then gathered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="fire" newWord="self" score="0.239">self</span> to hear Lady Catherine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>determine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="determine" newWord="battle" score="0.31">battle</span> what weather they were to have on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="morrow" newWord="half" score="0.39">half</span>. From these instructions they were summoned by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>; and with many speeches of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thankfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.358" formerWord="thankfulness" newWord="ill-humour" score="0.358">ill-humour</span> on Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> and as many bows on Sir William's they departed. As soon as they had driven from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>, Elizabeth was called on by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> to give her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of all that she had seen at Rosings, which, for Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>, she made more favourable than it really was. But her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="commendation" newWord="hush" score="0.256">hush</span>, though costing her some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>, could by no means satisfy Mr. Collins, and he was very soon obliged to take her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> into his own hands. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 30 
<p>
<p>Sir William stayed only a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> at Hunsford, but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> was long enough to convince him of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>'s being most comfortably settled, and of her possessing such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> and such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.762" formerWord="neighbour" newWord="way" score="0.762">way</span> as were not often met with. While Sir William was with them, Mr. Collins devoted his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to driving him out in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gig</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.273" formerWord="gig" newWord="admiral" score="0.273">admiral</span>, and showing him the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>; but when he went away, the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> returned to their usual employments, and Elizabeth was thankful to find that they did not see more of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alteration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="alteration" newWord="family" score="0.834">family</span>, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> between <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> was now passed by him either at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> or in reading and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span>, and looking out of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> in his own book-room, which fronted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> in which the ladies sat was backwards. Elizabeth had at first rather wondered that Charlotte should not prefer the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="dining-parlour" newWord="gown" score="0.366">gown</span> for common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span>; it was a better sized <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and had a more pleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aspect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="aspect" newWord="curiosity" score="0.443">curiosity</span>; but she soon saw that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> had an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> for what she did, for Mr. Collins would undoubtedly have been much less in his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apartment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.734" formerWord="apartment" newWord="minute" score="0.734">minute</span>, had they sat in one equally lively; and she gave Charlotte <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span>. 
<p>From the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span> they could distinguish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span>, and were indebted to Mr. Collins for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of what carriages went along, and how often especially Miss de Bourgh drove by in her phaeton, which he never failed coming to inform them of, though it happened almost every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. She not unfrequently stopped at the Parsonage, and had a few minutes ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with Charlotte, but was scarcely ever prevailed upon to get out. 
<p>Very few days passed in which Mr. Collins did not walk to Rosings, and not many in which his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> did not think it necessary to go likewise; and till Elizabeth recollected that there might be other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> livings to be disposed of, she could not understand the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sacrifice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="sacrifice" newWord="g" score="0.232">g</span> of so many hours. Now and then they were honoured with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>call</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="call" newWord="praise" score="0.601">praise</span> from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> escaped her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span> that was passing in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> during these visits. She examined into their employments, looked at their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span>, and advised them to do it differently; found <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fault</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="fault" newWord="deal" score="0.893">deal</span> with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span>; or detected the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housemaid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.427" formerWord="housemaid" newWord="child" score="0.427">child</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>negligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.385" formerWord="negligence" newWord="convenience" score="0.385">convenience</span>; and if she accepted any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refreshment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.661" formerWord="refreshment" newWord="minute" score="0.661">minute</span>, seemed to do it only for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of finding out that Mrs. Collins's joints of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.602" formerWord="meat" newWord="minute" score="0.602">minute</span> were too large for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth soon perceived, that though this great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> was not in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.678" formerWord="commission" newWord="talk" score="0.678">talk</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>peace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="peace" newWord="anything" score="0.817">anything</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>county</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="county" newWord="innocence" score="0.275">innocence</span>, she was a most active <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>magistrate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.42" formerWord="magistrate" newWord="bridge" score="0.42">bridge</span> in her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span>, the minutest concerns of which were carried to her by Mr. Collins; and whenever any of the cottagers were disposed to be quarrelsome, discontented, or too poor, she sallied forth into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>village</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="village" newWord="heart" score="0.893">heart</span> to settle their differences, silence their complaints, and scold them into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>harmony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.576" formerWord="harmony" newWord="justice" score="0.576">justice</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plenty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="plenty" newWord="man" score="0.851">man</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entertainment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="entertainment" newWord="maid" score="0.391">maid</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="dining" newWord="minute" score="0.788">minute</span> at Rosings was repeated about twice a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>; and, allowing for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of Sir William, and there being only one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>card-table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="card-table" newWord="king" score="0.237">king</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, every such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entertainment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="entertainment" newWord="maid" score="0.391">maid</span> was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>counterpart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="counterpart" newWord="blessing" score="0.391">blessing</span> of the first. Their other engagements were few, as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>general</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="general" newWord="brought" score="0.326">brought</span> was beyond Mr. Collins's reach. This, however, was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span> to Elizabeth, and upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> she spent her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> comfortably enough; there were half-hours of pleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with Charlotte, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="weather" newWord="sister" score="0.954">sister</span> was so <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span> that she had often great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> out of doors. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, and where she frequently went while the others were calling on Lady Catherine, was along the open <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grove</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.53" formerWord="grove" newWord="resolution" score="0.53">resolution</span> which edged that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>, where there was a nice sheltered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>path</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.71" formerWord="path" newWord="matter" score="0.71">matter</span>, which no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> seemed to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> but herself, and where she felt beyond the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.389" formerWord="reach" newWord="office" score="0.389">office</span> of Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>. 
<p>In this quiet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> soon passed away. Easter was approaching, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> preceding it was to bring an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>addition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.876" formerWord="addition" newWord="mother" score="0.876">mother</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> at Rosings, which in so small a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.774" formerWord="circle" newWord="home" score="0.774">home</span> must be important. Elizabeth had heard soon after her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> that Mr. Darcy was expected there in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of a few weeks, and though there were not many of her acquaintances whom she did not prefer, his coming would furnish one comparatively new to look at in their Rosings parties, and she might be amused in seeing how hopeless Miss Bingley's designs on him were, by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, for whom he was evidently destined by Lady Catherine, who talked of his coming with the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>, spoke of him in terms of the highest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span>, and seemed almost angry to find that he had already been frequently seen by Miss Lucas and herself. 
<p>His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> was soon known at the Parsonage; for Mr. Collins was walking the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> within <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span> of the lodges opening into Hunsford Lane, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>order</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="order" newWord="way" score="0.909">way</span> to have the earliest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> of it, and after making his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span> as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> turned into the Park, hurried <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> with the great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>. On the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> he hastened to Rosings to pay his respects. There were two nephews of Lady Catherine to require them, for Mr. Darcy had brought with him a Colonel Fitzwilliam, the younger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> Lord - - - -, and, to the great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> of all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, when Mr. Collins returned, the gentlemen accompanied him. Charlotte had seen them from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, crossing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>, and immediately running into the other, told the girls what an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> they might expect, adding: 
<p>"I may thank you, Eliza, for this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>piece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="piece" newWord="longbourn" score="0.754">longbourn</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>. Mr. Darcy would never have come so soon to wait upon me."
<p>Elizabeth had scarcely <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to disclaim all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>right</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="right" newWord="nothing" score="0.843">nothing</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span>, before their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="approach" newWord="country" score="0.761">country</span> was announced by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door-bell</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.472" formerWord="door-bell" newWord="minute" score="0.472">minute</span>, and shortly afterwards the three gentlemen entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Colonel Fitzwilliam, who led the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, was about thirty, not handsome, but in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> and address most truly the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>. Mr. Darcy looked just as he had been used to look in Hertfordshire - - paid his compliments, with his usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reserve</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.385" formerWord="reserve" newWord="weather" score="0.385">weather</span>, to Mrs. Collins, and whatever might be his feelings toward her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, met her with every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>. Elizabeth merely curtseyed to him without saying a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. 
<p>Colonel Fitzwilliam entered into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> directly with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>readiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="readiness" newWord="engagement" score="0.846">engagement</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span> of a well-bred <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and talked very pleasantly; but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, after having addressed a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> to Mrs. Collins, sat for some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>. At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, however, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> was so far awakened as to inquire of Elizabeth after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. She answered him in the usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>, added: 
<p>"My eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> has been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> these three months. Have you never happened to see her there?"
<p>She was perfectly sensible that he never had; but she wished to see whether he would betray any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consciousness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.795" formerWord="consciousness" newWord="horror" score="0.795">horror</span> of what had passed between the Bingleys and Jane, and she thought he looked a little confused as he answered that he had never been so fortunate as to meet Miss Bennet. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> was pursued no farther, and the gentlemen soon afterwards went away. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 31 
<p>
<p>Colonel Fitzwilliam's manners were very much admired at the Parsonage, and the ladies all felt that he must add considerably to the pleasures of their engagements at Rosings. It was some days, however, before they received any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> thither - - for while there were visitors in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, they could not be necessary; and it was not till Easter-day, almost a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> after the gentlemen's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, that they were honoured by such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>, and then they were merely asked on leaving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span> to come there in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. For the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> they had seen very little of Lady Catherine or her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. Colonel Fitzwilliam had called at the Parsonage more than once during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, but Mr. Darcy they had seen only at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> was accepted of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>, and at a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> they joined the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> in Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> received them civilly, but it was plain that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> was by no means so acceptable as when she could get <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> else; and she was, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span>, almost engrossed by her nephews, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> to them, especially to Darcy, much more than to any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>Colonel Fitzwilliam seemed really glad to see them; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> was a welcome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span> to him at Rosings; and Mrs. Collins's pretty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> had moreover caught his fancy very much. He now seated himself by her, and talked so agreeably of Kent and Hertfordshire, of travelling and staying at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, of new books and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>, that Elizabeth had never been <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> so well entertained in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> before; and they conversed with so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="flow" newWord="horror" score="0.318">horror</span>, as to draw the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> of Lady Catherine herself, as well as of Mr. Darcy. His eyes had been soon and repeatedly turned towards them with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>; and that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, after a while, shared the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, was more openly acknowledged, for she did not scruple to call out: 
<p>"What is that you are saying, Fitzwilliam? What is it you are talking of? What are you telling Miss Bennet? Let me hear what it is."
<p>"We are <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"said he, when no longer able to avoid a reply. 
<p>"Of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>! Then pray speak aloud. It is of all subjects my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>.
