I must have my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> if you are <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span>. There are few people in England, I suppose, who have more true <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span> than myself, or a better natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>. If I had ever learnt, I should have been a great proficient. And so would Anne, if her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> had allowed her to apply. I am confident that she would have performed delightfully. How does Georgiana get on, Darcy?"
<p>Mr. Darcy spoke with affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proficiency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="proficiency" newWord="quest" score="0.278">quest</span>. 
<p>"I am very glad to hear such a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of her,"said Lady Catherine;"and pray tell her from me, that she cannot expect to excel if she does not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>practice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.58" formerWord="practice" newWord="horror" score="0.58">horror</span> a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>."
<p>"I assure you, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"he replied,"that she does not need such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span>. She practises very constantly."
<p>"So much the better. It cannot be done too much; and when I next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>write</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.354" formerWord="write" newWord="discussion" score="0.354">discussion</span> to her, I shall charge her not to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> it on any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span>. I often tell young ladies that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excellence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.432" formerWord="excellence" newWord="haste" score="0.432">haste</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>music</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="music" newWord="wish" score="0.909">wish</span> is to be acquired without constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>practice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.58" formerWord="practice" newWord="horror" score="0.58">horror</span>. I have told Miss Bennet several times, that she will never play really well unless she practises more; and though Mrs. Collins has no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span>, she is very welcome, as I have often told her, to come to Rosings every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, and play on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pianoforte</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="pianoforte" newWord="day" score="0.859">day</span> in Mrs. Jenkinson's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. She would be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, you know, in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>."
<p>Mr. Darcy looked a little ashamed of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-breeding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="ill-breeding" newWord="error" score="0.34">error</span>, and made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. 
<p>When <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coffee</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="coffee" newWord="hurry" score="0.345">hurry</span> was over, Colonel Fitzwilliam reminded Elizabeth of having promised to play to him; and she sat down directly to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span>. He drew a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="chair" newWord="haste" score="0.793">haste</span> near her. Lady Catherine listened to half a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>song</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="song" newWord="card" score="0.471">card</span>, and then talked, as before, to her other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>; till the latter walked away from her, and making with his usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deliberation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.431" formerWord="deliberation" newWord="choice" score="0.431">choice</span> towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pianoforte</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="pianoforte" newWord="day" score="0.859">day</span> stationed himself so as to command a full <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span> of the fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>performer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="performer" newWord="duke" score="0.248">duke</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>. Elizabeth saw what he was doing, and at the first convenient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>, turned to him with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arch</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.564" formerWord="arch" newWord="patience" score="0.564">patience</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, and said: 
<p>"You mean to frighten me, Mr. Darcy, by coming in all this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> to hear me? I will not be alarmed though your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> does play so well. There is a stubbornness about me that never can bear to be frightened at the will of others. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> always rises at every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to intimidate me."
<p>"I shall not say you are mistaken,"he replied,"because you could not really believe me to entertain any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> of alarming you; and I have had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> long enough to know that you find great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> in occasionally professing opinions which in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> are not your own."
<p>Elizabeth laughed heartily at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span> of herself, and said to Colonel Fitzwilliam,"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> will give you a very pretty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="notion" newWord="intermission" score="0.312">intermission</span> of me, and teach you not to believe a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> I say. I am particularly unlucky in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> so able to expose my real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> where I had hoped to pass myself off with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span>. Indeed, Mr. Darcy, it is very ungenerous in you to mention all that you knew to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disadvantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="disadvantage" newWord="security" score="0.248">security</span> in Hertfordshire - - and, give me leave to say, very impolitic too - - for it is provoking me to retaliate, and such things may come out as will <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shock</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="shock" newWord="stab" score="0.257">stab</span> your relations to hear."
<p>"I am not afraid of you,"said he, smilingly. 
<p>"Pray let me hear what you have to accuse him of,"cried Colonel Fitzwilliam."I should like to know how he behaves among strangers."
<p>"You shall hear then - - but prepare yourself for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> very dreadful. The first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> of my ever seeing him in Hertfordshire, you must know, was at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> - - and at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>, what do you think he did? He danced only four dances, though gentlemen were scarce; and, to my certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span>, more than one young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> was sitting down in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span>. Mr. Darcy, you cannot deny the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span>."
<p>"I had not at that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of knowing any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assembly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.441" formerWord="assembly" newWord="horror" score="0.441">horror</span> beyond my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>."
<p>"True; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> can ever be introduced in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.396" formerWord="ball-room" newWord="though" score="0.396">though</span>. Well, Colonel Fitzwilliam, what do I play next? My fingers wait your orders."
<p>"Perhaps,"said Darcy,"I should have judged better, had I sought an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span>; but I am ill-qualified to recommend myself to strangers."
<p>"Shall we ask your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> of this?"said Elizabeth, still addressing Colonel Fitzwilliam."Shall we ask him why a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span>, and who has lived in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, is ill qualified to recommend himself to strangers?"
<p>"I can answer your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span>,"said Fitzwilliam,"without applying to him. It is because he will not give himself the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>."
<p>"I certainly have not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="talent" newWord="debasement" score="0.233">debasement</span> which some people possess,"said Darcy,"of conversing easily with those I have never seen before. I cannot catch their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, or appear interested in their concerns, as I often see done."
<p>"My fingers,"said Elizabeth,"do not move over this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span> in the masterly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> which I see so many women's do. They have not the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>force</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="force" newWord="arch" score="0.333">arch</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rapidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.727" formerWord="rapidity" newWord="pain" score="0.727">pain</span>, and do not produce the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>. But then I have always supposed it to be my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fault</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="fault" newWord="deal" score="0.893">deal</span> - - because I will not take the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of practising. It is not that I do not believe my fingers as capable as any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>'s of superior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>execution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.494" formerWord="execution" newWord="worth" score="0.494">worth</span>."
<p>Darcy smiled and said,"You are perfectly right. You have employed your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> much better. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> admitted to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>privilege</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.711" formerWord="privilege" newWord="woman" score="0.711">woman</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> you can think <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> wanting. We neither of us perform to strangers."
<p>Here they were interrupted by Lady Catherine, who called out to know what they were talking of. Elizabeth immediately began playing again. Lady Catherine approached, and, after listening for a few minutes, said to Darcy: 
<p>"Miss Bennet would not play at all amiss if she practised more, and could have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of a London <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>. She has a very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="notion" newWord="intermission" score="0.312">intermission</span> of fingering, though her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span> is not equal to Anne ' s. Anne would have been a delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>performer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="performer" newWord="duke" score="0.248">duke</span>, had her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> allowed her to learn."
<p>Elizabeth looked at Darcy to see how cordially he assented to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span>; but neither at that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> nor at any other could she discern any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>symptom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.274" formerWord="symptom" newWord="shop" score="0.274">shop</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>; and from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to Miss de Bourgh she derived this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> for Miss Bingley, that he might have been just as likely to marry her, had she been his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span>. 
<p>Lady Catherine continued her remarks on Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>performance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="performance" newWord="though" score="0.309">though</span>, mixing with them many instructions on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>execution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.494" formerWord="execution" newWord="worth" score="0.494">worth</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>. Elizabeth received them with all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forbearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="forbearance" newWord="sort" score="0.515">sort</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, and, at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span> of the gentlemen, remained at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span> till her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was ready to take them all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 32 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth was sitting by herself the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span> to Jane while Mrs. Collins and Maria were gone on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>village</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="village" newWord="heart" score="0.893">heart</span>, when she was startled by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ring</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.599" formerWord="ring" newWord="justice" score="0.599">justice</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>, the certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>signal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="signal" newWord="ingenuity" score="0.36">ingenuity</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span>. As she had heard no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, she thought it not unlikely to be Lady Catherine, and under that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> was putting away her half-finished <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> that she might escape all impertinent questions, when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> opened, and, to her very great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, Mr. Darcy, and Mr. Darcy only, entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>He seemed astonished too on finding her alone, and apologised for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intrusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="intrusion" newWord="revenge" score="0.247">revenge</span> by letting her know that he had understood all the ladies were to be within. 
<p>They then sat down, and when her inquiries after Rosings were made, seemed in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of sinking into total <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. It was absolutely necessary, therefore, to think of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span>, and in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emergence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.274" formerWord="emergence" newWord="square" score="0.274">square</span> recollecting when she had seen him last in Hertfordshire, and feeling curious to know what he would say on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of their hasty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>departure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="departure" newWord="news" score="0.808">news</span>, she observed: 
<p>"How very suddenly you all quitted Netherfield last November, Mr. Darcy! It must have been a most agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to Mr. Bingley to see you all after him so soon; for, if I recollect right, he went but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before. He and his sisters were well, I hope, when you left London?"
<p>"Perfectly so, I thank you."
<p>She found that she was to receive no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and, after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> added: 
<p>"I think I have understood that Mr. Bingley has not much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of ever returning to Netherfield again?"
<p>"I have never heard him say so; but it is probable that he may spend very little of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> there in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>future</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="future" newWord="aunt" score="0.943">aunt</span>. He has many friends, and is at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> when friends and engagements are continually increasing."
<p>"If he means to be but little at Netherfield, it would be better for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> that he should give up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> entirely, for then we might possibly get a settled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> there. But, perhaps, Mr. Bingley did not take the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> so much for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>convenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="convenience" newWord="family" score="0.915">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> as for his own, and we must expect him to keep it or quit it on the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="principle" newWord="town" score="0.858">town</span>."
<p>"I should not be surprised,"said Darcy,"if he were to give it up as soon as any eligible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purchase</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.306" formerWord="purchase" newWord="dining" score="0.306">dining</span> offers."
<p>Elizabeth made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. She was afraid of talking longer of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>; and, having <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else to say, was now determined to leave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of finding a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> to him. 
<p>He took the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span>, and soon began with,"This seems a very comfortable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. Lady Catherine, I believe, did a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> to it when Mr. Collins first came to Hunsford."
<p>"I believe she did - - and I am sure she could not have bestowed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> on a more grateful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>."
<p>"Mr. Collins appears to be very fortunate in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>."
<p>"Yes, indeed, his friends may well rejoice in his having met with one of the very few <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> women who would have accepted him, or have made him happy if they had. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> has an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> - - though I am not certain that I consider her marrying Mr. Collins as the wisest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> she ever did. She seems perfectly happy, however, and in a prudential <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span> it is certainly a very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> for her."
<p>"It must be very agreeable for her to be settled within so easy a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> of her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> and friends."
<p>"An easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>, do you call it? It is nearly fifty miles."
<p>"And what is fifty miles of good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>? Little more than half a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. Yes, I call it a very easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>."
<p>"I should never have considered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> as one of the advantages of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>,"cried Elizabeth."I should never have said Mrs. Collins was settled near her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>."
<p>"It is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="proof" newWord="nothing" score="0.855">nothing</span> of your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to Hertfordshire. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="Anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">Time</span> beyond the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>, I suppose, would appear far."
<p>As he spoke there was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> which Elizabeth fancied she <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="understood" newWord="life" score="0.788">life</span>; he must be supposing her to be thinking of Jane and Netherfield, and she blushed as she answered: 
<p>"I do not mean to say that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> may not be settled too near her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. The far and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>near</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.385" formerWord="near" newWord="perfection" score="0.385">perfection</span> must be relative, and depend on many varying circumstances. Where there is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> to make the expenses of travelling unimportant, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> becomes no evil. But that is not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> here. Mr. and Mrs. Collins have a comfortable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>, but not such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> as will allow of frequent journeys - - and I am persuaded my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> would not call herself near her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> under less than half the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>."
<p>Mr. Darcy drew his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="chair" newWord="haste" score="0.793">haste</span> a little towards her, and said,"You cannot have a right to such very strong local <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>. You cannot have been always at Longbourn."
<p>Elizabeth looked surprised. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> experienced some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>; he drew back his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="chair" newWord="haste" score="0.793">haste</span>, took a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>newspaper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="newspaper" newWord="scene" score="0.637">scene</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, and glancing over it, said, in a colder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>: 
<p>"Are you pleased with Kent?"
<p>A short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dialogue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.492" formerWord="dialogue" newWord="work" score="0.492">work</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> ensued, on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>calm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="calm" newWord="occupation" score="0.318">occupation</span> and concise - - and soon put an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> to by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span> of Charlotte and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, just returned from her walk. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tete-a-tete</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="tete-a-tete" newWord="ingenuity" score="0.322">ingenuity</span> surprised them. Mr. Darcy related the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="mistake" newWord="time" score="0.949">time</span> which had occasioned his intruding on Miss Bennet, and after sitting a few minutes longer without saying much to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>, went away. 
<p>"What can be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span> of this?"said Charlotte, as soon as he was gone."My dear, Eliza, he must be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with you, or he would never have called us in this familiar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>But when Elizabeth told of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>; it did not seem very likely, even to Charlotte's wishes, to be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>; and after various conjectures, they could at last only suppose his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> to proceed from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span> of finding <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> to do, which was the more probable from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>. All <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>field</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.772" formerWord="field" newWord="year" score="0.772">year</span> sports were over. Within doors there was Lady Catherine, books, and a billiard-table, but gentlemen cannot always be within doors; and in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nearness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="nearness" newWord="horror" score="0.318">horror</span> of the Parsonage, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasantness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="pleasantness" newWord="sooner" score="0.528">sooner</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> to it, or of the people who lived in it, the two cousins found a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temptation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="temptation" newWord="weakness" score="0.387">weakness</span> from this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span> thither almost every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. They called at various times of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, sometimes separately, sometimes together, and now and then accompanied by their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. It was plain to them all that Colonel Fitzwilliam came because he had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span> which of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> recommended him still more; and Elizabeth was reminded by her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> in being with him, as well as by his evident <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of her, of her former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> George Wickham; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>though</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="though" newWord="life" score="0.866">life</span>, in comparing them, she saw there was less captivating <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>softness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="softness" newWord="brought" score="0.315">brought</span> in Colonel Fitzwilliam's manners, she believed he might have the best informed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>. 
<p>But why Mr. Darcy came so often to the Parsonage, it was more difficult to understand. It could not be for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, as he frequently sat there ten minutes together without opening his lips; and when he did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speak</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.342" formerWord="speak" newWord="something" score="0.342">something</span>, it seemed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> rather than of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> - - a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sacrifice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="sacrifice" newWord="g" score="0.232">g</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>propriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="propriety" newWord="none" score="0.837">none</span>, not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to himself. He seldom appeared really animated. Mrs. Collins knew not what to make of him. Colonel Fitzwilliam's occasionally laughing at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stupidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="stupidity" newWord="scheme" score="0.749">scheme</span>, proved that he was generally different, which her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of him could not have told her; and as she would liked to have believed this change the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of that love her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> Eliza, she set herself seriously to work to find it out. She watched him whenever they were at Rosings, and whenever he came to Hunsford; but without much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span>. He certainly looked at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of that look was disputable. It was an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="earnest" newWord="compunction" score="0.261">compunction</span>, steadfast <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gaze</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.238" formerWord="gaze" newWord="bliss" score="0.238">bliss</span>, but she often doubted whether there were much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> in it, and sometimes it seemed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>. 
<p>She had once or twice suggested to Elizabeth the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of his being partial to her, but Elizabeth always laughed at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>; and Mrs. Collins did not think it right to press the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of raising expectations which might only end in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>; for in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> it admitted not of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, that all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> would vanish, if she could suppose him to be in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>. 
<p>
<p>In her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> schemes for Elizabeth, she sometimes planned her marrying Colonel Fitzwilliam. He was beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> the most pleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; he certainly admired her, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> was most eligible; but, to counterbalance these advantages, Mr. Darcy had considerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patronage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="patronage" newWord="wall" score="0.303">wall</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span>, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> could have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> at all. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 33 
<p>
<p>More than once did Elizabeth, in her ramble within the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>, unexpectedly meet Mr. Darcy. She felt all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perverseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="perverseness" newWord="look" score="0.477">look</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mischance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.626" formerWord="mischance" newWord="change" score="0.626">change</span> that should bring him where no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> else was brought, and, to prevent its ever happening again, took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> to inform him at first that it was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> haunt of hers. How it could occur a second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, therefore, was very odd! Yet it did, and even a third. It seemed like wilful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.288" formerWord="ill-nature" newWord="rupture" score="0.288">rupture</span>, or a voluntary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>penance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="penance" newWord="haste" score="0.549">haste</span>, for on these occasions it was not merely a few formal inquiries and an awkward <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> and then away, but he actually thought it necessary to turn back and walk with her. He never said a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, nor did she give herself the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of talking or of listening much; but it struck her in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of their third rencontre that he was asking some odd unconnected questions - - about her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in being at Hunsford, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> of solitary walks, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of Mr. and Mrs. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; and that in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of Rosings and her not perfectly understanding the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, he seemed to expect that whenever she came into Kent again she would be staying there too. His words seemed to imply it. Could he have Colonel Fitzwilliam in his thoughts? She supposed, if he meant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>, he must mean an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>allusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="allusion" newWord="haste" score="0.332">haste</span> to what might arise in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span>. It distressed her a little, and she was quite glad to find herself at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="gate" newWord="her" score="0.829">her</span> in the pales opposite the Parsonage. 
<p>She was engaged one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> as she walked, in perusing Jane's last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span> on some passages which proved that Jane had not written in spirits, when, instead of being again surprised by Mr. Darcy, she saw on looking up that Colonel Fitzwilliam was meeting her. Putting away the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> immediately and forcing a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, she said: 
<p>"I did not know before that you ever walked this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>"I have been making the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="tour" newWord="satisfying" score="0.275">satisfying</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>,"he replied,"as I generally do every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.273" formerWord="intend" newWord="yielding" score="0.273">yielding</span> to close it with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>call</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="call" newWord="praise" score="0.601">praise</span> at the Parsonage. Are you going much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>farther</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="farther" newWord="review" score="0.333">review</span>?"
<p>"No, I should have turned in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>."
<p>And accordingly she did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span>, and they walked towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Parsonage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.223" formerWord="Parsonage" newWord="villain" score="0.223">Villain</span> together. 
<p>"Do you certainly leave Kent on Saturday?"said she. 
<p>"Yes - - if Darcy does not put it off again. But I am at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="disposal" newWord="talk" score="0.52">talk</span>. He arranges the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> just as he pleases."
<p>"And if not able to please himself in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span>, he has at least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in the great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>. I do not know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> who seems more to enjoy the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of doing what he likes than Mr. Darcy."
<p>"He likes to have his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> very well,"replied Colonel Fitzwilliam."But so we all do. It is only that he has better means of having it than many others, because he is rich, and many others are poor. I speak feelingly. A younger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>, you know, must be inured to self-denial and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dependence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="dependence" newWord="conversation" score="0.854">conversation</span>."
<p>"In my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, the younger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.559" formerWord="earl" newWord="sort" score="0.559">sort</span> can know very little of either. Now seriously, what have you ever known of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-denial</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="self-denial" newWord="dancing" score="0.583">dancing</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dependence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="dependence" newWord="conversation" score="0.854">conversation</span>? When have you been prevented by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> from going wherever you chose, or procuring <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> you had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="fancy" newWord="family" score="0.949">family</span> for?"
<p>"These are <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> questions - - and perhaps I cannot say that I have experienced many hardships of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span>. But in matters of greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.744" formerWord="weight" newWord="sense" score="0.744">sense</span>, I may suffer from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>. Younger sons cannot marry where they like."
<p>"Unless where they like women of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, which I think they very often do."
<p>"Our habits of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.869" formerWord="expense" newWord="part" score="0.869">part</span> make us too dependent, and there are not many in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.766" formerWord="rank" newWord="minute" score="0.766">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> who can afford to marry without some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>."
<p>"Is this,"thought Elizabeth,"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.551" formerWord="meant" newWord="walk" score="0.551">walk</span> for me?"and she coloured at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>; but, recovering herself, said in a lively <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>,"And pray, what is the usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>price</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="price" newWord="time" score="0.831">time</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.559" formerWord="earl" newWord="sort" score="0.559">sort</span>'s younger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>? Unless the elder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> is very sickly, I suppose you would not ask above fifty thousand pounds."
<p>He answered her in the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> dropped. To interrupt a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> which might make him fancy her affected with what had passed, she soon afterwards said:
