<p>"I imagine your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="brought" newWord="nature" score="0.699">nature</span> you down with him chiefly for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of having <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>someone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.485" formerWord="someone" newWord="satisfaction" score="0.485">satisfaction</span> at his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="disposal" newWord="talk" score="0.52">talk</span>. I wonder he does not marry, to secure a lasting <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>convenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="convenience" newWord="family" score="0.915">family</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. But, perhaps, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> does as well for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span>, and, as she is under his sole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span>, he may do what he likes with her."
<p>"No,"said Colonel Fitzwilliam,"that is an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> which he must divide with me. I am joined with him in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guardianship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.262" formerWord="guardianship" newWord="self-denying" score="0.262">self-denying</span> of Miss Darcy."
<p>"Are you indeed? And pray what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of guardians do you make? Does your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="charge" newWord="mercy" score="0.237">mercy</span> give you much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>? Young ladies of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span> are sometimes a little difficult to manage, and if she has the true Darcy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span>, she may like to have her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>As she spoke she observed him looking at her earnestly; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> in which he immediately asked her why she supposed Miss Darcy likely to give them any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uneasiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="uneasiness" newWord="disquiet" score="0.229">disquiet</span>, convinced her that she had somehow or other got pretty near the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>. She directly replied: 
<p>"You need not be frightened. I never heard any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>harm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="harm" newWord="night" score="0.674">night</span> of her; and I dare say she is one of the most tractable creatures in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. She is a very great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> with some ladies of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, Mrs. Hurst and Miss Bingley. I think I have heard you say that you know them."
<p>"I know them a little. Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> is a pleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentlemanlike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="gentlemanlike" newWord="time" score="0.79">time</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> - - he is a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> of Darcy ' s."
<p>"Oh! yes,"said Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drily</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.294" formerWord="drily" newWord="midst" score="0.294">midst</span>;"Mr. Darcy is uncommonly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> to Mr. Bingley, and takes a prodigious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of him."
<p>"Care of him! Yes, I really believe Darcy does take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of him in those points where he most wants care. From <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> that he told me in our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> hither, I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to think Bingley very much indebted to him. But I ought to beg his pardon, for I have no right to suppose that Bingley was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> meant. It was all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conjecture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="conjecture" newWord="wit" score="0.283">wit</span>."
<p>"What is it you mean?"
<p>"It is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> which Darcy could not wish to be generally known, because if it were to get <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, it would be an unpleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>"You may depend upon my not mentioning it."
<p>"And remember that I have not much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> for supposing it to be Bingley. What he told me was merely this: that he congratulated himself on having lately saved a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> from the inconveniences of a most imprudent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, but without mentioning names or any other particulars, and I only suspected it to be Bingley from believing him the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to get into a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scrape</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="scrape" newWord="difference" score="0.522">difference</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span>, and from knowing them to have been together the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>."
<p>"Did Mr. Darcy give you reasons for this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span>?"
<p>"I understood that there were some very strong objections against the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>."
<p>"And what arts did he use to separate them?"
<p>"He did not talk to me of his own arts,"said Fitzwilliam, smiling."He only told me what I have now told you."
<p>Elizabeth made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and walked on, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> swelling with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="indignation" newWord="anything" score="0.908">anything</span>. After watching her a little, Fitzwilliam asked her why she was so thoughtful. 
<p>"I am thinking of what you have been telling me,"said she."Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> does not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span> my feelings. Why was he to be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span>?"
<p>"You are rather disposed to call his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> officious?"
<p>"I do not see what right Mr. Darcy had to decide on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>propriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="propriety" newWord="none" score="0.837">none</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>, or why, upon his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> alone, he was to determine and direct in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> was to be happy. But,"she continued, recollecting herself,"as we know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of the particulars, it is not fair to condemn him. It is not to be supposed that there was much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>."
<p>"That is not an unnatural surmise,"said Fitzwilliam,"but it is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lessening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.42" formerWord="lessening" newWord="readiness" score="0.42">readiness</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span> very sadly."
<p>This was spoken jestingly; but it appeared to her so just a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span> of Mr. Darcy, that she would not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> herself with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and therefore, abruptly changing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> talked on indifferent matters until they reached the Parsonage. There, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shut</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="shut" newWord="round" score="0.702">round</span> into her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, as soon as their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span> left them, she could think without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span> of all that she had heard. It was not to be supposed that any other people could be meant than those with whom she was connected. There could not exist in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> two men over whom Mr. Darcy could have such boundless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>influence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="influence" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>. That he had been concerned in the measures taken to separate Bingley and Jane she had never doubted; but she had always attributed to Miss Bingley the principal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span> of them. If his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span>, however, did not mislead him, he was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>caprice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="caprice" newWord="minute" score="0.471">minute</span> were the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span>, of all that Jane had suffered, and still continued to suffer. He had ruined for a while every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> for the most affectionate, generous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>; and no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> could say how lasting an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span> he might have inflicted. 
<p>"There were some very strong objections against the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>,"were Colonel Fitzwilliam's words; and those strong objections probably were, her having one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> who was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attorney</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.6" formerWord="attorney" newWord="mother" score="0.6">mother</span>, and another who was in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> in London. 
<p>"To Jane herself,"she exclaimed,"there could be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>; all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loveliness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.441" formerWord="loveliness" newWord="suspicion" score="0.441">suspicion</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span> as she is! - - her understanding excellent, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> improved, and her manners captivating. Neither could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> be urged against my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, who, though with some peculiarities, has abilities Mr. Darcy himself need not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disdain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="disdain" newWord="park" score="0.402">park</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respectability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="respectability" newWord="gratitude" score="0.786">gratitude</span> which he will probably never reach."When she thought of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.877" formerWord="confidence" newWord="heart" score="0.877">heart</span> gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> a little; but she would not allow that any objections there had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>material</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="material" newWord="landing-place" score="0.253">landing-place</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.744" formerWord="weight" newWord="sense" score="0.744">sense</span> with Mr. Darcy, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>, she was convinced, would receive a deeper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wound</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.678" formerWord="wound" newWord="mother" score="0.678">mother</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>'s connections, than from their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span>; and she was quite decided, at last, that he had been partly governed by this worst <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>, and partly by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of retaining Mr. Bingley for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="agitation" newWord="difference" score="0.722">difference</span> and tears which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> occasioned, brought on a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>headache</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="headache" newWord="tea" score="0.588">tea</span>; and it grew so much worse towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, that, added to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unwillingness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.226" formerWord="unwillingness" newWord="imprudence" score="0.226">imprudence</span> to see Mr. Darcy, it determined her not to attend her cousins to Rosings, where they were engaged to drink <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span>. Mrs. Collins, seeing that she was really unwell, did not press her to go and as much as possible prevented her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> from pressing her; but Mr. Collins could not conceal his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> of Lady Catherine's being rather displeased by her staying at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 34 
<p>
<p>When they were gone, Elizabeth, as if intending to exasperate herself as much as possible against Mr. Darcy, chose for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>employment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="employment" newWord="answer" score="0.916">answer</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>examination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.228" formerWord="examination" newWord="copse" score="0.228">copse</span> of all the letters which Jane had written to her since her being in Kent. They contained no actual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complaint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.507" formerWord="complaint" newWord="sweetness" score="0.507">sweetness</span>, nor was there any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>revival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.292" formerWord="revival" newWord="met" score="0.292">met</span> of past occurrences, or any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suffering</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.809" formerWord="suffering" newWord="son" score="0.809">son</span>. But in all, and in almost every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span> of each, there was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cheerfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="cheerfulness" newWord="absence" score="0.542">absence</span> which had been used to characterise her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span>, and which, proceeding from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>serenity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.395" formerWord="serenity" newWord="disposition" score="0.395">disposition</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span> with itself and kindly disposed towards <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.392" formerWord="everyone" newWord="value" score="0.392">value</span>, had been scarcely ever clouded. Elizabeth noticed every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> conveying the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uneasiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="uneasiness" newWord="disquiet" score="0.229">disquiet</span>, with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> which it had hardly received on the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="perusal" newWord="repugnance" score="0.25">repugnance</span>. Mr. Darcy's shameful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>boast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="boast" newWord="horror" score="0.464">horror</span> of what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> he had been able to inflict, gave her a keener <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s sufferings. It was some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> to think that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> to Rosings was to end on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> after the next - - and, a still greater, that in less than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> she should herself be with Jane again, and enabled to contribute to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.802" formerWord="recovery" newWord="character" score="0.802">character</span> of her spirits, by all that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> could do. 
<p>She could not think of Darcy's leaving Kent without remembering that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> was to go with him; but Colonel Fitzwilliam had made it clear that he had no intentions at all, and agreeable as he was, she did not mean to be unhappy about him. 
<p>While settling this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>, she was suddenly roused by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sound</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.726" formerWord="sound" newWord="object" score="0.726">object</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door-bell</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.472" formerWord="door-bell" newWord="minute" score="0.472">minute</span>, and her spirits were a little fluttered by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of its being Colonel Fitzwilliam himself, who had once before called late in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, and might now come to inquire particularly after her. But this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> was soon banished, and her spirits were very differently affected, when, to her utter <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span>, she saw Mr. Darcy walk into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. In an hurried <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> he immediately began an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span> after her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span>, imputing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> that she were better. She answered him with cold <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>. He sat down for a few moments, and then getting up, walked about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Elizabeth was surprised, but said not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. After a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> of several minutes, he came towards her in an agitated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, and thus began: 
<p>"In vain I have struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you."
<p>Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> was beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>. She stared, coloured, doubted, and was silent. This he considered sufficient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span>; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>avowal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="avowal" newWord="hour" score="0.266">hour</span> of all that he felt, and had long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.388" formerWord="felt" newWord="illness" score="0.388">illness</span> for her, immediately followed. He spoke well; but there were feelings besides those of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to be detailed; and he was not more eloquent on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tenderness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="tenderness" newWord="day" score="0.791">day</span> than of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inferiority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.863" formerWord="inferiority" newWord="course" score="0.863">course</span> - - of its being a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degradation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="degradation" newWord="phoo" score="0.391">phoo</span> - - of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> obstacles which had always opposed to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>, were dwelt on with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span> which seemed due to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> he was wounding, but was very unlikely to recommend his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span>. 
<p>In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of her deeply-rooted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span>, she could not be insensible to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and though her intentions did not vary for an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="instant" newWord="observation" score="0.683">observation</span>, she was at first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="sorry" newWord="perfection" score="0.329">perfection</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> he was to receive; till, roused to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> by his subsequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>language</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="language" newWord="fuss" score="0.216">fuss</span>, she lost all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>. She tried, however, to compose herself to answer him with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="patience" newWord="aunt" score="0.938">aunt</span>, when he should have done. He concluded with representing to her the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>strength</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="strength" newWord="happiness" score="0.924">happiness</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> which, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of all his endeavours, he had found impossible to conquer; and with expressing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> that it would now be rewarded by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acceptance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.347" formerWord="acceptance" newWord="se'nnight" score="0.347">se'nnight</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>. As he said this, she could easily see that he had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of a favourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. He spoke of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span>, but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> expressed real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>security</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="security" newWord="kind" score="0.633">kind</span>. Such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> could only exasperate farther, and, when he ceased, the colour rose into her cheeks, and she said: 
<p>"In such cases as this, it is, I believe, the established <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="mode" newWord="haste" score="0.617">haste</span> to express a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>obligation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="obligation" newWord="deal" score="0.811">deal</span> for the sentiments avowed, however unequally they may be returned. It is natural that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>obligation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="obligation" newWord="deal" score="0.811">deal</span> should be felt, and if I could feel <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>, I would now <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.696" formerWord="thank" newWord="door" score="0.696">door</span> you. But I cannot - - I have never desired your good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, and you have certainly bestowed it most unwillingly. I am sorry to have occasioned <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span>. It has been most unconsciously done, however, and I hope will be of short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.43" formerWord="duration" newWord="horror" score="0.43">horror</span>. The feelings which, you tell me, have long prevented the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acknowledgment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="acknowledgment" newWord="silence" score="0.528">silence</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>, can have little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span> in overcoming it after this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>explanation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.92" formerWord="explanation" newWord="mother" score="0.92">mother</span>."
<p>Mr. Darcy, who was leaning against the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mantelpiece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="mantelpiece" newWord="heaven" score="0.28">heaven</span> with his eyes fixed on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, seemed to catch her words with no less <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span> became pale with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disturbance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="disturbance" newWord="door" score="0.508">door</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> was visible in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="feature" newWord="shut" score="0.321">shut</span>. He was struggling for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>, and would not open his lips till he believed himself to have attained it. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> was to Elizabeth's feelings dreadful. At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> of forced <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>calmness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="calmness" newWord="brother" score="0.895">brother</span>, he said: 
<p>"And this is all the reply which I am to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of expecting! I might, perhaps, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> to be informed why, with so little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, I am thus rejected. But it is of small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>."
<p>"I might as well inquire,"replied she,"why with so evident a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> of offending and insulting me, you chose to tell me that you liked me against your will, against your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>, and even against your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>? Was not this some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" newWord="experience" score="0.41">experience</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>incivility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.276" formerWord="incivility" newWord="feebleness" score="0.276">feebleness</span>, if I was uncivil? But I have other provocations. You know I have. Had not my feelings decided against you - - had they been indifferent, or had they even been favourable, do you think that any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> would tempt me to accept the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who has been the means of ruining, perhaps for ever, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of a most beloved <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>?"
<p>As she pronounced these words, Mr. Darcy changed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="colour" newWord="party" score="0.87">party</span>; but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emotion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.91" formerWord="emotion" newWord="affection" score="0.91">affection</span> was short, and he listened without attempting to interrupt her while she continued: 
<p>"I have every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> to think <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of you. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span> can excuse the unjust and ungenerous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> you acted there. You dare not, you cannot deny, that you have been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="principal" newWord="country" score="0.832">country</span>, if not the only means of dividing them from each other - - of exposing one to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>censure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="censure" newWord="discussion" score="0.659">discussion</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>caprice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.471" formerWord="caprice" newWord="minute" score="0.471">minute</span> and instability, and the other to its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>derision</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="derision" newWord="mass" score="0.259">mass</span> for disappointed hopes, and involving them both in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> of the acutest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>."
<p>She paused, and saw with no slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="indignation" newWord="anything" score="0.908">anything</span> that he was listening with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> which proved him wholly unmoved by any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remorse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="remorse" newWord="dirt" score="0.299">dirt</span>. He even looked at her with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> of affected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>incredulity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.371" formerWord="incredulity" newWord="compliment" score="0.371">compliment</span>. 
<p>"Can you deny that you have done it?"she repeated. 
<p>With assumed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tranquillity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.408" formerWord="tranquillity" newWord="melancholy" score="0.408">melancholy</span> he then replied:"I have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of denying that I did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to separate my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> from your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, or that I rejoice in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span>. Towards him I have been kinder than towards myself."
<p>Elizabeth disdained the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of noticing this civil <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">billiard-room</span>, but its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span> did not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>escape</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="escape" newWord="talk" score="0.631">talk</span>, nor was it likely to conciliate her. 
<p>"But it is not merely this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>,"she continued,"on which my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> is founded. Long before it had taken place my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of you was decided. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> was unfolded in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recital</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="recital" newWord="body" score="0.322">body</span> which I received many months ago from Mr. Wickham. On this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, what can you have to say? In what imaginary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>act</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.822" formerWord="act" newWord="her" score="0.822">her</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> can you here defend yourself? or under what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misrepresentation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="misrepresentation" newWord="all" score="0.225">all</span> can you here impose upon others?"
<p>"You take an eager <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>'s concerns,"said Darcy, in a less tranquil <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>, and with a heightened <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="colour" newWord="party" score="0.87">party</span>. 
<p>"Who that knows what his misfortunes have been, can help feeling an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> in him?"
<p>"His misfortunes!"repeated Darcy contemptuously;"yes, his misfortunes have been great indeed."
<p>"And of your infliction,"cried Elizabeth with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>energy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.335" formerWord="energy" newWord="good" score="0.335">good</span>."You have reduced him to his present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poverty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="poverty" newWord="stain" score="0.236">stain</span> - - comparative <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poverty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="poverty" newWord="stain" score="0.236">stain</span>. You have withheld the advantages which you must know to have been designed for him. You have deprived the best years of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>independence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="independence" newWord="encouragement" score="0.631">encouragement</span> which was no less his due than his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desert</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="desert" newWord="lamp" score="0.332">lamp</span>. You have done all this! and yet you can treat the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="mention" newWord="sister" score="0.888">sister</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ridicule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.639" formerWord="ridicule" newWord="park" score="0.639">park</span>."
<p>"And this,"cried Darcy, as he walked with quick steps across the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>,"is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of me! This is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estimation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="estimation" newWord="vacancy" score="0.216">vacancy</span> in which you hold me! I thank you for explaining it so fully. My faults, according to this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>calculation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="calculation" newWord="affection" score="0.756">affection</span>, are heavy indeed! But perhaps,"added he, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stopping</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.551" formerWord="stopping" newWord="minute" score="0.551">minute</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, and turning towards her,"these offenses might have been overlooked, had not your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> been hurt by my honest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="confession" newWord="representation" score="0.299">representation</span> of the scruples that had long prevented my forming any serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span>. These bitter accusations might have been suppressed, had I, with greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>policy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="policy" newWord="rage" score="0.282">rage</span>, concealed my struggles, and flattered you into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> of my being impelled by unqualified, unalloyed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>; by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>, by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">billiard-room</span>, by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. But disguise of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abhorrence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.454" formerWord="abhorrence" newWord="dirt" score="0.454">dirt</span>. Nor am I ashamed of the feelings I related. They were natural and just. Could you expect me to rejoice in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inferiority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.863" formerWord="inferiority" newWord="course" score="0.863">course</span> of your connections? - - to congratulate myself on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of relations, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.499" formerWord="condition" newWord="round" score="0.499">round</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> is so decidedly beneath my own?"
<p>Elizabeth felt herself growing more angry every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>; yet she tried to the utmost to speak with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span> when she said: 
<p>"You are mistaken, Mr. Darcy, if you suppose that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="mode" newWord="haste" score="0.617">haste</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>declaration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="declaration" newWord="indignation" score="0.359">indignation</span> affected me in any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, than as it spared me the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> which I might have felt in refusing you, had you behaved in a more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentlemanlike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="gentlemanlike" newWord="time" score="0.79">time</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>."
<p>She saw him start at this, but he said <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>, and she continued: 
<p>"You could not have made the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> in any possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> that would have tempted me to accept it."
<p>Again his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> was obvious; and he looked at her with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of mingled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>incredulity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.371" formerWord="incredulity" newWord="compliment" score="0.371">compliment</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mortification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="mortification" newWord="answer" score="0.658">answer</span>. She went on: 
<p>"From the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span> - - from the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, I may almost say - - of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> with you, your manners, impressing me with the fullest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrogance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.44" formerWord="arrogance" newWord="haste" score="0.44">haste</span>, your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conceit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="conceit" newWord="park" score="0.628">park</span>, and your selfish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disdain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="disdain" newWord="park" score="0.402">park</span> of the feelings of others, were such as to form the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>groundwork</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="groundwork" newWord="smoothness" score="0.247">smoothness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disapprobation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="disapprobation" newWord="volume" score="0.26">volume</span> on which succeeding events have built so immovable a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span>; and I had not known you a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span> before I felt that you were the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> whom I could ever be prevailed on to marry."
<p>"You have said quite enough, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>. I perfectly comprehend your feelings, and have now only to be ashamed of what my own have been. Forgive me for having taken up so much of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, and accept my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>best</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="best" newWord="propensity" score="0.308">propensity</span> wishes for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>."
<p>And with these words he hastily left the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and Elizabeth heard him the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> open the front <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> and quit the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tumult</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="tumult" newWord="minute" score="0.569">minute</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, was now painfully great. She knew not how to support herself, and from actual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weakness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.755" formerWord="weakness" newWord="husband" score="0.755">husband</span> sat down and cried for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-an-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="half-an-hour" newWord="regret" score="0.477">regret</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>, as she reflected on what had passed, was increased by every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>review</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="review" newWord="life" score="0.829">life</span> of it. That she should receive an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from Mr. Darcy! That he should have been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with her for so many months!
