So much in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> as to wish to marry her in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of all the objections which had made him prevent his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>'s marrying her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and which must appear at least with equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>force</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="force" newWord="arch" score="0.333">arch</span> in his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> - - was almost incredible! It was gratifying to have inspired unconsciously so strong an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. But his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>, his abominable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> - - his shameless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>avowal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="avowal" newWord="hour" score="0.266">hour</span> of what he had done with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> to Jane - - his unpardonable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> in acknowledging, though he could not justify it, and the unfeeling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> in which he had mentioned Mr. Wickham, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cruelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="cruelty" newWord="native" score="0.298">native</span> towards whom he had not attempted to deny, soon overcame the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="pity" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> had for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> excited. She continued in very agitated reflections till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sound</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.726" formerWord="sound" newWord="object" score="0.726">object</span> of Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> made her feel how unequal she was to encounter Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span>, and hurried her away to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 35 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth awoke the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to the same thoughts and meditations which had at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> closed her eyes. She could not yet recover from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> of what had happened; it was impossible to think of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> else; and, totally indisposed for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>employment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="employment" newWord="answer" score="0.916">answer</span>, she resolved, soon after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>, to indulge herself in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exercise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="exercise" newWord="minute" score="0.713">minute</span>. She was proceeding directly to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> of Mr. Darcy's sometimes coming there stopped her, and instead of entering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>, she turned up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span>, which led farther from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turnpike-road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.373" formerWord="turnpike-road" newWord="briefly" score="0.373">briefly</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span> paling was still the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>boundary</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="boundary" newWord="cake" score="0.249">cake</span> on one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, and she soon passed one of the gates into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>. 
<p>After walking two or three times along that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span>, she was tempted, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasantness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="pleasantness" newWord="sooner" score="0.528">sooner</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, to stop at the gates and look into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>. The five weeks which she had now passed in Kent had made a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="difference" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>, and every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> was adding to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>verdure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="verdure" newWord="play" score="0.299">play</span> of the early trees. She was on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of continuing her walk, when she caught a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glimpse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.582" formerWord="glimpse" newWord="absence" score="0.582">absence</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> within the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grove</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.53" formerWord="grove" newWord="resolution" score="0.53">resolution</span> which edged the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>; he was moving that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; and, fearful of its being Mr. Darcy, she was directly retreating. But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> who advanced was now near enough to see her, and stepping forward with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eagerness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="eagerness" newWord="nothing" score="0.862">nothing</span>, pronounced her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span>. She had turned away; but on hearing herself called, though in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> which proved it to be Mr. Darcy, she moved again towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="gate" newWord="her" score="0.829">her</span>. He had by that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> reached it also, and, holding out a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, which she instinctively took, said, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> of haughty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>,"I have been walking in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grove</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.53" formerWord="grove" newWord="resolution" score="0.53">resolution</span> some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> you. Will you do me the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of reading that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>?"And then, with a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span>, turned again into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plantation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.45" formerWord="plantation" newWord="horror" score="0.45">horror</span>, and was soon out of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span>. 
<p>With no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, but with the strongest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>, Elizabeth opened the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, and, to her still increasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wonder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="wonder" newWord="heart" score="0.914">heart</span>, perceived an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>envelope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="envelope" newWord="church" score="0.233">church</span> containing two sheets of letter-paper, written quite through, in a very close <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>envelope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="envelope" newWord="church" score="0.233">church</span> itself was likewise full. Pursuing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> along the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span>, she then began it. It was dated from Rosings, at eight o'clock in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, and was as follows: - - 
<p>"Be not alarmed, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, on receiving this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> of its containing any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repetition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="repetition" newWord="man-servant" score="0.303">man-servant</span> of those sentiments or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>renewal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.224" formerWord="renewal" newWord="culture" score="0.224">culture</span> of those offers which were last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> so disgusting to you. I write without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of paining you, or humbling myself, by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span> on wishes which, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of both, cannot be too soon forgotten; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="effort" newWord="excursion" score="0.239">excursion</span> which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>formation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.285" formerWord="formation" newWord="courtesy" score="0.285">courtesy</span> and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="perusal" newWord="repugnance" score="0.25">repugnance</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> must occasion, should have been spared, had not my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> required it to be written and read. You must, therefore, pardon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>freedom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="freedom" newWord="defence" score="0.297">defence</span> with which I demand your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>; your feelings, I know, will bestow it unwillingly, but I demand it of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>. 
<p>"Two offenses of a very different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span>, and by no means of equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>magnitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="magnitude" newWord="matter" score="0.52">matter</span>, you last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> laid to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="charge" newWord="mercy" score="0.237">mercy</span>. The first mentioned was, that, regardless of the sentiments of either, I had detached Mr. Bingley from your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and the other, that I had, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defiance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="defiance" newWord="conceit" score="0.328">conceit</span> of various claims, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defiance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="defiance" newWord="conceit" score="0.328">conceit</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="humanity" newWord="anybody" score="0.707">anybody</span>, ruined the immediate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prosperity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.66" formerWord="prosperity" newWord="countenance" score="0.66">countenance</span> and blasted the prospects of Mr. Wickham. Wilfully and wantonly to have thrown off the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span>, the <p>"I had not been long in Hertfordshire, before I saw, in common with others, that Bingley preferred your elder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> to any other young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>. I had often seen him in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> before. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> I also watched. If you have not been mistaken here, I must have been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>error</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.732" formerWord="error" newWord="minute" score="0.732">minute</span>. But I shall not scruple to assert, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>serenity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.395" formerWord="serenity" newWord="disposition" score="0.395">disposition</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> was such as might have given the most acute <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.43" formerWord="observer" newWord="gift" score="0.43">gift</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> that, however amiable her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> was not likely to be easily touched. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, though objectionable, was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> to that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>total</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="total" newWord="mortification" score="0.239">mortification</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>propriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="propriety" newWord="none" score="0.837">none</span> so frequently, so almost uniformly betrayed by herself, by your three younger sisters, and occasionally even by your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Pardon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.656" formerWord="Pardon" newWord="happiness" score="0.656">Happiness</span> me. It pains me to offend you. But amidst your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> for the defects of your nearest relations, and your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>displeasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.747" formerWord="displeasure" newWord="return" score="0.747">return</span> at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>representation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.757" formerWord="representation" newWord="moment" score="0.757">moment</span> of them, let it give you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> to consider that, to have conducted yourselves so as to avoid any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> of the like <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>censure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="censure" newWord="discussion" score="0.659">discussion</span>, is praise no less generally bestowed on you and your elder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, than it is honourable to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> of both. I will only say farther that from what passed that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of all parties was confirmed, and every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inducement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="inducement" newWord="matrimony" score="0.315">matrimony</span> heightened which could have led me before, to preserve my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> from what I esteemed a most unhappy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span>. He left Netherfield for London, on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>following</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="following" newWord="justice" score="0.644">justice</span>, as you, I am certain, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remember</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="remember" newWord="praise" score="0.631">praise</span>, with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> of soon returning. 
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> which I acted is now to be explained. His sisters ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uneasiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="uneasiness" newWord="disquiet" score="0.229">disquiet</span> had been equally excited with my own; our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coincidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="coincidence" newWord="north" score="0.391">north</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> was soon discovered, and, alike <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> was to be lost in detaching their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, we shortly resolved on joining him directly in London. We accordingly went - - and there I readily engaged in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>office</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="office" newWord="sir" score="0.764">sir</span> of pointing out to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> the certain evils of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>. I described, and enforced them earnestly. But, however this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remonstrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.765" formerWord="remonstrance" newWord="journey" score="0.765">journey</span> might have staggered or delayed his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>determination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.426" formerWord="determination" newWord="side" score="0.426">side</span>, I do not suppose that it would ultimately have prevented the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, had it not been seconded by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> that I hesitated not in giving, of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>. He had before believed her to return his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> with sincere, if not with equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>. But Bingley has great natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>modesty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="modesty" newWord="portionless" score="0.283">portionless</span>, with a stronger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dependence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="dependence" newWord="conversation" score="0.854">conversation</span> on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> than on his own. To convince him, therefore, that he had deceived himself, was no very difficult <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>. To persuade him against returning into Hertfordshire, when that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> had been given, was scarcely the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>. I cannot blame myself for having done thus much. There is but one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> in the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> on which I do not reflect with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>; it is that I condescended to adopt the measures of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>art</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.484" formerWord="art" newWord="engagement" score="0.484">engagement</span> so far as to conceal from him your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s being in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. I knew it myself, as it was known to Miss Bingley; but her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> is even yet ignorant of it. That they might have met without ill <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> is perhaps probable; but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> did not appear to me enough extinguished for him to see her without some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span>. Perhaps this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concealment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="concealment" newWord="assertion" score="0.366">assertion</span>, this disguise was beneath me; it is done, however, and it was done for the best. On this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> more to say, no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apology</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="apology" newWord="character" score="0.793">character</span> to offer. If I have wounded your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s feelings, it was unknowingly done and though the motives which governed me may to you very naturally appear insufficient, I have not yet learnt to condemn them. 
<p>"With <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> to that other, more weighty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accusation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="accusation" newWord="hardness" score="0.299">hardness</span>, of having injured Mr. Wickham, I can only refute it by laying before you the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> with my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Of what he has particularly accused me I am ignorant; but of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> of what I shall relate, I can summon more than one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>witness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.752" formerWord="witness" newWord="rest" score="0.752">rest</span> of undoubted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>veracity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="veracity" newWord="conduct" score="0.403">conduct</span>. 
<p>"Mr. Wickham is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of a very respectable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, who had for many years the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>management</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="management" newWord="journey" score="0.65">journey</span> of all the Pemberley estates, and whose good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discharge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.317" formerWord="discharge" newWord="sign" score="0.317">sign</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> naturally inclined my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> to be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>service</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="service" newWord="time" score="0.851">time</span> to him; and on George Wickham, who was his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>godson</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="godson" newWord="gayer" score="0.266">gayer</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> was therefore liberally bestowed. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> supported him at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>school</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="school" newWord="vanity" score="0.583">vanity</span>, and afterwards at Cambridge - - most important <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span>, as his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, always poor from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extravagance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.603" formerWord="extravagance" newWord="minute" score="0.603">minute</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, would have been unable to give him a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> was not only fond of this young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, whose manners were always engaging; he had also the highest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of him, and hoping the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span> would be his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>, intended to provide for him in it. As for myself, it is many, many years since I first began to think of him in a very different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>. The vicious propensities - - the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="principle" newWord="town" score="0.858">town</span>, which he was careful to guard from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of his best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, could not escape the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span> of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of nearly the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span> with himself, and who had opportunities of seeing him in unguarded moments, which Mr. Darcy could not have. Here again I shall give you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> - - to what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> you only can tell. But whatever may be the sentiments which Mr. Wickham has created, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> shall not prevent me from unfolding his real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> - - it adds even another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>. 
<p>"My excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> died about five years ago; and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to Mr. Wickham was to the last so steady, that in his will he particularly recommended it to me, to promote his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advancement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="advancement" newWord="casement" score="0.259">casement</span> in the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> might allow - - and if he took orders, desired that a valuable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> might be his as soon as it became vacant. There was also a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>legacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.415" formerWord="legacy" newWord="good" score="0.415">good</span> of one thousand pounds. His own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> did not long survive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>, and within <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span> from these events, Mr. Wickham wrote to inform me that, having finally resolved against taking orders, he hoped I should not think it unreasonable for him to expect some more immediate pecuniary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lieu</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.534" formerWord="lieu" newWord="round" score="0.534">round</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>preferment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="preferment" newWord="complaint" score="0.298">complaint</span>, by which he could not be benefited. He had some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span>, he added, of studying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.445" formerWord="law" newWord="conduct" score="0.445">conduct</span>, and I must be aware that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> of one thousand pounds would be a very insufficient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>support</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.358" formerWord="support" newWord="phoo" score="0.358">phoo</span> therein. I rather wished, than believed him to be sincere; but, at any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="rate" newWord="absence" score="0.368">absence</span>, was perfectly ready to accede to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span>. I knew that Mr. Wickham ought not to be a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clergyman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="clergyman" newWord="none" score="0.613">none</span>; the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> was therefore soon settled - - he resigned all claim to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>church</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.487" formerWord="church" newWord="visit" score="0.487">visit</span>, were it possible that he could ever be in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> to receive it, and accepted in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> three thousand pounds. All <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> between us seemed now dissolved. I thought too ill of him to invite him to Pemberley, or admit his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> I believe he chiefly lived, but his studying the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.445" formerWord="law" newWord="conduct" score="0.445">conduct</span> was a mere <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pretence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="pretence" newWord="conscience" score="0.465">conscience</span>, and being now free from all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restraint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="restraint" newWord="account" score="0.786">account</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idleness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.512" formerWord="idleness" newWord="horror" score="0.512">horror</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dissipation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="dissipation" newWord="opinion" score="0.681">opinion</span>. For about three years I heard little of him; but on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="decease" newWord="period" score="0.412">period</span> of the incumbent of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> which had been designed for him, he applied to me again by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presentation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="presentation" newWord="learning" score="0.23">learning</span>. His circumstances, he assured me, and I had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span> in believing it, were exceedingly bad. He had found the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.445" formerWord="law" newWord="conduct" score="0.445">conduct</span> a most unprofitable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>study</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.54" formerWord="study" newWord="curiosity" score="0.54">curiosity</span>, and was now absolutely resolved on being ordained, if I would present him to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> - - of which he trusted there could be little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, as he was well assured that I had no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> to provide for, and I could not have forgotten my revered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s intentions. You will hardly blame me for refusing to comply with this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entreaty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="entreaty" newWord="card" score="0.361">card</span>, or for resisting every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repetition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="repetition" newWord="man-servant" score="0.303">man-servant</span> to it. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> was in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proportion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.472" formerWord="proportion" newWord="tea" score="0.472">tea</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span> of his circumstances - - and he was doubtless as violent in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.234" formerWord="abuse" newWord="vault" score="0.234">vault</span> of me to others as in his reproaches to myself. After this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> was dropped. How he lived I know not. But last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> he was again most painfully obtruded on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>. 
<p>"I must now mention a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> which I would wish to forget myself, and which no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>obligation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="obligation" newWord="deal" score="0.811">deal</span> less than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> should induce me to unfold to any human being. Having said thus much, I feel no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, who is more than ten years my junior, was left to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guardianship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.262" formerWord="guardianship" newWord="self-denying" score="0.262">self-denying</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, Colonel Fitzwilliam, and myself. About a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span> ago, she was taken from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>school</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="school" newWord="vanity" score="0.583">vanity</span>, and an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>establishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="establishment" newWord="satisfaction" score="0.477">satisfaction</span> formed for her in London; and last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> she went with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> who presided over it, to Ramsgate; and thither also went Mr. Wickham, undoubtedly by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span>; for there proved to have been a prior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> between him and Mrs. Younge, in whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> we were most unhappily deceived; and by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connivance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.238" formerWord="connivance" newWord="council" score="0.238">council</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.376" formerWord="aid" newWord="colour" score="0.376">colour</span>, he so far recommended himself to Georgiana, whose affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> retained a strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="impression" newWord="part" score="0.871">part</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> to her as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, that she was persuaded to believe herself in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>, and to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span> to an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span>. She was then but fifteen, which must be her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" newWord="experience" score="0.41">experience</span>; and after stating her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">self</span>, I am happy to add, that I owed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of it to herself. I joined them unexpectedly a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> or two before the intended <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span>, and then Georgiana, unable to support the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of grieving and offending a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> whom she almost looked up to as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, acknowledged the whole to me. You may imagine what I felt and how I acted. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="Regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">Family</span> for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> and feelings prevented any public <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exposure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.494" formerWord="exposure" newWord="glance" score="0.494">glance</span>; but I wrote to Mr. Wickham, who left the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> immediately, and Mrs. Younge was of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> removed from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="charge" newWord="mercy" score="0.237">mercy</span>. Mr. Wickham's chief <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> was unquestionably my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, which is thirty thousand pounds; but I cannot help supposing that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of revenging himself on me was a strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inducement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="inducement" newWord="matrimony" score="0.315">matrimony</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>revenge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.49" formerWord="revenge" newWord="minute" score="0.49">minute</span> would have been complete indeed. 
<p>"This, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, is a faithful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>narrative</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.53" formerWord="narrative" newWord="conversation" score="0.53">conversation</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> in which we have been concerned together; and if you do not absolutely reject it as false, you will, I hope, acquit me henceforth of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cruelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="cruelty" newWord="native" score="0.298">native</span> towards Mr. Wickham. I know not in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, under what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>form</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="form" newWord="aunt" score="0.832">aunt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>falsehood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="falsehood" newWord="hyacinth" score="0.244">hyacinth</span> he had imposed on you; but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> is not perhaps to be wondered at. Ignorant as you previously were of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> concerning either, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>detection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="detection" newWord="abode" score="0.39">abode</span> could not be in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span> certainly not in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>. 
<p>"You may possibly wonder why all this was not told you last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>; but I was not then <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> enough of myself to know what could or ought to be revealed. For the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> here related, I can appeal more particularly to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>testimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.511" formerWord="testimony" newWord="behaviour" score="0.511">behaviour</span> of Colonel Fitzwilliam, who, from our near <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span> and constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span>, and, still more, as one of the executors of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s will, has been unavoidably acquainted with every particular of these transactions. If your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abhorrence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.454" formerWord="abhorrence" newWord="dirt" score="0.454">dirt</span> of me should make my assertions valueless, you cannot be prevented by the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> from confiding in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>; and that there may be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of consulting him, I shall <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to find some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of putting this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> in your hands in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. I will only add, God bless you. 
<p>"FITZWILLIAM DARCY"
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 36 
<p>
<p>If Elizabeth, when Mr. Darcy gave her the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, did not expect it to contain a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>renewal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.224" formerWord="renewal" newWord="culture" score="0.224">culture</span> of his offers, she had formed no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> at all of its contents. But such as they were, it may well be supposed how eagerly she went through them, and what a contrariety of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emotion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.91" formerWord="emotion" newWord="affection" score="0.91">affection</span> they excited. Her feelings as she read were scarcely to be defined. With <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span> did she first understand that he believed any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apology</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="apology" newWord="character" score="0.793">character</span> to be in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>; and steadfastly was she persuaded, that he could have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>explanation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.92" formerWord="explanation" newWord="mother" score="0.92">mother</span> to give, which a just <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> would not conceal. With a strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prejudice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.751" formerWord="prejudice" newWord="arrival" score="0.751">arrival</span> against <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> he might say, she began his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of what had happened at Netherfield. She read with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eagerness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="eagerness" newWord="nothing" score="0.862">nothing</span> which hardly left her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="comprehension" newWord="indication" score="0.302">indication</span>, and from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span> of knowing what the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> might bring, was incapable of attending to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of the one before her eyes. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insensibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="insensibility" newWord="danger" score="0.403">danger</span> she instantly resolved to be false; and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of the real, the worst objections to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>, made her too angry to have any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of doing him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>.
