He expressed no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span> for what he had done which satisfied her; his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span> was not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>penitent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.376" formerWord="penitent" newWord="master" score="0.376">master</span>, but haughty. It was all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="insolence" newWord="joy" score="0.497">joy</span>. 
<p>But when this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> was succeeded by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of Mr. Wickham - - when she read with somewhat clearer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> of events which, if true, must overthrow every cherished <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>worth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="worth" newWord="man" score="0.953">man</span>, and which bore so alarming an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affinity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="affinity" newWord="seemed" score="0.23">seemed</span> to his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>history</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="history" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span> of himself - - her feelings were yet more acutely painful and more difficult of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>definition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.416" formerWord="definition" newWord="charm" score="0.416">charm</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="Astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">Life</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span>, and even <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horror</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="horror" newWord="minute" score="0.867">minute</span>, oppressed her. She wished to discredit it entirely, repeatedly exclaiming,"This must be false! This cannot be! This must be the grossest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>falsehood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="falsehood" newWord="hyacinth" score="0.244">hyacinth</span>!"- - and when she had gone through the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, though scarcely knowing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> of the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>page</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.518" formerWord="page" newWord="chance" score="0.518">chance</span> or two, put it hastily away, protesting that she would not regard it, that she would never look in it again. 
<p>In this perturbed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, with thoughts that could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>, she walked on; but it would not do; in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>minute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="minute" newWord="round" score="0.875">round</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was unfolded again, and collecting herself as well as she could, she again began the mortifying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="perusal" newWord="repugnance" score="0.25">repugnance</span> of all that related to Wickham, and commanded herself so far as to examine the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> with the Pemberley <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> was exactly what he had related himself; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> of the late Mr. Darcy, though she had not before known its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="extent" newWord="hand" score="0.79">hand</span>, agreed equally well with his own words. So far each <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recital</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="recital" newWord="body" score="0.322">body</span> confirmed the other; but when she came to the will, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="difference" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> was great. What Wickham had said of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> was fresh in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>memory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="memory" newWord="deficiency" score="0.462">deficiency</span>, and as she recalled his very words, it was impossible not to feel that there was gross <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duplicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="duplicity" newWord="character" score="0.546">character</span> on one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> or the other; and, for a few moments, she flattered herself that her wishes did not err. But when she read and re-read with the closest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>, the particulars immediately following of Wickham's resigning all pretensions to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>, of his receiving in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lieu</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.534" formerWord="lieu" newWord="round" score="0.534">round</span> so considerable a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="sum" newWord="horror" score="0.528">horror</span> as three thousand pounds, again was she forced to hesitate. She put down the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, weighed every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> with what she meant to be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impartiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.634" formerWord="impartiality" newWord="visit" score="0.634">visit</span> - - deliberated on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>probability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="probability" newWord="family" score="0.849">family</span> of each <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>statement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.511" formerWord="statement" newWord="engagement" score="0.511">engagement</span> - - but with little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span>. On both sides it was only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.636" formerWord="assertion" newWord="situation" score="0.636">situation</span>. Again she read on; but every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span> proved more clearly that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>, which she had believed it impossible that any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contrivance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="contrivance" newWord="chuse" score="0.257">chuse</span> could so represent as to render Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> in it less than infamous, was capable of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> which must make him entirely blameless throughout the whole. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extravagance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.603" formerWord="extravagance" newWord="minute" score="0.603">minute</span> and general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profligacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.273" formerWord="profligacy" newWord="pupil" score="0.273">pupil</span> which he scrupled not to lay at Mr. Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="charge" newWord="mercy" score="0.237">mercy</span>, exceedingly shocked her; the more so, as she could bring no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="proof" newWord="nothing" score="0.855">nothing</span> of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>injustice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="injustice" newWord="give" score="0.326">give</span>. She had never heard of him before his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span> into the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> Militia, in which he had engaged at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span> of the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who, on meeting him accidentally in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, had there renewed a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>. Of his former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> had been known in Hertfordshire but what he told himself. As to his real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> been in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>, she had never felt a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of inquiring. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> had established him at once in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="possession" newWord="retirement" score="0.275">retirement</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span>. She tried to recollect some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="instance" newWord="minute" score="0.464">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span>, some distinguished trait of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>integrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="integrity" newWord="xxviii" score="0.256">xxviii</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benevolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.377" formerWord="benevolence" newWord="length" score="0.377">length</span>, that might rescue him from the attacks of Mr. Darcy; or at least, by the predominance of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span>, atone for those casual errors under which she would <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>class</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.427" formerWord="class" newWord="education" score="0.427">education</span> what Mr. Darcy had described as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idleness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.512" formerWord="idleness" newWord="horror" score="0.512">horror</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.614" formerWord="vice" newWord="minute" score="0.614">minute</span> of many years ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>continuance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="continuance" newWord="notice" score="0.508">notice</span>. But no such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> befriended her. She could see him instantly before her, in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="charm" newWord="sister" score="0.891">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span>; but she could remember no more substantial good than the general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="approbation" newWord="paint" score="0.232">paint</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> which his social powers had gained him in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.204" formerWord="mess" newWord="sweep-gate" score="0.204">sweep-gate</span>. After pausing on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> a considerable while, she once more continued to read. But, alas! the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>story</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="story" newWord="letter" score="0.837">letter</span> which followed, of his designs on Miss Darcy, received some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confirmation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.648" formerWord="confirmation" newWord="surprise" score="0.648">surprise</span> from what had passed between Colonel Fitzwilliam and herself only the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> before; and at last she was referred for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> of every particular to Colonel Fitzwilliam himself - - from whom she had previously received the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> of his near <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> in all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s affairs, and whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to question. At one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> she had almost resolved on applying to him, but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> was checked by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>awkwardness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="awkwardness" newWord="disturbance" score="0.261">disturbance</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span>, and at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> wholly banished by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> that Mr. Darcy would never have hazarded such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span>, if he had not been well assured of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>'s corroboration. 
<p>She perfectly remembered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> that had passed in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> between Wickham and herself, in their first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> at Mr. Phillips ' s. Many of his expressions were still fresh in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>memory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="memory" newWord="deficiency" score="0.462">deficiency</span>. She was now struck with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impropriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="impropriety" newWord="native" score="0.255">native</span> of such communications to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span>, and wondered it had escaped her before. She saw the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indelicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="indelicacy" newWord="mistress" score="0.305">mistress</span> of putting himself forward as he had done, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inconsistency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="inconsistency" newWord="dining" score="0.302">dining</span> of his professions with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>. She remembered that he had boasted of having no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of seeing Mr. Darcy - - that Mr. Darcy might leave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>, but that he should stand his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>; yet he had avoided the Netherfield <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> the very next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>. She remembered also that, till the Netherfield <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> had quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>, he had told his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>story</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="story" newWord="letter" score="0.837">letter</span> to no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> but herself; but that after their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span> it had been everywhere discussed; that he had then no reserves, no scruples in sinking Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, though he had assured her that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> would always prevent his exposing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>. 
<p>How differently did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> now appear in which he was concerned! His attentions to Miss King were now the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of views solely and hatefully mercenary; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mediocrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.269" formerWord="mediocrity" newWord="painting" score="0.269">painting</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> proved no longer the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moderation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="moderation" newWord="mass" score="0.216">mass</span> of his wishes, but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eagerness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="eagerness" newWord="nothing" score="0.862">nothing</span> to grasp at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to herself could now have had no tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>; he had either been deceived with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>, or had been gratifying his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span> by encouraging the preference which she believed she had most incautiously shown. Every lingering <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>struggle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.539" formerWord="struggle" newWord="tone" score="0.539">tone</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> grew fainter and fainter; and in farther <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="justification" newWord="mite" score="0.232">mite</span> of Mr. Darcy, she could not but allow that Mr. Bingley, when questioned by Jane, had long ago asserted his blamelessness in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>; that proud and repulsive as were his manners, she had never, in the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> - - an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> which had latterly brought them much together, and given her a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span> with his ways - - seen <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> that betrayed him to be unprincipled or unjust - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> that spoke him of irreligious or immoral habits; that among his own connections he was esteemed and valued - - that even Wickham had allowed him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>merit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="merit" newWord="attitude" score="0.205">attitude</span> as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, and that she had often heard him speak so affectionately of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> as to prove him capable of some amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>; that had his actions been what Mr. Wickham represented them, so gross a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>violation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="violation" newWord="guile" score="0.25">guile</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>right</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="right" newWord="nothing" score="0.843">nothing</span> could hardly have been concealed from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>; and that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> between a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> capable of it, and such an amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> as Mr. Bingley, was incomprehensible. 
<p>She grew absolutely ashamed of herself. Of neither Darcy nor Wickham could she think without feeling she had been blind, partial, prejudiced, absurd. 
<p>"How despicably I have acted!"she cried;"I, who have prided myself on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discernment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.607" formerWord="discernment" newWord="park" score="0.607">park</span>! I, who have valued myself on my abilities! who have often disdained the generous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>candour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.198" formerWord="candour" newWord="talker" score="0.198">talker</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and gratified my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span> in useless or blameable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistrust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.224" formerWord="mistrust" newWord="ill-treatment" score="0.224">ill-treatment</span>! How humiliating is this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="discovery" newWord="trouble" score="0.588">trouble</span>! Yet, how just a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humiliation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="humiliation" newWord="mansion" score="0.243">mansion</span>! Had I been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>, I could not have been more wretchedly blind! But <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span>, not love, has been my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span>. Pleased with the preference of one, and offended by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> of the other, on the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span> of our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, I have courted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prepossession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.254" formerWord="prepossession" newWord="acquittal" score="0.254">acquittal</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ignorance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.642" formerWord="ignorance" newWord="horror" score="0.642">horror</span>, and driven <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> away, where either were concerned. Till this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> I never knew myself."
<p>From herself to Jane - - from Jane to Bingley, her thoughts were in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span> which soon brought to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> that Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>explanation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.92" formerWord="explanation" newWord="mother" score="0.92">mother</span> there had appeared very insufficient, and she read it again. Widely different was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> of a second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="perusal" newWord="repugnance" score="0.25">repugnance</span>. How could she deny that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> to his assertions in one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="instance" newWord="minute" score="0.464">minute</span>, which she had been obliged to give in the other? He declared himself to be totally unsuspicious of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>; and she could not help remembering what Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> had always been. Neither could she deny the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>description</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="description" newWord="wish" score="0.731">wish</span> of Jane. She felt that Jane's feelings, though fervent, were little displayed, and that there was a constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complacency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="complacency" newWord="ma'am" score="0.522">ma'am</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> not often united with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="sensibility" newWord="family" score="0.948">family</span>. 
<p>When she came to that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> in which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were mentioned in terms of such mortifying, yet merited <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="reproach" newWord="face" score="0.255">face</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> was severe. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="charge" newWord="mercy" score="0.237">mercy</span> struck her too forcibly for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>denial</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="denial" newWord="inexperience" score="0.237">inexperience</span>, and the circumstances to which he particularly alluded as having passed at the Netherfield <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span>, and as confirming all his first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disapprobation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="disapprobation" newWord="volume" score="0.26">volume</span>, could not have made a stronger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="impression" newWord="part" score="0.871">part</span> on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> than on hers. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> to herself and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was not unfelt. It soothed, but it could not console her for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> which had thus been self-attracted by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>; and as she considered that Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> had in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> of her nearest relations, and reflected how materially the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> of both must be hurt by such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impropriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="impropriety" newWord="native" score="0.255">native</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>, she felt depressed beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> she had ever known before. 
<p>After wandering along the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lane</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.681" formerWord="lane" newWord="weather" score="0.681">weather</span> for two hours, giving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> - - re-considering events, determining probabilities, and reconciling herself, as well as she could, to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> so sudden and so important, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fatigue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="fatigue" newWord="fortnight" score="0.542">fortnight</span>, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> of her long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span>, made her at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; and she entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of appearing cheerful as usual, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> of repressing such reflections as must make her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unfit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.431" formerWord="unfit" newWord="attendance" score="0.431">attendance</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>. 
<p>She was immediately told that the two gentlemen from Rosings had each called during her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span>; Mr. Darcy, only for a few minutes, to take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> - - but that Colonel Fitzwilliam had been sitting with them at least an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>, hoping for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, and almost resolving to walk after her till she could be found. Elizabeth could but just affect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> in missing him; she really rejoiced at it. Colonel Fitzwilliam was no longer an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>; she could think only of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 37 
<p>
<p>The two gentlemen left Rosings the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, and Mr. Collins having been in waiting near the lodges, to make them his parting obeisance, was able to bring <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> the pleasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>, of their appearing in very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span>, and in as tolerable spirits as could be expected, after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>melancholy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="melancholy" newWord="heart" score="0.917">heart</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span> so lately gone through at Rosings. To Rosings he then hastened, to console Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>; and on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> brought back, with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>message</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.836" formerWord="message" newWord="worth" score="0.836">worth</span> from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, importing that she felt herself so dull as to make her very desirous of having them all to dine with her. 
<p>Elizabeth could not see Lady Catherine without recollecting that, had she chosen it, she might by this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> have been presented to her as her future <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>; nor could she think, without a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, of what her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="indignation" newWord="anything" score="0.908">anything</span> would have been."What would she have said? how would she have behaved?"were questions with which she amused herself. 
<p>Their first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diminution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="diminution" newWord="self" score="0.27">self</span> of the Rosings <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>."I assure you, I feel it exceedingly,"said Lady Catherine;"I believe no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> feels the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of friends so much as I do. But I am particularly attached to these young men, and know them to be so much attached to me! They were excessively sorry to go! But so they always are. The dear Colonel rallied his spirits tolerably till just at last; but Darcy seemed to feel it most acutely, more, I think, than last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to Rosings certainly increases."
<p>Mr. Collins had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span>, and an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>allusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="allusion" newWord="haste" score="0.332">haste</span> to throw in here, which were kindly smiled on by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. 
<p>Lady Catherine observed, after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, that Miss Bennet seemed out of spirits, and immediately <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accounting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="accounting" newWord="avowal" score="0.237">avowal</span> for it by herself, by supposing that she did not like to go <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> again so soon, she added: 
<p>"But if that is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, you must write to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and beg that you may stay a little longer. Mrs. Collins will be very glad of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, I am sure."
<p>"I am much obliged to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span>,"replied Elizabeth,"but it is not in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to accept it. I must be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> next Saturday."
<p>"Why, at that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="rate" newWord="absence" score="0.368">absence</span>, you will have been here only six weeks. I expected you to stay two months. I told Mrs. Collins so before you came. There can be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for your going so soon. Mrs. Bennet could certainly spare you for another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span>."
<p>"But my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> cannot. He wrote last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> to hurry my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>."
<p>"Oh! your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> may spare you, if your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> can. Daughters are never of so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>. And if you will stay another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span> complete, it will be in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to take one of you as far as London, for I am going there early in June, for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>; and as Dawson does not object to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>barouche-box</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.258" formerWord="barouche-box" newWord="soliloquy" score="0.258">soliloquy</span>, there will be very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> for one of you - - and indeed, if the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="weather" newWord="sister" score="0.954">sister</span> should happen to be cool, I should not object to taking you both, as you are neither of you large."
<p>"You are all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>; but I believe we must abide by our original <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span>."
<p>Lady Catherine seemed resigned."Mrs. Collins, you must send a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> with them. You know I always speak my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, and I cannot bear the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of two young women travelling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>post</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="post" newWord="voice" score="0.838">voice</span> by themselves. It is highly improper. You must contrive to send <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>somebody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="somebody" newWord="yesterday" score="0.649">yesterday</span>. I have the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> to that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>. Young women should always be properly guarded and attended, according to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. When my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> Georgiana went to Ramsgate last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>, I made a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of her having two men-servants go with her. Miss Darcy, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> of Mr. Darcy, of Pemberley, and Lady Anne, could not have appeared with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>propriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="propriety" newWord="none" score="0.837">none</span> in a different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>. I am excessively attentive to all those things. You must send John with the young ladies, Mrs. Collins. I am glad it occurred to me to mention it; for it would really be discreditable to you to let them go alone."
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> is to send a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> for us."
<p>"Oh! Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>! He keeps a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man-servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.459" formerWord="man-servant" newWord="number" score="0.459">number</span>, does he? I am very glad you have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>somebody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="somebody" newWord="yesterday" score="0.649">yesterday</span> who thinks of these things. Where shall you change horses? Oh! Bromley, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>. If you mention my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> at the Bell, you will be attended to."
<p>Lady Catherine had many other questions to ask respecting their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, and as she did not answer them all herself, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> was necessary, which Elizabeth believed to be lucky for her; or, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> so occupied, she might have forgotten where she was. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="Reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">Billiard-room</span> must be reserved for solitary hours; whenever she was alone, she gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to it as the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span>; and not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> went by without a solitary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, in which she might indulge in all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> of unpleasant recollections. 
<p>Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> she was in a fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of soon knowing by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. She studied every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span>; and her feelings towards its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="writer" newWord="conquest" score="0.421">conquest</span> were at times widely different. When she remembered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span>, she was still full of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="indignation" newWord="anything" score="0.908">anything</span>; but when she considered how unjustly she had condemned and upbraided him, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> was turned against herself; and his disappointed feelings became the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> excited <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>, his general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span>; but she could not approve him; nor could she for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> repent her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span>, or feel the slightest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> ever to see him again. In her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>past</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="past" newWord="confidence" score="0.301">confidence</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>, there was a constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>source</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="source" newWord="happiness" score="0.883">happiness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span>; and in the unhappy defects of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of yet heavier chagrin. They were hopeless of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remedy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.246" formerWord="remedy" newWord="impediment" score="0.246">impediment</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, contented with laughing at them, would never exert himself to restrain the wild giddiness of his youngest daughters; and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, with manners so far from right herself, was entirely <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="insensible" newWord="pressure" score="0.249">pressure</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span>. Elizabeth had frequently united with Jane in an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to check the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">self</span> of Catherine and Lydia; but while they were supported by their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indulgence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="indulgence" newWord="error" score="0.429">error</span>, what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> could there be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span>? Catherine, weak-spirited, irritable, and completely under Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guidance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="guidance" newWord="harm" score="0.336">harm</span>, had been always affronted by their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span>; and Lydia, self-willed and careless, would scarcely give them a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span>. They were ignorant, idle, and vain. While there was an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span> in Meryton, they would flirt with him; and while Meryton was within a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>, they would be going there forever. 
<p>Anxiety on Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behalf</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.792" formerWord="behalf" newWord="kind" score="0.792">kind</span> was another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prevailing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.519" formerWord="prevailing" newWord="solemnity" score="0.519">solemnity</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>; and Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>explanation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.92" formerWord="explanation" newWord="mother" score="0.92">mother</span>, by restoring Bingley to all her former good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, heightened the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of what Jane had lost. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was proved to have been sincere, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> cleared of all blame, unless any could attach to the implicitness of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.877" formerWord="confidence" newWord="heart" score="0.877">heart</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>.
