How grievous then was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> that, of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> so desirable in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span>, so replete with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>, so promising for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, Jane had been deprived, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indecorum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="indecorum" newWord="soothing" score="0.305">soothing</span> of her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>! 
<p>When to these recollections was added the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>development</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="development" newWord="cash" score="0.237">cash</span> of Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, it may be easily believed that the happy spirits which had seldom been depressed before, were now so much affected as to make it almost impossible for her to appear tolerably cheerful. 
<p>Their engagements at Rosings were as frequent during the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of her stay as they had been at first. The very last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> was spent there; and her ladyship again inquired minutely into the particulars of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, gave them directions as to the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>method</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="method" newWord="field" score="0.298">field</span> of packing, and was so urgent on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> of placing gowns in the only right <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, that Maria thought herself obliged, on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, to undo all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, and pack her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trunk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="trunk" newWord="tide" score="0.297">tide</span> afresh. 
<p>When they parted, Lady Catherine, with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, wished them a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, and invited them to come to Hunsford again next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>; and Miss de Bourgh exerted herself so far as to curtsey and hold out her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> to both. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 38 
<p>
<p>On Saturday <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> Elizabeth and Mr. Collins <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>met</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="met" newWord="engagement" score="0.649">engagement</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> a few minutes before the others appeared; and he took the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of paying the parting civilities which he deemed indispensably necessary. 
<p>"I know not, Miss Elizabeth,"said he,"whether Mrs. Collins has yet expressed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> in coming to us; but I am very certain you will not leave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> without receiving her thanks for it. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> has been much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.388" formerWord="felt" newWord="illness" score="0.388">illness</span>, I assure you. We know how little there is to tempt <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> to our humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="abode" newWord="minute" score="0.817">minute</span>. Our plain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>, our small rooms and few domestics, and the little we see of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, must make Hunsford extremely dull to a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> like yourself; but I hope you will believe us grateful for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, and that we have done <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to prevent your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spending</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="spending" newWord="observation" score="0.569">observation</span> your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> unpleasantly."
<p>Elizabeth was eager with her thanks and assurances of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. She had spent six weeks with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span>; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of being with Charlotte, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> attentions she had received, must make her feel the obliged. Mr. Collins was gratified, and with a more smiling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solemnity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="solemnity" newWord="return" score="0.776">return</span> replied: 
<p>"It gives me great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to hear that you have passed your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> not disagreeably. We have certainly done our best; and most fortunately having it in our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to introduce you to very superior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, and, from our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> with Rosings, the frequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>means</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="means" newWord="landscape" score="0.24">landscape</span> of varying the humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>, I think we may flatter ourselves that your Hunsford <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> cannot have been entirely irksome. Our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> is indeed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of extraordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blessing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.913" formerWord="blessing" newWord="town" score="0.913">town</span> which few can boast. You see on what a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>footing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.56" formerWord="footing" newWord="furniture" score="0.56">furniture</span> we are. You see how continually we are engaged there. In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> I must acknowledge that, with all the disadvantages of this humble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parsonage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.223" formerWord="parsonage" newWord="villain" score="0.223">villain</span>, I should not think <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> abiding in it an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span>, while they are sharers of our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span> at Rosings."
<p>Words were insufficient for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elevation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="elevation" newWord="affluence" score="0.301">affluence</span> of his feelings; and he was obliged to walk about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, while Elizabeth tried to unite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> in a few short sentences. 
<p>"You may, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span>, carry a very favourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span> of us into Hertfordshire, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>. I flatter myself at least that you will be able to do so. Lady Catherine's great attentions to Mrs. Collins you have been a daily <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>witness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.752" formerWord="witness" newWord="rest" score="0.752">rest</span> of; and altogether I trust it does not appear that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> has drawn an unfortunate - - but on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> it will be as well to be silent. Only let me assure you, my dear Miss Elizabeth, that I can from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> most cordially wish you equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. My dear Charlotte and I have but one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> and one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thinking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="thinking" newWord="duty" score="0.605">duty</span>. There is in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> a most remarkable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resemblance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="resemblance" newWord="minute" score="0.675">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> and ideas between us. We seem to have been designed for each other."
<p>Elizabeth could safely say that it was a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> where that was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, and with equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sincerity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="sincerity" newWord="manuscript" score="0.339">manuscript</span> could add, that she firmly believed and rejoiced in his domestic comforts. She was not sorry, however, to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recital</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="recital" newWord="body" score="0.322">body</span> of them interrupted by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> from whom they sprang. Poor Charlotte! it was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>melancholy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="melancholy" newWord="heart" score="0.917">heart</span> to leave her to such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>! But she had chosen it with her eyes open; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>though</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="though" newWord="life" score="0.866">life</span> evidently regretting that her visitors were to go, she did not seem to ask for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeping</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="housekeeping" newWord="oath" score="0.259">oath</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="parish" newWord="consent" score="0.617">consent</span> and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poultry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.692" formerWord="poultry" newWord="minute" score="0.692">minute</span>, and all their dependent concerns, had not yet lost their charms. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span> arrived, the trunks were fastened on, the parcels placed within, and it was pronounced to be ready. After an affectionate parting between the friends, Elizabeth was attended to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> by Mr. Collins, and as they walked down the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>garden</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="garden" newWord="lock" score="0.585">lock</span> he was commissioning her with his best respects to all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, not forgetting his thanks for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> he had received at Longbourn in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>, and his compliments to Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner, though <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unknown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="unknown" newWord="park" score="0.522">park</span>. He then handed her in, Maria followed, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> was on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of being closed, when he suddenly reminded them, with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consternation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="consternation" newWord="mass" score="0.225">mass</span>, that they had hitherto forgotten to leave any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>message</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.836" formerWord="message" newWord="worth" score="0.836">worth</span> for the ladies at Rosings. 
<p>"But,"he added,"you will of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> to have your humble respects delivered to them, with your grateful thanks for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> to you while you have been here."
<p>Elizabeth made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>; the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> was then allowed to be shut, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> drove off. 
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Good</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="Good" newWord="mother" score="0.858">Mother</span> gracious!"cried Maria, after a few minutes ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>,"it seems but a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> or two since we first came! and yet how many things have happened!"
<p>"A great many indeed,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sigh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="sigh" newWord="day" score="0.917">day</span>. 
<p>"We have dined nine times at Rosings, besides drinking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span> there twice! How much I shall have to tell!"
<p>Elizabeth added privately,"And how much I shall have to conceal!"
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was performed without much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, or any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>; and within four hours of their leaving Hunsford they reached Mr. Gardiner's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, where they were to remain a few days. 
<p>Jane looked well, and Elizabeth had little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of studying her spirits, amidst the various engagements which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> had reserved for them. But Jane was to go <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> with her, and at Longbourn there would be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> enough for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span>. 
<p>It was not without an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="effort" newWord="excursion" score="0.239">excursion</span>, meanwhile, that she could wait even for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>, before she told her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> of Mr. Darcy's proposals. To know that she had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of revealing what would so exceedingly astonish Jane, and must, at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, so highly gratify whatever of her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span> she had not yet been able to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> away, was such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temptation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="temptation" newWord="weakness" score="0.387">weakness</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>openness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.459" formerWord="openness" newWord="wedding" score="0.459">wedding</span> as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> could have conquered but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indecision</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="indecision" newWord="imprisonment" score="0.247">imprisonment</span> in which she remained as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="extent" newWord="hand" score="0.79">hand</span> of what she should communicate; and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span>, if she once entered on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, of being hurried into repeating <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> of Bingley which might only grieve her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> further. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 39 
<p>
<p>It was the second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> in May, in which the three young ladies set out together from Gracechurch Street for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of - - - -, in Hertfordshire; and, as they drew near the appointed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="inn" newWord="enjoyment" score="0.497">enjoyment</span> where Mr. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was to meet them, they quickly perceived, in token of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coachman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="coachman" newWord="minute" score="0.497">minute</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>punctuality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="punctuality" newWord="scene" score="0.617">scene</span>, both Kitty and Lydia looking out of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span> up stairs. These two girls had been above an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, happily employed in visiting an opposite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>milliner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="milliner" newWord="class" score="0.244">class</span>, watching the sentinel on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="guard" newWord="effect" score="0.569">effect</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dressing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.401" formerWord="dressing" newWord="wait" score="0.401">wait</span> a salad and cucumber. 
<p>After welcoming their sisters, they triumphantly displayed a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>set</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.919" formerWord="set" newWord="idea" score="0.919">idea</span> out with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cold</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="cold" newWord="return" score="0.787">return</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.602" formerWord="meat" newWord="minute" score="0.602">minute</span> as an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="inn" newWord="enjoyment" score="0.497">enjoyment</span> larder usually affords, exclaiming,"Is not this nice? Is not this an agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>?"
<p>"And we mean to treat you all,"added Lydia,"but you must lend us the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, for we have just spent ours at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="shop" newWord="minute" score="0.67">minute</span> out there."Then, showing her purchases - -"Look here, I have bought this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bonnet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="bonnet" newWord="park" score="0.658">park</span>. I do not think it is very pretty; but I thought I might as well buy it as not. I shall pull it to pieces as soon as I get <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, and see if I can make it up any better."
<p>And when her sisters abused it as ugly, she added, with perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unconcern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.601" formerWord="unconcern" newWord="spirit" score="0.601">spirit</span>,"Oh! but there were two or three much uglier in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shop</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="shop" newWord="minute" score="0.67">minute</span>; and when I have bought some prettier-coloured <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.234" formerWord="satin" newWord="midnight" score="0.234">midnight</span> to trim it with fresh, I think it will be very tolerable. Besides, it will not much signify what one wears this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>, after the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> have left Meryton, and they are going in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span>."
<p>"Are they indeed!"cried Elizabeth, with the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>. 
<p>"They are going to be encamped near Brighton; and I do so want papa to take us all there for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>! It would be such a delicious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>; and I dare say would hardly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.323" formerWord="cost" newWord="perfection" score="0.323">perfection</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> at all. Mamma would like to go too of all things! Only think what a miserable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> else we shall have!"
<p>"Yes,"thought Elizabeth,"that would be a delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> indeed, and completely do for us at once. Good Heaven! Brighton, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> campful of soldiers, to us, who have been overset already by one poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>militia</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.706" formerWord="militia" newWord="kind" score="0.706">kind</span>, and the monthly balls of Meryton!"
<p>"Now I have got some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> for you,"said Lydia, as they sat down at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>."What do you think? It is excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>capital</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="capital" newWord="doubt" score="0.871">doubt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> - - and about a certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> we all like!"
<p>Jane and Elizabeth looked at each other, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>waiter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="waiter" newWord="oak" score="0.255">oak</span> was told he need not stay. Lydia laughed, and said: 
<p>"Aye, that is just like your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>formality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.709" formerWord="formality" newWord="life" score="0.709">life</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discretion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.865" formerWord="discretion" newWord="arrival" score="0.865">arrival</span>. You thought the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>waiter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="waiter" newWord="oak" score="0.255">oak</span> must not hear, as if he cared! I dare say he often hears worse things said than I am going to say. But he is an ugly fellow! I am glad he is gone. I never saw such a long chin in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. Well, but now for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>; it is about dear Wickham; too good for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>waiter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="waiter" newWord="oak" score="0.255">oak</span>, is it not? There is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of Wickham's marrying Mary King. There's for you! She is gone down to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> at Liverpool: gone to stay. Wickham is safe."
<p>"And Mary King is safe!"added Elizabeth;"safe from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> imprudent as to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>."
<p>"She is a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fool</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="fool" newWord="composure" score="0.368">composure</span> for going away, if she liked him."
<p>"But I hope there is no strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>,"said Jane. 
<p>"I am sure there is not on his. I will answer for it, he never cared three straws about her - - who could about such a nasty little freckled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>?"
<p>Elizabeth was shocked to think that, however incapable of such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coarseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="coarseness" newWord="consistency" score="0.243">consistency</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> herself, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coarseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="coarseness" newWord="consistency" score="0.243">consistency</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="sentiment" newWord="haste" score="0.645">haste</span> was little other than her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.21" formerWord="breast" newWord="meanness" score="0.21">meanness</span> had harboured and fancied liberal! 
<p>As soon as all had ate, and the elder ones paid, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was ordered; and after some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contrivance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="contrivance" newWord="chuse" score="0.257">chuse</span>, the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, with all their boxes, work-bags, and parcels, and the unwelcome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>addition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.876" formerWord="addition" newWord="mother" score="0.876">mother</span> of Kitty's and Lydia's purchases, were seated in it. 
<p>"How nicely we are all crammed in,"cried Lydia."I am glad I bought my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bonnet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="bonnet" newWord="park" score="0.658">park</span>, if it is only for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span> of having another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bandbox</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="bandbox" newWord="man-servant" score="0.289">man-servant</span>! Well, now let us be quite comfortable and snug, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span> all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. And in the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, let us hear what has happened to you all since you went away. Have you seen any pleasant men? Have you had any flirting? I was in great hopes that one of you would have got a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> before you came back. Jane will be quite an old <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>maid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="maid" newWord="round" score="0.733">round</span> soon, I declare. She is almost <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>three-and-twenty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="three-and-twenty" newWord="minute" score="0.329">minute</span>! Lord, how ashamed I should be of not being married before <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>three-and-twenty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="three-and-twenty" newWord="minute" score="0.329">minute</span>! My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> Phillips wants you so to get husbands, you can't think. She says Lizzy had better have taken Mr. Collins; but I do not think there would have been any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span> in it. Lord! how I should like to be married before any of you; and then I would <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaperon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="chaperon" newWord="expedition" score="0.255">expedition</span> you about to all the balls. Dear me! we had such a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>piece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="piece" newWord="longbourn" score="0.754">longbourn</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span> the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> at Colonel Forster ' s. Kitty and me were to spend the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> there, and Mrs. Forster promised to have a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="dance" newWord="answer" score="0.902">answer</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; ( by the bye, Mrs. Forster and me are such friends! ) and so she asked the two Harringtons to come, but Harriet was ill, and so Pen was forced to come by herself; and then, what do you think we did? We dressed up Chamberlayne in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>'s clothes on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> to pass for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>, only think what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span>! Not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>soul</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="soul" newWord="eloquence" score="0.249">eloquence</span> knew of it, but Colonel and Mrs. Forster, and Kitty and me, except my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, for we were forced to borrow one of her gowns; and you cannot imagine how well he looked! When Denny, and Wickham, and Pratt, and two or three more of the men came in, they did not know him in the least. Lord! how I laughed! and so did Mrs. Forster. I thought I should have died. And that made the men suspect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span>, and then they soon found out what was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>."
<p>With such kinds of histories of their parties and good jokes, did Lydia, assisted by Kitty's hints and additions, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to amuse her companions all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to Longbourn. Elizabeth listened as little as she could, but there was no escaping the frequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="mention" newWord="sister" score="0.888">sister</span> of Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span>. 
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="reception" newWord="plain" score="0.346">plain</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> was most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. Mrs. Bennet rejoiced to see Jane in undiminished <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>; and more than once during <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> did Mr. Bennet say voluntarily to Elizabeth: 
<p>"I am glad you are come back, Lizzy."
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span> was large, for almost all the Lucases came to meet Maria and hear the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>; and various were the subjects that occupied them: Lady Lucas was inquiring of Maria, after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>welfare</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="welfare" newWord="wait" score="0.549">wait</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>poultry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.692" formerWord="poultry" newWord="minute" score="0.692">minute</span> of her eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>; Mrs. Bennet was doubly engaged, on one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> collecting an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of the present fashions from Jane, who sat some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> below her, and, on the other, retailing them all to the younger Lucases; and Lydia, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> rather louder than any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> ' s, was enumerating the various pleasures of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> who would hear her. 
<p>"Oh! Mary,"said she,"I wish you had gone with us, for we had such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span>! As we went along, Kitty and I drew up the blinds, and pretended there was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>; and I should have gone so all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, if Kitty had not been sick; and when we got to the George, I do think we behaved very handsomely, for we treated the other three with the nicest cold luncheon in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, and if you would have gone, we would have treated you too. And then when we came away it was such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fun</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="fun" newWord="behaviour" score="0.608">behaviour</span>! I thought we never should have got into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>. I was ready to die of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="laughter" newWord="consciousness" score="0.36">consciousness</span>. And then we were so merry all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>! we talked and laughed so loud, that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> might have heard us ten miles off!"
<p>To this Mary very gravely replied,"Far be it from me, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, to depreciate such pleasures! They would doubtless be congenial with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>generality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="generality" newWord="suspense" score="0.239">suspense</span> of female minds. But I confess they would have no charms for me - - I should infinitely prefer a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>book</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="book" newWord="mother" score="0.799">mother</span>."
<p>But of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> Lydia <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="heard" newWord="park" score="0.653">park</span> not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. She seldom listened to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> for more than half a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>minute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="minute" newWord="round" score="0.875">round</span>, and never attended to Mary at all. 
<p>In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>afternoon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="afternoon" newWord="astonishment" score="0.465">astonishment</span> Lydia was urgent with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the girls to walk to Meryton, and to see how <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> went on; but Elizabeth steadily opposed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>. It should not be said that the Miss Bennets could not be at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before they were in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pursuit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="pursuit" newWord="fireside" score="0.25">fireside</span> of the officers. There was another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> too for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.509" formerWord="opposition" newWord="justice" score="0.509">justice</span>. She dreaded seeing Mr. Wickham again, and was resolved to avoid it as long as possible. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to her of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>'s approaching <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span> was indeed beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>. In a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> they were to go - - and once gone, she hoped there could be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> more to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plague</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="plague" newWord="bottle" score="0.368">bottle</span> her on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span>. 
<p>She had not been many hours at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> before she found that the Brighton <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>, of which Lydia had given them a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="inn" newWord="enjoyment" score="0.497">enjoyment</span>, was under frequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discussion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.905" formerWord="discussion" newWord="day" score="0.905">day</span> between her parents. Elizabeth saw directly that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yielding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.536" formerWord="yielding" newWord="evil" score="0.536">evil</span>; but his answers were at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> so vague and equivocal, that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, though often disheartened, had never yet despaired of succeeding at last. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 40 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span> to acquaint Jane with what had happened could no longer be overcome; and at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, resolving to suppress every particular in which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was concerned, and preparing her to be surprised, she related to her the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span> between Mr. Darcy and herself. 
<p>Miss Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> was soon lessened by the strong sisterly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span> which made any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of Elizabeth appear perfectly natural; and all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> was shortly lost in other feelings. She was sorry that Mr. Darcy should have delivered his sentiments in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> so little suited to recommend them; but still more was she grieved for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unhappiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="unhappiness" newWord="concern" score="0.331">concern</span> which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refusal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="refusal" newWord="everything" score="0.807">everything</span> must have given him. 
<p>"His being so sure of succeeding was wrong,"said she,"and certainly ought not to have appeared; but consider how much it must increase his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>!"
<p>"Indeed,"replied Elizabeth,"I am heartily sorry for him; but he has other feelings, which will probably soon drive away his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> for me. You do not blame me, however, for refusing him?"
<p>"Blame you! Oh, no."
<p>"But you blame me for having spoken so warmly of Wickham?"
<p>"No - - I do not know that you were wrong in saying what you did."
<p>"But you will know it, when I tell you what happened the very next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>."
<p>She then spoke of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, repeating the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of its contents as far as they concerned George Wickham. What a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stroke</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.467" formerWord="stroke" newWord="word" score="0.467">word</span> was this for poor Jane! who would willingly have gone through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> without believing that so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wickedness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="wickedness" newWord="tend" score="0.369">tend</span> existed in the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>race</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.209" formerWord="race" newWord="drawer" score="0.209">drawer</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mankind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="mankind" newWord="mamma" score="0.278">mamma</span>, as was here collected in one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>individual</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="individual" newWord="rent" score="0.305">rent</span>. Nor was Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vindication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="vindication" newWord="heard" score="0.242">heard</span>, though grateful to her feelings, capable of consoling her for such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="discovery" newWord="trouble" score="0.588">trouble</span>. Most earnestly did she <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>labour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.385" formerWord="labour" newWord="absence" score="0.385">absence</span> to prove the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>probability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="probability" newWord="family" score="0.849">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>error</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.732" formerWord="error" newWord="minute" score="0.732">minute</span>, and seek to clear the one without involving the other. 
<p>"This will not do,"said Elizabeth;"you never will be able to make both of them good for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>. Take your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>, but you must be satisfied with only one. There is but such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quantity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="quantity" newWord="fender" score="0.305">fender</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>merit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="merit" newWord="attitude" score="0.205">attitude</span> between them; just enough to make one good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; and of late it has been shifting about pretty much. For my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, I am inclined to believe it all Darcy ' s; but you shall do as you choose."
<p>It was some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, however, before a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> could be extorted from Jane. 
<p>"I do not know when I have been more shocked,"said she."Wickham so very bad! It is almost past <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span>. And poor Mr. Darcy! Dear Lizzy, only consider what he must have suffered. Such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>! and with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, too! and having to relate such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>! It is really too distressing. I am sure you must feel it so."
<p>"Oh! no, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span> are all done away by seeing you so full of both. I know you will do him such ample <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>, that I am growing every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> more unconcerned and indifferent. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.533" formerWord="profusion" newWord="minute" score="0.533">minute</span> makes me saving; and if you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lament</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="lament" newWord="downstairs" score="0.293">downstairs</span> over him much longer, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> will be as light as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feather</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="feather" newWord="contrary" score="0.225">contrary</span>."
<p>"Poor Wickham! there is such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>! such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>openness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.459" formerWord="openness" newWord="wedding" score="0.459">wedding</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="gentleness" newWord="brother" score="0.889">brother</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>!"
<p>"There certainly was some great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mismanagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="mismanagement" newWord="sufferer" score="0.241">sufferer</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>education</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="education" newWord="hearing" score="0.787">hearing</span> of those two young men. One has got all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span>, and the other all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of it."
<p>"I never thought Mr. Darcy so deficient in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of it as you used to do."
<p>"And yet I meant to be uncommonly clever in taking so decided a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> to him, without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>.
