It is such a spur to one's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>genius</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="genius" newWord="mirth" score="0.26">mirth</span>, such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="opening" newWord="subject" score="0.685">subject</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.579" formerWord="wit" newWord="observation" score="0.579">observation</span>, to have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. One may be continually abusive without saying <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> just; but one cannot always be laughing at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> without now and then stumbling on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> witty."
<p>"Lizzy, when you first read that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, I am sure you could not treat the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> as you do now."
<p>"Indeed, I could not. I was uncomfortable enough, I may say unhappy. And with no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> to speak to about what I felt, no Jane to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> me and say that I had not been so very weak and vain and nonsensical as I knew I had! Oh! how I wanted you!"
<p>"How unfortunate that you should have used such very strong expressions in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of Wickham to Mr. Darcy, for now they do appear wholly undeserved."
<p>"Certainly. But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bitterness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.666" formerWord="bitterness" newWord="countenance" score="0.666">countenance</span> is a most natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of the prejudices I had been encouraging. There is one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> on which I want your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span>. I want to be told whether I ought, or ought not, to make our acquaintances in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>general</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="general" newWord="brought" score="0.326">brought</span> understand Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>."
<p>Miss Bennet paused a little, and then replied,"Surely there can be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for exposing him so dreadfully. What is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>?"
<p>"That it ought not to be attempted. Mr. Darcy has not authorised me to make his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>public</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.507" formerWord="public" newWord="housekeeper" score="0.507">housekeeper</span>. On the contrary, every particular relative to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was meant to be kept as much as possible to myself; and if I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to undeceive people as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>, who will believe me? The general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prejudice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.751" formerWord="prejudice" newWord="arrival" score="0.751">arrival</span> against Mr. Darcy is so violent, that it would be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> the good people in Meryton to attempt to place him in an amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span>. I am not equal to it. Wickham will soon be gone; and therefore it will not signify to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> here what he really is. Some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> hence it will be all found out, and then we may laugh at their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stupidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="stupidity" newWord="scheme" score="0.749">scheme</span> in not knowing it before. At present I will say <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> about it."
<p>"You are quite right. To have his errors made <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>public</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.507" formerWord="public" newWord="housekeeper" score="0.507">housekeeper</span> might ruin him for ever. He is now, perhaps, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="sorry" newWord="perfection" score="0.329">perfection</span> for what he has done, and anxious to re-establish a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>. We must not make him desperate."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tumult</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="tumult" newWord="minute" score="0.569">minute</span> of Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> was allayed by this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>. She had got rid of two of the secrets which had weighed on her for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span>, and was certain of a willing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>listener</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="listener" newWord="future" score="0.586">future</span> in Jane, whenever she might wish to talk again of either. But there was still <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> lurking behind, of which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="prudence" newWord="hope" score="0.805">hope</span> forbade the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disclosure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="disclosure" newWord="listener" score="0.257">listener</span>. She dared not relate the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> of Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, nor explain to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> how sincerely she had been valued by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. Here was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> in which no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> could partake; and she was sensible that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> less than a perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> between the parties could justify her in throwing off this last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encumbrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.238" formerWord="encumbrance" newWord="taste" score="0.238">taste</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mystery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="mystery" newWord="mother" score="0.55">mother</span>."And then,"said she,"if that very improbable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> should ever take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, I shall merely be able to tell what Bingley may tell in a much more agreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> himself. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liberty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="liberty" newWord="part" score="0.724">part</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> cannot be mine till it has lost all its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span>!"
<p>She was now, on being settled at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to observe the real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s spirits. Jane was not happy. She still cherished a very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tender</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="tender" newWord="thing" score="0.907">thing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for Bingley. Having never even fancied herself in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> before, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> had all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span> of first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>, and, from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>, greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>steadiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.397" formerWord="steadiness" newWord="understanding" score="0.397">understanding</span> than most first attachments often boast; and so fervently did she <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remembrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="remembrance" newWord="parting" score="0.28">parting</span>, and prefer him to every other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, that all her good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span>, and all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> to the feelings of her friends, were requisite to check the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indulgence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="indulgence" newWord="error" score="0.429">error</span> of those regrets which must have been injurious to her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tranquillity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.408" formerWord="tranquillity" newWord="melancholy" score="0.408">melancholy</span>. 
<p>"Well, Lizzy,"said Mrs. Bennet one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>,"what is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> now of this sad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> of Jane ' s? For my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, I am determined never to speak of it again to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>. I told my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> Phillips so the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. But I cannot find out that Jane saw <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> of him in London. Well, he is a very undeserving young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> - - and I do not suppose there's the least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> of her ever getting him now. There is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span> of his coming to Netherfield again in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>; and I have inquired of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>, too, who is likely to know."
<p>"I do not believe he will ever live at Netherfield any more."
<p>"Oh well! it is just as he chooses. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="Nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">Family</span> wants him to come. Though I shall always say he used my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> extremely ill; and if I was her, I would not have put up with it. Well, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> is, I am sure Jane will die of a broken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; and then he will be sorry for what he has done."
<p>But as Elizabeth could not receive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> from any such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, she made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. 
<p>"Well, Lizzy,"continued her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, soon afterwards,"and so the Collinses live very comfortable, do they? Well, well, I only hope it will last. And what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> do they keep? Charlotte is an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manager</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.388" formerWord="manager" newWord="selfishness" score="0.388">selfishness</span>, I dare say. If she is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> as sharp as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, she is saving enough. There is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> extravagant in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeping</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="housekeeping" newWord="oath" score="0.259">oath</span>, I dare say."
<p>"No, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all."
<p>"A great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>management</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="management" newWord="journey" score="0.65">journey</span>, depend upon it. Yes, yes. they will take care not to outrun their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>. They will never be distressed for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>. Well, much good may it do them! And so, I suppose, they often <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span> of having Longbourn when your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> is dead. They look upon it as quite their own, I dare say, whenever that happens."
<p>"It was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> which they could not mention before me."
<p>"No; it would have been strange if they had; but I make no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> they often <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span> of it between themselves. Well, if they can be easy with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> that is not lawfully their own, so much the better. I should be ashamed of having one that was only entailed on me."
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 41 
<p>
<p>The first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> was soon gone. The second began. It was the last of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="stay" newWord="point" score="0.787">point</span> in Meryton, and all the young ladies in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> were drooping apace. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dejection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="dejection" newWord="artlessness" score="0.264">artlessness</span> was almost universal. The elder Miss Bennets alone were still able to eat, drink, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sleep</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="sleep" newWord="dominion" score="0.315">dominion</span>, and pursue the usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of their employments. Very frequently were they reproached for this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insensibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.403" formerWord="insensibility" newWord="danger" score="0.403">danger</span> by Kitty and Lydia, whose own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> was extreme, and who could not comprehend such hard-heartedness in any of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. 
<p>"Good Heaven! what is to become of us? What are we to do?"would they often exclaim in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bitterness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.666" formerWord="bitterness" newWord="countenance" score="0.666">countenance</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woe</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="woe" newWord="descent" score="0.281">descent</span>."How can you be smiling so, Lizzy?"
<p>Their affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> shared all their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.439" formerWord="grief" newWord="horror" score="0.439">horror</span>; she remembered what she had herself endured on a similar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, five-and-twenty years ago. 
<p>"I am sure,"said she,"I cried for two days together when Colonel Miller's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> went away. I thought I should have broken my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>"I am sure I shall break mine,"said Lydia. 
<p>"If <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> could but go to Brighton!"observed Mrs. Bennet. 
<p>"Oh, yes! - - if <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> could but go to Brighton! But <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>papa</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="papa" newWord="affection" score="0.787">affection</span> is so disagreeable."
<p>"A little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sea-bathing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="sea-bathing" newWord="ball-room" score="0.256">ball-room</span> would set me up forever."
<p>"And my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> Phillips is sure it would do me a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of good,"added Kitty. 
<p>Such were the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of lamentations resounding perpetually through Longbourn House. Elizabeth tried to be diverted by them; but all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> was lost in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>. She felt anew the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span> of Mr. Darcy's objections; and never had she been so much disposed to pardon his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> in the views of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. 
<p>But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gloom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="gloom" newWord="smile" score="0.4">smile</span> of Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span> was shortly cleared away; for she received an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> from Mrs. Forster, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colonel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="colonel" newWord="midst" score="0.326">midst</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>, to accompany her to Brighton. This invaluable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> was a very young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, and very lately married. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resemblance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="resemblance" newWord="minute" score="0.675">minute</span> in good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> and good spirits had recommended her and Lydia to each other, and out of their three months ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> they had been intimate two. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rapture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.555" formerWord="rapture" newWord="consequence" score="0.555">consequence</span> of Lydia on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>adoration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.446" formerWord="adoration" newWord="hair" score="0.446">hair</span> of Mrs. Forster, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> of Mrs. Bennet, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mortification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="mortification" newWord="answer" score="0.658">answer</span> of Kitty, are scarcely to be described. Wholly inattentive to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s feelings, Lydia flew about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in restless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ecstasy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="ecstasy" newWord="partner" score="0.665">partner</span>, calling for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.392" formerWord="everyone" newWord="value" score="0.392">value</span>'s congratulations, and laughing and talking with more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>violence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="violence" newWord="inspection" score="0.328">inspection</span> than ever; whilst the luckless Kitty continued in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.338" formerWord="parlour" newWord="distance" score="0.338">distance</span> repined at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.358" formerWord="fate" newWord="penance" score="0.358">penance</span> in terms as unreasonable as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="accent" newWord="period" score="0.674">period</span> was peevish. 
<p>"I cannot see why Mrs. Forster should not ask me as well as Lydia,"said she,"Though I am not her particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. I have just as much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>right</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.843" formerWord="right" newWord="nothing" score="0.843">nothing</span> to be asked as she has, and more too, for I am two years older."
<p>In vain did Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to make her reasonable, and Jane to make her resigned. As for Elizabeth herself, this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> was so far from exciting in her the same feelings as in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and Lydia, that she considered it as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warrant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="warrant" newWord="revolution" score="0.264">revolution</span> of all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> for the latter; and detestable as such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> must make her were it known, she could not help secretly advising her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> not to let her go. She represented to him all the improprieties of Lydia's general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>, the little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> she could derive from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> of such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> as Mrs. Forster, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>probability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="probability" newWord="family" score="0.849">family</span> of her being yet more imprudent with such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> at Brighton, where the temptations must be greater than at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. He heard her attentively, and then said: 
<p>"Lydia will never be easy until she has exposed herself in some public <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> or other, and we can never expect her to do it with so little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.869" formerWord="expense" newWord="part" score="0.869">part</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inconvenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="inconvenience" newWord="affection" score="0.911">affection</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> as under the present circumstances."
<p>"If you were aware,"said Elizabeth,"of the very great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disadvantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="disadvantage" newWord="security" score="0.248">security</span> to us all which must arise from the public <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> of Lydia's unguarded and imprudent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> - - nay, which has already arisen from it, I am sure you would <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span> differently in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>."
<p>"Already arisen?"repeated Mr. Bennet."What, has she frightened away some of your lovers? Poor little Lizzy! But do not be cast down. Such squeamish youths as cannot bear to be connected with a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absurdity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="absurdity" newWord="little" score="0.247">little</span> are not worth a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span>. Come, let me see the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>list</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.485" formerWord="list" newWord="spite" score="0.485">spite</span> of pitiful fellows who have been kept aloof by Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span>."
<p>"Indeed you are mistaken. I have no such injuries to resent. It is not of particular, but of general evils, which I am now complaining. Our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>, our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respectability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="respectability" newWord="gratitude" score="0.786">gratitude</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> must be affected by the wild volatility, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disdain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="disdain" newWord="park" score="0.402">park</span> of all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restraint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="restraint" newWord="account" score="0.786">account</span> which mark Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>. Excuse me, for I must speak plainly. If you, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, will not take the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of checking her exuberant spirits, and of teaching her that her present pursuits are not to be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, she will soon be beyond the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.389" formerWord="reach" newWord="office" score="0.389">office</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amendment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.274" formerWord="amendment" newWord="use" score="0.274">use</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> will be fixed, and she will, at sixteen, be the most determined flirt that ever made herself or her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> ridiculous; a flirt, too, in the worst and meanest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flirtation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.228" formerWord="flirtation" newWord="merriment" score="0.228">merriment</span>; without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attraction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.621" formerWord="attraction" newWord="thing" score="0.621">thing</span> beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> and a tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>; and, from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ignorance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.642" formerWord="ignorance" newWord="horror" score="0.642">horror</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emptiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="emptiness" newWord="imprudent" score="0.243">imprudent</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, wholly unable to ward off any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>portion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="portion" newWord="everything" score="0.854">everything</span> of that universal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="rage" newWord="eye" score="0.412">eye</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> will excite. In this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> Kitty also is comprehended. She will follow wherever Lydia leads. Vain, ignorant, idle, and absolutely uncontrolled! Oh! my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, can you suppose it possible that they will not be censured and despised wherever they are known, and that their sisters will not be often involved in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span>?"
<p>Mr. Bennet saw that her whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> was in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, and affectionately taking her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> said in reply: 
<p>"Do not make yourself uneasy, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>. Wherever you and Jane are known you must be respected and valued; and you will not appear to less <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> for having a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>couple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="couple" newWord="sat" score="0.244">sat</span> of - - or I may say, three - - very silly sisters. We shall have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>peace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="peace" newWord="anything" score="0.817">anything</span> at Longbourn if Lydia does not go to Brighton. Let her go, then. Colonel Forster is a sensible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and will keep her out of any real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mischief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="mischief" newWord="love" score="0.585">love</span>; and she is luckily too poor to be an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.469" formerWord="prey" newWord="nephew" score="0.469">nephew</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>. At Brighton she will be of less <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> even as a common flirt than she has been here. The officers will find women better worth their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span>. Let us hope, therefore, that her being there may teach her her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>insignificance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="insignificance" newWord="glow" score="0.312">glow</span>. At any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="rate" newWord="absence" score="0.368">absence</span>, she cannot grow many degrees worse, without authorising us to lock her up for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>."
<p>With this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> Elizabeth was forced to be content; but her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> continued the same, and she left him disappointed and sorry. It was not in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span>, however, to increase her vexations by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span> on them. She was confident of having performed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span>, and to fret over unavoidable evils, or augment them by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span>, was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>. 
<p>Had Lydia and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> known the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>substance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.746" formerWord="substance" newWord="deal" score="0.746">deal</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="conference" newWord="dancing" score="0.846">dancing</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="indignation" newWord="anything" score="0.908">anything</span> would hardly have found <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> in their united <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>volubility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="volubility" newWord="gentleness" score="0.549">gentleness</span>. In Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imagination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="imagination" newWord="happiness" score="0.938">happiness</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> to Brighton comprised every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of earthly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. She saw, with the creative <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> of fancy, the streets of that gay bathing-place covered with officers. She saw herself the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>, to tens and to scores of them at present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unknown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.522" formerWord="unknown" newWord="park" score="0.522">park</span>. She saw all the glories of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>camp</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="camp" newWord="glee" score="0.22">glee</span> - - its tents stretched forth in beauteous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uniformity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.254" formerWord="uniformity" newWord="frugality" score="0.254">frugality</span> of lines, crowded with the young and the gay, and dazzling with scarlet; and, to complete the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>, she saw herself seated beneath a tent, tenderly flirting with at least six officers at once. 
<p>Had she known her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> sought to tear her from such prospects and such realities as these, what would have been her sensations? They could have been understood only by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, who might have felt nearly the same. Lydia's going to Brighton was all that consoled her for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>melancholy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="melancholy" newWord="heart" score="0.917">heart</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>'s never intending to go there himself. 
<p>But they were entirely ignorant of what had passed; and their raptures continued, with little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intermission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.8" formerWord="intermission" newWord="anybody" score="0.8">anybody</span>, to the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of Lydia's leaving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth was now to see Mr. Wickham for the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. Having been frequently in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> with him since her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="agitation" newWord="difference" score="0.722">difference</span> was pretty well over; the agitations of formal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span> entirely so. She had even learnt to detect, in the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="gentleness" newWord="brother" score="0.889">brother</span> which had first delighted her, an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="affectation" newWord="doubt" score="0.594">doubt</span> and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sameness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.474" formerWord="sameness" newWord="affair" score="0.474">affair</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.825" formerWord="disgust" newWord="honour" score="0.825">honour</span> and weary. In his present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to herself, moreover, she had a fresh <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>source</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="source" newWord="happiness" score="0.883">happiness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>displeasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.747" formerWord="displeasure" newWord="return" score="0.747">return</span>, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> he soon testified of renewing those intentions which had marked the early <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> could only serve, after what had since passed, to provoke her. She lost all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> for him in finding herself thus selected as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.461" formerWord="idle" newWord="manner" score="0.461">manner</span> and frivolous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.884" formerWord="gallantry" newWord="end" score="0.884">end</span>; and while she steadily repressed it, could not but feel the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.847" formerWord="reproof" newWord="family" score="0.847">family</span> contained in his believing, that however long, and for whatever cause, his attentions had been withdrawn, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span> would be gratified, and her preference secured at any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> by their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>renewal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.224" formerWord="renewal" newWord="culture" score="0.224">culture</span>. 
<p>On the very last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remaining</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.265" formerWord="remaining" newWord="violence" score="0.265">violence</span> at Meryton, he dined, with other of the officers, at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>; and so little was Elizabeth disposed to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> from him in good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span>, that on his making some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span> as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> in which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> had passed at Hunsford, she mentioned Colonel Fitzwilliam's and Mr. Darcy's having both spent three weeks at Rosings, and asked him, if he was acquainted with the former. 
<p>He looked surprised, displeased, alarmed; but with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> and a returning <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, replied, that he had formerly seen him often; and, after observing that he was a very gentlemanlike <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, asked her how she had liked him. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> was warmly in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span>. With an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span> he soon afterwards added: 
<p>"How long did you say he was at Rosings?"
<p>"Nearly three weeks."
<p>"And you saw him frequently?"
<p>"Yes, almost every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>."
<p>"His manners are very different from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> ' s."
<p>"Yes, very different. But I think Mr. Darcy improves upon <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>."
<p>"Indeed!"cried Mr. Wickham with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> which did not escape her."And pray, may I ask? - -"But checking himself, he added, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gayer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="gayer" newWord="godson" score="0.266">godson</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>,"Is it in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span> that he improves? Has he deigned to add aught of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> to his ordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span>? - - for I dare not hope,"he continued in a lower and more serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>,"that he is improved in essentials."
<p>"Oh, no!"said Elizabeth."In essentials, I believe, he is very much what he ever was."
<p>While she spoke, Wickham looked as if scarcely knowing whether to rejoice over her words, or to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distrust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="distrust" newWord="engagement" score="0.737">engagement</span> their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span>. There was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> which made him listen with an apprehensive and anxious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>, while she added: 
<p>"When I said that he improved on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, I did not mean that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> or his manners were in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span>, but that, from knowing him better, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> was better understood."
<p>Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span> now appeared in a heightened <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span> and agitated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span>; for a few minutes he was silent, till, shaking off his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embarrassment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="embarrassment" newWord="shortness" score="0.369">shortness</span>, he turned to her again, and said in the gentlest of accents: 
<p>"You, who so well know my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> towards Mr. Darcy, will readily comprehend how sincerely I must rejoice that he is wise enough to assume even the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of what is right. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>, in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span>, may be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>service</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="service" newWord="time" score="0.851">time</span>, if not to himself, to many others, for it must only deter him from such foul <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misconduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.424" formerWord="misconduct" newWord="gift" score="0.424">gift</span> as I have suffered by. I only fear that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cautiousness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.6" formerWord="cautiousness" newWord="minute" score="0.6">minute</span> to which you, I imagine, have been alluding, is merely adopted on his visits to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, of whose good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> he stands much in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>awe</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="awe" newWord="child" score="0.491">child</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of her has always operated, I know, when they were together; and a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> is to be imputed to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forwarding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.677" formerWord="forwarding" newWord="work" score="0.677">work</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> with Miss de Bourgh, which I am certain he has very much at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>Elizabeth could not repress a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> at this, but she answered only by a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. She saw that he wanted to engage her on the old <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of his grievances, and she was in no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> to indulge him. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> passed with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span>, on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, of usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cheerfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="cheerfulness" newWord="absence" score="0.542">absence</span>, but with no further <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> to distinguish Elizabeth; and they parted at last with mutual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, and possibly a mutual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> of never <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> again. 
<p>When the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> broke up, Lydia returned with Mrs. Forster to Meryton, from whence they were to set out early the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>separation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="separation" newWord="company" score="0.866">company</span> between her and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> was rather noisy than pathetic. Kitty was the only one who shed tears; but she did weep from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>envy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="envy" newWord="park" score="0.309">park</span>.
