Mrs. Bennet was diffuse in her good wishes for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, and impressive in her injunctions that she should not miss the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of enjoying herself as much as possible - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> which there was every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to believe would be well attended to; and in the clamorous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of Lydia herself in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bidding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="bidding" newWord="walker" score="0.327">walker</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>farewell</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="farewell" newWord="house" score="0.724">house</span>, the more gentle <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>adieus</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="adieus" newWord="emotion" score="0.299">emotion</span> of her sisters were uttered without being heard. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 42 
<p>
<p>Had Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> been all drawn from her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, she could not have formed a very pleasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of conjugal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> or domestic <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, captivated by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, and that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" But Mr. Bennet was not of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> to seek <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> which his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">self</span> had brought on, in any of those pleasures which too often console the unfortunate for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span> or their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.614" formerWord="vice" newWord="minute" score="0.614">minute</span>. He was fond of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> and of books; and from these tastes had arisen his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="principal" newWord="country" score="0.832">country</span> enjoyments. To his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> he was very little otherwise indebted, than as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ignorance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.642" formerWord="ignorance" newWord="horror" score="0.642">horror</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span> had contributed to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>. This is not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> which a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> would in general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> to owe to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>; but where other powers of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entertainment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.391" formerWord="entertainment" newWord="maid" score="0.391">maid</span> are wanting, the true philosopher will derive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benefit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.654" formerWord="benefit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.654">astonishment</span> from such as are given. 
<p>Elizabeth, however, had never been blind to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impropriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="impropriety" newWord="native" score="0.255">native</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>. She had always seen it with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>; but respecting his abilities, and grateful for his affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>treatment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="treatment" newWord="dressing" score="0.27">dressing</span> of herself, she endeavoured to forget what she could not overlook, and to banish from her thoughts that continual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.714" formerWord="breach" newWord="spring" score="0.714">spring</span> of conjugal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>obligation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="obligation" newWord="deal" score="0.811">deal</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decorum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="decorum" newWord="none" score="0.733">none</span> which, in exposing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> of her own children, was so highly reprehensible. But she had never felt so strongly as now the disadvantages which must attend the children of so unsuitable a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, nor ever been so fully aware of the evils arising from so ill-judged a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span> of talents; talents, which, rightly used, might at least have preserved the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respectability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="respectability" newWord="gratitude" score="0.786">gratitude</span> of his daughters, even if incapable of enlarging the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>. 
<p>When Elizabeth had rejoiced over Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>departure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="departure" newWord="news" score="0.808">news</span> she found little other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>. Their parties abroad were less varied than before, and at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> she had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> whose constant repinings at the Upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, therefore, she found, what has been sometimes found before, that an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> to which she had been looking with impatient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> did not, in taking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, bring all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> she had promised herself. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="tour" newWord="satisfying" score="0.275">satisfying</span> to the Lakes was now the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of her happiest thoughts; it was her best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> for all the uncomfortable hours which the discontentedness of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and Kitty made inevitable; and could she have included Jane in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of it would have been perfect. 
<p>"But it is fortunate,"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> she,"that I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to wish for. Were the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span> complete, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> would be certain. But here, by carrying with me one ceaseless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>source</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="source" newWord="happiness" score="0.883">happiness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span> in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span>, I may reasonably hope to have all my expectations of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> realised. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of which every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> promises <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> can never be successful; and general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> is only warded off by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="defence" newWord="curiosity" score="0.645">curiosity</span> of some little peculiar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span>."
<p>When Lydia went away she promised to write very often and very minutely to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and Kitty; but her letters were always long expected, and always very short. Those to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> contained little else than that they were just returned from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>, where such and such officers had attended them, and where she had seen such beautiful ornaments as made her quite wild; that she had a new <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.657" formerWord="gown" newWord="minute" score="0.657">minute</span>, or a new <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parasol</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="parasol" newWord="littleness" score="0.256">littleness</span>, which she would have described more fully, but was obliged to leave off in a violent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span>, as Mrs. Forster called her, and they were going off to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>camp</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="camp" newWord="glee" score="0.22">glee</span>; and from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>correspondence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.246" formerWord="correspondence" newWord="entree" score="0.246">entree</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, there was still less to be learnt - - for her letters to Kitty, though rather longer, were much too full of lines under the words to be made <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>public</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.507" formerWord="public" newWord="housekeeper" score="0.507">housekeeper</span>. 
<p>After the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> or three weeks of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span>, good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cheerfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="cheerfulness" newWord="absence" score="0.542">absence</span> began to reappear at Longbourn. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="Everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">Brother</span> wore a happier <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aspect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="aspect" newWord="curiosity" score="0.443">curiosity</span>. The families who had been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span> came back again, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>finery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.574" formerWord="finery" newWord="curiosity" score="0.574">curiosity</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> engagements arose. Mrs. Bennet was restored to her usual querulous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>serenity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.395" formerWord="serenity" newWord="disposition" score="0.395">disposition</span>; and, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>middle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.525" formerWord="middle" newWord="gratitude" score="0.525">gratitude</span> of June, Kitty was so much recovered as to be able to enter Meryton without tears; an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> of such happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> as to make Elizabeth hope that by the following Christmas she might be so tolerably reasonable as not to mention an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span> above once a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, unless, by some cruel and malicious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span> at the War Office, another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> should be quartered in Meryton. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> fixed for the beginning of their northern <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="tour" newWord="satisfying" score="0.275">satisfying</span> was now fast approaching, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> only was wanting of it, when a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> arrived from Mrs. Gardiner, which at once delayed its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commencement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.235" formerWord="commencement" newWord="despondency" score="0.235">despondency</span> and curtailed its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="extent" newWord="hand" score="0.79">hand</span>. Mr. Gardiner would be prevented by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> from setting out till a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> later in July, and must be in London again within a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>month</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="month" newWord="reason" score="0.406">reason</span>, and as that left too short a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> for them to go so far, and see so much as they had proposed, or at least to see it with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> they had built on, they were obliged to give up the Lakes, and substitute a more contracted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="tour" newWord="satisfying" score="0.275">satisfying</span>, and, according to the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span>, were to go no farther northwards than Derbyshire. In that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>county</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="county" newWord="innocence" score="0.275">innocence</span> there was enough to be seen to occupy the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of their three weeks; and to Mrs. Gardiner it had a peculiarly strong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attraction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.621" formerWord="attraction" newWord="thing" score="0.621">thing</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> where she had formerly passed some years of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, and where they were now to spend a few days, was probably as great an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> as all the celebrated beauties of Matlock, Chatsworth, Dovedale, or the Peak. 
<p>Elizabeth was excessively disappointed; she had set her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> on seeing the Lakes, and still thought there might have been <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> enough. But it was her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> to be satisfied - - and certainly her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> to be happy; and all was soon right again. 
<p>With the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="mention" newWord="sister" score="0.888">sister</span> of Derbyshire there were many ideas connected. It was impossible for her to see the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> without thinking of Pemberley and its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>owner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.566" formerWord="owner" newWord="friendship" score="0.566">friendship</span>."But surely,"said she,"I may enter his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>county</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="county" newWord="innocence" score="0.275">innocence</span> with impunity, and rob it of a few petrified spars without his perceiving me."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> was now doubled. Four weeks were to pass away before her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>. But they did pass away, and Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner, with their four children, did at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> appear at Longbourn. The children, two girls of six and eight years old, and two younger boys, were to be left under the particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> Jane, who was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>general</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="general" newWord="brought" score="0.326">brought</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span>, and whose steady <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sweetness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.803" formerWord="sweetness" newWord="minute" score="0.803">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> exactly adapted her for attending to them in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> - - teaching them, playing with them, and loving them. 
<p>The Gardiners stayed only one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> at Longbourn, and set off the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> with Elizabeth in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pursuit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="pursuit" newWord="fireside" score="0.25">fireside</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>novelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="novelty" newWord="way" score="0.834">way</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span>. One <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enjoyment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="enjoyment" newWord="heart" score="0.922">heart</span> was certain - - that of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suitableness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="suitableness" newWord="tender" score="0.359">tender</span> of companions; a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suitableness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="suitableness" newWord="tender" score="0.359">tender</span> which comprehended <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> to bear inconveniences - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cheerfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="cheerfulness" newWord="absence" score="0.542">absence</span> to enhance every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> - - and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>, which might supply it among themselves if there were disappointments abroad. 
<p>It is not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> to give a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>description</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.731" formerWord="description" newWord="wish" score="0.731">wish</span> of Derbyshire, nor of any of the remarkable places through which their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>route</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="route" newWord="cook" score="0.266">cook</span> thither lay; Oxford, Blenheim, Warwick, Kenilworth, Birmingham, etc. are sufficiently known. A small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of Derbyshire is all the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>. To the little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of Lambton, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span> of Mrs. Gardiner's former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>residence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.804" formerWord="residence" newWord="letter" score="0.804">letter</span>, and where she had lately learned some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> still remained, they bent their steps, after having seen all the principal wonders of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>; and within five miles of Lambton, Elizabeth found from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> that Pemberley was situated. It was not in their direct <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>, nor more than a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.801" formerWord="mile" newWord="minute" score="0.801">minute</span> or two out of it. In talking over their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>route</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="route" newWord="cook" score="0.266">cook</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> before, Mrs. Gardiner expressed an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> to see the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> again. Mr. Gardiner declared his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>willingness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.316" formerWord="willingness" newWord="comparison" score="0.316">comparison</span>, and Elizabeth was applied to for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="approbation" newWord="paint" score="0.232">paint</span>. 
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>, should not you like to see a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> of which you have heard so much?"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>;"a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, too, with which so many of your acquaintances are connected. Wickham passed all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> there, you know."
<p>Elizabeth was distressed. She felt that she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> at Pemberley, and was obliged to assume a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disinclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="disinclination" newWord="trash" score="0.312">trash</span> for seeing it. She must own that she was tired of seeing great houses; after going over so many, she really had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in fine carpets or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.234" formerWord="satin" newWord="midnight" score="0.234">midnight</span> curtains. 
<p>Mrs. Gardiner abused her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stupidity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="stupidity" newWord="scheme" score="0.749">scheme</span>."If it were merely a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> richly furnished,"said she,"I should not care about it myself; but the grounds are delightful. They have some of the finest woods in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>."
<p>Elizabeth said no more - - but her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> could not acquiesce. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> Mr. Darcy, while viewing the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, instantly occurred. It would be dreadful! She blushed at the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> it would be better to speak openly to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> than to run such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>risk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.625" formerWord="risk" newWord="affair" score="0.625">affair</span>. But against this there were objections; and she finally resolved that it could be the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resource</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="resource" newWord="deposit" score="0.23">deposit</span>, if her private inquiries to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were unfavourably answered. 
<p>Accordingly, when she retired at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, she asked the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chambermaid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.296" formerWord="chambermaid" newWord="subjection" score="0.296">subjection</span> whether Pemberley were not a very fine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>? what was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proprietor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="proprietor" newWord="justice" score="0.545">justice</span>? and, with no little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>, whether the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were down for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>? A most welcome negative followed the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> - - and her alarms now being removed, she was at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to feel a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> to see the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> herself; and when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> was revived the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, and she was again applied to, could readily answer, and with a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>, that she had not really any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>. To Pemberley, therefore, they were to go. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 43 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth, as they drove along, watched for the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of Pemberley Woods with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perturbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="perturbation" newWord="minute" score="0.448">minute</span>; and when at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> they turned in at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lodge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="lodge" newWord="inhumanity" score="0.256">inhumanity</span>, her spirits were in a high <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flutter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="flutter" newWord="charm" score="0.421">charm</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span> was very large, and contained great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>. They entered it in one of its lowest points, and drove for some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> through a beautiful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.61" formerWord="wood" newWord="round" score="0.61">round</span> stretching over a wide <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="extent" newWord="hand" score="0.79">hand</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> was too full for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, but she saw and admired every remarkable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>. They gradually ascended for half-a-mile, and then found themselves at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>top</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="top" newWord="bottom" score="0.266">bottom</span> of a considerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eminence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="eminence" newWord="suspense" score="0.275">suspense</span>, where the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.61" formerWord="wood" newWord="round" score="0.61">round</span> ceased, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> was instantly caught by Pemberley House, situated on the opposite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>valley</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="valley" newWord="continuance" score="0.339">continuance</span>, into which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span> with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abruptness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.589" formerWord="abruptness" newWord="country" score="0.589">country</span> wound. It was a large, handsome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.697" formerWord="stone" newWord="round" score="0.697">round</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>building</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="building" newWord="xxxvii" score="0.249">xxxvii</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>standing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.696" formerWord="standing" newWord="horror" score="0.696">horror</span> well on rising <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>, and backed by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ridge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="ridge" newWord="footing" score="0.369">footing</span> of high <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="woody" newWord="furniture" score="0.299">furniture</span> hills; and in front, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stream</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="stream" newWord="furniture" score="0.488">furniture</span> of some natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> was swelled into greater, but without any artificial <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span>. Its banks were neither formal nor falsely adorned. Elizabeth was delighted. She had never seen a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> for which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> had done more, or where natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> had been so little counteracted by an awkward <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>. They were all of them warm in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span>; and at that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> she felt that to be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span> of Pemberley might be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span>! 
<p>They descended the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="hill" newWord="carriage" score="0.805">carriage</span>, crossed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bridge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="bridge" newWord="future" score="0.651">future</span>, and drove to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>; and, while examining the nearer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aspect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="aspect" newWord="curiosity" score="0.443">curiosity</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>owner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.566" formerWord="owner" newWord="friendship" score="0.566">friendship</span> returned. She dreaded lest the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chambermaid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.296" formerWord="chambermaid" newWord="subjection" score="0.296">subjection</span> had been mistaken. On applying to see the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, they were admitted into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span>; and Elizabeth, as they waited for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span>, had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to wonder at her being where she was. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> came; a respectable-looking elderly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, much less <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span>, and more civil, than she had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="notion" newWord="intermission" score="0.312">intermission</span> of finding her. They followed her into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="dining-parlour" newWord="gown" score="0.366">gown</span>. It was a large, well proportioned <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, handsomely fitted up. Elizabeth, after slightly surveying it, went to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> to enjoy its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prospect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.775" formerWord="prospect" newWord="degree" score="0.775">degree</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="hill" newWord="carriage" score="0.805">carriage</span>, crowned with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.61" formerWord="wood" newWord="round" score="0.61">round</span>, which they had descended, receiving increased <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abruptness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.589" formerWord="abruptness" newWord="country" score="0.589">country</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>, was a beautiful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>. Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span> was good; and she looked on the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>river</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="river" newWord="close" score="0.331">close</span>, the trees scattered on its banks and the winding of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>valley</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="valley" newWord="continuance" score="0.339">continuance</span>, as far as she could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="trace" newWord="minute" score="0.651">minute</span> it, with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>. As they passed into other rooms these objects were taking different positions; but from every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> there were beauties to be seen. The rooms were lofty and handsome, and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span> suitable to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proprietor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="proprietor" newWord="justice" score="0.545">justice</span>; but Elizabeth saw, with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>, that it was neither gaudy nor uselessly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span>; with less of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>splendour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.356" formerWord="splendour" newWord="perfection" score="0.356">perfection</span>, and more real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span>, than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span> of Rosings. 
<p>"And of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>,"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> she,"I might have been <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span>! With these rooms I might now have been familiarly acquainted! Instead of viewing them as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span>, I might have rejoiced in them as my own, and welcomed to them as visitors my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. But no,"- - recollecting herself - -"that could never be; my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> would have been lost to me; I should not have been allowed to invite them."
<p>This was a lucky <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> - - it saved her from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> very like <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span>. 
<p>She longed to inquire of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> whether her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> was really absent, but had not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> for it. At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> however, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> was asked by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>; and she turned away with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>, while Mrs. Reynolds replied that he was, adding,"But we expect him to-morrow, with a large <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> of friends."How rejoiced was Elizabeth that their own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> had not by any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> been delayed a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>! 
<p>Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> now called her to look at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span>. She approached and saw the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="likeness" newWord="cabinet" score="0.26">cabinet</span> of Mr. Wickham, suspended, amongst several other miniatures, over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mantelpiece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="mantelpiece" newWord="heaven" score="0.28">heaven</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> asked her, smilingly, how she liked it. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> came forward, and told them it was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span> of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of her late <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>steward</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="steward" newWord="sister" score="0.85">sister</span>, who had been brought up by him at his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.869" formerWord="expense" newWord="part" score="0.869">part</span>."He is now gone into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>army</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="army" newWord="key" score="0.289">key</span>,"she added;"but I am afraid he has turned out very wild."
<p>Mrs. Gardiner looked at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, but Elizabeth could not return it. 
<p>"And that,"said Mrs. Reynolds, pointing to another of the miniatures,"is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> - - and very like him. It was drawn at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> as the other - - about eight years ago."
<p>"I have heard much of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>,"said Mrs. Gardiner, looking at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span>;"it is a handsome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>. But, Lizzy, you can tell us whether it is like or not."
<p>Mrs. Reynolds <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span> for Elizabeth seemed to increase on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="intimation" newWord="woody" score="0.216">woody</span> of her knowing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>. 
<p>"Does that young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> know Mr. Darcy?"
<p>Elizabeth coloured, and said:"A little."
<p>"And do not you think him a very handsome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ma'am</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="ma'am" newWord="family" score="0.966">family</span>?"
<p>"Yes, very handsome."
<p>"I am sure I know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> so handsome; but in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.928" formerWord="gallery" newWord="pleasure" score="0.928">pleasure</span> up stairs you will see a finer, larger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span> of him than this. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> was my late <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>'s favourite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and these miniatures are just as they used to be then. He was very fond of them."
<p>This accounted to Elizabeth for Mr. Wickham's being among them. 
<p>Mrs. Reynolds then directed their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> to one of Miss Darcy, drawn when she was only eight years old. 
<p>"And is Miss Darcy as handsome as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>?"said Mrs. Gardiner. 
<p>"Oh! yes - - the handsomest young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> that ever was seen; and so accomplished! - - She plays and sings all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> long. In the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> is a new <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instrument</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.594" formerWord="instrument" newWord="case" score="0.594">case</span> just come down for her - - a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>; she comes here to-morrow with him."
<p>Mr. Gardiner, whose manners were very easy and pleasant, encouraged her communicativeness by his questions and remarks; Mrs. Reynolds, either by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>, had evidently great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in talking of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. 
<p>"Is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> much at Pemberley in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>?"
<p>"Not so much as I could wish, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>; but I dare say he may spend <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> here; and Miss Darcy is always down for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span> months."
<p>"Except,"thought Elizabeth,"when she goes to Ramsgate."
<p>"If your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> would marry, you might see more of him."
<p>"Yes, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>; but I do not know when that will be. I do not know who is good enough for him."
<p>Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner smiled. Elizabeth could not help saying,"It is very much to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span>, I am sure, that you should think so."
<p>"I say no more than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> will say that knows him,"replied the other.
