Elizabeth thought this was going pretty far; and she listened with increasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> added,"I have never known a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cross</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.204" formerWord="cross" newWord="dear" score="0.204">dear</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> from him in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, and I have known him ever since he was four years old."
<p>This was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span>, of all others most extraordinary, most opposite to her ideas. That he was not a good-tempered <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> had been her firmest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>. Her keenest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> was awakened; she longed to hear more, and was grateful to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> for saying: 
<p>"There are very few people of whom so much can be said. You are lucky in having such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>."
<p>"Yes, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, I know I am. If I were to go through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, I could not meet with a better. But I have always observed, that they who are good-natured when children, are good-natured when they grow up; and he was always the sweetest-tempered, most generous-hearted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>boy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.384" formerWord="boy" newWord="firmness" score="0.384">firmness</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>."
<p>Elizabeth almost stared at her."Can this be Mr. Darcy?"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> she. 
<p>"His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> was an excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>,"said Mrs. Gardiner. 
<p>"Yes, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ma'am</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="ma'am" newWord="family" score="0.966">family</span>, that he was indeed; and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> will be just like him - - just as affable to the poor."
<p>Elizabeth listened, wondered, doubted, and was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatient</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.742" formerWord="impatient" newWord="news" score="0.742">news</span> for more. Mrs. Reynolds could <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> on no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>. She related the subjects of the pictures, the dimensions of the rooms, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>price</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="price" newWord="time" score="0.831">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>furniture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.841" formerWord="furniture" newWord="minute" score="0.841">minute</span>, in vain. Mr. Gardiner, highly amused by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prejudice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.751" formerWord="prejudice" newWord="arrival" score="0.751">arrival</span> to which he attributed her excessive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="commendation" newWord="hush" score="0.256">hush</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>, soon led again to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>; and she dwelt with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>energy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.335" formerWord="energy" newWord="good" score="0.335">good</span> on his many merits as they proceeded together up the great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>staircase</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="staircase" newWord="family" score="0.814">family</span>. 
<p>"He is the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>landlord</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.666" formerWord="landlord" newWord="home" score="0.666">home</span>, and the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>,"said she,"that ever lived; not like the wild young men nowadays, who think of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but themselves. There is not one of his tenants or servants but will give him a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span>. Some people call him proud; but I am sure I never saw <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> of it. To my fancy, it is only because he does not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rattle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="rattle" newWord="soothing" score="0.255">soothing</span> away like other young men."
<p>"In what an amiable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span> does this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> him!"thought Elizabeth. 
<p>"This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of him,"whispered her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> as they walked,"is not quite consistent with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to our poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>."
<p>"Perhaps we might be deceived."
<p>"That is not very likely; our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>authority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="authority" newWord="aunt" score="0.859">aunt</span> was too good."
<p>On reaching the spacious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lobby</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.365" formerWord="lobby" newWord="convenience" score="0.365">convenience</span> above they were shown into a very pretty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sitting-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="sitting-room" newWord="congregation" score="0.267">congregation</span>, lately fitted up with greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lightness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="lightness" newWord="boy" score="0.259">boy</span> than the apartments below; and were informed that it was but just done to give <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to Miss Darcy, who had taken a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="liking" newWord="deal" score="0.858">deal</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> when last at Pemberley. 
<p>"He is certainly a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>,"said Elizabeth, as she walked towards one of the windows. 
<p>Mrs. Reynolds anticipated Miss Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>, when she should enter the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>."And this is always the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> with him,"she added."Whatever can give his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> is sure to be done in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>. There is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> he would not do for her."
<p>The picture-gallery, and two or three of the principal bedrooms, were all that remained to be shown. In the former were many good paintings; but Elizabeth knew <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>art</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.484" formerWord="art" newWord="engagement" score="0.484">engagement</span>; and from such as had been already visible below, she had willingly turned to look at some drawings of Miss Darcy ' s, in crayons, whose subjects were usually more interesting, and also more intelligible. 
<p>In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.928" formerWord="gallery" newWord="pleasure" score="0.928">pleasure</span> there were many <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> portraits, but they could have little to fix the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span>. Elizabeth walked in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.47" formerWord="quest" newWord="behaviour" score="0.47">behaviour</span> of the only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> whose features would be known to her. At last it arrested her - - and she beheld a striking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resemblance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="resemblance" newWord="minute" score="0.675">minute</span> to Mr. Darcy, with such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> as she remembered to have sometimes seen when he looked at her. She stood several minutes before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span>, in earnest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contemplation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="contemplation" newWord="brother" score="0.902">brother</span>, and returned to it again before they quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gallery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.928" formerWord="gallery" newWord="pleasure" score="0.928">pleasure</span>. Mrs. Reynolds informed them that it had been taken in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s lifetime. 
<p>There was certainly at this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, in Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, a more gentle <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.221" formerWord="sensation" newWord="farm" score="0.221">farm</span> towards the original than she had ever felt at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>height</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.273" formerWord="height" newWord="fashion" score="0.273">fashion</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="commendation" newWord="hush" score="0.256">hush</span> bestowed on him by Mrs. Reynolds was of no trifling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span>. What <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> is more valuable than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> of an intelligent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span>? As a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>landlord</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.666" formerWord="landlord" newWord="home" score="0.666">home</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>, she considered how many people's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> were in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guardianship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.262" formerWord="guardianship" newWord="self-denying" score="0.262">self-denying</span>! - - how much of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> was it in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to bestow! - - how much of good or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span> must be done by him! Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> that had been brought forward by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> was favourable to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, and as she stood before the canvas on which he was represented, and fixed his eyes upon herself, she thought of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> with a deeper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="sentiment" newWord="haste" score="0.645">haste</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> than it had ever raised before; she remembered its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span>, and softened its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impropriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="impropriety" newWord="native" score="0.255">native</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>. 
<p>When all of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> that was open to general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inspection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.704" formerWord="inspection" newWord="haste" score="0.704">haste</span> had been seen, they returned <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>downstairs</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="downstairs" newWord="day" score="0.713">day</span>, and, taking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span>, were consigned over to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gardener</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="gardener" newWord="importunate" score="0.22">importunate</span>, who met them at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall-door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="hall-door" newWord="detection" score="0.249">detection</span>. 
<p>As they walked across the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span> towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>river</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="river" newWord="close" score="0.331">close</span>, Elizabeth turned back to look again; her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> stopped also, and while the former was conjecturing as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>date</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="date" newWord="wait" score="0.327">wait</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>building</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="building" newWord="xxxvii" score="0.249">xxxvii</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>owner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.566" formerWord="owner" newWord="friendship" score="0.566">friendship</span> of it himself suddenly came forward from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>, which led behind it to the stables. 
<p>They were within twenty yards of each other, and so abrupt was his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span>, that it was impossible to avoid his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span>. Their eyes instantly met, and the cheeks of both were overspread with the deepest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blush</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.271" formerWord="blush" newWord="bathing" score="0.271">bathing</span>. He absolutely started, and for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> seemed immovable from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; but shortly recovering himself, advanced towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, and spoke to Elizabeth, if not in terms of perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>, at least of perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>. 
<p>She had instinctively turned away; but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stopping</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.551" formerWord="stopping" newWord="minute" score="0.551">minute</span> on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="approach" newWord="country" score="0.761">country</span>, received his compliments with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embarrassment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="embarrassment" newWord="shortness" score="0.369">shortness</span> impossible to be overcome. Had his first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span>, or his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resemblance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="resemblance" newWord="minute" score="0.675">minute</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>picture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="picture" newWord="honour" score="0.846">honour</span> they had just been examining, been insufficient to assure the other two that they now saw Mr. Darcy, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gardener</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="gardener" newWord="importunate" score="0.22">importunate</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, on beholding his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>, must immediately have told it. They stood a little aloof while he was talking to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>, who, astonished and confused, scarcely dared lift her eyes to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, and knew not what answer she returned to his civil inquiries after her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Amazed at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alteration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="alteration" newWord="family" score="0.834">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> since they last parted, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> that he uttered was increasing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embarrassment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="embarrassment" newWord="shortness" score="0.369">shortness</span>; and every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impropriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="impropriety" newWord="native" score="0.255">native</span> of her being found there recurring to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, the few minutes in which they continued were some of the most uncomfortable in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. Nor did he seem much more at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span>; when he spoke, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="accent" newWord="period" score="0.674">period</span> had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of its usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sedateness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.309" formerWord="sedateness" newWord="magnitude" score="0.309">magnitude</span>; and he repeated his inquiries as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> of her having left <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>, and of her having stayed in Derbyshire, so often, and in so hurried a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, as plainly spoke the distraction of his thoughts. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> seemed to fail him; and, after standing a few moments without saying a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, he suddenly recollected himself, and took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span>. 
<p>The others then joined her, and expressed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>figure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="figure" newWord="week" score="0.834">week</span>; but Elizabeth heard not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, and wholly engrossed by her own feelings, followed them in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. She was overpowered by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span>. Her coming there was the most unfortunate, the most ill-judged <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>! How strange it must appear to him! In what a disgraceful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span> might it not strike so vain a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>! It might seem as if she had purposely thrown herself in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> again! Oh! why did she come? Or, why did he thus come a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before he was expected? Had they been only ten minutes sooner, they should have been beyond the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.389" formerWord="reach" newWord="office" score="0.389">office</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discrimination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="discrimination" newWord="penury" score="0.266">penury</span>; for it was plain that he was that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> arrived - - that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> alighted from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="horse" newWord="pleasure" score="0.851">pleasure</span> or his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. She blushed again and again over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perverseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="perverseness" newWord="look" score="0.477">look</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span>. And his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>, so strikingly altered - - what could it mean? That he should even speak to her was amazing! - - but to speak with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, to inquire after her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>! Never in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> had she seen his manners so little dignified, never had he spoken with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="gentleness" newWord="brother" score="0.889">brother</span> as on this unexpected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span>. What a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contrast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="contrast" newWord="entertainment" score="0.349">entertainment</span> did it offer to his last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span> in Rosings Park, when he put his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> into her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>! She knew not what to think, or how to account for it. 
<p>They had now entered a beautiful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>water</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.736" formerWord="water" newWord="minute" score="0.736">minute</span>, and every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> was bringing forward a nobler <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="fall" newWord="home" score="0.699">home</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ground</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.278" formerWord="ground" newWord="slope" score="0.278">slope</span>, or a finer reach of the woods to which they were approaching; but it was some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> before Elizabeth was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> of any of it; and, though she answered mechanically to the repeated appeals of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and seemed to direct her eyes to such objects as they pointed out, she distinguished no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>. Her thoughts were all fixed on that one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span> of Pemberley House, whichever it might be, where Mr. Darcy then was. She longed to know what at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> was passing in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> - - in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> he thought of her, and whether, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defiance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="defiance" newWord="conceit" score="0.328">conceit</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, she was still dear to him. Perhaps he had been civil only because he felt himself at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span>; yet there had been that in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> which was not like <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span>. Whether he had felt more of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> or of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in seeing her she could not tell, but he certainly had not seen her with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, however, the remarks of her companions on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> aroused her, and she felt the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> of appearing more like herself. 
<p>They entered the woods, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bidding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="bidding" newWord="walker" score="0.327">walker</span> adieu to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>river</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="river" newWord="close" score="0.331">close</span> for a while, ascended some of the higher grounds; when, in spots where the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="opening" newWord="subject" score="0.685">subject</span> of the trees gave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to wander, were many charming views of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>valley</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="valley" newWord="continuance" score="0.339">continuance</span>, the opposite hills, with the long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>range</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="range" newWord="offering" score="0.247">offering</span> of woods overspreading many, and occasionally <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stream</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="stream" newWord="furniture" score="0.488">furniture</span>. Mr. Gardiner expressed a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of going <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span>, but feared it might be beyond a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>. With a triumphant smile they were told that it was ten miles <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span>. It settled the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>; and they pursued the accustomed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circuit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="circuit" newWord="resolution" score="0.31">resolution</span>; which brought them again, after some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>descent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="descent" newWord="sister" score="0.761">sister</span> among hanging woods, to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>edge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="edge" newWord="minute" score="0.41">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>water</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.736" formerWord="water" newWord="minute" score="0.736">minute</span>, and one of its narrowest parts. They crossed it by a simple <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bridge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="bridge" newWord="future" score="0.651">future</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> with the general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scene</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="scene" newWord="affection" score="0.934">affection</span>; it was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span> less adorned than any they had yet visited; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>valley</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="valley" newWord="continuance" score="0.339">continuance</span>, here contracted into a glen, allowed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> only for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stream</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="stream" newWord="furniture" score="0.488">furniture</span>, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>narrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="narrow" newWord="chair" score="0.515">chair</span> walk amidst the rough coppice-wood which bordered it. Elizabeth longed to explore its windings; but when they had crossed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bridge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="bridge" newWord="future" score="0.651">future</span>, and perceived their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, Mrs. Gardiner, who was not a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walker</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="walker" newWord="company" score="0.729">company</span>, could go no farther, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> only of returning to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> as quickly as possible. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> was, therefore, obliged to submit, and they took their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> on the opposite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>river</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="river" newWord="close" score="0.331">close</span>, in the nearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span>; but their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>progress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.773" formerWord="progress" newWord="heart" score="0.773">heart</span> was slow, for Mr. Gardiner, though seldom able to indulge the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>, was very fond of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fishing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.288" formerWord="fishing" newWord="connection" score="0.288">connection</span>, and was so much engaged in watching the occasional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of some trout in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>water</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.736" formerWord="water" newWord="minute" score="0.736">minute</span>, and talking to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> about them, that he advanced but little. Whilst wandering on in this slow <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, they were again surprised, and Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> was quite equal to what it had been at first, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span> of Mr. Darcy approaching them, and at no great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> being here less sheltered than on the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, allowed them to see him before they met. Elizabeth, however astonished, was at least more prepared for an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interview</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="interview" newWord="horror" score="0.633">horror</span> than before, and resolved to appear and to speak with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>calmness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="calmness" newWord="brother" score="0.895">brother</span>, if he really intended to meet them. For a few moments, indeed, she felt that he would probably strike into some other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>path</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.71" formerWord="path" newWord="matter" score="0.71">matter</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> lasted while a turning in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span> concealed him from their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>; the turning past, he was immediately before them. With a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="glance" newWord="idea" score="0.849">idea</span>, she saw that he had lost <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> of his recent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>; and, to imitate his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>, she began, as they met, to admire the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>; but she had not got beyond the words"delightful,"and"charming,"when some unlucky recollections obtruded, and she fancied that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>praise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="praise" newWord="time" score="0.948">time</span> of Pemberley from her might be mischievously construed. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="colour" newWord="party" score="0.87">party</span> changed, and she said no more. 
<p>Mrs. Gardiner was standing a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="behind" newWord="stuff" score="0.359">stuff</span>; and on her pausing, he asked her if she would do him the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of introducing him to her friends. This was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stroke</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.467" formerWord="stroke" newWord="word" score="0.467">word</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> for which she was quite unprepared; and she could hardly suppress a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> at his being now seeking the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> of some of those very people against whom his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> had revolted in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> to herself."What will be his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>,"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> she,"when he knows who they are? He takes them now for people of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fashion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.531" formerWord="fashion" newWord="persuasion" score="0.531">persuasion</span>."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span>, however, was immediately made; and as she named their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span> to herself, she stole a sly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> at him, to see how he bore it, and was not without the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> of his decamping as fast as he could from such disgraceful companions. That he was surprised by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> was evident; he sustained it, however, with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.58" formerWord="fortitude" newWord="anger" score="0.58">anger</span>, and so far from going away, turned back with them, and entered into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with Mr. Gardiner. Elizabeth could not but be pleased, could not but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span>. It was consoling that he should know she had some relations for whom there was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>need</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="need" newWord="reply" score="0.27">reply</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blush</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.271" formerWord="blush" newWord="bathing" score="0.271">bathing</span>. She listened most attentively to all that passed between them, and gloried in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span>, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>, which marked his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span>, or his good manners. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> soon turned upon <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fishing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.288" formerWord="fishing" newWord="connection" score="0.288">connection</span>; and she heard Mr. Darcy invite him, with the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, to fish there as often as he chose while he continued in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>, offering at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to supply him with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fishing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.288" formerWord="fishing" newWord="connection" score="0.288">connection</span> tackle, and pointing out those parts of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stream</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="stream" newWord="furniture" score="0.488">furniture</span> where there was usually most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sport</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="sport" newWord="haste" score="0.437">haste</span>. Mrs. Gardiner, who was walking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arm-in-arm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="arm-in-arm" newWord="minute" score="0.334">minute</span> with Elizabeth, gave her a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> expressive of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wonder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="wonder" newWord="heart" score="0.914">heart</span>. Elizabeth said <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>, but it gratified her exceedingly; the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> must be all for herself. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>, however, was extreme, and continually was she <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repeating</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="repeating" newWord="indignation" score="0.301">indignation</span>,"Why is he so altered? From what can it proceed? It cannot be for me - - it cannot be for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> that his manners are thus softened. It is impossible that he should still love me."
<p>After walking some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, the two ladies in front, the two gentlemen behind, on resuming their places, after descending to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brink</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="brink" newWord="tremor" score="0.229">tremor</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>river</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="river" newWord="close" score="0.331">close</span> for the better <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inspection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.704" formerWord="inspection" newWord="haste" score="0.704">haste</span> of some curious water-plant, there chanced to be a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alteration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="alteration" newWord="family" score="0.834">family</span>. It originated in Mrs. Gardiner, who, fatigued by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exercise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="exercise" newWord="minute" score="0.713">minute</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, found Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="arm" newWord="course" score="0.974">course</span> inadequate to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>support</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.358" formerWord="support" newWord="phoo" score="0.358">phoo</span>, and consequently preferred her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> ' s. Mr. Darcy took her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>, and they walked on together. After a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> first spoke. She wished him to know that she had been assured of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> before she came to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, and accordingly began by observing, that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> had been very unexpected - -"for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span>,"she added,"informed us that you would certainly not be here till to-morrow; and indeed, before we left Bakewell, we understood that you were not immediately expected in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>."He acknowledged the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> of it all, and said that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>steward</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="steward" newWord="sister" score="0.85">sister</span> had occasioned his coming forward a few hours before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> with whom he had been travelling."They will join me early to-morrow,"he continued,"and among them are some who will claim an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> with you - - Mr. Bingley and his sisters."
<p>Elizabeth answered only by a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="bow" newWord="relationship" score="0.332">relationship</span>. Her thoughts were instantly driven back to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> when Mr. Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> had been the last mentioned between them; and, if she might <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span> by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> was not very differently engaged. 
<p>"There is also one other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>,"he continued after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>,"who more particularly wishes to be known to you. <p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> of such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> was great indeed; it was too great for her to know in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> she acceded to it. <p>They now walked on in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>, each of them deep in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span>. Elizabeth was not comfortable; that was impossible; but she was flattered and pleased. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of introducing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> to her was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> of the highest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. <p>He then asked her to walk into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> - - but she declared herself not tired, and they stood together on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lawn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="lawn" newWord="residence" score="0.546">residence</span>. At such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> much might have been said, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> was very awkward. She wanted to talk, but there seemed to be an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embargo</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="embargo" newWord="abhorrence" score="0.282">abhorrence</span> on every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. At last she recollected that she had been travelling, and they talked of Matlock and Dove Dale with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perseverance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="perseverance" newWord="delay" score="0.749">delay</span>.
