It was first broken by Mrs. Annesley, a genteel, agreeable-looking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to introduce some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discourse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="discourse" newWord="century" score="0.264">century</span> proved her to be more truly well-bred than either of the others; and between her and Mrs. Gardiner, with occasional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>help</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="help" newWord="duration" score="0.29">duration</span> from Elizabeth, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> was carried on. Miss Darcy looked as if she wished for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> enough to join in it; and sometimes did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>venture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="venture" newWord="doubt" score="0.637">doubt</span> a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> when there was least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> of its being heard. 
<p>Elizabeth soon saw that she was herself closely watched by Miss Bingley, and that she could not speak a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, especially to Miss Darcy, without calling her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span> would not have prevented her from trying to talk to the latter, had they not been seated at an inconvenient <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>; but she was not sorry to be spared the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> of saying much. Her own thoughts were employing her. She expected every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> that some of the gentlemen would enter the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. She wished, she feared that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> might be amongst them; and whether she wished or feared it most, she could scarcely <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>determine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="determine" newWord="battle" score="0.31">battle</span>. After sitting in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span> of an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> Miss Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>, Elizabeth was roused by receiving from her a cold <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span> after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. She answered with equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span> and brevity, and the other said no more. 
<p>The next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.294" formerWord="variation" newWord="existence" score="0.294">existence</span> which their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> afforded was produced by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span> of servants with cold <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.602" formerWord="meat" newWord="minute" score="0.602">minute</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.647" formerWord="cake" newWord="persuasion" score="0.647">persuasion</span>, and a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of all the finest fruits in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>season</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.634" formerWord="season" newWord="card" score="0.634">card</span>; but this did not take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> till after many a significant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span> from Mrs. Annesley to Miss Darcy had been given, to remind her of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>post</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="post" newWord="voice" score="0.838">voice</span>. There was now <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>employment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="employment" newWord="answer" score="0.916">answer</span> for the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> - - for though they could not all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="talk" newWord="happiness" score="0.933">happiness</span>, they could all eat; and the beautiful pyramids of grapes, nectarines, and peaches soon collected them round the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>. 
<p>While thus engaged, Elizabeth had a fair <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of deciding whether she most feared or wished for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of Mr. Darcy, by the feelings which prevailed on his entering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>; and then, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>though</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="though" newWord="life" score="0.866">life</span> but a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> before she had believed her wishes to predominate, she began to regret that he came. 
<p>He had been some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> with Mr. Gardiner, who, with two or three other gentlemen from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, was engaged by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>river</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="river" newWord="close" score="0.331">close</span>, and had left him only on learning that the ladies of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> intended a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> to Georgiana that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. No sooner did he appear than Elizabeth wisely resolved to be perfectly easy and unembarrassed; a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> the more necessary to be made, but perhaps not the more easily kept, because she saw that the suspicions of the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> were awakened against them, and that there was scarcely an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> which did not watch his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> when he first came into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. In no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> was attentive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> so strongly marked as in Miss Bingley ' s, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of the smiles which overspread her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> whenever she spoke to one of its objects; for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>jealousy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="jealousy" newWord="tea-table" score="0.239">tea-table</span> had not yet made her desperate, and her attentions to Mr. Darcy were by no means over. Miss Darcy, on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span>, exerted herself much more to talk, and Elizabeth saw that he was anxious for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> and herself to get acquainted, and forwarded as much as possible, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>. Miss Bingley saw all this likewise; and, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">self</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>, took the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of saying, with sneering <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>: 
<p>"Pray, Miss Eliza, are not the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> Militia removed from Meryton? They must be a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>."
<p>In Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.209" formerWord="presence" newWord="decay" score="0.209">decay</span> she dared not mention Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span>; but Elizabeth instantly comprehended that he was uppermost in her thoughts; and the various recollections connected with him gave her a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>; but exerting herself vigorously to repel the ill-natured <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attack</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.641" formerWord="attack" newWord="arrival" score="0.641">arrival</span>, she presently answered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> in a tolerably detached <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>. While she spoke, an involuntary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="glance" newWord="idea" score="0.849">idea</span> showed her Darcy, with a heightened <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span>, earnestly looking at her, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>overcome</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.317" formerWord="overcome" newWord="tea" score="0.317">tea</span> with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span>, and unable to lift up her eyes. Had Miss Bingley known what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> she was then giving her beloved <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, she undoubtedly would have refrained from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span>; but she had merely intended to discompose Elizabeth by bringing forward the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to whom she believed her partial, to make her betray a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.948" formerWord="sensibility" newWord="family" score="0.948">family</span> which might injure her in Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, and, perhaps, to remind the latter of all the follies and absurdities by which some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were connected with that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>corps</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="corps" newWord="yesterday" score="0.546">yesterday</span>. Not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>syllable</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.378" formerWord="syllable" newWord="chair" score="0.378">chair</span> had ever reached her of Miss Darcy's meditated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span>. To no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span> had it been revealed, where <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span> was possible, except to Elizabeth; and from all Bingley's connections her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> was particularly anxious to conceal it, from the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> which Elizabeth had long ago attributed to him, of their becoming hereafter her own. He had certainly formed such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span>, and without meaning that it should affect his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to separate him from Miss Bennet, it is probable that it might add <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to his lively <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>welfare</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="welfare" newWord="wait" score="0.549">wait</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth's collected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>, however, soon quieted his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emotion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.91" formerWord="emotion" newWord="affection" score="0.91">affection</span>; and as Miss Bingley, vexed and disappointed, dared not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="approach" newWord="country" score="0.761">country</span> nearer to Wickham, Georgiana also recovered in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, though not enough to be able to speak any more. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span> she feared to meet, scarcely recollected her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>, and the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> which had been designed to turn his thoughts from Elizabeth seemed to have fixed them on her more and more cheerfully. 
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> did not continue long after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> and answer above mentioned; and while Mr. Darcy was attending them to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> Miss Bingley was venting her feelings in criticisms on Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="dress" newWord="pain" score="0.832">pain</span>. But Georgiana would not join her. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recommendation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.689" formerWord="recommendation" newWord="conviction" score="0.689">conviction</span> was enough to ensure her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span>; his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span> could not err. And he had spoken in such terms of Elizabeth as to leave Georgiana without the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of finding her otherwise than lovely and amiable. When Darcy returned to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>saloon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="saloon" newWord="make" score="0.263">make</span>, Miss Bingley could not help <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repeating</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="repeating" newWord="indignation" score="0.301">indignation</span> to him some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of what she had been saying to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. 
<p>"How very ill Miss Eliza Bennet looks this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, Mr. Darcy,"she cried;"I never in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> saw <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> so much altered as she is since the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>. She is grown so brown and coarse! Louisa and I were agreeing that we should not have known her again."
<p>However little Mr. Darcy might have liked such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span>, he contented himself with coolly replying that he perceived no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alteration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="alteration" newWord="family" score="0.834">family</span> than her being rather tanned, no miraculous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of travelling in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>. 
<p>"For my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>,"she rejoined,"I must confess that I never could see any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> in her. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> is too thin; her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>complexion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="complexion" newWord="marriage" score="0.758">marriage</span> has no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brilliancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="brilliancy" newWord="minute" score="0.674">minute</span>; and her features are not at all handsome. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.388" formerWord="nose" newWord="plain" score="0.388">plain</span> wants <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> - - there is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> marked in its lines. Her teeth are tolerable, but not out of the common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>; and as for her eyes, which have sometimes been called so fine, I could never see <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> extraordinary in them. They have a sharp, shrewish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span>, which I do not like at all; and in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> altogether there is a self-sufficiency without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fashion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.531" formerWord="fashion" newWord="persuasion" score="0.531">persuasion</span>, which is intolerable."
<p>Persuaded as Miss Bingley was that Darcy admired Elizabeth, this was not the best <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>method</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="method" newWord="field" score="0.298">field</span> of recommending herself; but angry people are not always wise; and in seeing him at last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> somewhat nettled, she had all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> she expected. He was resolutely silent, however, and, from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>determination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.426" formerWord="determination" newWord="side" score="0.426">side</span> of making him speak, she continued: 
<p>"I remember, when we first knew her in Hertfordshire, how amazed we all were to find that she was a reputed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>; and I particularly recollect your saying one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, after they had been dining at Netherfield, ' She a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>! - - I should as soon call her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.579" formerWord="wit" newWord="observation" score="0.579">observation</span>. ' But afterwards she seemed to improve on you, and I believe you thought her rather pretty at one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>."
<p>"Yes,"replied Darcy, who could contain himself no longer,"but that was only when I first saw her, for it is many months since I have considered her as one of the handsomest women of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>."
<p>He then went away, and Miss Bingley was left to all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> of having forced him to say what gave no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> but herself. 
<p>Mrs. Gardiner and Elizabeth talked of all that had occurred during their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span>, as they returned, except what had particularly interested them both. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> they had seen were discussed, except of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> who had mostly engaged their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. They talked of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, his friends, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fruit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.348" formerWord="fruit" newWord="longing" score="0.348">longing</span> - - of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> but himself; yet Elizabeth was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>longing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="longing" newWord="everything" score="0.805">everything</span> to know what Mrs. Gardiner thought of him, and Mrs. Gardiner would have been highly gratified by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>'s beginning the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 46 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth had been a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> disappointed in not finding a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from Jane on their first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> at Lambton; and this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> had been renewed on each of the mornings that had now been spent there; but on the third her repining was over, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> justified, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>receipt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="receipt" newWord="shakespeare" score="0.255">shakespeare</span> of two letters from her at once, on one of which was marked that it had been <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>missent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.196" formerWord="missent" newWord="consumption" score="0.196">consumption</span> elsewhere. Elizabeth was not surprised at it, as Jane had written the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span> remarkably ill. 
<p>They had just been preparing to walk as the letters came in; and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, leaving her to enjoy them in quiet, set off by themselves. The one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>missent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.196" formerWord="missent" newWord="consumption" score="0.196">consumption</span> must first be attended to; it had been written five days ago. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span> contained an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> of all their little parties and engagements, with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span> afforded; but the latter <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span>, which was dated a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> later, and written in evident <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="agitation" newWord="difference" score="0.722">difference</span>, gave more important <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>. It was to this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span>: 
<p>"Since <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span> the above, dearest Lizzy, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> has occurred of a most unexpected and serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span>; but I am afraid of alarming you - - be assured that we are all well. What I have to say relates to poor Lydia. An <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>express</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="express" newWord="marianne" score="0.23">marianne</span> came at twelve last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, just as we were all gone to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bed</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="bed" newWord="whip" score="0.249">whip</span>, from Colonel Forster, to inform us that she was gone off to Scotland with one of his officers; to own the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>, with Wickham! Imagine our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. To Kitty, however, it does not seem so wholly unexpected. I am very, very sorry. So imprudent a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> on both sides! But I am willing to hope the best, and that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> has been misunderstood. Thoughtless and indiscreet I can easily believe him, but this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> ( and let us rejoice over it ) marks <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> bad at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> is disinterested at least, for he must know my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> can give her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>. Our poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> is sadly grieved. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> bears it better. How thankful am I that we never let them know what has been said against him; we must forget it ourselves. They were off Saturday <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> about twelve, as is conjectured, but were not missed till <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> at eight. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>express</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="express" newWord="marianne" score="0.23">marianne</span> was sent off directly. My dear Lizzy, they must have passed within ten miles of us. Colonel Forster gives us <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to expect him here soon. Lydia left a few lines for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, informing her of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span>. I must conclude, for I cannot be long from my poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. I am afraid you will not be able to make it out, but I hardly know what I have written."
<p>Without allowing herself <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span>, and scarcely knowing what she felt, Elizabeth on finishing this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> instantly seized the other, and opening it with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>utmost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="utmost" newWord="brother" score="0.947">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span>, read as follows: it had been written a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> later than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="conclusion" newWord="happiness" score="0.902">happiness</span> of the first. 
<p>"By this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, my dearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, you have received my hurried <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; I wish this may be more intelligible, but though not confined for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> is so bewildered that I cannot answer for being coherent. Dearest Lizzy, I hardly know what I would write, but I have bad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> for you, and it cannot be delayed. Imprudent as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> between Mr. Wickham and our poor Lydia would be, we are now anxious to be assured it has taken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, for there is but too much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to fear they are not gone to Scotland. Colonel Forster came <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span>, having left Brighton the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> before, not many hours after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>express</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="express" newWord="marianne" score="0.23">marianne</span>. Though Lydia's short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> to Mrs. F. gave them to understand that they were going to Gretna Green, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> was dropped by Denny expressing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> that W. never intended to go there, or to marry Lydia at all, which was repeated to Colonel F., who, instantly taking the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>, set off from B. intending to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="trace" newWord="minute" score="0.651">minute</span> their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>route</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.266" formerWord="route" newWord="cook" score="0.266">cook</span>. He did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="trace" newWord="minute" score="0.651">minute</span> them easily to Clapham, but no further; for on entering that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, they removed into a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hackney</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.269" formerWord="hackney" newWord="imitation" score="0.269">imitation</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>, and dismissed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span> that brought them from Epsom. All that is known after this is, that they were seen to continue the London <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>. I know not what to think. After making every possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inquiry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="inquiry" newWord="house" score="0.683">house</span> on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> London, Colonel F. came on into Hertfordshire, anxiously renewing them at all the turnpikes, and at the inns in Barnet and Hatfield, but without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> - - no such people had been seen to pass through. With the kindest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> he came on to Longbourn, and broke his apprehensions to us in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> most creditable to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. I am sincerely grieved for him and Mrs. F., but no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> can throw any blame on them. Our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>, my dear Lizzy, is very great. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> believe the worst, but I cannot think so ill of him. Many circumstances might make it more eligible for them to be married privately in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> than to pursue their first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span>; and even if he could form such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> against a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> of Lydia's connections, which is not likely, can I suppose her so lost to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>? Impossible! I grieve to find, however, that Colonel F. is not disposed to depend upon their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; he shook his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> when I expressed my hopes, and said he feared W. was not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to be trusted. My poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> is really ill, and keeps her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Could she exert herself, it would be better; but this is not to be expected. And as to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, I never in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> saw him so affected.
