I am truly glad, dearest Lizzy, that you have been spared <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> of these distressing scenes; but now, as the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shock</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.257" formerWord="shock" newWord="stab" score="0.257">stab</span> is over, shall I own that I long for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>? I am not so selfish, however, as to press for it, if inconvenient. Adieu! I take up my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.584" formerWord="pen" newWord="answer" score="0.584">answer</span> again to do what I have just told you I would not; but circumstances are such that I cannot help earnestly begging you all to come here as soon as possible. I know my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> so well, that I am not afraid of requesting it, though I have still <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> more to ask of the former. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> is going to London with Colonel Forster instantly, to try to discover her. What he means to do I am sure I know not; but his excessive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span> will not allow him to pursue any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>measure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="measure" newWord="expediency" score="0.275">expediency</span> in the best and safest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and Colonel Forster is obliged to be at Brighton again to-morrow <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. In such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exigence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="exigence" newWord="drop" score="0.281">drop</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span> would be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>; he will immediately comprehend what I must feel, and I rely upon his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span>."
<p>"Oh! where, where is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>?"cried Elizabeth, darting from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.704" formerWord="seat" newWord="sort" score="0.704">sort</span> as she finished the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eagerness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="eagerness" newWord="nothing" score="0.862">nothing</span> to follow him, without losing a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> so precious; but as she reached the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> it was opened by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span>, and Mr. Darcy appeared. Her pale <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> and impetuous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> made him start, and before he could recover himself to speak, she, in whose mind every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> was superseded by Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, hastily exclaimed,"I beg your pardon, but I must leave you. I must find Mr. Gardiner this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> that cannot be delayed; I have not an instant to lose."
<p>"Good God! what is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>?"cried he, with more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>; then recollecting himself,"I will not detain you a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>minute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="minute" newWord="round" score="0.875">round</span>; but let me, or let the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> go after Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner. You are not well enough; you cannot go yourself."
<p>Elizabeth hesitated, but her knees trembled under her and she felt how little would be gained by her attempting to pursue them. Calling back the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span>, therefore, she commissioned him, though in so breathless an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="accent" newWord="period" score="0.674">period</span> as made her almost unintelligible, to fetch his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> instantly. 
<p>On his quitting the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> she sat down, unable to support herself, and looking so miserably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span>, that it was impossible for Darcy to leave her, or to refrain from saying, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="gentleness" newWord="brother" score="0.889">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commiseration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="commiseration" newWord="expense" score="0.514">expense</span>,"Let me call your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>maid</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="maid" newWord="round" score="0.733">round</span>. Is there <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> you could take to give you present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span>? A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glass</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.318" formerWord="glass" newWord="tender" score="0.318">tender</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.445" formerWord="wine" newWord="horror" score="0.445">horror</span>; shall I get you one? You are very ill."
<p>"No, I thank you,"she replied, endeavouring to recover herself."There is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> with me. I am quite well; I am only distressed by some dreadful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> which I have just received from Longbourn."
<p>She burst into tears as she alluded to it, and for a few minutes could not speak another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. Darcy, in wretched <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="suspense" newWord="selfishness" score="0.572">selfishness</span>, could only say <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> indistinctly of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>, and observe her in compassionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> she spoke again."I have just had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from Jane, with such dreadful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>. It cannot be concealed from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span>. My younger <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> has left all her friends - - has eloped; has thrown herself into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of - - of Mr. Wickham. They are gone off together from Brighton. You know him too well to doubt the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span>. She has no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, no connections, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> that can tempt him to - - she is lost for ever."
<p>Darcy was fixed in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>."When I consider,"she added in a yet more agitated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span>,"that I might have prevented it! I, who knew what he was. Had I but explained some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of it only - - some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of what I learnt, to my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>! Had his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> been known, this could not have happened. But it is all - - all too late now."
<p>"I am grieved indeed,"cried Darcy;"grieved - - shocked. But is it certain - - absolutely certain?"
<p>"Oh, yes! They left Brighton together on Sunday <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, and were traced almost to London, but not beyond; they are certainly not gone to Scotland."
<p>"And what has been done, what has been attempted, to recover her?"
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> is gone to London, and Jane has written to beg my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s immediate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span>; and we shall be off, I hope, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-an-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="half-an-hour" newWord="regret" score="0.477">regret</span>. But <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> can be done - - I know very well that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> can be done. How is such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to be worked on? How are they even to be discovered? I have not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span>. It is every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> horrible!"
<p>Darcy shook his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> in silent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquiescence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="acquiescence" newWord="make" score="0.239">make</span>. 
<p>"When my eyes were opened to his real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> - - Oh! had I known what I ought, what I dared to do! But I knew not - - I was afraid of doing too much. Wretched, wretched <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="mistake" newWord="time" score="0.949">time</span>!"
<p>Darcy made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. He seemed scarcely to hear her, and was walking up and down the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> in earnest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meditation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.222" formerWord="meditation" newWord="back" score="0.222">back</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="brow" newWord="hair" score="0.483">hair</span> contracted, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> gloomy. Elizabeth soon observed, and instantly understood it. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> was sinking; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> must sink under such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="proof" newWord="nothing" score="0.855">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weakness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.755" formerWord="weakness" newWord="husband" score="0.755">husband</span>, such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> of the deepest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span>. She could neither <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wonder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="wonder" newWord="heart" score="0.914">heart</span> nor condemn, but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> of his self-conquest brought <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> consolatory to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bosom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="bosom" newWord="error" score="0.327">error</span>, afforded no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>palliation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.292" formerWord="palliation" newWord="pitch" score="0.292">pitch</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>. It was, on the contrary, exactly calculated to make her understand her own wishes; and never had she so honestly felt that she could have loved him, as now, when all love must be vain. 
<p>But <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.592" formerWord="self" newWord="curiosity" score="0.592">curiosity</span>, though it would intrude, could not engross her. Lydia - - the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humiliation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="humiliation" newWord="mansion" score="0.243">mansion</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> she was bringing on them all, soon swallowed up every private <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span>; and covering her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>handkerchief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="handkerchief" newWord="minute" score="0.616">minute</span>, Elizabeth was soon lost to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> else; and, after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span> of several minutes, was only recalled to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span>, who, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> which, though it spoke <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span>, spoke likewise <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restraint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="restraint" newWord="account" score="0.786">account</span>, said,"I am afraid you have been long desiring my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> to plead in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" score="0.862">sister</span>. Would to Heaven that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> could be either said or done on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> that might offer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> to such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>! But I will not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>torment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.861" formerWord="torment" newWord="girl" score="0.861">girl</span> you with vain wishes, which may seem purposely to ask for your thanks. This unfortunate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> will, I fear, prevent my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s having the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of seeing you at Pemberley <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span>."
<p>"Oh, yes. Be so <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> as to apologise for us to Miss Darcy. Say that urgent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> calls us <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> immediately. Conceal the unhappy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> as long as it is possible, I know it cannot be long."
<p>He readily assured her of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span>; again expressed his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="sorrow" newWord="pleasure" score="0.651">pleasure</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>, wished it a happier <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="conclusion" newWord="happiness" score="0.902">happiness</span> than there was at present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to hope, and leaving his compliments for her relations, with only one serious, parting look, went away. 
<p>As he quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, Elizabeth felt how improbable it was that they should ever see each other again on such terms of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cordiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.478" formerWord="cordiality" newWord="impression" score="0.478">impression</span> as had marked their several meetings in Derbyshire; and as she threw a retrospective <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="glance" newWord="idea" score="0.849">idea</span> over the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, so full of contradictions and varieties, sighed at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perverseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="perverseness" newWord="look" score="0.477">look</span> of those feelings which would now have promoted its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>continuance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="continuance" newWord="notice" score="0.508">notice</span>, and would formerly have rejoiced in its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>termination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="termination" newWord="similarity" score="0.23">similarity</span>. 
<p>If <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>esteem</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.718" formerWord="esteem" newWord="circumstance" score="0.718">circumstance</span> are good foundations of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="sentiment" newWord="haste" score="0.645">haste</span> will be neither improbable nor faulty. But if otherwise - - if <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> springing from such sources is unreasonable or unnatural, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> of what is so often described as arising on a first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interview</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="interview" newWord="horror" score="0.633">horror</span> with its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>, and even before two words have been exchanged, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> can be said in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>defence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="defence" newWord="curiosity" score="0.645">curiosity</span>, except that she had given somewhat of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trial</span> / Word2Vec formerWord="method" newWord="field" score="0.298">field</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span> for Wickham, and that its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> might, perhaps, authorise her to seek the other less interesting <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="mode" newWord="haste" score="0.617">haste</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>. Be that as it may, she saw him go with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span>; and in this early <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>example</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="example" newWord="rumour" score="0.336">rumour</span> of what Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>infamy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.422" formerWord="infamy" newWord="wonder" score="0.422">wonder</span> must produce, found additional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anguish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.662" formerWord="anguish" newWord="attention" score="0.662">attention</span> as she reflected on that wretched <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>. Never, since reading Jane's second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, had she entertained a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meaning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="meaning" newWord="day" score="0.796">day</span> to marry her. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> but Jane, she thought, could flatter herself with such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="Surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">Brother</span> was the least of her feelings on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>development</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="development" newWord="cash" score="0.237">cash</span>. While the contents of the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> remained in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, she was all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> - - all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> that Wickham should marry a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> whom it was impossible he could marry for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>; and how Lydia could ever have attached him had appeared incomprehensible. But now it was all too natural. For such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> as this she might have sufficient charms; and though she did not suppose Lydia to be deliberately engaging in an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span> without the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, she had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span> in believing that neither her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span> nor her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> would preserve her from falling an easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.469" formerWord="prey" newWord="nephew" score="0.469">nephew</span>. 
<p>She had never perceived, while the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> was in Hertfordshire, that Lydia had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span> for him; but she was convinced that Lydia wanted only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span> to attach herself to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span>. Sometimes one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span>, sometimes another, had been her favourite, as their attentions raised them in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>. Her affections had continually been fluctuating but never without an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mischief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.585" formerWord="mischief" newWord="love" score="0.585">love</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> and mistaken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indulgence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="indulgence" newWord="error" score="0.429">error</span> towards such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> - - oh! how acutely did she now feel it! 
<p>She was wild to be at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> - - to hear, to see, to be upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> with Jane in the cares that must now fall wholly upon her, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> so deranged, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.537" formerWord="absent" newWord="minute" score="0.537">minute</span>, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> incapable of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="exertion" newWord="course" score="0.956">course</span>, and requiring constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attendance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="attendance" newWord="pain" score="0.859">pain</span>; and though almost persuaded that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> could be done for Lydia, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> seemed of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>utmost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="utmost" newWord="brother" score="0.947">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>, and till he entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span> was severe. Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner had hurried back in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>, supposing by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> was taken suddenly ill; but satisfying them instantly on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, she eagerly communicated the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summons</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="summons" newWord="mutton" score="0.298">mutton</span>, reading the two letters aloud, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>postscript</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.611" formerWord="postscript" newWord="nobody" score="0.611">nobody</span> of the last with trembling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>energy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.335" formerWord="energy" newWord="good" score="0.335">good</span>, though Lydia had never been a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span> with them, Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner could not but be deeply afflicted. Not Lydia only, but all were concerned in it; and after the first exclamations of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horror</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="horror" newWord="minute" score="0.867">minute</span>, Mr. Gardiner promised every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>. Elizabeth, though expecting no less, thanked him with tears of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>; and all three being actuated by one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> relating to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was speedily settled. They were to be off as soon as possible."But what is to be done about Pemberley?"cried Mrs. Gardiner."John told us Mr. Darcy was here when you sent for us; was it so?"
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Yes</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="Yes" newWord="honour" score="0.883">Honour</span>; and I told him we should not be able to keep our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span>. That is all settled."
<p>"What is all settled?"repeated the other, as she ran into her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> to prepare."And are they upon such terms as for her to disclose the real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>? Oh, that I knew how it was!"
<p>But wishes were vain, or at least could only serve to amuse her in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span> of the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>. Had Elizabeth been at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to be idle, she would have remained certain that all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>employment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="employment" newWord="answer" score="0.916">answer</span> was impossible to one so wretched as herself; but she had her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> as well as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and amongst the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> there were notes to be written to all their friends at Lambton, with false excuses for their sudden <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>departure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="departure" newWord="news" score="0.808">news</span>. An <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>, however, saw the whole completed; and Mr. Gardiner meanwhile having settled his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="inn" newWord="enjoyment" score="0.497">enjoyment</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> remained to be done but to go; and Elizabeth, after all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, found herself, in a shorter <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>space</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.595" formerWord="space" newWord="anything" score="0.595">anything</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> than she could have supposed, seated in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, and on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span> to Longbourn. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 47 
<p>
<p>"I have been thinking it over again, Elizabeth,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>, as they drove from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>;"and really, upon serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span>, I am much more inclined than I was to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span> as your eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> does on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>. It appears to me so very unlikely that any young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> should form such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> against a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> who is by no means unprotected or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendless</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="friendless" newWord="gape" score="0.253">gape</span>, and who was actually staying in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colonel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.326" formerWord="colonel" newWord="midst" score="0.326">midst</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, that I am strongly inclined to hope the best. Could he expect that her friends would not step forward? Could he expect to be noticed again by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>, after such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affront</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.637" formerWord="affront" newWord="person" score="0.637">person</span> to Colonel Forster? His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temptation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="temptation" newWord="weakness" score="0.387">weakness</span> is not adequate to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>risk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.625" formerWord="risk" newWord="affair" score="0.625">affair</span>!"
<p>"Do you really think so?"cried Elizabeth, brightening up for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>. 
<p>"Upon my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>,"said Mrs. Gardiner,"I begin to be of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>. It is really too great a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>violation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="violation" newWord="guile" score="0.25">guile</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="decency" newWord="pin" score="0.232">pin</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span>, for him to be guilty of. I cannot think so very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of Wickham. Can you yourself, Lizzy, so wholly give him up, as to believe him capable of it?"
<p>"Not, perhaps, of neglecting his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span>; but of every other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> I can believe him capable. If, indeed, it should be so! But I dare not hope it. Why should they not go on to Scotland if that had been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>?"
<p>"In the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>,"replied Mr. Gardiner,"there is no absolute <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="proof" newWord="nothing" score="0.855">nothing</span> that they are not gone to Scotland."
<p>"Oh! but their removing from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span> into a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hackney</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.269" formerWord="hackney" newWord="imitation" score="0.269">imitation</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span> is such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presumption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="presumption" newWord="subject" score="0.729">subject</span>! And, besides, no traces of them were to be found on the Barnet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>."
<p>"Well, then - - supposing them to be in London. They may be there, though for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concealment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="concealment" newWord="assertion" score="0.366">assertion</span>, for no more exceptional <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span>. It is not likely that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> should be very abundant on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>; and it might strike them that they could be more economically, though less expeditiously, married in London than in Scotland."
<p>"But why all this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span>? Why any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>detection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="detection" newWord="abode" score="0.39">abode</span>? Why must their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> be private? Oh, no, no - - this is not likely. His most particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, you see by Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span>, was persuaded of his never intending to marry her. Wickham will never marry a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> without some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>. He cannot afford it. And what claims has Lydia - - what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attraction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.621" formerWord="attraction" newWord="thing" score="0.621">thing</span> has she beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>health</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="health" newWord="pleasure" score="0.937">pleasure</span>, and good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> that could make him, for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>, forego every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of benefiting himself by marrying well? As to what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restraint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.786" formerWord="restraint" newWord="account" score="0.786">account</span> the apprehensions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span> in the corps might throw on a dishonourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span> with her, I am not able to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span>; for I know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of the effects that such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> might produce. But as to your other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>, I am afraid it will hardly hold good. Lydia has no brothers to step forward; and he might imagine, from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span>, from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="indolence" newWord="chief" score="0.498">chief</span> and the little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> he has ever seemed to give to what was going forward in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, that he would do as little, and think as little about it, as any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> could do, in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>."
<p>"But can you think that Lydia is so lost to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> but love of him as to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span> to live with him on any terms other than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>?"
<p>"It does seem, and it is most shocking indeed,"replied Elizabeth, with tears in her eyes,"that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="decency" newWord="pin" score="0.232">pin</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span> in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> should admit of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>. But, really, I know not what to say. Perhaps I am not doing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>. But she is very young; she has never been taught to think on serious subjects; and for the last half-year, nay, for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>twelvemonth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.723" formerWord="twelvemonth" newWord="answer" score="0.723">answer</span> - - she has been given up to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amusement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="amusement" newWord="way" score="0.86">way</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span>. She has been allowed to dispose of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> in the most idle and frivolous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, and to adopt any opinions that came in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. Since the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> were first quartered in Meryton, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but love, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flirtation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.228" formerWord="flirtation" newWord="merriment" score="0.228">merriment</span>, and officers have been in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. She has been doing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thinking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="thinking" newWord="duty" score="0.605">duty</span> and talking on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, to give greater - - what shall I call it? susceptibility to her feelings; which are naturally lively enough. And we all know that Wickham has every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="charm" newWord="sister" score="0.891">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> and address that can captivate a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>"But you see that Jane,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>,"does not think so very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> of Wickham as to believe him capable of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span>."
<p>"Of whom does Jane ever think ill? And who is there, whatever might be their former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>, that she would think capable of such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="attempt" newWord="affection" score="0.967">affection</span>, till it were proved against them? But Jane knows, as well as I do, what Wickham really is. We both know that he has been profligate in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>; that he has neither <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>integrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="integrity" newWord="xxviii" score="0.256">xxviii</span> nor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>; that he is as false and deceitful as he is insinuating."
<p>"And do you really know all this?"cried Mrs. Gardiner, whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> as to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mode</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.617" formerWord="mode" newWord="haste" score="0.617">haste</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> was all alive. 
<p>"I do indeed,"replied Elizabeth, colouring."I told you, the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, of his infamous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to Mr. Darcy; and you yourself, when last at Longbourn, heard in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> he spoke of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who had behaved with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forbearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="forbearance" newWord="sort" score="0.515">sort</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liberality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="liberality" newWord="daughter" score="0.68">daughter</span> towards him. And there are other circumstances which I am not at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liberty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="liberty" newWord="part" score="0.724">part</span> - - which it is not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>worth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="worth" newWord="man" score="0.953">man</span> while to relate; but his lies about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> Pemberley <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> are endless. From what he said of Miss Darcy I was thoroughly prepared to see a proud, reserved, disagreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>. Yet he knew to the contrary himself. He must know that she was as amiable and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unpretending</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="unpretending" newWord="engagement" score="0.67">engagement</span> as we have found her."
<p>"But does Lydia know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of this? can she be ignorant of what you and Jane seem so well to understand?"
<p>"Oh, yes! - - that, that is the worst of all. Till I was in Kent, and saw so much both of Mr. Darcy and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> Colonel Fitzwilliam, I was ignorant of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> myself. And when I returned <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> was to leave Meryton in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. As that was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, neither Jane, to whom I related the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, nor I, thought it necessary to make our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>public</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.507" formerWord="public" newWord="housekeeper" score="0.507">housekeeper</span>; for of what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> could it apparently be to any one, that the good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> which all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> had of him should then be overthrown? And even when it was settled that Lydia should go with Mrs. Forster, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>necessity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="necessity" newWord="happiness" score="0.966">happiness</span> of opening her eyes to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> never occurred to me.
