That she could be in any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.683" formerWord="deception" newWord="kindness" score="0.683">kindness</span> never entered my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. That such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> as this could ensue, you may easily believe, was far enough from my thoughts."
<p>"When they all removed to Brighton, therefore, you had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>, I suppose, to believe them fond of each other?"
<p>"Not the slightest. I can remember no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>symptom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.274" formerWord="symptom" newWord="shop" score="0.274">shop</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>; and had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> been perceptible, you must be aware that ours is not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> on which it could be thrown away. When first he entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>corps</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="corps" newWord="yesterday" score="0.546">yesterday</span>, she was ready enough to admire him; but so we all were. Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> in or near Meryton was out of her senses about him for the first two months; but he never distinguished her by any particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>; and, consequently, after a moderate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> of extravagant and wild <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admiration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="admiration" newWord="nothing" score="0.893">nothing</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="fancy" newWord="family" score="0.949">family</span> for him gave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, and others of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>, who treated her with more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distinction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.533" formerWord="distinction" newWord="weather" score="0.533">weather</span>, again became her favourites."
<p>* * * * * 
<p>It may be easily believed, that however little of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>novelty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="novelty" newWord="way" score="0.834">way</span> could be added to their fears, hopes, and conjectures, on this interesting <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, by its repeated <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discussion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.905" formerWord="discussion" newWord="day" score="0.905">day</span>, no other could detain them from it long, during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. From Elizabeth's thoughts it was never absent. Fixed there by the keenest of all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anguish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.662" formerWord="anguish" newWord="attention" score="0.662">attention</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>self-reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="self-reproach" newWord="fault" score="0.462">fault</span>, she could find no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interval</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="interval" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.788">acquaintance</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forgetfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="forgetfulness" newWord="elegance" score="0.387">elegance</span>. 
<p>They travelled as expeditiously as possible, and, sleeping one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span>, reached <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. It was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to Elizabeth to consider that Jane could not have been wearied by long expectations. 
<p>The little Gardiners, attracted by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span>, were standing on the steps of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> as they entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paddock</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="paddock" newWord="xlv" score="0.236">xlv</span>; and, when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> drove up to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>, the joyful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> that lighted up their faces, and displayed itself over their whole bodies, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>variety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.67" formerWord="variety" newWord="character" score="0.67">character</span> of capers and frisks, was the first pleasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="earnest" newWord="compunction" score="0.261">compunction</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>welcome</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.632" formerWord="welcome" newWord="engagement" score="0.632">engagement</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth jumped out; and, after giving each of them a hasty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kiss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.294" formerWord="kiss" newWord="joke" score="0.294">joke</span>, hurried into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vestibule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="vestibule" newWord="self-importance" score="0.437">self-importance</span>, where Jane, who came running down from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apartment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.734" formerWord="apartment" newWord="minute" score="0.734">minute</span>, immediately met her. 
<p>Elizabeth, as she affectionately embraced her, whilst tears filled the eyes of both, lost not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> in asking whether <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> had been heard of the fugitives. 
<p>"Not yet,"replied Jane."But now that my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> is come, I hope <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> will be well."
<p>"Is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>?"
<p>"Yes, he went on Tuesday, as I wrote you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>."
<p>"And have you heard from him often?"
<p>"We have heard only twice. He wrote me a few lines on Wednesday to say that he had arrived in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>safety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.59" formerWord="safety" newWord="favour" score="0.59">favour</span>, and to give me his directions, which I particularly begged him to do. He merely added that he should not write again till he had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> to mention."
<p>"And my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> - - how is she? How are you all?"
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> is tolerably well, I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span>; though her spirits are greatly shaken. She is up stairs and will have great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> in seeing you all. She does not yet leave her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dressing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.868" formerWord="dressing-room" newWord="kind" score="0.868">kind</span>. Mary and Kitty, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thank</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.696" formerWord="thank" newWord="door" score="0.696">door</span> Heaven, are quite well."
<p>"But you - - how are you?"cried Elizabeth."You look <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pale</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="pale" newWord="evidence" score="0.229">evidence</span>. How much you must have gone through!"
<p>Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, however, assured her of her being perfectly well; and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>, which had been passing while Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner were engaged with their children, was now put an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> to by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="approach" newWord="country" score="0.761">country</span> of the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>. Jane ran to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and welcomed and thanked them both, with alternate smiles and tears. 
<p>When they were all in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>, the questions which Elizabeth had already asked were of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> repeated by the others, and they soon found that Jane had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> to give. The sanguine <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of good, however, which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benevolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.377" formerWord="benevolence" newWord="length" score="0.377">length</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> suggested had not yet deserted her; she still expected that it would all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> well, and that every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> would bring some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, either from Lydia or her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, to explain their proceedings, and, perhaps, announce their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. 
<p>Mrs. Bennet, to whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apartment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.734" formerWord="apartment" newWord="minute" score="0.734">minute</span> they all repaired, after a few minutes ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> together, received them exactly as might be expected; with tears and lamentations of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="regret" newWord="family" score="0.972">family</span>, invectives against the villainous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> of Wickham, and complaints of her own sufferings and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-usage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.231" formerWord="ill-usage" newWord="prompter" score="0.231">prompter</span>; blaming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> to whose ill-judging <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indulgence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="indulgence" newWord="error" score="0.429">error</span> the errors of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> must principally be owing. 
<p>"If I had been able,"said she,"to carry my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> in going to Brighton, with all my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, this would not have happened; but poor dear Lydia had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> to take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> of her. Why did the Forsters ever let her go out of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span>? I am sure there was some great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neglect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="neglect" newWord="dance" score="0.465">dance</span> or other on their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, for she is not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> to do such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> if she had been well looked after. I always thought they were very unfit to have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="charge" newWord="mercy" score="0.237">mercy</span> of her; but I was overruled, as I always am. Poor dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>! And now here's Mr. Bennet gone away, and I know he will fight Wickham, wherever he meets him and then he will be killed, and what is to become of us all? The Collinses will turn us out before he is cold in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="grave" newWord="education" score="0.464">education</span>, and if you are not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> to us, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, I do not know what we shall do."
<p>They all exclaimed against such terrific ideas; and Mr. Gardiner, after general assurances of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for her and all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, told her that he meant to be in London the very next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, and would assist Mr. Bennet in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> for recovering Lydia. 
<p>"Do not give <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to useless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>,"added he;"though it is right to be prepared for the worst, there is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> to look on it as certain. It is not quite a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> since they left Brighton. In a few days more we may gain some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> of them; and till we know that they are not married, and have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> of marrying, do not let us give the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> over as lost. As soon as I get to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> I shall go to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, and make him come <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> with me to Gracechurch Street; and then we may consult together as to what is to be done."
<p>"Oh! my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>,"replied Mrs. Bennet,"that is exactly what I could most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> for. And now do, when you get to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, find them out, wherever they may be; and if they are not married already, make them marry. And as for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span> clothes, do not let them wait for that, but tell Lydia she shall have as much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> as she chooses to buy them, after they are married. And, above all, keep Mr. Bennet from fighting. Tell him what a dreadful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> I am in, that I am frighted out of my wits - - and have such tremblings, such flutterings, all over me - - such spasms in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> and pains in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, and such beatings at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, that I can get no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> nor by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. And tell my dear Lydia not to give any directions about her clothes till she has seen me, for she does not know which are the best warehouses. Oh, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, how <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> you are! I know you will contrive it all."
<p>But Mr. Gardiner, though he assured her again of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="earnest" newWord="compunction" score="0.261">compunction</span> endeavours in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span>, could not avoid recommending <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moderation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="moderation" newWord="mass" score="0.216">mass</span> to her, as well in her hopes as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span>; and after talking with her in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> till <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> was on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, they all left her to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.22" formerWord="vent" newWord="mass" score="0.22">mass</span> all her feelings on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span>, who attended in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of her daughters. 
<p>Though her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> were persuaded that there was no real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.313" formerWord="seclusion" newWord="bottom" score="0.313">bottom</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, they did not attempt to oppose it, for they knew that she had not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="prudence" newWord="hope" score="0.805">hope</span> enough to hold her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tongue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.32" formerWord="tongue" newWord="drive" score="0.32">drive</span> before the servants, while they waited at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, and judged it better that one only of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>household</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="household" newWord="degree" score="0.545">degree</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> whom they could most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> should comprehend all her fears and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>solicitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.615" formerWord="solicitude" newWord="minute" score="0.615">minute</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. 
<p>In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span> they were soon joined by Mary and Kitty, who had been too busily engaged in their separate apartments to make their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> before. One came from her books, and the other from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>toilette</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.661" formerWord="toilette" newWord="happiness" score="0.661">happiness</span>. The faces of both, however, were tolerably calm; and no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> was visible in either, except that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of her favourite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> which she had herself incurred in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, had given more of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fretfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="fretfulness" newWord="handwriting" score="0.267">handwriting</span> than usual to the accents of Kitty. As for Mary, she was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.807" formerWord="mistress" newWord="woman" score="0.807">woman</span> enough of herself to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span> to Elizabeth, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of grave <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">billiard-room</span>, soon after they were seated at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>: 
<p>"This is a most unfortunate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>, and will probably be much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>talked</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="talked" newWord="whip" score="0.243">whip</span> of. But we must stem the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tide</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="tide" newWord="trunk" score="0.297">trunk</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>malice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="malice" newWord="error" score="0.421">error</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="pour" newWord="minute" score="0.421">minute</span> into the wounded bosoms of each other the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>balm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.286" formerWord="balm" newWord="contemplation" score="0.286">contemplation</span> of sisterly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span>."
<p>Then, perceiving in Elizabeth no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> of replying, she added,"Unhappy as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> must be for Lydia, we may draw from it this useful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lesson</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="lesson" newWord="patience" score="0.515">patience</span>: that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span> in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>female</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.282" formerWord="female" newWord="faint" score="0.282">faint</span> is irretrievable; that one false <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> involves her in endless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ruin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="ruin" newWord="shame" score="0.412">shame</span>; that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reputation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.292" formerWord="reputation" newWord="three-and-twenty" score="0.292">three-and-twenty</span> is no less brittle than it is beautiful; and that she cannot be too much guarded in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> towards the undeserving of the other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sex</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="sex" newWord="compassion" score="0.52">compassion</span>."
<p>Elizabeth lifted up her eyes in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span>, but was too much oppressed to make any reply. Mary, however, continued to console herself with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of moral extractions from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span> before them. 
<p>In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>afternoon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="afternoon" newWord="astonishment" score="0.465">astonishment</span>, the two elder Miss Bennets were able to be for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-an-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="half-an-hour" newWord="regret" score="0.477">regret</span> by themselves; and Elizabeth instantly availed herself of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opportunity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="opportunity" newWord="day" score="0.967">day</span> of making any inquiries, which Jane was equally eager to satisfy. After joining in general lamentations over the dreadful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sequel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.235" formerWord="sequel" newWord="reform" score="0.235">reform</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span>, which Elizabeth considered as all but certain, and Miss Bennet could not assert to be wholly impossible, the former continued the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>, by saying,"But tell me all and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> about it which I have not already heard. Give me further particulars. What did Colonel Forster say? Had they no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span> took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>? They must have seen them together for ever."
<p>"Colonel Forster did own that he had often suspected some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="partiality" newWord="affection" score="0.938">affection</span>, especially on Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to give him any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span>. I am so grieved for him! His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> was attentive and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>utmost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="utmost" newWord="brother" score="0.947">brother</span>. He was coming to us, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>order</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="order" newWord="way" score="0.909">way</span> to assure us of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>, before he had any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of their not being gone to Scotland: when that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span> first got abroad, it hastened his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>."
<p>"And was Denny convinced that Wickham would not marry? Did he know of their intending to go off? Had Colonel Forster seen Denny himself?"
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Yes</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="Yes" newWord="honour" score="0.883">Honour</span>; but, when questioned by him, Denny denied knowing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> of their plans, and would not give his real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> about it. He did not repeat his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span> of their not marrying - - and from that, I am inclined to hope, he might have been misunderstood before."
<p>"And till Colonel Forster came himself, not one of you entertained a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, I suppose, of their being really married?"
<p>"How was it possible that such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> should enter our brains? I felt a little uneasy - - a little fearful of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> with him in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, because I knew that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> had not been always quite right. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> knew <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of that; they only felt how imprudent a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span> it must be. Kitty then owned, with a very natural <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span> on knowing more than the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of us, that in Lydia's last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> she had prepared her for such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span>. She had known, it seems, of their being in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with each other, many weeks."
<p>"But not before they went to Brighton?"
<p>"No, I believe not."
<p>"And did Colonel Forster appear to think well of Wickham himself? Does he know his real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>?"
<p>"I must confess that he did not speak so well of Wickham as he formerly did. He believed him to be imprudent and extravagant. And since this sad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span> has taken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, it is said that he left Meryton greatly in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>debt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="debt" newWord="route" score="0.243">route</span>; but I hope this may be false."
<p>"Oh, Jane, had we been less secret, had we told what we knew of him, this could not have happened!"
<p>"Perhaps it would have been better,"replied her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>."But to expose the former faults of any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> without knowing what their present feelings were, seemed unjustifiable. We acted with the best intentions."
<p>"Could Colonel Forster repeat the particulars of Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>note</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="note" newWord="day" score="0.96">day</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>?"
<p>"He brought it with him for us to see."
<p>Jane then took it from her pocket-book, and gave it to Elizabeth. These were the contents: 
<p>"MY DEAR HARRIET, 
<p>"You will laugh when you know where I am gone, and I cannot help laughing myself at your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to-morrow <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, as soon as I am missed. I am going to Gretna Green, and if you cannot guess with who, I shall think you a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>simpleton</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.64" formerWord="simpleton" newWord="ease" score="0.64">ease</span>, for there is but one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> I love, and he is an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>angel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.423" formerWord="angel" newWord="inspection" score="0.423">inspection</span>. I should never be happy without him, so think it no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>harm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.674" formerWord="harm" newWord="night" score="0.674">night</span> to be off. You need not send them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> at Longbourn of my going, if you do not like it, for it will make the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> the greater, when I write to them and sign my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> ' Lydia Wickham. ' What a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joke</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.3" formerWord="joke" newWord="venture" score="0.3">venture</span> it will be! I can hardly write for laughing. Pray make my excuses to Pratt for not keeping my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dancing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="dancing" newWord="brother" score="0.962">brother</span> with him to-night. Tell him I hope he will excuse me when he knows all; and tell him I will dance with him at the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ball</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="ball" newWord="friend" score="0.985">friend</span> we meet, with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. I shall send for my clothes when I get to Longbourn; but I wish you would tell Sally to mend a great slit in my worked <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>muslin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="muslin" newWord="acquisition" score="0.488">acquisition</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.657" formerWord="gown" newWord="minute" score="0.657">minute</span> before they are packed up. Good-bye. Give my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> to Colonel Forster. I hope you will drink to our good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. 
<p>"Your affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, 
<p>"LYDIA BENNET."
<p>"Oh! thoughtless, thoughtless Lydia!"cried Elizabeth when she had finished it."What a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> is this, to be written at such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>! But at least it shows that she was serious on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. Whatever he might afterwards persuade her to, it was not on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>infamy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.422" formerWord="infamy" newWord="wonder" score="0.422">wonder</span>. My poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>! how he must have felt it!"
<p>"I never saw <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> so shocked. He could not speak a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> for full ten minutes. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> was taken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> immediately, and the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span>!"
<p>"Oh! Jane,"cried Elizabeth,"was there a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> belonging to it who did not know the whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>story</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="story" newWord="letter" score="0.837">letter</span> before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>?"
<p>"I do not know. I hope there was. But to be guarded at such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> is very difficult. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> was in hysterics, and though I endeavoured to give her every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span> in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>, I am afraid I did not do so much as I might have done! But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horror</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="horror" newWord="minute" score="0.867">minute</span> of what might possibly happen almost took from me my faculties."
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attendance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="attendance" newWord="pain" score="0.859">pain</span> upon her has been too much for you. You do not look well. Oh that I had been with you! you have had every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>care</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="care" newWord="affection" score="0.903">affection</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> upon yourself alone."
<p>"Mary and Kitty have been very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>, and would have shared in every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fatigue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="fatigue" newWord="fortnight" score="0.542">fortnight</span>, I am sure; but I did not think it right for either of them. Kitty is slight and delicate; and Mary studies so much, that her hours of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="repose" newWord="note" score="0.565">note</span> should not be broken in on. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> Phillips came to Longbourn on Tuesday, after my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> went away; and was so good as to stay till Thursday with me. She was of great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to us all. And Lady Lucas has been very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>; she walked here on Wednesday <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> to condole with us, and offered her services, or any of her daughters ', if they should be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> to us."
<p>"She had better have stayed at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>,"cried Elizabeth;"perhaps she meant well, but, under such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span> as this, one cannot see too little of one's neighbours. Assistance is impossible; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="condolence" newWord="mortification" score="0.305">mortification</span> insufferable. Let them <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span> over us at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="distance" newWord="nature" score="0.498">nature</span>, and be satisfied."
<p>She then proceeded to inquire into the measures which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had intended to pursue, while in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.802" formerWord="recovery" newWord="character" score="0.802">character</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. 
<p>"He meant I believe,"replied Jane,"to go to Epsom, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> where they last changed horses, see the postilions and try if <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> could be made out from them. His principal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> must be to discover the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>number</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="number" newWord="kind" score="0.875">kind</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hackney</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.269" formerWord="hackney" newWord="imitation" score="0.269">imitation</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span> which took them from Clapham. It had come with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fare</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.382" formerWord="fare" newWord="park" score="0.382">park</span> from London; and as he thought that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>'s removing from one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> into another might be remarked he meant to make inquiries at Clapham. If he could anyhow discover at what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coachman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="coachman" newWord="minute" score="0.497">minute</span> had before set down his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fare</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.382" formerWord="fare" newWord="park" score="0.382">park</span>, he determined to make inquiries there, and hoped it might not be impossible to find out the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.226" formerWord="stand" newWord="fan" score="0.226">fan</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>number</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="number" newWord="kind" score="0.875">kind</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>. I do not know of any other designs that he had formed; but he was in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hurry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="hurry" newWord="girl" score="0.777">girl</span> to be gone, and his spirits so greatly discomposed, that I had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span> in finding out even so much as this."
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 48 
<p>
<p>The whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> were in hopes of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from Mr. Bennet the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>post</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="post" newWord="voice" score="0.838">voice</span> came in without bringing a single <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span> from him. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> knew him to be, on all common occasions, a most negligent and dilatory <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>correspondent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.344" formerWord="correspondent" newWord="stuff" score="0.344">stuff</span>; but at such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> they had hoped for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="exertion" newWord="course" score="0.956">course</span>. They were forced to conclude that he had no pleasing <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> to send; but even of that they would have been glad to be certain. Mr. Gardiner had waited only for the letters before he set off. 
<p>When he was gone, they were certain at least of receiving constant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> of what was going on, and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> promised, at parting, to prevail on Mr. Bennet to return to Longbourn, as soon as he could, to the great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, who considered it as the only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>security</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="security" newWord="kind" score="0.633">kind</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>'s not being killed in a duel. 
<p>Mrs. Gardiner and the children were to remain in Hertfordshire a few days longer, as the former thought her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.209" formerWord="presence" newWord="decay" score="0.209">decay</span> might be serviceable to her nieces. She shared in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attendance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="attendance" newWord="pain" score="0.859">pain</span> on Mrs. Bennet, and was a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to them in their hours of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>freedom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="freedom" newWord="defence" score="0.297">defence</span>. Their other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> also visited them frequently, and always, as she said, with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>design</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="design" newWord="wife" score="0.429">wife</span> of cheering and heartening them up - - though, as she never came without reporting some fresh <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="instance" newWord="minute" score="0.464">minute</span> of Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extravagance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.603" formerWord="extravagance" newWord="minute" score="0.603">minute</span> or irregularity, she seldom went away without leaving them more dispirited than she found them. 
<p>All Meryton seemed striving to blacken the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who, but three months before, had been almost an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>angel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.423" formerWord="angel" newWord="inspection" score="0.423">inspection</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span>. He was declared to be in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>debt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="debt" newWord="route" score="0.243">route</span> to every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tradesman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="tradesman" newWord="capital" score="0.383">capital</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, and his intrigues, all honoured with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>title</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="title" newWord="breakfast-room" score="0.325">breakfast-room</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="seduction" newWord="motto" score="0.229">motto</span>, had been extended into every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tradesman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="tradesman" newWord="capital" score="0.383">capital</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="Everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">Word</span> declared that he was the wickedest young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> began to find out that they had always distrusted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span>. Elizabeth, though she did not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> above <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> of what was said, believed enough to make her former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ruin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="ruin" newWord="shame" score="0.412">shame</span> more certain; and even Jane, who believed still less of it, became almost hopeless, more especially as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> was now come when, if they had gone to Scotland, which she had never before entirely despaired of, they must in all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>probability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="probability" newWord="family" score="0.849">family</span> have gained some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> of them. 
<p>Mr. Gardiner left <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> on Sunday; on Tuesday his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> received a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from him; it told them that, on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, he had immediately found out his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, and persuaded him to come to Gracechurch Street; that Mr. Bennet had been to Epsom and Clapham, before his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span>, but without gaining any satisfactory <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>; and that he was now determined to inquire at all the principal hotels in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, as Mr. Bennet thought it possible they might have gone to one of them, on their first coming to London, before they procured lodgings. Mr. Gardiner himself did not expect any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>success</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="success" newWord="man" score="0.888">man</span> from this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>measure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="measure" newWord="expediency" score="0.275">expediency</span>, but as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> was eager in it, he meant to assist him in pursuing it.
