He added that Mr. Bennet seemed wholly disinclined at present to leave London and promised to write again very soon. There was also a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>postscript</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.611" formerWord="postscript" newWord="nobody" score="0.611">nobody</span> to this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span>: 
<p>"I have written to Colonel Forster to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> him to find out, if possible, from some of the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s intimates in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>, whether Wickham has any relations or connections who would be likely to know in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> he has now concealed himself. If there were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> could apply to with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>probability</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.849" formerWord="probability" newWord="family" score="0.849">family</span> of gaining such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>clue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="clue" newWord="detail" score="0.225">detail</span> as that, it might be of essential <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>. At present we have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to guide us. Colonel Forster will, I dare say, do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to satisfy us on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. But, on second thoughts, perhaps, Lizzy could tell us what relations he has now living, better than any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>."
<p>Elizabeth was at no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> to understand from whence this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="deference" newWord="way" score="0.729">way</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>authority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="authority" newWord="aunt" score="0.859">aunt</span> proceeded; but it was not in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to give any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> of so satisfactory a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compliment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.889" formerWord="compliment" newWord="day" score="0.889">day</span> deserved. She had never heard of his having had any relations, except a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, both of whom had been dead many years. It was possible, however, that some of his companions in the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> might be able to give more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>; and though she was not very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sanguine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.476" formerWord="sanguine" newWord="barouche" score="0.476">barouche</span> in expecting it, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to look forward to. 
<p>Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span> was now a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span>; but the most anxious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of each was when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>post</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="post" newWord="voice" score="0.838">voice</span> was expected. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of letters was the grand <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span>. Through letters, whatever of good or bad was to be told would be communicated, and every succeeding <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> was expected to bring some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>. 
<p>But before they heard again from Mr. Gardiner, a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> arrived for their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, from a different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="quarter" newWord="ingenuousness" score="0.24">ingenuousness</span>, from Mr. Collins; which, as Jane had received directions to open all that came for him in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span>, she accordingly read; and Elizabeth, who knew what curiosities his letters always were, looked over her, and read it likewise. It was as follows: 
<p>"MY DEAR SIR, 
<p>"I feel myself called upon, by our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span>, and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, to condole with you on the grievous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affliction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.621" formerWord="affliction" newWord="horror" score="0.621">horror</span> you are now suffering under, of which we were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>yesterday</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="yesterday" newWord="family" score="0.967">family</span> informed by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from Hertfordshire. Be assured, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, that Mrs. Collins and myself sincerely sympathise with you and all your respectable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span>, which must be of the bitterest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>, because <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proceeding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.364" formerWord="proceeding" newWord="conscience" score="0.364">conscience</span> from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> which no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> can remove. No arguments shall be wanting on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> that can alleviate so severe a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span> - - or that may <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> you, under a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> that must be of all others the most afflicting to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.492" formerWord="parent" newWord="observation" score="0.492">observation</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>death</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.565" formerWord="death" newWord="minute" score="0.565">minute</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> would have been a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blessing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.913" formerWord="blessing" newWord="town" score="0.913">town</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> of this. And it is the more to be lamented, because there is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to suppose as my dear Charlotte informs me, that this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>licentiousness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.252" formerWord="licentiousness" newWord="simple" score="0.252">simple</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> has proceeded from a faulty <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indulgence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="indulgence" newWord="error" score="0.429">error</span>; though, at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consolation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="consolation" newWord="money" score="0.853">money</span> of yourself and Mrs. Bennet, I am inclined to think that her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> must be naturally bad, or she could not be guilty of such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>enormity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="enormity" newWord="furnishing" score="0.233">furnishing</span>, at so early an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>. Howsoever that may be, you are grievously to be pitied; in which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> I am not only joined by Mrs. Collins, but likewise by Lady Catherine and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, to whom I have related the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.942" formerWord="affair" newWord="friend" score="0.942">friend</span>. They agree with me in apprehending that this false <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>step</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="step" newWord="round" score="0.724">round</span> in one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> will be injurious to the fortunes of all the others; for who, as Lady Catherine herself condescendingly says, will connect themselves with such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>? And this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span> leads me moreover to reflect, with augmented <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>, on a certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> of last November; for had it been otherwise, I must have been involved in all your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="sorrow" newWord="pleasure" score="0.651">pleasure</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span>. Let me then advise you, dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, to console yourself as much as possible, to throw off your unworthy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> from your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for ever, and leave her to reap the fruits of her own heinous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.277" formerWord="offense" newWord="rate" score="0.277">rate</span>. 
<p>"I am, dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, etc., etc."
<p>Mr. Gardiner did not write again till he had received an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> from Colonel Forster; and then he had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of a pleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> to send. It was not known that Wickham had a single <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span> with whom he kept up any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span>, and it was certain that he had no near one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>. His former acquaintances had been numerous; but since he had been in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>militia</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.706" formerWord="militia" newWord="kind" score="0.706">kind</span>, it did not appear that he was on terms of particular <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friendship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.964" formerWord="friendship" newWord="time" score="0.964">time</span> with any of them. There was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>, therefore, who could be pointed out as likely to give any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> of him. And in the wretched <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of his own finances, there was a very powerful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>addition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.876" formerWord="addition" newWord="mother" score="0.876">mother</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discovery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.588" formerWord="discovery" newWord="trouble" score="0.588">trouble</span> by Lydia's relations, for it had just transpired that he had left <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gaming</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="gaming" newWord="grief" score="0.229">grief</span> debts behind him to a very considerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amount</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.481" formerWord="amount" newWord="tone" score="0.481">tone</span>. Colonel Forster believed that more than a thousand pounds would be necessary to clear his expenses at Brighton. He owed a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, but his debts of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> were still more formidable. Mr. Gardiner did not attempt to conceal these particulars from the Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. Jane heard them with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horror</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="horror" newWord="minute" score="0.867">minute</span>."A gamester!"she cried."This is wholly unexpected. I had not an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of it."
<p>Mr. Gardiner added in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, that they might expect to see their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> on the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, which was Saturday. Rendered spiritless by the ill-success of all their endeavours, he had yielded to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="brother-in-law" newWord="season" score="0.333">season</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entreaty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="entreaty" newWord="card" score="0.361">card</span> that he would return to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, and leave it to him to do whatever <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> might suggest to be advisable for continuing their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pursuit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="pursuit" newWord="fireside" score="0.25">fireside</span>. When Mrs. Bennet was told of this, she did not express so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> as her children expected, considering what her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> had been before. 
<p>"What, is he coming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, and without poor Lydia?"she cried."Sure he will not leave London before he has found them. Who is to fight Wickham, and make him marry her, if he comes away?"
<p>As Mrs. Gardiner began to wish to be at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, it was settled that she and the children should go to London, at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> that Mr. Bennet came from it. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>coach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="coach" newWord="anything" score="0.874">anything</span>, therefore, took them the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.56" formerWord="stage" newWord="activity" score="0.56">activity</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, and brought its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> back to Longbourn. 
<p>Mrs. Gardiner went away in all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perplexity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.545" formerWord="perplexity" newWord="delay" score="0.545">delay</span> about Elizabeth and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Derbyshire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.335" formerWord="Derbyshire" newWord="mischance" score="0.335">Mischance</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> that had attended her from that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> had never been voluntarily mentioned before them by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>; and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of half-expectation which Mrs. Gardiner had formed, of their being followed by a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from him, had ended in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>. Elizabeth had received <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> since her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> that could come from Pemberley. 
<p>The present unhappy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> rendered any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" newWord="experience" score="0.41">experience</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lowness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="lowness" newWord="round" score="0.586">round</span> of her spirits unnecessary; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>, therefore, could be fairly conjectured from that, though Elizabeth, who was by this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> tolerably well acquainted with her own feelings, was perfectly aware that, had she known <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of Darcy, she could have borne the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dread</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="dread" newWord="part" score="0.818">part</span> of Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>infamy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.422" formerWord="infamy" newWord="wonder" score="0.422">wonder</span> somewhat better. It would have spared her, she thought, one sleepless <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> out of two. 
<p>When Mr. Bennet arrived, he had all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>appearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.983" formerWord="appearance" newWord="family" score="0.983">family</span> of his usual philosophic <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>. He said as little as he had ever been in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>habit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.527" formerWord="habit" newWord="profession" score="0.527">profession</span> of saying; made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.888" formerWord="mention" newWord="sister" score="0.888">sister</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> that had taken him away, and it was some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> before his daughters had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> to speak of it. 
<p>It was not till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>afternoon</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.465" formerWord="afternoon" newWord="astonishment" score="0.465">astonishment</span>, when he had joined them at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span>, that Elizabeth ventured to introduce the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>; and then, on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>briefly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.7" formerWord="briefly" newWord="her" score="0.7">her</span> expressing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sorrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="sorrow" newWord="pleasure" score="0.651">pleasure</span> for what he must have endured, he replied,"Say <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of that. Who should suffer but myself? It has been my own doing, and I ought to feel it."
<p>"You must not be too severe upon yourself,"replied Elizabeth. 
<p>"You may well warn me against such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evil</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="evil" newWord="letter" score="0.962">letter</span>. Human <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> is so prone to fall into it! No, Lizzy, let me once in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="feel" newWord="copy" score="0.256">copy</span> how much I have been to blame. I am not afraid of being overpowered by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="impression" newWord="part" score="0.871">part</span>. It will pass away soon enough."
<p>"Do you suppose them to be in London?"
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Yes</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="Yes" newWord="honour" score="0.883">Honour</span>; where else can they be so well concealed?"
<p>"And Lydia used to want to go to London,"added Kitty. 
<p>"She is happy then,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drily</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.294" formerWord="drily" newWord="midst" score="0.294">midst</span>;"and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>residence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.804" formerWord="residence" newWord="letter" score="0.804">letter</span> there will probably be of some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.43" formerWord="duration" newWord="horror" score="0.43">horror</span>."
<p>Then after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> he continued: 
<p>"Lizzy, I bear you no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill-will</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.544" formerWord="ill-will" newWord="respectability" score="0.544">respectability</span> for being justified in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> to me last May, which, considering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span>, shows some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>greatness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.317" formerWord="greatness" newWord="conquest" score="0.317">conquest</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>."
<p>They were interrupted by Miss Bennet, who came to fetch her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="tea" newWord="time" score="0.908">time</span>. 
<p>"This is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parade</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="parade" newWord="certainty" score="0.387">certainty</span>,"he cried,"which does one good; it gives such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span>! Another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> I will do the same; I will sit in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>, in my nightcap and powdering <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gown</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.657" formerWord="gown" newWord="minute" score="0.657">minute</span>, and give as much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> as I can; or, perhaps, I may defer it till Kitty runs away."
<p>"I am not going to run away, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>papa</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="papa" newWord="affection" score="0.787">affection</span>,"said Kitty fretfully."If I should ever go to Brighton, I would behave better than Lydia."
<p>"You go to Brighton. I would not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> you so near it as Eastbourne for fifty pounds! No, Kitty, I have at last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>learnt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="learnt" newWord="performance" score="0.249">performance</span> to be cautious, and you will feel the effects of it. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>officer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.442" formerWord="officer" newWord="minute" score="0.442">minute</span> is ever to enter into my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> again, nor even to pass through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>village</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="village" newWord="heart" score="0.893">heart</span>. Balls will be absolutely prohibited, unless you stand up with one of your sisters. And you are never to stir out of doors till you can prove that you have spent ten minutes of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> in a rational <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>."
<p>Kitty, who took all these threats in a serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span>, began to cry. 
<p>"Well, well,"said he,"do not make yourself unhappy. If you are a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> for the next ten years, I will take you to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>review</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="review" newWord="life" score="0.829">life</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> of them."
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 49 
<p>
<p>Two days after Mr. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, as Jane and Elizabeth were walking together in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shrubbery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.596" formerWord="shrubbery" newWord="person" score="0.596">person</span> behind the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, they saw the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>housekeeper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.651" formerWord="housekeeper" newWord="dirt" score="0.651">dirt</span> coming towards them, and, concluding that she came to call them to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, went forward to meet her; but, instead of the expected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summons</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="summons" newWord="mutton" score="0.298">mutton</span>, when they approached her, she said to Miss Bennet,"I beg your pardon, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>, for interrupting you, but I was in hopes you might have got some good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, so I took the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liberty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="liberty" newWord="part" score="0.724">part</span> of coming to ask."
<p>"What do you mean, Hill? We have heard <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."
<p>"Dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"cried Mrs. Hill, in great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>,"don't you know there is an express come for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> from Mr. Gardiner? He has been here this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half-hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.532" formerWord="half-hour" newWord="partner" score="0.532">partner</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span> has had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."
<p>Away ran the girls, too eager to get in to have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>. They ran through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vestibule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="vestibule" newWord="self-importance" score="0.437">self-importance</span> into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="breakfast-room" newWord="title" score="0.325">title</span>; from thence to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>; their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> was in neither; and they were on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of seeking him up stairs with their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, when they were met by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>butler</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.264" formerWord="butler" newWord="art" score="0.264">art</span>, who said: 
<p>"If you are looking for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>master</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="master" newWord="town" score="0.818">town</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ma'am</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="ma'am" newWord="family" score="0.966">family</span>, he is walking towards the little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>copse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="copse" newWord="inmate" score="0.315">inmate</span>."
<p>Upon this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>, they instantly passed through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span> once more, and ran across the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lawn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="lawn" newWord="residence" score="0.546">residence</span> after their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, who was deliberately pursuing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> towards a small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.61" formerWord="wood" newWord="round" score="0.61">round</span> on one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paddock</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.236" formerWord="paddock" newWord="xlv" score="0.236">xlv</span>. 
<p>Jane, who was not so light nor so much in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>habit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.527" formerWord="habit" newWord="profession" score="0.527">profession</span> of running as Elizabeth, soon lagged behind, while her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, panting for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breath</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.439" formerWord="breath" newWord="companion" score="0.439">companion</span>, came up with him, and eagerly cried out: 
<p>"Oh, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>papa</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="papa" newWord="affection" score="0.787">affection</span>, what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> - - what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>? Have you heard from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>?"
<p>"Yes I have had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from him by express."
<p>"Well, and what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> does it bring - - good or bad?"
<p>"What is there of good to be expected?"said he, taking the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pocket</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="pocket" newWord="blessing" score="0.325">blessing</span>."But perhaps you would like to read it."
<p>Elizabeth impatiently caught it from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>. Jane now came up. 
<p>"Read it aloud,"said their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>,"for I hardly know myself what it is about."
<p>"Gracechurch Street, Monday, August 2. 
<p>"MY DEAR BROTHER, 
<p>"At last I am able to send you some tidings of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>, and such as, upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, I hope it will give you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>. Soon after you left me on Saturday, I was fortunate enough to find out in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of London they were. The particulars I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reserve</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.385" formerWord="reserve" newWord="weather" score="0.385">weather</span> till we meet; it is enough to know they are discovered. I have seen them both - -"
<p>"Then it is as I always hoped,"cried Jane;"they are married!"
<p>Elizabeth read on: 
<p>"I have seen them both. They are not married, nor can I find there was any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> of being so; but if you are willing to perform the engagements which I have ventured to make on your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, I hope it will not be long before they are. All that is required of you is, to assure to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>settlement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.215" formerWord="settlement" newWord="inquietude" score="0.215">inquietude</span>, her equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> of the five thousand pounds secured among your children after the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="decease" newWord="period" score="0.412">period</span> of yourself and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>; and, moreover, to enter into an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> of allowing her, during your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, one hundred pounds per <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>annum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.251" formerWord="annum" newWord="trade" score="0.251">trade</span>. These are conditions which, considering <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, I had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hesitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="hesitation" newWord="fashion" score="0.31">fashion</span> in complying with, as far as I thought myself privileged, for you. I shall send this by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>express</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="express" newWord="marianne" score="0.23">marianne</span>, that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> may be lost in bringing me your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. You will easily comprehend, from these particulars, that Mr. Wickham's circumstances are not so hopeless as they are generally believed to be. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> has been deceived in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span>; and I am happy to say there will be some little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, even when all his debts are discharged, to settle on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>addition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.876" formerWord="addition" newWord="mother" score="0.876">mother</span> to her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>. If, as I conclude will be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, you send me full powers to act in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> throughout the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, I will immediately give directions to Haggerston for preparing a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>settlement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.215" formerWord="settlement" newWord="inquietude" score="0.215">inquietude</span>. There will not be the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for your coming to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> again; therefore stay quiet at Longbourn, and depend on my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.246" formerWord="diligence" newWord="search" score="0.246">search</span> and care. Send back your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> as fast as you can, and be careful to write explicitly. We have judged it best that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> should be married from this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, of which I hope you will approve. She comes to us <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span>. I shall write again as soon as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> more is determined on. Yours, etc., 
<p>"EDW. GARDINER."
<p>"Is it possible?"cried Elizabeth, when she had finished."Can it be possible that he will marry her?"
<p>"Wickham is not so undeserving, then, as we thought him,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>."My dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, I congratulate you."
<p>"And have you answered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>?"cried Elizabeth. 
<p>"No; but it must be done soon."
<p>Most earnestly did she then entreaty him to lose no more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> before he wrote. 
<p>"Oh! my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>,"she cried,"come back and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>write</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.354" formerWord="write" newWord="discussion" score="0.354">discussion</span> immediately. Consider how important every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> is in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>."
<p>"Let me write for you,"said Jane,"if you dislike the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> yourself."
<p>"I dislike it very much,"he replied;"but it must be done."
<p>And so saying, he turned back with them, and walked towards the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. 
<p>"And may I ask - -"said Elizabeth;"but the terms, I suppose, must be complied with."
<p>"Complied with! I am only ashamed of his asking so little."
<p>"And they must marry! Yet he is such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>!"
<p>"Yes, yes, they must marry. There is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else to be done. But there are two things that I want very much to know; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> is, how much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> has laid down to bring it about; and the other, how am I ever to pay him."
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="Money" newWord="time" score="0.975">Time</span>! My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>!"cried Jane,"what do you mean, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sir</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="sir" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>?"
<p>"I mean, that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> in his senses would marry Lydia on so slight a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temptation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.387" formerWord="temptation" newWord="weakness" score="0.387">weakness</span> as one hundred a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span> during my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, and fifty after I am gone."
<p>"That is very true,"said Elizabeth;"though it had not occurred to me before. His debts to be discharged, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> still to remain! Oh! it must be my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s doings! Generous, good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, I am afraid he has distressed himself. A small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="sum" newWord="horror" score="0.528">horror</span> could not do all this."
<p>"No,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>;"Wickham's a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fool</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="fool" newWord="composure" score="0.368">composure</span> if he takes her with a farthing less than ten thousand pounds. I should be sorry to think so ill of him, in the very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span> of our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span>."
<p>"Ten thousand pounds! Heaven forbid! How is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="sum" newWord="horror" score="0.528">horror</span> to be repaid?"
<p>Mr. Bennet made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, and each of them, deep in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span>, continued silent till they reached the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> then went on to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> to write, and the girls walked into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="breakfast-room" newWord="title" score="0.325">title</span>. 
<p>"And they are really to be married!"cried Elizabeth, as soon as they were by themselves."How strange this is! And for this we are to be thankful. That they should marry, small as is their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and wretched as is his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, we are forced to rejoice. Oh, Lydia!"
<p>"I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> myself with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thinking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="thinking" newWord="duty" score="0.605">duty</span>,"replied Jane,"that he certainly would not marry Lydia if he had not a real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> for her. Though our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> has done <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> towards clearing him, I cannot believe that ten thousand pounds, or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> like it, has been advanced. He has children of his own, and may have more. How could he spare <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> ten thousand pounds?"
<p>"If he were ever able to learn what Wickham's debts have been,"said Elizabeth,"and how much is settled on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> on our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, we shall exactly know what Mr. Gardiner has done for them, because Wickham has not sixpence of his own. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> can never be requited. Their taking her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, and affording her their personal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>protection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="protection" newWord="minute" score="0.788">minute</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, is such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sacrifice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="sacrifice" newWord="g" score="0.232">g</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> as years of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> cannot enough acknowledge. By this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> she is actually with them! If such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span> does not make her miserable now, she will never deserve to be happy! What a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> for her, when she first sees my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>!"
<p>"We must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>endeavour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="endeavour" newWord="person" score="0.35">person</span> to forget all that has passed on either <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>,"said Jane:"I hope and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trust</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="trust" newWord="man" score="0.915">man</span> they will yet be happy. His consenting to marry her is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="proof" newWord="nothing" score="0.855">nothing</span>, I will believe, that he is come to a right <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thinking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="thinking" newWord="duty" score="0.605">duty</span>. Their mutual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> will steady them; and I flatter myself they will settle so quietly, and live in so rational a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, as may in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> make their past <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">self</span> forgotten."
<p>"Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> has been such,"replied Elizabeth,"as neither you, nor I, nor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="anybody" newWord="way" score="0.969">way</span> can ever forget. It is useless to talk of it."
<p>It now occurred to the girls that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> was in all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likelihood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="likelihood" newWord="inn" score="0.289">inn</span> perfectly ignorant of what had happened. They went to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>, therefore, and asked their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> whether he would not wish them to make it known to her. He was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span> and, without raising his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, coolly replied: 
<p>"Just as you please."
<p>"May we take my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> to read to her?"
<p>"Take whatever you like, and get away."
<p>Elizabeth took the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from his writing-table, and they went up stairs together. Mary and Kitty were both with Mrs. Bennet: one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> would, therefore, do for all. After a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>preparation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="preparation" newWord="astonishment" score="0.515">astonishment</span> for good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was read aloud. Mrs. Bennet could hardly contain herself.
