As soon as Jane had read Mr. Gardiner's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of Lydia's being soon married, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span> burst forth, and every following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sentence" newWord="end" score="0.756">end</span> added to its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exuberance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="exuberance" newWord="complication" score="0.205">complication</span>. She was now in an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>irritation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.593" formerWord="irritation" newWord="respect" score="0.593">respect</span> as violent from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>, as she had ever been fidgety from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alarm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="alarm" newWord="sister" score="0.966">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vexation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="vexation" newWord="brilliancy" score="0.248">brilliancy</span>. To know that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> would be married was enough. She was disturbed by no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span>, nor humbled by any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remembrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="remembrance" newWord="parting" score="0.28">parting</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misconduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.424" formerWord="misconduct" newWord="gift" score="0.424">gift</span>. 
<p>"My dear, dear Lydia!"she cried."This is delightful indeed! She will be married! I shall see her again! She will be married at sixteen! My good, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>! I knew how it would be. I knew he would manage <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="everything" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>! How I long to see her! and to see dear Wickham too! But the clothes, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span> clothes! I will write to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> Gardiner about them directly. Lizzy, my dear, run down to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, and ask him how much he will give her. Stay, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.787" formerWord="stay" newWord="point" score="0.787">point</span>, I will go myself. Ring the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bell</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.204" formerWord="bell" newWord="varnish" score="0.204">varnish</span>, Kitty, for Hill. I will put on my things in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>. My dear, dear Lydia! How merry we shall be together when we meet!"
<p>Her eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> endeavoured to give some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>violence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.328" formerWord="violence" newWord="inspection" score="0.328">inspection</span> of these transports, by leading her thoughts to the obligations which Mr. Gardiner's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> laid them all under. 
<p>"For we must attribute this happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conclusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="conclusion" newWord="happiness" score="0.902">happiness</span>,"she added,"in a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>measure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="measure" newWord="expediency" score="0.275">expediency</span> to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span>. We are persuaded that he has pledged himself to assist Mr. Wickham with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>."
<p>"Well,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>,"it is all very right; who should do it but her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>? If he had not had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> of his own, I and my children must have had all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, you know; and it is the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> we have ever had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> from him, except a few presents. Well! I am so happy! In a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> I shall have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> married. Mrs. Wickham! How well it sounds! And she was only sixteen last June. My dear Jane, I am in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flutter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.421" formerWord="flutter" newWord="charm" score="0.421">charm</span>, that I am sure I can't write; so I will dictate, and you write for me. We will settle with your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> afterwards; but the things should be ordered immediately."
<p>She was then proceeding to all the particulars of calico, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>muslin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="muslin" newWord="acquisition" score="0.488">acquisition</span>, and cambric, and would shortly have dictated some very plentiful orders, had not Jane, though with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>difficulty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.903" formerWord="difficulty" newWord="home" score="0.903">home</span>, persuaded her to wait till her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> was at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span> to be consulted. One <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="delay" newWord="affection" score="0.977">affection</span>, she observed, would be of small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>; and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> was too happy to be quite so obstinate as usual. Other schemes, too, came into her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>. 
<p>"I will go to Meryton,"said she,"as soon as I am dressed, and tell the good, good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> Philips. And as I come back, I can call on Lady Lucas and Mrs. Long. Kitty, run down and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>order</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="order" newWord="way" score="0.909">way</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>. An <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>airing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.241" formerWord="airing" newWord="diffident" score="0.241">diffident</span> would do me a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> of good, I am sure. Girls, can I do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> for you in Meryton? Oh! Here comes Hill! My dear Hill, have you heard the good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span>? Miss Lydia is going to be married; and you shall all have a bowl of punch to make merry at her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span>."
<p>Mrs. Hill began instantly to express her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span>. Elizabeth received her congratulations amongst the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span>, and then, sick of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>folly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="folly" newWord="walk" score="0.645">walk</span>, took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refuge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.246" formerWord="refuge" newWord="hedge-row" score="0.246">hedge-row</span> in her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, that she might think with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>freedom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="freedom" newWord="defence" score="0.297">defence</span>. 
<p>Poor Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> must, at best, be bad enough; but that it was no worse, she had need to be thankful. She felt it so; and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>though</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="though" newWord="life" score="0.866">life</span>, in looking forward, neither rational <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> nor worldly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prosperity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.66" formerWord="prosperity" newWord="countenance" score="0.66">countenance</span> could be justly expected for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, in looking back to what they had feared, only two hours ago, she felt all the advantages of what they had gained. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 50 
<p>
<p>Mr. Bennet had very often wished before this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> that, instead of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spending</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="spending" newWord="observation" score="0.569">observation</span> his whole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>, he had laid by an annual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="sum" newWord="horror" score="0.528">horror</span> for the better <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>provision</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="provision" newWord="exist" score="0.244">exist</span> of his children, and of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, if she survived him. He now wished it more than ever. Had he done his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>respect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="respect" newWord="happiness" score="0.955">happiness</span>, Lydia need not have been indebted to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> for whatever of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> could now be purchased for her. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> of prevailing on one of the most worthless young men in Great Britain to be her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> might then have rested in its proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>. 
<p>He was seriously concerned that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> of so little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> should be forwarded at the sole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.869" formerWord="expense" newWord="part" score="0.869">part</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.333" formerWord="brother-in-law" newWord="season" score="0.333">season</span>, and he was determined, if possible, to find out the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>extent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="extent" newWord="hand" score="0.79">hand</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span>, and to discharge the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>obligation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="obligation" newWord="deal" score="0.811">deal</span> as soon as he could. 
<p>When first Mr. Bennet had married, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>economy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.407" formerWord="economy" newWord="word" score="0.407">word</span> was held to be perfectly useless, for, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>, they were to have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> was to join in cutting off the entail, as soon as he should be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>age</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="age" newWord="affection" score="0.975">affection</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>widow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.739" formerWord="widow" newWord="attention" score="0.739">attention</span> and younger children would by that means be provided for. Five daughters successively entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, but yet the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> was to come; and Mrs. Bennet, for many years after Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>birth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="birth" newWord="sign" score="0.289">sign</span>, had been certain that he would. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span> had at last been despaired of, but it was then too late to be saving. Mrs. Bennet had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>economy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.407" formerWord="economy" newWord="word" score="0.407">word</span>, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>independence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="independence" newWord="encouragement" score="0.631">encouragement</span> had alone prevented their exceeding their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>. 
<p>Five thousand pounds was settled by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> articles on Mrs. Bennet and the children. But in what proportions it should be divided amongst the latter depended on the will of the parents. This was one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>, with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to Lydia, at least, which was now to be settled, and Mr. Bennet could have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hesitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="hesitation" newWord="fashion" score="0.31">fashion</span> in acceding to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span> before him. In terms of grateful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acknowledgment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="acknowledgment" newWord="silence" score="0.528">silence</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, though expressed most concisely, he then delivered on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="paper" newWord="hearing" score="0.645">hearing</span> his perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="approbation" newWord="paint" score="0.232">paint</span> of all that was done, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>willingness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.316" formerWord="willingness" newWord="comparison" score="0.316">comparison</span> to fulfil the engagements that had been made for him. He had never before supposed that, could Wickham be prevailed on to marry his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, it would be done with so little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inconvenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="inconvenience" newWord="affection" score="0.911">affection</span> to himself as by the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrangement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="arrangement" newWord="note" score="0.715">note</span>. He would scarcely be ten pounds a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span> the loser by the hundred that was to be paid them; for, what with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>board</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.738" formerWord="board" newWord="subject" score="0.738">subject</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pocket</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="pocket" newWord="blessing" score="0.325">blessing</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>allowance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="allowance" newWord="horror" score="0.293">horror</span>, and the continual presents in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> which passed to her through her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s hands, Lydia's expenses had been very little within that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.528" formerWord="sum" newWord="horror" score="0.528">horror</span>. 
<p>That it would be done with such trifling <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>exertion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="exertion" newWord="course" score="0.956">course</span> on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, too, was another very welcome <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> was to have as little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> as possible. When the first transports of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="rage" newWord="eye" score="0.412">eye</span> which had produced his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>activity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.891" formerWord="activity" newWord="aunt" score="0.891">aunt</span> in seeking her were over, he naturally returned to all his former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indolence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.498" formerWord="indolence" newWord="chief" score="0.498">chief</span>. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was soon dispatched; for, though dilatory in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>undertaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.446" formerWord="undertaking" newWord="desire" score="0.446">desire</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, he was quick in its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>execution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.494" formerWord="execution" newWord="worth" score="0.494">worth</span>. He begged to know further particulars of what he was indebted to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, but was too angry with Lydia to send any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>message</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.836" formerWord="message" newWord="worth" score="0.836">worth</span> to her. 
<p>The good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>news</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="news" newWord="brother" score="0.977">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spread</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.293" formerWord="spread" newWord="plague" score="0.293">plague</span> quickly through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, and with proportionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speed</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speed" newWord="feature" score="0.217">feature</span> through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span>. It was borne in the latter with decent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>philosophy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="philosophy" newWord="cousin" score="0.644">cousin</span>. To be sure, it would have been more for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> had Miss Lydia Bennet come upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; or, as the happiest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alternative</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.258" formerWord="alternative" newWord="escape" score="0.258">escape</span>, been secluded from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, in some distant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>farmhouse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="farmhouse" newWord="maidservant" score="0.26">maidservant</span>. But there was much to be talked of in marrying her; and the good-natured <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wishes</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="wishes" newWord="manufacture" score="0.219">manufacture</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>well-doing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="well-doing" newWord="lavender-water" score="0.263">lavender-water</span> which had proceeded before from all the spiteful old ladies in Meryton lost but a little of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span> in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> of circumstances, because with such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> was considered certain. 
<p>It was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> since Mrs. Bennet had been <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>downstairs</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="downstairs" newWord="day" score="0.713">day</span>; but on this happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> she again took her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>seat</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.704" formerWord="seat" newWord="sort" score="0.704">sort</span> at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>, and in spirits oppressively high. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sentiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="sentiment" newWord="haste" score="0.645">haste</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> gave a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>damp</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.418" formerWord="damp" newWord="humour" score="0.418">humour</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, which had been the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of her wishes since Jane was sixteen, was now on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accomplishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="accomplishment" newWord="extreme" score="0.366">extreme</span>, and her thoughts and her words ran wholly on those attendants of elegant nuptials, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.259" formerWord="fine" newWord="hint" score="0.259">hint</span> muslins, new carriages, and servants. She was busily searching through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> for a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, and, without knowing or considering what their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span> might be, rejected many as deficient in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>size</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.812" formerWord="size" newWord="longbourn" score="0.812">longbourn</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>. 
<p>"Haye Park might do,"said she,"if the Gouldings could quit it - - or the great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> at Stoke, if the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span> were larger; but Ashworth is too far off! I could not bear to have her ten miles from me; and as for Pulvis Lodge, the attics are dreadful."
<p>Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> allowed her to talk on without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span> while the servants remained. But when they had withdrawn, he said to her:"Mrs. Bennet, before you take any or all of these houses for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, let us come to a right <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span>. Into one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> they shall never have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admittance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.235" formerWord="admittance" newWord="grievance" score="0.235">grievance</span>. I will not encourage the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.388" formerWord="impudence" newWord="ear" score="0.388">ear</span> of either, by receiving them at Longbourn."
<p>A long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dispute</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="dispute" newWord="tenderest" score="0.249">tenderest</span> followed this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>declaration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="declaration" newWord="indignation" score="0.359">indignation</span>; but Mr. Bennet was firm. It soon led to another; and Mrs. Bennet found, with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>horror</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="horror" newWord="minute" score="0.867">minute</span>, that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> would not advance a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guinea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.233" formerWord="guinea" newWord="tax" score="0.233">tax</span> to buy clothes for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. He protested that she should receive from him no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mark</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="mark" newWord="enlargement" score="0.205">enlargement</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> whatever on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>. Mrs. Bennet could hardly comprehend it. That his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> could be carried to such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of inconceivable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> as to refuse his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>privilege</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.711" formerWord="privilege" newWord="woman" score="0.711">woman</span> without which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> would scarcely seem valid, exceeded all she could believe possible. She was more alive to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span> which her want of new clothes must reflect on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>'s nuptials, than to any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="shame" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span> at her eloping and living with Wickham a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortnight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="fortnight" newWord="affection" score="0.96">affection</span> before they took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth was now most heartily sorry that she had, from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, been led to make Mr. Darcy acquainted with their fears for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>; for since her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> would so shortly give the proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>termination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="termination" newWord="similarity" score="0.23">similarity</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span>, they might hope to conceal its unfavourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span> from all those who were not immediately on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span>. 
<p>She had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of its spreading farther through his means. There were few people on whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span> she would have more confidently depended; but, at the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, there was no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> whose <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s frailty would have mortified her so much - - not, however, from any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.831" formerWord="fear" newWord="family" score="0.831">family</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disadvantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="disadvantage" newWord="security" score="0.248">security</span> from it individually to herself, for, at any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.368" formerWord="rate" newWord="absence" score="0.368">absence</span>, there seemed a gulf impassable between them. Had Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> been concluded on the most honourable terms, it was not to be supposed that Mr. Darcy would connect himself with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> where, to every other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>, would now be added an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alliance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="alliance" newWord="aunt" score="0.784">aunt</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span> of the nearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> whom he so justly scorned. 
<p>From such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> she could not wonder that he would shrink. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of procuring her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>, which she had assured herself of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> in Derbyshire, could not in rational <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> survive such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.656" formerWord="blow" newWord="influence" score="0.656">influence</span> as this. She was humbled, she was grieved; she repented, though she hardly knew of what. She became jealous of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>esteem</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.718" formerWord="esteem" newWord="circumstance" score="0.718">circumstance</span>, when she could no longer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> to be benefited by it. She wanted to hear of him, when there seemed the least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="chance" newWord="time" score="0.924">time</span> of gaining <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span>. She was convinced that she could have been happy with him, when it was no longer likely they should meet. 
<p>What a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span> for him, as she often thought, could he know that the proposals which she had proudly spurned only four months ago, would now have been most gladly and gratefully received! He was as generous, she doubted not, as the most generous of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sex</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.52" formerWord="sex" newWord="compassion" score="0.52">compassion</span>; but while he was mortal, there must be a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>triumph</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.284" formerWord="triumph" newWord="self-denying" score="0.284">self-denying</span>. 
<p>She began now to comprehend that he was exactly the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> and talents, would most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="suit" newWord="happiness" score="0.882">happiness</span> her. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>, though unlike her own, would have answered all her wishes. It was an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>union</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="union" newWord="air" score="0.327">air</span> that must have been to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of both; by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liveliness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.397" formerWord="liveliness" newWord="chair" score="0.397">chair</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> might have been softened, his manners improved; and from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.797" formerWord="judgement" newWord="son" score="0.797">son</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, she must have received <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>benefit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.654" formerWord="benefit" newWord="astonishment" score="0.654">astonishment</span> of greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>. 
<p>But no such happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> could now teach the admiring <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>multitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="multitude" newWord="madam" score="0.321">madam</span> what connubial <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> really was. An <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>union</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="union" newWord="air" score="0.327">air</span> of a different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tendency</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.306" formerWord="tendency" newWord="dirt" score="0.306">dirt</span>, and precluding the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possibility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.623" formerWord="possibility" newWord="ease" score="0.623">ease</span> of the other, was soon to be formed in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. 
<p>How Wickham and Lydia were to be supported in tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>independence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.631" formerWord="independence" newWord="encouragement" score="0.631">encouragement</span>, she could not imagine. But how little of permanent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> could belong to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>couple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="couple" newWord="sat" score="0.244">sat</span> who were only brought together because their passions were stronger than their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span>, she could easily <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conjecture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="conjecture" newWord="wit" score="0.283">wit</span>. 
<p>* * * * * 
<p>Mr. Gardiner soon wrote again to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>. To Mr. Bennet's acknowledgments he <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>briefly</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.7" formerWord="briefly" newWord="her" score="0.7">her</span> replied, with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eagerness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="eagerness" newWord="nothing" score="0.862">nothing</span> to promote the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>welfare</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.549" formerWord="welfare" newWord="wait" score="0.549">wait</span> of any of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>; and concluded with entreaties that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> might never be mentioned to him again. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="principal" newWord="country" score="0.832">country</span> purport of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was to inform them that Mr. Wickham had resolved on quitting the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>militia</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.706" formerWord="militia" newWord="kind" score="0.706">kind</span>. 
<p>"It was greatly my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> that he should do so,"he added,"as soon as his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was fixed on. And I think you will agree with me, in considering the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span> from that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>corps</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="corps" newWord="yesterday" score="0.546">yesterday</span> as highly advisable, both on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> ' s. It is Mr. Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.68" formerWord="intention" newWord="world" score="0.68">world</span> to go into the regulars; and among his former friends, there are still some who are able and willing to assist him in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>army</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="army" newWord="key" score="0.289">key</span>. He has the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> of an ensigncy in General - - - -'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>, now quartered in the North. It is an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> to have it so far from this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kingdom</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="kingdom" newWord="child" score="0.412">child</span>. He promises fairly; and I hope among different people, where they may each have a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> to preserve, they will both be more prudent. I have written to Colonel Forster, to inform him of our present arrangements, and to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span> that he will satisfy the various creditors of Mr. Wickham in and near Brighton, with assurances of speedy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>payment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="payment" newWord="noise" score="0.516">noise</span>, for which I have pledged myself. And will you give yourself the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of carrying similar assurances to his creditors in Meryton, of whom I shall subjoin a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>list</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.485" formerWord="list" newWord="spite" score="0.485">spite</span> according to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>? He has given in all his debts; I hope at least he has not deceived us. Haggerston has our directions, and all will be completed in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span>. They will then join his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>, unless they are first invited to Longbourn; and I understand from Mrs. Gardiner, that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>niece</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="niece" newWord="love" score="0.853">love</span> is very desirous of seeing you all before she leaves the South. She is well, and begs to be dutifully remembered to you and your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. - - Yours, etc., 
<p>"E. GARDINER."
<p>Mr. Bennet and his daughters saw all the advantages of Wickham's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span> from the - - - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="shire" newWord="distrust" score="0.337">distrust</span> as clearly as Mr. Gardiner could do. But Mrs. Bennet was not so well pleased with it. Lydia's being settled in the North, just when she had expected most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>, for she had by no means given up her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>plan</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="plan" newWord="pleasure" score="0.79">pleasure</span> of their residing in Hertfordshire, was a severe <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>; and, besides, it was such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="pity" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> that Lydia should be taken from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span> where she was acquainted with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>, and had so many favourites. 
<p>"She is so fond of Mrs. Forster,"said she,"it will be quite shocking to send her away! And there are several of the young men, too, that she likes very much. The officers may not be so pleasant in General - - - -'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regiment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="regiment" newWord="family" score="0.93">family</span>."
<p>His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span>, for such it might be considered, of being admitted into her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> again before she set off for the North, received at first an absolute negative. But Jane and Elizabeth, who agreed in wishing, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s feelings and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>, that she should be noticed on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> by her parents, urged him so earnestly yet so rationally and so mildly, to receive her and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> at Longbourn, as soon as they were married, that he was prevailed on to think as they thought, and act as they wished. And their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> of knowing that she would be able to show her married <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbourhood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.675" formerWord="neighbourhood" newWord="duty" score="0.675">duty</span> before she was banished to the North. When Mr. Bennet wrote again to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, therefore, he sent his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>permission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="permission" newWord="newspaper" score="0.267">newspaper</span> for them to come; and it was settled, that as soon as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ceremony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.539" formerWord="ceremony" newWord="curiosity" score="0.539">curiosity</span> was over, they should proceed to Longbourn. Elizabeth was surprised, however, that Wickham should <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span> to such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>, and had she consulted only her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span>, any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> with him would have been the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of her wishes. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 51 
<p>
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> arrived; and Jane and Elizabeth felt for her probably more than she felt for herself. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> was sent to meet them at - - - -, and they were to return in it by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner-time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.671" formerWord="dinner-time" newWord="visit" score="0.671">visit</span>. Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> was dreaded by the elder Miss Bennets, and Jane more especially, who gave Lydia the feelings which would have attended herself, had she been the culprit, and was wretched in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> of what her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> must endure. 
<p>They came. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were assembled in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> to receive them. Smiles decked the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span> of Mrs. Bennet as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> drove up to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>; her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> looked impenetrably <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="grave" newWord="education" score="0.464">education</span>; her daughters, alarmed, anxious, uneasy. 
<p>Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> was heard in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vestibule</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="vestibule" newWord="self-importance" score="0.437">self-importance</span>; the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> was thrown open, and she ran into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> stepped forwards, embraced her, and welcomed her with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rapture</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.555" formerWord="rapture" newWord="consequence" score="0.555">consequence</span>; gave her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, with an affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>, to Wickham, who followed his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>; and wished them both <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span> with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alacrity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.813" formerWord="alacrity" newWord="acquaintance" score="0.813">acquaintance</span> which shewed no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. 
<p>Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="reception" newWord="plain" score="0.346">plain</span> from Mr. Bennet, to whom they then turned, was not quite so cordial. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> rather gained in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>austerity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.227" formerWord="austerity" newWord="extension" score="0.227">extension</span>; and he scarcely opened his lips. The easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> of the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>couple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="couple" newWord="sat" score="0.244">sat</span>, indeed, was enough to provoke him. Elizabeth was disgusted, and even Miss Bennet was shocked. Lydia was Lydia still; untamed, unabashed, wild, noisy, and fearless. She turned from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> to sister, demanding their congratulations; and when at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> they all sat down, looked eagerly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> of some little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alteration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="alteration" newWord="family" score="0.834">family</span> in it, and observed, with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span>, that it was a great while since she had been there. 
<p>Wickham was not at all more distressed than herself, but his manners were always so pleasing, that had his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> been exactly what they ought, his smiles and his easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>address</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="address" newWord="justice" score="0.729">justice</span>, while he claimed their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relationship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="relationship" newWord="minute" score="0.777">minute</span>, would have delighted them all.
