They shook hands with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cordiality</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.478" formerWord="cordiality" newWord="impression" score="0.478">impression</span>; and then, till her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> came down, she had to listen to all he had to say of his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and of Jane's perfections; and in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of his being a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lover</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="lover" newWord="return" score="0.676">return</span>, Elizabeth really believed all his expectations of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> to be rationally founded, because they had for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>basis</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.213" formerWord="basis" newWord="vow" score="0.213">vow</span> the excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span>, and super-excellent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> of Jane, and a general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>similarity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.329" formerWord="similarity" newWord="trifle" score="0.329">trifle</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taste</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="taste" newWord="credit" score="0.301">credit</span> between her and himself. 
<p>It was an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> of no common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> to them all; the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> of Miss Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> gave a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>glow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.765" formerWord="glow" newWord="evening" score="0.765">evening</span> of such sweet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>animation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.416" formerWord="animation" newWord="minute" score="0.416">minute</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, as made her look handsomer than ever. Kitty simpered and smiled, and hoped her turn was coming soon. Mrs. Bennet could not give her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span> or speak her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="approbation" newWord="paint" score="0.232">paint</span> in terms warm enough to satisfy her feelings, though she talked to Bingley of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else for half an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>; and when Mr. Bennet joined them at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span>, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> plainly showed how really happy he was. 
<p>Not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>, however, passed his lips in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>allusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.332" formerWord="allusion" newWord="haste" score="0.332">haste</span> to it, till their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span> took his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>; but as soon as he was gone, he turned to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, and said: 
<p>"Jane, I congratulate you. You will be a very happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>Jane went to him instantly, kissed him, and thanked him for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span>. 
<p>"You are a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>;"he replied,"and I have great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in thinking you will be so happily settled. I have not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of your doing very well together. Your tempers are by no means unlike. You are each of you so complying, that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> will ever be resolved on; so easy, that every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> will cheat you; and so generous, that you will always exceed your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>."
<p>"I hope not so. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Imprudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.334" formerWord="Imprudence" newWord="self" score="0.334">Self</span> or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thoughtlessness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.476" formerWord="thoughtlessness" newWord="spirit" score="0.476">spirit</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> matters would be unpardonable in me."
<p>"Exceed their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span>! My dear Mr. Bennet,"cried his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>,"what are you talking of? I was sure you could not be so beautiful for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>! <p>Wickham, Lydia, were all forgotten. Jane was beyond <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>competition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="competition" newWord="heaven" score="0.281">heaven</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>her</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="her" newWord="affection" score="0.986">affection</span> favourite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>. At that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, she cared for no other. Her younger sisters soon began to make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span> with her for objects of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> which she might in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>future</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="future" newWord="aunt" score="0.943">aunt</span> be able to dispense. 
<p>Mary petitioned for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> at Netherfield; and Kitty begged very hard for a few balls there every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>. 
<p>Bingley, from this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, was of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> a daily <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>; coming frequently before <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breakfast</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.725" formerWord="breakfast" newWord="influence" score="0.725">influence</span>, and always remaining till after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="supper" newWord="wonder" score="0.386">wonder</span>; unless when some barbarous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>neighbour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.762" formerWord="neighbour" newWord="way" score="0.762">way</span>, who could not be enough detested, had given him an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>invitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="invitation" newWord="aunt" score="0.96">aunt</span> to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> which he thought himself obliged to accept. 
<p>Elizabeth had now but little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>; for while he was present, Jane had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> to bestow on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> else; but she found herself considerably useful to both of them in those hours of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>separation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="separation" newWord="company" score="0.866">company</span> that must sometimes occur. In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>absence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="absence" newWord="minute" score="0.86">minute</span> of Jane, he always attached himself to Elizabeth, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of talking of her; and when Bingley was gone, Jane constantly sought the same means of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span>. 
<p>"He has made me so happy,"said she, one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>,"by telling me that he was totally ignorant of my being in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spring</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="spring" newWord="time" score="0.959">time</span>! I had not believed it possible."
<p>"I suspected as much,"replied Elizabeth."But how did he <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>account</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="account" newWord="family" score="0.991">family</span> for it?"
<p>"It must have been his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s doing. They were certainly no friends to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span> with me, which I cannot wonder at, since he might have chosen so much more advantageously in many respects. But when they see, as I trust they will, that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span> is happy with me, they will learn to be contented, and we shall be on good terms again; though we can never be what we once were to each other."
<p>"That is the most unforgiving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speech</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="speech" newWord="destroyer" score="0.217">destroyer</span>,"said Elizabeth,"that I ever heard you utter. Good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>! <p>"Would you believe it, Lizzy, that when he went to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> last November, he really loved me, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>persuasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="persuasion" newWord="friend" score="0.893">friend</span> of my being indifferent would have prevented his coming down again!"
<p>"He made a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mistake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="mistake" newWord="time" score="0.949">time</span> to be sure; but it is to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>modesty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="modesty" newWord="portionless" score="0.283">portionless</span>."
<p>This naturally introduced a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>panegyric</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.285" formerWord="panegyric" newWord="sophy" score="0.285">sophy</span> from Jane on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diffidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="diffidence" newWord="act" score="0.322">act</span>, and the little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> he put on his own good qualities. Elizabeth was pleased to find that he had not betrayed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>; for, though Jane had the most generous and forgiving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, she knew it was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> which must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prejudice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.751" formerWord="prejudice" newWord="arrival" score="0.751">arrival</span> her against him. 
<p>"I am certainly the most fortunate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span> that ever existed!"cried Jane."Oh! Lizzy, why am I thus singled from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, and blessed above them all! If I could but see you as happy! If there were but such another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> for you!"
<p>"If you were to give me forty such men, I never could be so happy as you. Till I have your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>, your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>goodness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="goodness" newWord="space" score="0.297">space</span>, I never can have your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. No, no, let me shift for myself; and, perhaps, if I have very good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>luck</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.535" formerWord="luck" newWord="order" score="0.535">order</span>, I may meet with another Mr. Collins in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> of affairs in the Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> could not be long a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secret</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.749" formerWord="secret" newWord="minute" score="0.749">minute</span>. Mrs. Bennet was privileged to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span> it to Mrs. Phillips, and she ventured, without any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>permission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="permission" newWord="newspaper" score="0.267">newspaper</span>, to do the same by all her neighbours in Meryton. 
<p>The Bennets were speedily pronounced to be the luckiest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, though only a few weeks before, when Lydia had first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>run</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.671" formerWord="run" newWord="society" score="0.671">society</span> away, they had been generally proved to be marked out for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misfortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.748" formerWord="misfortune" newWord="son" score="0.748">son</span>. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 56 
<p>
<p>One <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, about a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>week</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="week" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> after Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> with Jane had been formed, as he and the females of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> were sitting together in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.331" formerWord="dining-room" newWord="error" score="0.331">error</span>, their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> was suddenly drawn to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span>, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sound</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.726" formerWord="sound" newWord="object" score="0.726">object</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>; and they perceived a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chaise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="chaise" newWord="met" score="0.298">met</span> and four driving up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lawn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="lawn" newWord="residence" score="0.546">residence</span>. It was too early in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> for visitors, and besides, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>equipage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.412" formerWord="equipage" newWord="comfort" score="0.412">comfort</span> did not answer to that of any of their neighbours. The horses were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>post</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.838" formerWord="post" newWord="voice" score="0.838">voice</span>; and neither the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, nor the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>livery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="livery" newWord="laugh" score="0.256">laugh</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>servant</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.608" formerWord="servant" newWord="word" score="0.608">word</span> who preceded it, were familiar to them. As it was certain, however, that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>somebody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="somebody" newWord="yesterday" score="0.649">yesterday</span> was coming, Bingley instantly prevailed on Miss Bennet to avoid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confinement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.231" formerWord="confinement" newWord="elopement" score="0.231">elopement</span> of such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intrusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.247" formerWord="intrusion" newWord="revenge" score="0.247">revenge</span>, and walk away with him into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shrubbery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.596" formerWord="shrubbery" newWord="person" score="0.596">person</span>. They both set off, and the conjectures of the remaining three continued, though with little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span>, till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> was thrown open and their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span> entered. It was Lady Catherine de Bourgh. 
<p>They were of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> all intending to be surprised; but their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> was beyond their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>; and on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of Mrs. Bennet and Kitty, though she was perfectly unknown to them, even inferior to what Elizabeth felt. 
<p>She entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> with an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>air</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="air" newWord="sea" score="0.491">sea</span> more than usually ungracious, made no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reply</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="reply" newWord="brother" score="0.811">brother</span> to Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>salutation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.313" formerWord="salutation" newWord="service" score="0.313">service</span> than a slight <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inclination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.758" formerWord="inclination" newWord="mother" score="0.758">mother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>head</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="head" newWord="occasion" score="0.883">occasion</span>, and sat down without saying a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. Elizabeth had mentioned her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> on her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="entrance" newWord="week" score="0.915">week</span>, though no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>request</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.808" formerWord="request" newWord="none" score="0.808">none</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>introduction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.514" formerWord="introduction" newWord="note" score="0.514">note</span> had been made. 
<p>Mrs. Bennet, all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span>, though flattered by having a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="guest" newWord="mode" score="0.349">mode</span> of such high <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span>, received her with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>utmost</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="utmost" newWord="brother" score="0.947">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>. After sitting for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>, she said very stiffly to Elizabeth, 
<p>"I hope you are well, Miss Bennet. That <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>, I suppose, is your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>."
<p>Elizabeth replied very concisely that she was. 
<p>"And that I suppose is one of your sisters."
<p>"Yes, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>madam</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.699" formerWord="madam" newWord="year" score="0.699">year</span>,"said Mrs. Bennet, delighted to speak to Lady Catherine."She is my youngest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> but one. My youngest of all is lately married, and my eldest is somewhere about the grounds, walking with a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who, I believe, will soon become a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>."
<p>"You have a very small <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>park</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.845" formerWord="park" newWord="minute" score="0.845">minute</span> here,"returned Lady Catherine after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. 
<p>"It is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comparison</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.542" formerWord="comparison" newWord="spirit" score="0.542">spirit</span> of Rosings, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span>, I dare say; but I assure you it is much larger than Sir William Lucas ' s."
<p>"This must be a most inconvenient sitting <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>summer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.27" formerWord="summer" newWord="exposure" score="0.27">exposure</span>; the windows are full <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>west</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.337" formerWord="west" newWord="reliance" score="0.337">reliance</span>."
<p>Mrs. Bennet assured her that they never sat there after <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>, and then added: 
<p>"May I take the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liberty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="liberty" newWord="part" score="0.724">part</span> of asking your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> whether you left Mr. and Mrs. Collins well."
<p>"Yes, very well. I saw them the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> before last."
<p>Elizabeth now expected that she would produce a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> for her from Charlotte, as it seemed the only probable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span> for her calling. But no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> appeared, and she was completely puzzled. 
<p>Mrs. Bennet, with great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, begged her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> to take some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>refreshment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.661" formerWord="refreshment" newWord="minute" score="0.661">minute</span>; but Lady Catherine very resolutely, and not very politely, declined <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eating</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.525" formerWord="eating" newWord="respect" score="0.525">respect</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>; and then, rising up, said to Elizabeth, 
<p>"Miss Bennet, there seemed to be a prettyish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wilderness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.243" formerWord="wilderness" newWord="lieu" score="0.243">lieu</span> on one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lawn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.546" formerWord="lawn" newWord="residence" score="0.546">residence</span>. I should be glad to take a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> in it, if you will <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="favour" newWord="time" score="0.976">time</span> me with your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>."
<p>"Go, my dear,"cried her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>,"and show her ladyship about the different walks. I think she will be pleased with the hermitage."
<p>Elizabeth obeyed, and running into her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>parasol</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="parasol" newWord="littleness" score="0.256">littleness</span>, attended her noble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.349" formerWord="guest" newWord="mode" score="0.349">mode</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>downstairs</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="downstairs" newWord="day" score="0.713">day</span>. As they passed through the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span>, Lady Catherine opened the doors into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dining-parlour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="dining-parlour" newWord="gown" score="0.366">gown</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drawing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.707" formerWord="drawing-room" newWord="room" score="0.707">room</span>, and pronouncing them, after a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>survey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="survey" newWord="officer" score="0.229">officer</span>, to be decent looking rooms, walked on. 
<p>Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> remained at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span>, and Elizabeth saw that her waiting-woman was in it. They proceeded in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span> along the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.32" formerWord="gravel" newWord="dirt" score="0.32">dirt</span> walk that led to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>copse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="copse" newWord="inmate" score="0.315">inmate</span>; Elizabeth was determined to make no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="effort" newWord="excursion" score="0.239">excursion</span> for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> who was now more than usually insolent and disagreeable. 
<p>"How could I ever think her like her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>?"said she, as she looked in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>. 
<p>As soon as they entered the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>copse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="copse" newWord="inmate" score="0.315">inmate</span>, Lady Catherine began in the following <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>: - - 
<p>"You can be at no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span>, Miss Bennet, to understand the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> hither. Your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conscience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="conscience" newWord="happiness" score="0.947">happiness</span>, must tell you why I come."
<p>Elizabeth looked with unaffected <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>. 
<p>"Indeed, you are mistaken, Madam. I have not been at all able to account for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> of seeing you here."
<p>"Miss Bennet,"replied her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, in an angry <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span>,"you ought to know, that I am not to be trifled with. But however insincere you may choose to be, you shall not find me so. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span> has ever been celebrated for its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sincerity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.339" formerWord="sincerity" newWord="manuscript" score="0.339">manuscript</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>frankness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="frankness" newWord="poultry" score="0.36">poultry</span>, and in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> of such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> as this, I shall certainly not depart from it. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span> of a most alarming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="nature" newWord="time" score="0.94">time</span> reached me two days ago. I was told that not only your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> of being most advantageously married, but that you, that Miss Elizabeth Bennet, would, in all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likelihood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="likelihood" newWord="inn" score="0.289">inn</span>, be soon afterwards united to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, Mr. Darcy. Though I know it must be a scandalous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>falsehood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="falsehood" newWord="hyacinth" score="0.244">hyacinth</span>, though I would not injure him so much as to suppose the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span> of it possible, I instantly resolved on setting off for this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, that I might make my sentiments known to you."
<p>"If you believed it impossible to be true,"said Elizabeth, colouring with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disdain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.402" formerWord="disdain" newWord="park" score="0.402">park</span>,"I wonder you took the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of coming so far. What could your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> propose by it?"
<p>"At once to insist upon having such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span> universally contradicted."
<p>"Your coming to Longbourn, to see me and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>,"said Elizabeth coolly,"will be rather a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confirmation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.648" formerWord="confirmation" newWord="surprise" score="0.648">surprise</span> of it; if, indeed, such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span> is in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>existence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.587" formerWord="existence" newWord="countenance" score="0.587">countenance</span>."
<p>"If! Do you then pretend to be ignorant of it? Has it not been industriously circulated by yourselves? Do you not know that such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span> is spread abroad?"
<p>"I never heard that it was."
<p>"And can you likewise declare, that there is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>foundation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="foundation" newWord="suspicion" score="0.319">suspicion</span> for it?"
<p>"I do not pretend to possess equal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>frankness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="frankness" newWord="poultry" score="0.36">poultry</span> with your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>. You may ask questions which I shall not choose to answer."
<p>"This is not to be borne. Miss Bennet, I insist on being satisfied. Has he, has my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, made you an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>?"
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> has declared it to be impossible."
<p>"It ought to be so; it must be so, while he retains the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span>. But your arts and allurements may, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>infatuation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.356" formerWord="infatuation" newWord="listener" score="0.356">listener</span>, have made him forget what he owes to himself and to all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>. You may have drawn him in."
<p>"If I have, I shall be the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> to confess it."
<p>"Miss Bennet, do you know who I am? I have not been accustomed to such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>language</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="language" newWord="fuss" score="0.216">fuss</span> as this. I am almost the nearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> he has in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, and am entitled to know all his dearest concerns."
<p>"But you are not entitled to know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>; nor will such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> as this, ever induce me to be explicit."
<p>"Let me be rightly understood. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>, to which you have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>presumption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="presumption" newWord="subject" score="0.729">subject</span> to aspire, can never take <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>. No, never. Mr. Darcy is engaged to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. Now what have you to say?"
<p>"Only this; that if he is so, you can have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to suppose he will make an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>offer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.771" formerWord="offer" newWord="attempt" score="0.771">attempt</span> to me."
<p>Lady Catherine hesitated for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, and then replied: 
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> between them is of a peculiar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. From their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>infancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.761" formerWord="infancy" newWord="engagement" score="0.761">engagement</span>, they have been intended for each other. It was the favourite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>, as well as of hers. While in their cradles, we planned the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>union</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="union" newWord="air" score="0.327">air</span>: and now, at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> when the wishes of both sisters would be accomplished in their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, to be prevented by a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> of inferior <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>birth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="birth" newWord="sign" score="0.289">sign</span>, of no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, and wholly unallied to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>! Do you pay no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to the wishes of his friends? To his tacit <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> with Miss de Bourgh? Are you lost to every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>propriety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="propriety" newWord="none" score="0.837">none</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delicacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.4" formerWord="delicacy" newWord="something" score="0.4">something</span>? <p>"Yes, and I had heard it before. But what is that to me? If there is no other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span> to my marrying your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, I shall certainly not be kept from it by knowing that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> wished him to marry Miss de Bourgh. You both did as much as you could in planning the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. Its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>completion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.231" formerWord="completion" newWord="confirmation" score="0.231">confirmation</span> depended on others.
