And if I am that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>, why may not I accept him?"
<p>"Because <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>decorum</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.733" formerWord="decorum" newWord="none" score="0.733">none</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>prudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.805" formerWord="prudence" newWord="hope" score="0.805">hope</span>, nay, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span>, forbid it. Yes, Miss Bennet, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="interest" newWord="family" score="0.981">family</span>; for do not expect to be noticed by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> or friends, if you wilfully act against the inclinations of all. You will be censured, slighted, and despised, by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.392" formerWord="everyone" newWord="value" score="0.392">value</span> connected with him. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>alliance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="alliance" newWord="aunt" score="0.784">aunt</span> will be a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span>; your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> will never even be mentioned by any of us."
<p>"These are heavy misfortunes,"replied Elizabeth."But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> of Mr. Darcy must have such extraordinary sources of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> necessarily attached to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, that she could, upon the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> to repine."
<p>"Obstinate, headstrong <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>! I am ashamed of you! Is this your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> for my attentions to you last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spring</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="spring" newWord="time" score="0.959">time</span>? Is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> due to me on that score? Let us sit down. You are to understand, Miss Bennet, that I came here with the determined <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> of carrying my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span>; nor will I be dissuaded from it. I have not been used to submit to any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>'s whims. I have not been in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>habit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.527" formerWord="habit" newWord="profession" score="0.527">profession</span> of brooking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span>."
<p>"That will make your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>present</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="present" newWord="brother" score="0.959">brother</span> more pitiable; but it will have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> on me."
<p>"I will not be interrupted. Hear me in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>silence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="silence" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> and my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span> are formed for each other. They are descended, on the maternal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, from the same noble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>line</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="line" newWord="degree" score="0.754">degree</span>; and, on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> ' s, from respectable, honourable, and ancient - - though untitled - - families. Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> on both sides is splendid. They are destined for each other by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>voice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="voice" newWord="brother" score="0.984">brother</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>member</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.325" formerWord="member" newWord="furniture" score="0.325">furniture</span> of their respective houses; and what is to divide them? The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>upstart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.268" formerWord="upstart" newWord="distrust" score="0.268">distrust</span> pretensions of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, connections, or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>. Is this to be endured! But it must not, shall not be. If you were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span> of your own good, you would not wish to quit the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sphere</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.291" formerWord="sphere" newWord="supply" score="0.291">supply</span> in which you have been brought up."
<p>"In marrying your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, I should not consider myself as quitting that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sphere</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.291" formerWord="sphere" newWord="supply" score="0.291">supply</span>. He is a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>; I am a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>; so far we are equal."
<p>"True. You are a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>. But who was your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>? Who are your uncles and aunts? Do not imagine me ignorant of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.499" formerWord="condition" newWord="round" score="0.499">round</span>."
<p>"Whatever my connections may be,"said Elizabeth,"if your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span> does not object to them, they can be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to you."
<p>"Tell me once for all, are you engaged to him?"
<p>Though Elizabeth would not, for the mere <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> of obliging Lady Catherine, have answered this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span>, she could not but say, after a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deliberation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.431" formerWord="deliberation" newWord="choice" score="0.431">choice</span>: 
<p>"I am not."
<p>Lady Catherine seemed pleased. 
<p>"And will you promise me, never to enter into such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span>?"
<p>"I will make no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>."
<p>"Miss Bennet I am shocked and astonished. I expected to find a more reasonable young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>. But do not deceive yourself into a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> that I will ever recede. I shall not go away till you have given me the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> I require."
<p>"And I certainly never shall give it. I am not to be intimidated into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> so wholly unreasonable. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> wants Mr. Darcy to marry your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>; but would my giving you the wished-for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> make their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> at all more probable? Supposing him to be attached to me, would my refusing to accept his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> make him <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> to bestow it on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>? Allow me to say, Lady Catherine, that the arguments with which you have supported this extraordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> have been as frivolous as the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> was ill-judged. You have widely mistaken my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>character</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="character" newWord="family" score="0.977">family</span>, if you think I can be worked on by such persuasions as these. How far your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span> might approve of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> in his affairs, I cannot tell; but you have certainly no right to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> yourself in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span>. I must beg, therefore, to be importuned no farther on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>."
<p>"Not so hasty, if you please. I have by no means done. To all the objections I have already urged, I have still another to add. I am no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>stranger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.359" formerWord="stranger" newWord="humour" score="0.359">humour</span> to the particulars of your youngest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s infamous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elopement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.305" formerWord="elopement" newWord="barouche" score="0.305">barouche</span>. I know it all; that the young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s marrying her was a patched-up <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, at the expence of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> and uncles. And is such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span> to be my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>? Is her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> of his late <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>steward</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="steward" newWord="sister" score="0.85">sister</span>, to be his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>? Heaven and earth! - - of what are you thinking? Are the shades of Pemberley to be thus polluted?"
<p>"You can now have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> further to say,"she resentfully answered."You have insulted me in every possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>method</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="method" newWord="field" score="0.298">field</span>. I must beg to return to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>."
<p>And she rose as she spoke. Lady Catherine rose also, and they turned back. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> was highly incensed. 
<p>"You have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>, then, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>! Unfeeling, selfish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>girl</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="girl" newWord="man" score="0.988">man</span>! Do you not consider that a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> with you must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disgrace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="disgrace" newWord="time" score="0.857">time</span> him in the eyes of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span>?"
<p>"Lady Catherine, I have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> further to say. You know my sentiments."
<p>"You are then resolved to have him?"
<p>"I have said no such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>. I am only resolved to act in that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, which will, in my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, constitute my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.357" formerWord="reference" newWord="rank" score="0.357">rank</span> to you, or to any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> so wholly unconnected with me."
<p>"It is well. You refuse, then, to oblige me. You refuse to obey the claims of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span>, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>. You are determined to ruin him in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span> of all his friends, and make him the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contempt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.724" formerWord="contempt" newWord="return" score="0.724">return</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>."
<p>"Neither <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span>, nor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>honour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="honour" newWord="happiness" score="0.986">happiness</span>, nor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>,"replied Elizabeth,"have any possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>claim</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.335" formerWord="claim" newWord="shut" score="0.335">shut</span> on me, in the present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>instance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="instance" newWord="minute" score="0.464">minute</span>. No <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="principle" newWord="town" score="0.858">town</span> of either would be violated by my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> with Mr. Darcy. And with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.386" formerWord="resentment" newWord="papa" score="0.386">papa</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indignation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.908" formerWord="indignation" newWord="anything" score="0.908">anything</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, if the former were excited by his marrying me, it would not give me one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span> - - and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> in general would have too much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> to join in the scorn."
<p>"And this is your real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>! This is your final <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolve</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.256" formerWord="resolve" newWord="convent" score="0.256">convent</span>! Very well. I shall now know how to act. Do not imagine, Miss Bennet, that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ambition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.297" formerWord="ambition" newWord="half" score="0.297">half</span> will ever be gratified. I came to try you. I hoped to find you reasonable; but, depend upon it, I will carry my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>."
<p>In this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> Lady Catherine talked on, till they were at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span>, when, turning hastily <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span>, she added,"I take no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.931" formerWord="leave" newWord="friend" score="0.931">friend</span> of you, Miss Bennet. I send no compliments to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>. You deserve no such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. I am most seriously displeased."
<p>Elizabeth made no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>; and without attempting to persuade her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> to return into the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>, walked quietly into it herself. She heard the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>carriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="carriage" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>drive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.837" formerWord="drive" newWord="door" score="0.837">door</span> away as she proceeded up stairs. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> impatiently met her at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>door</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="door" newWord="time" score="0.978">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dressing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.868" formerWord="dressing-room" newWord="kind" score="0.868">kind</span>, to ask why Lady Catherine would not come in again and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> herself. 
<p>"She did not choose it,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>,"she would go."
<p>"She is a very fine-looking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>! and her calling here was prodigiously civil! for she only came, I suppose, to tell us the Collinses were well. She is on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>road</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.796" formerWord="road" newWord="deal" score="0.796">deal</span> somewhere, I dare say, and so, passing through Meryton, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> she might as well call on you. I suppose she had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> particular to say to you, Lizzy?"
<p>Elizabeth was forced to give into a little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>falsehood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="falsehood" newWord="hyacinth" score="0.244">hyacinth</span> here; for to acknowledge the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>substance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.746" formerWord="substance" newWord="deal" score="0.746">deal</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> was impossible. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 57 
<p>
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discomposure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.279" formerWord="discomposure" newWord="agitation" score="0.279">agitation</span> of spirits which this extraordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span> threw Elizabeth into, could not be easily overcome; nor could she, for many hours, learn to think of it less than incessantly. Lady Catherine, it appeared, had actually taken the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> from Rosings, for the sole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> of breaking off her supposed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> with Mr. Darcy. It was a rational <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scheme</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="scheme" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>, to be sure! but from what the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> could originate, Elizabeth was at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> to imagine; till she recollected that his being the intimate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> of Bingley, and her being the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> of Jane, was enough, at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> of one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wedding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="wedding" newWord="brother" score="0.924">brother</span> made <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>everybody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="everybody" newWord="word" score="0.754">word</span> eager for another, to supply the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>. She had not herself forgotten to feel that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> must bring them more frequently together. And her neighbours at Lucas Lodge, therefore ( for through their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span> with the Collinses, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span>, she concluded, had reached Lady Catherine ), had only set that down as almost certain and immediate, which she had looked forward to as possible at some future <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. 
<p>In revolving Lady Catherine's expressions, however, she could not help feeling some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uneasiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="uneasiness" newWord="disquiet" score="0.229">disquiet</span> as to the possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> of her persisting in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span>. From what she had said of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> to prevent their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, it occurred to Elizabeth that she must meditate an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>; and how he might take a similar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>representation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.757" formerWord="representation" newWord="moment" score="0.757">moment</span> of the evils attached to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>connection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.586" formerWord="connection" newWord="fortune" score="0.586">fortune</span> with her, she dared not pronounce. She knew not the exact <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>degree</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="degree" newWord="sister" score="0.982">sister</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, or his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dependence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="dependence" newWord="conversation" score="0.854">conversation</span> on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.91" formerWord="judgment" newWord="rest" score="0.91">rest</span>, but it was natural to suppose that he thought much higher of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span> than she could do; and it was certain that, in enumerating the miseries of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> with one, whose immediate connections were so unequal to his own, his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> would address him on his weakest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>side</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="side" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>. With his notions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dignity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.694" formerWord="dignity" newWord="idea" score="0.694">idea</span>, he would probably feel that the arguments, which to Elizabeth had appeared weak and ridiculous, contained much good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> and solid <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reasoning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="reasoning" newWord="err" score="0.229">err</span>. 
<p>If he had been wavering before as to what he should do, which had often seemed likely, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.764" formerWord="advice" newWord="part" score="0.764">part</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entreaty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="entreaty" newWord="card" score="0.361">card</span> of so near a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> might settle every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, and determine him at once to be as happy as <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dignity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.694" formerWord="dignity" newWord="idea" score="0.694">idea</span> unblemished could make him. In that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span> he would return no more. Lady Catherine might see him in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> through <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span> to Bingley of coming again to Netherfield must give <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. 
<p>"If, therefore, an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" newWord="experience" score="0.41">experience</span> for not keeping his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> should come to his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> within a few days,"she added,"I shall know how to understand it. I shall then give over every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>constancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.324" formerWord="constancy" newWord="weakness" score="0.324">weakness</span>. If he is satisfied with only regretting me, when he might have obtained my affections and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>, I shall soon cease to regret him at all."
<p>* * * * * 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, on hearing who their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span> had been, was very great; but they obligingly satisfied it, with the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="supposition" newWord="gravity" score="0.327">gravity</span> which had appeased Mrs. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span>; and Elizabeth was spared from much teasing on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. 
<p>The next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>, as she was going <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>downstairs</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.713" formerWord="downstairs" newWord="day" score="0.713">day</span>, she was met by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, who came out of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span> with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hand</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="hand" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span>. 
<p>"Lizzy,"said he,"I was going to look for you; come into my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>."
<p>She followed him thither; and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> to know what he had to tell her was heightened by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>supposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="supposition" newWord="gravity" score="0.327">gravity</span> of its being in some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> connected with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> he held. It suddenly struck her that it might be from Lady Catherine; and she anticipated with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dismay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="dismay" newWord="variety" score="0.267">variety</span> all the consequent explanations. 
<p>She followed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.239" formerWord="fire" newWord="self" score="0.239">self</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>, and they both sat down. He then said, 
<p>"I have received a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> that has astonished me exceedingly. As it principally concerns yourself, you ought to know its contents. I did not know before, that I had two daughters on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brink</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="brink" newWord="tremor" score="0.229">tremor</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matrimony</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="matrimony" newWord="heart" score="0.858">heart</span>. Let me congratulate you on a very important <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conquest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.636" formerWord="conquest" newWord="pleasure" score="0.636">pleasure</span>."
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>colour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="colour" newWord="party" score="0.87">party</span> now rushed into Elizabeth's cheeks in the instantaneous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> of its being a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>, instead of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; and she was undetermined whether most to be pleased that he explained himself at all, or offended that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was not rather addressed to herself; when her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> continued: 
<p>"You look conscious. Young ladies have great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>penetration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="penetration" newWord="good" score="0.321">good</span> in such matters as these; but I think I may defy even your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sagacity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.3" formerWord="sagacity" newWord="soothing" score="0.3">soothing</span>, to discover the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admirer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.574" formerWord="admirer" newWord="expectation" score="0.574">expectation</span>. This <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> is from Mr. Collins."
<p>"From Mr. Collins! and what can he have to say?"
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="Something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">Mind</span> very much to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>. He begins with congratulations on the approaching nuptials of my eldest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span>, of which, it seems, he has been told by some of the good-natured, gossiping Lucases. I shall not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sport</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="sport" newWord="haste" score="0.437">haste</span> with your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impatience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="impatience" newWord="felicity" score="0.448">felicity</span>, by reading what he says on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span>. What relates to yourself, is as follows: ' Having thus offered you the sincere congratulations of Mrs. Collins and myself on this happy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>event</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.24" formerWord="event" newWord="gentlewoman" score="0.24">gentlewoman</span>, let me now add a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span> on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> of another; of which we have been advertised by the same <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>authority</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.859" formerWord="authority" newWord="aunt" score="0.859">aunt</span>. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> Elizabeth, it is presumed, will not long bear the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> of Bennet, after her elder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> has resigned it, and the chosen <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.358" formerWord="fate" newWord="penance" score="0.358">penance</span> may be reasonably looked up to as one of the most illustrious personages in this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>land</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.757" formerWord="land" newWord="girl" score="0.757">girl</span>. ' 
<p>"Can you possibly <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>guess</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.612" formerWord="guess" newWord="minute" score="0.612">minute</span>, Lizzy, who is meant by this?"' This young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> is blessed, in a peculiar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, with every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> of mortal can most <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span>, - - splendid <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>property</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.737" formerWord="property" newWord="degree" score="0.737">degree</span>, noble kindred, and extensive <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>patronage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="patronage" newWord="wall" score="0.303">wall</span>. Yet in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of all these temptations, let me warn my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> Elizabeth, and yourself, of what evils you may incur by a precipitate closure with this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span>'s proposals, which, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>, you will be inclined to take immediate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of. ' 
<p>"Have you any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span>, Lizzy, who this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> is? But now it comes out: 
<p>"' My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span> for cautioning you is as follows. ' 
<p>"Mr. Darcy, you see, is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>! It is admirable!"
<p>Elizabeth tried to join in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasantry</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="pleasantry" newWord="madam" score="0.41">madam</span>, but could only force one most reluctant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>. <p>"Are you not diverted?"
<p>"Oh! yes. Pray read on."
<p>"' After mentioning the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>likelihood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="likelihood" newWord="inn" score="0.289">inn</span> of this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> to her ladyship last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, she immediately, with her usual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>condescension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.616" formerWord="condescension" newWord="haste" score="0.616">haste</span>, expressed what she felt on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>; I thought it my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>duty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="duty" newWord="time" score="0.98">time</span> to give the speediest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> of this to my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span>, that she and her noble <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>admirer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.574" formerWord="admirer" newWord="expectation" score="0.574">expectation</span> may be aware of what they are about, and not run hastily into a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> which has not been properly sanctioned. ' Mr. Collins moreover adds, ' I am truly rejoiced that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cousin</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="cousin" newWord="happiness" score="0.967">happiness</span> Lydia's sad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>business</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="business" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> has been so well hushed up, and am only concerned that their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span> together before the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> took <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> should be so generally known. It was an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.614" formerWord="vice" newWord="minute" score="0.614">minute</span>; and had I been the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rector</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.659" formerWord="rector" newWord="profession" score="0.659">profession</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Longbourn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="Longbourn" newWord="family" score="0.971">Family</span>, I should very strenuously have opposed it. You ought certainly to forgive them, as a Christian, but never to admit them in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span>, or allow their names to be mentioned in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span>. ' That is his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="notion" newWord="intermission" score="0.312">intermission</span> of Christian <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forgiveness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="forgiveness" newWord="better" score="0.225">better</span>! The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> is only about his dear Charlotte's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, and his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> of a young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>olive-branch</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.314" formerWord="olive-branch" newWord="butcher" score="0.314">butcher</span>. But, Lizzy, you look as if you did not enjoy it. You are not going to be missish, I hope, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pretend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.78" formerWord="pretend" newWord="time" score="0.78">time</span> to be affronted at an idle <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span>. For what do we live, but to make <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sport</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.437" formerWord="sport" newWord="haste" score="0.437">haste</span> for our neighbours, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span> at them in our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span>?"
<p>"Oh!"cried Elizabeth,"I am excessively diverted. But it is so strange!"
<p>"Yes - - that is what makes it amusing. Had they fixed on any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> it would have been <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>; but his perfect <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>, and your pointed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span>, make it so delightfully absurd! Much as I abominate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span>, I would not give up Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>correspondence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.246" formerWord="correspondence" newWord="entree" score="0.246">entree</span> for any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consideration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="consideration" newWord="affection" score="0.914">affection</span>. Nay, when I read a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of his, I cannot help giving him the preference even over Wickham, much as I <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impudence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.388" formerWord="impudence" newWord="ear" score="0.388">ear</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hypocrisy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="hypocrisy" newWord="obstinacy" score="0.216">obstinacy</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.215" formerWord="son-in-law" newWord="diligence" score="0.215">diligence</span>. And pray, Lizzy, what said Lady Catherine about this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>report</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.554" formerWord="report" newWord="intimacy" score="0.554">intimacy</span>? Did she call to refuse her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>?"
<p>To this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> replied only with a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span>; and as it had been asked without the least <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span>, she was not distressed by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>repeating</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.301" formerWord="repeating" newWord="indignation" score="0.301">indignation</span> it. Elizabeth had never been more at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>loss</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="loss" newWord="brother" score="0.969">brother</span> to make her feelings appear what they were not. It was necessary to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>laugh</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.578" formerWord="laugh" newWord="horror" score="0.578">horror</span>, when she would rather have cried. Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> had most cruelly mortified her, by what he said of Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>, and she could do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but wonder at such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>want</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="want" newWord="time" score="0.938">time</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>penetration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="penetration" newWord="good" score="0.321">good</span>, or fear that perhaps, instead of his seeing too little, she might have fancied too much. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 58 
<p>
<p>Instead of receiving any such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>excuse</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.41" formerWord="excuse" newWord="experience" score="0.41">experience</span> from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>, as Elizabeth <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> expected Mr. Bingley to do, he was able to bring Darcy with him to Longbourn before many days had passed after Lady Catherine's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span>. The gentlemen arrived early; and, before Mrs. Bennet had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to tell him of their having seen his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, of which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> sat in momentary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dread</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="dread" newWord="part" score="0.818">part</span>, Bingley, who wanted to be alone with Jane, proposed their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>all</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="all" newWord="mean" score="0.275">mean</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span> out. It was agreed to. Mrs. Bennet was not in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>habit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.527" formerWord="habit" newWord="profession" score="0.527">profession</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="walking" newWord="sister" score="0.933">sister</span>; Mary could never spare <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>; but the remaining five <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>set</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.919" formerWord="set" newWord="idea" score="0.919">idea</span> off together. Bingley and Jane, however, soon allowed the others to outstrip them. They lagged behind, while Elizabeth, Kitty, and Darcy were to entertain each other. Very little was said by either; Kitty was too much afraid of him to talk; Elizabeth was secretly forming a desperate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span>; and perhaps he might be doing the same. 
<p>They walked towards the Lucases, because Kitty wished to call upon Maria; and as Elizabeth saw no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for making it a general <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>concern</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.862" formerWord="concern" newWord="sister" score="0.862">sister</span>, when Kitty left them she went boldly on with him alone. Now was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> to be executed, and, while her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> was high, she immediately said: 
<p>"Mr. Darcy, I am a very selfish <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span>; and, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of giving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span> to my own feelings, care not how much I may be wounding yours. I can no longer help thanking you for your unexampled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> to my poor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. Ever since I have known it, I have been most anxious to acknowledge to you how gratefully I feel it. Were it known to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, I should not have merely my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> to express."
<p>"I am sorry, exceedingly sorry,"replied Darcy, in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="tone" newWord="sister" score="0.943">sister</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>emotion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.91" formerWord="emotion" newWord="affection" score="0.91">affection</span>,"that you have ever been informed of what may, in a mistaken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>light</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="light" newWord="composure" score="0.302">composure</span>, have given you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uneasiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="uneasiness" newWord="disquiet" score="0.229">disquiet</span>. I did not think Mrs. Gardiner was so little to be trusted."
<p>"You must not blame my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>.
