Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thoughtlessness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.476" formerWord="thoughtlessness" newWord="spirit" score="0.476">spirit</span> first betrayed to me that you had been concerned in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>; and, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span>, I could not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> till I knew the particulars. Let me thank you again and again, in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> of all my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, for that generous <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>compassion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="compassion" newWord="family" score="0.961">family</span> which induced you to take so much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bear</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.298" formerWord="bear" newWord="heiress" score="0.298">heiress</span> so many mortifications, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of discovering them."
<p>"If you will thank me,"he replied,"let it be for yourself alone. That the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of giving <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to you might add force to the other inducements which led me on, I shall not attempt to deny. But your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> owe me <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span>. Much as I respect them, I believe I thought only of you."
<p>Elizabeth was too much embarrassed to say a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span>. After a short <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="pause" newWord="word" score="0.649">word</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>companion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.924" formerWord="companion" newWord="affection" score="0.924">affection</span> added,"You are too generous to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trifle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.861" formerWord="trifle" newWord="friend" score="0.861">friend</span> with me. If your feelings are still what they were last April, tell me so at once. My affections and wishes are unchanged, but one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>word</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="word" newWord="sister" score="0.969">sister</span> from you will silence me on this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> for ever."
<p>Elizabeth, feeling all the more than common <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>awkwardness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="awkwardness" newWord="disturbance" score="0.261">disturbance</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anxiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.898" formerWord="anxiety" newWord="life" score="0.898">life</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, now forced herself to speak; and immediately, though not very fluently, gave him to understand that her sentiments had undergone so <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>material</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="material" newWord="landing-place" score="0.253">landing-place</span> a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span>, since the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>period</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="period" newWord="sister" score="0.944">sister</span> to which he alluded, as to make her receive with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> his present assurances. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> which this reply produced, was such as he had probably never felt before; and he expressed himself on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> as sensibly and as warmly as a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> violently in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> can be supposed to do. Had Elizabeth been able to encounter his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>eye</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.94" formerWord="eye" newWord="appearance" score="0.94">appearance</span>, she might have seen how well the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of heartfelt <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>, diffused over his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, became him; but, though she could not look, she could listen, and he told her of feelings, which, in proving of what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>importance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.289" formerWord="importance" newWord="fruit" score="0.289">fruit</span> she was to him, made his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span> more valuable. 
<p>They walked on, without knowing in what <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span>. There was too much to be thought, and felt, and said, for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> to any other objects. She soon learnt that they were indebted for their present good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>understanding</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.721" formerWord="understanding" newWord="dinner" score="0.721">dinner</span> to the efforts of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, who did call on him in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> through London, and there relate her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>journey</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="journey" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> to Longbourn, its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>motive</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.923" formerWord="motive" newWord="brother" score="0.923">brother</span>, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>substance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.746" formerWord="substance" newWord="deal" score="0.746">deal</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> with Elizabeth; <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dwelling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="dwelling" newWord="family" score="0.784">family</span> emphatically on every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.794" formerWord="expression" newWord="woman" score="0.794">woman</span> of the latter which, in her ladyship's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>apprehension</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="apprehension" newWord="glance" score="0.572">glance</span>, peculiarly denoted her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>perverseness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="perverseness" newWord="look" score="0.477">look</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span>; in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> that such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.516" formerWord="relation" newWord="park" score="0.516">park</span> must assist her endeavours to obtain that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> from her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span> which she had refused to give. But, unluckily for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ladyship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.907" formerWord="ladyship" newWord="family" score="0.907">family</span>, its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> had been exactly contrariwise. 
<p>"It taught me to hope,"said he,"as I had scarcely ever allowed myself to hope before. I knew enough of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> to be certain that, had you been absolutely, irrevocably decided against me, you would have acknowledged it to Lady Catherine, frankly and openly."
<p>Elizabeth coloured and laughed as she replied,"Yes, you know enough of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>frankness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.36" formerWord="frankness" newWord="poultry" score="0.36">poultry</span> to believe me capable of that. After abusing you so abominably to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>face</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="face" newWord="reproach" score="0.255">reproach</span>, I could have no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>scruple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.221" formerWord="scruple" newWord="dinner-party" score="0.221">dinner-party</span> in abusing you to all your relations."
<p>"What did you say of me, that I did not deserve? For, though your accusations were ill-founded, formed on mistaken <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>premises</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.23" formerWord="premises" newWord="cup" score="0.23">cup</span>, my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to you at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> had merited the severest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.847" formerWord="reproof" newWord="family" score="0.847">family</span>. It was unpardonable. I cannot think of it without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>abhorrence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.454" formerWord="abhorrence" newWord="dirt" score="0.454">dirt</span>."
<p>"We will not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quarrel</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="quarrel" newWord="scheme" score="0.685">scheme</span> for the greater <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>blame</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.59" formerWord="blame" newWord="anger" score="0.59">anger</span> annexed to that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>,"said Elizabeth."The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span> of neither, if strictly examined, will be irreproachable; but since then, we have both, I hope, improved in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>."
<p>"I cannot be so easily reconciled to myself. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>recollection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.229" formerWord="recollection" newWord="delivery" score="0.229">delivery</span> of what I then said, of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conduct</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="conduct" newWord="kind" score="0.943">kind</span>, my manners, my expressions during the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whole</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="whole" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of it, is now, and has been many months, inexpressibly painful to me. Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproof</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.847" formerWord="reproof" newWord="family" score="0.847">family</span>, so well applied, I shall never forget: ' had you behaved in a more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentlemanlike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.79" formerWord="gentlemanlike" newWord="time" score="0.79">time</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>. ' Those were your words. You know not, you can scarcely conceive, how they have tortured me; - - though it was some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, I confess, before I was reasonable enough to allow their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>."
<p>"I was certainly very far from expecting them to make so strong an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="impression" newWord="part" score="0.871">part</span>. I had not the smallest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of their being ever felt in such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>"I can easily believe it. You thought me then devoid of every proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span>, I am sure you did. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>turn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.281" formerWord="turn" newWord="control" score="0.281">control</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>countenance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="countenance" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> I shall never forget, as you said that I could not have addressed you in any possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> that would induce you to accept me."
<p>"Oh! do not repeat what I then said. These recollections will not do at all. I assure you that I have long been most heartily ashamed of it."
<p>Darcy mentioned his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>."Did it,"said he,"did it soon make you think better of me? Did you, on reading it, give any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> to its contents?"
<p>She explained what its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> on her had been, and how gradually all her former prejudices had been removed. 
<p>"I knew,"said he,"that what I wrote must give you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span>, but it was necessary. I hope you have destroyed the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. There was one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>part</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="part" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> especially, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="opening" newWord="subject" score="0.685">subject</span> of it, which I should <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dread</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.818" formerWord="dread" newWord="part" score="0.818">part</span> your having the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> of reading again. I can remember some expressions which might justly make you hate me."
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> shall certainly be burnt, if you believe it essential to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>preservation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.245" formerWord="preservation" newWord="dose" score="0.245">dose</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>; but, though we have both <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> to think my opinions not entirely unalterable, they are not, I hope, quite so easily changed as that implies."
<p>"When I wrote that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>,"replied Darcy,"I believed myself perfectly calm and cool, but I am since convinced that it was written in a dreadful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bitterness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.666" formerWord="bitterness" newWord="countenance" score="0.666">countenance</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spirit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="spirit" newWord="day" score="0.952">day</span>."
<p>"The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, perhaps, began in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>bitterness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.666" formerWord="bitterness" newWord="countenance" score="0.666">countenance</span>, but it did not end so. The adieu is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>charity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.874" formerWord="charity" newWord="affection" score="0.874">affection</span> itself. But think no more of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. The feelings of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> who wrote, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>person</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="person" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> who received it, are now so widely different from what they were then, that every unpleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circumstance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="circumstance" newWord="thing" score="0.973">thing</span> attending it ought to be forgotten. You must learn some of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>philosophy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="philosophy" newWord="cousin" score="0.644">cousin</span>. Think only of the past as its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>remembrance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.28" formerWord="remembrance" newWord="parting" score="0.28">parting</span> gives you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>"I cannot give you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> for any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>philosophy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="philosophy" newWord="cousin" score="0.644">cousin</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. Your retrospections must be so totally void of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reproach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.255" formerWord="reproach" newWord="face" score="0.255">face</span>, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>contentment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.436" formerWord="contentment" newWord="discussion" score="0.436">discussion</span> arising from them is not of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>philosophy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="philosophy" newWord="cousin" score="0.644">cousin</span>, but, what is much better, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>innocence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="innocence" newWord="end" score="0.77">end</span>. But with me, it is not so. Painful recollections will intrude which cannot, which ought not, to be repelled. I have been a selfish being all my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>practice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.58" formerWord="practice" newWord="horror" score="0.58">horror</span>, though not in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>principle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="principle" newWord="town" score="0.858">town</span>. As a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> I was taught what was right, but I was not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>taught</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.315" formerWord="taught" newWord="poetry" score="0.315">poetry</span> to correct my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>. I was given good principles, but left to follow them in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conceit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="conceit" newWord="park" score="0.628">park</span>. Unfortunately an only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="son" newWord="brother" score="0.988">brother</span> ( for many years an only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> ), I was spoilt by my parents, who, though good themselves ( my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, particularly, all that was benevolent and amiable ), allowed, encouraged, almost taught me to be selfish and overbearing; to care for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>none</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="none" newWord="brother" score="0.986">brother</span> beyond my own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>circle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.774" formerWord="circle" newWord="home" score="0.774">home</span>; to think meanly of all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>; to wish at least to think meanly of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span> and worth compared with my own. Such I was, from eight to eight and twenty; and such I might still have been but for you, dearest, loveliest Elizabeth! What do I not owe you! You taught me a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lesson</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="lesson" newWord="patience" score="0.515">patience</span>, hard indeed at first, but most advantageous. By you, I was properly humbled. I came to you without a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reception</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="reception" newWord="plain" score="0.346">plain</span>. You showed me how insufficient were all my pretensions to please a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> worthy of being pleased."
<p>"Had you then persuaded yourself that I should?"
<p>"Indeed I had. What will you think of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vanity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="vanity" newWord="woman" score="0.921">woman</span>? I believed you to be wishing, expecting my addresses."
<p>"My manners must have been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fault</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.893" formerWord="fault" newWord="deal" score="0.893">deal</span>, but not intentionally, I assure you. I never meant to deceive you, but my spirits might often lead me wrong. How you must have hated me after that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>?"
<p>"Hate you! I was angry perhaps at first, but my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> soon began to take a proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span>."
<p>"I am almost afraid of asking what you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thought</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="thought" newWord="life" score="0.922">life</span> of me, when we met at Pemberley. You blamed me for coming?"
<p>"No indeed; I felt <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>."
<p>"Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> could not be greater than mine in being noticed by you. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conscience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="conscience" newWord="happiness" score="0.947">happiness</span> told me that I deserved no extraordinary <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>politeness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.853" formerWord="politeness" newWord="country" score="0.853">country</span>, and I confess that I did not expect to receive more than my due."
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> then,"replied Darcy,"was to show you, by every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> in my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span>, that I was not so mean as to resent the past; and I hoped to obtain your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forgiveness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="forgiveness" newWord="better" score="0.225">better</span>, to lessen your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ill</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="ill" newWord="son" score="0.95">son</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>, by letting you see that your reproofs had been attended to. How soon any other wishes introduced themselves I can hardly tell, but I believe in about half an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> after I had seen you."
<p>He then told her of Georgiana's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>acquaintance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="acquaintance" newWord="time" score="0.974">time</span>, and of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disappointment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="disappointment" newWord="time" score="0.947">time</span> at its sudden <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span>; which naturally leading to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>cause</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.921" formerWord="cause" newWord="affection" score="0.921">affection</span> of that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interruption</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.303" formerWord="interruption" newWord="grove" score="0.303">grove</span>, she soon learnt that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> of following her from Derbyshire in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.47" formerWord="quest" newWord="behaviour" score="0.47">behaviour</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> had been formed before he quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inn</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.497" formerWord="inn" newWord="enjoyment" score="0.497">enjoyment</span>, and that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gravity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.506" formerWord="gravity" newWord="horror" score="0.506">horror</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thoughtfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.469" formerWord="thoughtfulness" newWord="minute" score="0.469">minute</span> there had arisen from no other struggles than what such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> must comprehend. 
<p>She expressed her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span> again, but it was too painful a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> to each, to be dwelt on farther. 
<p>After walking several miles in a leisurely <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span>, and too busy to know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> about it, they found at last, on examining their watches, that it was <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> to be at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. 
<p>"What could become of Mr. Bingley and Jane!"was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wonder</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.914" formerWord="wonder" newWord="heart" score="0.914">heart</span> which introduced the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>discussion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.905" formerWord="discussion" newWord="day" score="0.905">day</span> of their affairs. Darcy was delighted with their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>engagement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="engagement" newWord="friend" score="0.98">friend</span>; his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> had given him the earliest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> of it. 
<p>"I must ask whether you were surprised?"said Elizabeth. 
<p>"Not at all. When I went away, I felt that it would soon happen."
<p>"That is to say, you had given your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>permission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.267" formerWord="permission" newWord="newspaper" score="0.267">newspaper</span>. I guessed as much."And though he exclaimed at the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>term</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="term" newWord="delay" score="0.728">delay</span>, she found that it had been pretty much the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>. 
<p>"On the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> before my going to London,"said he,"I made a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="confession" newWord="representation" score="0.299">representation</span> to him, which I believe I ought to have made long ago. I told him of all that had occurred to make my former <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>interference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.789" formerWord="interference" newWord="man" score="0.789">man</span> in his affairs absurd and impertinent. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>surprise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="surprise" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> was great. He had never had the slightest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span>. I told him, moreover, that I believed myself mistaken in supposing, as I had done, that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was indifferent to him; and as I could easily perceive that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to her was unabated, I felt no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> together."
<p>Elizabeth could not help smiling at his easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of directing his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. 
<p>"Did you speak from your own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>observation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.85" formerWord="observation" newWord="minute" score="0.85">minute</span>,"said she,"when you told him that my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> loved him, or merely from my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span> last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spring</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="spring" newWord="time" score="0.959">time</span>?"
<p>"From the former. I had narrowly observed her during the two visits which I had lately made here; and I was convinced of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>."
<p>"And your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assurance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.882" formerWord="assurance" newWord="heart" score="0.882">heart</span> of it, I suppose, carried immediate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> to him."
<p>"It did. Bingley is most unaffectedly modest. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>diffidence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.322" formerWord="diffidence" newWord="act" score="0.322">act</span> had prevented his depending on his own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judgment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.91" formerWord="judgment" newWord="rest" score="0.91">rest</span> in so anxious a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reliance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="reliance" newWord="observation" score="0.613">observation</span> on <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mine</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.351" formerWord="mine" newWord="companion" score="0.351">companion</span> made every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> easy. I was obliged to confess one <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, which for a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, and not unjustly, offended him. I could not allow myself to conceal that your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> had been in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> three months last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>winter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.483" formerWord="winter" newWord="mind" score="0.483">mind</span>, that I had known it, and purposely kept it from him. He was angry. But his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="anger" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span>, I am persuaded, lasted no longer than he remained in any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>'s sentiments. He has heartily forgiven me now."
<p>Elizabeth longed to observe that Mr. Bingley had been a most delightful <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>; so easily guided that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>worth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="worth" newWord="man" score="0.953">man</span> was invaluable; but she checked herself. She remembered that he had yet to learn to be laughed at, and it was rather too early to begin. In anticipating the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> of Bingley, which of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> was to be inferior only to his own, he continued the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span> till they reached the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span>. In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hall</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="hall" newWord="pelisse" score="0.29">pelisse</span> they parted. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 59 
<p>
<p>"My dear Lizzy, where can you have been walking to?"was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> which Elizabeth received from Jane as soon as she entered their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, and from all the others when they sat down to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span>. She had only to say in reply, that they had wandered about, till she was beyond her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>knowledge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.872" formerWord="knowledge" newWord="pleasure" score="0.872">pleasure</span>. She coloured as she spoke; but neither that, nor <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> else, awakened a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> passed quietly, unmarked by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> extraordinary. The acknowledged lovers talked and laughed, the unacknowledged were silent. Darcy was not of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span> in which <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> overflows in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mirth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.657" formerWord="mirth" newWord="voice" score="0.657">voice</span>; and Elizabeth, agitated and confused, rather knew that she was happy than felt herself to be so; for, besides the immediate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embarrassment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="embarrassment" newWord="shortness" score="0.369">shortness</span>, there were other evils before her. She anticipated what would be felt in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> when her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span> became known; she was aware that no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span> liked him but Jane; and even feared that with the others it was a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dislike</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="dislike" newWord="man" score="0.897">man</span> which not all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span> might do away. 
<p>At <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> she opened her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to Jane. Though <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspicion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="suspicion" newWord="haste" score="0.673">haste</span> was very far from Miss Bennet's general habits, she was absolutely incredulous here. 
<p>"You are joking, Lizzy. This cannot be! - - engaged to Mr. Darcy! No, no, you shall not deceive me. I know it to be impossible."
<p>"This is a wretched <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span> indeed! My sole <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dependence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.854" formerWord="dependence" newWord="conversation" score="0.854">conversation</span> was on you; and I am sure <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> else will believe me, if you do not. Yet, indeed, I am in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>earnest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.261" formerWord="earnest" newWord="compunction" score="0.261">compunction</span>. I speak <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>. He still loves me, and we are engaged."
<p>Jane looked at her doubtingly."Oh, Lizzy! it cannot be. I know how much you dislike him."
<p>"You know <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>. That is all to be forgot. Perhaps I did not always love him so well as I do now. But in such cases as these, a good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>memory</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.462" formerWord="memory" newWord="deficiency" score="0.462">deficiency</span> is unpardonable. This is the last <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> I shall ever remember it myself."
<p>Miss Bennet still looked all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>amazement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.754" formerWord="amazement" newWord="anger" score="0.754">anger</span>. Elizabeth again, and more seriously assured her of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>. 
<p>"Good Heaven! can it be really so! Yet now I must believe you,"cried Jane."My dear, dear Lizzy, I would - - I do congratulate you - - but are you certain? forgive the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>question</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="question" newWord="time" score="0.962">time</span> - - are you quite certain that you can be happy with him?"
<p>"There can be no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of that. It is settled between us already, that we are to be the happiest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>couple</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="couple" newWord="sat" score="0.244">sat</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. But are you pleased, Jane? Shall you like to have such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>?"
<p>"Very, very much. <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="Nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">Course</span> could give either Bingley or myself more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>. But we considered it, we talked of it as impossible. And do you really love him quite well enough? Oh, Lizzy! do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> rather than marry without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. Are you quite sure that you feel what you ought to do?"
<p>"Oh, yes! You will only think I feel more than I ought to do, when I tell you all."
<p>"What do you mean?"
<p>"Why, I must confess that I love him better than I do Bingley. I am afraid you will be angry."
<p>"My dearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, now be serious. I want to talk very seriously. Let me know every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> that I am to know, without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delay</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="delay" newWord="affection" score="0.977">affection</span>. Will you tell me how long you have loved him?"
<p>"It has been coming on so gradually, that I hardly know when it began. But I believe I must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>date</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.327" formerWord="date" newWord="wait" score="0.327">wait</span> it from my first seeing his beautiful grounds at Pemberley."
<p>Another <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entreaty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="entreaty" newWord="card" score="0.361">card</span> that she would be serious, however, produced the desired <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span>; and she soon satisfied Jane by her solemn assurances of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span>. When convinced on that <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>article</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.633" formerWord="article" newWord="love" score="0.633">love</span>, Miss Bennet had <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> further to wish. 
<p>"Now I am quite happy,"said she,"for you will be as happy as myself. I always had a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>value</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.915" formerWord="value" newWord="ball" score="0.915">ball</span> for him. Were it for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> but his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> of you, I must always have esteemed him; but now, as Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> and your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, there can be only Bingley and yourself more dear to me. But Lizzy, you have been very sly, very reserved with me. How little did you tell me of what passed at Pemberley and Lambton! I owe all that I know of it to another, not to you."
<p>Elizabeth told her the motives of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secrecy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.443" formerWord="secrecy" newWord="fault" score="0.443">fault</span>. She had been unwilling to mention Bingley; and the unsettled <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>state</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="state" newWord="friend" score="0.972">friend</span> of her own feelings had made her equally avoid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>name</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="name" newWord="family" score="0.971">family</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span>. But now she would no longer conceal from her his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>share</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.466" formerWord="share" newWord="horror" score="0.466">horror</span> in Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. All was acknowledged, and half the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span> spent in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conversation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="conversation" newWord="friend" score="0.981">friend</span>. 
<p>* * * * * 
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Good</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="Good" newWord="mother" score="0.858">Mother</span> gracious!"cried Mrs. Bennet, as she stood at a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>window</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.34" formerWord="window" newWord="agreeableness" score="0.34">agreeableness</span> the next <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>,"if that disagreeable Mr. Darcy is not coming here again with our dear Bingley! What can he mean by being so tiresome as to be always coming here? I had no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.312" formerWord="notion" newWord="intermission" score="0.312">intermission</span> but he would go a-shooting, or <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> or other, and not disturb us with his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>company</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="company" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span>. What shall we do with him? Lizzy, you must walk out with him again, that he may not be in Bingley's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>."
<p>Elizabeth could hardly help laughing at so convenient a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>proposal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.263" formerWord="proposal" newWord="dream" score="0.263">dream</span>; yet was really vexed that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> should be always giving him such an epithet. 
<p>As soon as they entered, Bingley looked at her so expressively, and shook hands with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.97" formerWord="warmth" newWord="time" score="0.97">time</span>, as left no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>doubt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="doubt" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> of his good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>; and he soon afterwards said aloud,"Mrs. Bennet, have you no more lanes hereabouts in which Lizzy may lose her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> again <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>to-day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.37" formerWord="to-day" newWord="music" score="0.37">music</span>?"
<p>"I advise Mr. Darcy, and Lizzy, and Kitty,"said Mrs. Bennet,"to walk to Oakham Mount this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span>. It is a nice long walk, and Mr. Darcy has never seen the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span>."
<p>"It may do very well for the others,"replied Mr. Bingley;"but I am sure it will be too much for Kitty. Won't it, Kitty?"Kitty owned that she had rather stay at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. Darcy professed a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>curiosity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.829" formerWord="curiosity" newWord="minute" score="0.829">minute</span> to see the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>view</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.375" formerWord="view" newWord="dirt" score="0.375">dirt</span> from the Mount, and Elizabeth silently consented. As she went up stairs to get ready, Mrs. Bennet followed her, saying: 
<p>"I am quite sorry, Lizzy, that you should be forced to have that disagreeable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> all to yourself. But I hope you will not mind it: it is all for Jane's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>, you know; and there is no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span> for talking to him, except just now and then. So, do not put yourself to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>inconvenience</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="inconvenience" newWord="affection" score="0.911">affection</span>."
<p>During their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>walk</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="walk" newWord="friend" score="0.978">friend</span>, it was resolved that Mr. Bennet's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span> should be asked in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>. Elizabeth reserved to herself the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>application</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.393" formerWord="application" newWord="agreement" score="0.393">agreement</span> for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> ' s. She could not determine how her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> would take it; sometimes doubting whether all his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wealth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.715" formerWord="wealth" newWord="country" score="0.715">country</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grandeur</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.363" formerWord="grandeur" newWord="haste" score="0.363">haste</span> would be enough to overcome her abhorrence of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>. But whether she were violently set against the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>, or violently delighted with it, it was certain that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> would be equally ill adapted to do <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.978" formerWord="sense" newWord="man" score="0.978">man</span>; and she could no more bear that Mr. Darcy should hear the first raptures of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span>, than the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vehemence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.217" formerWord="vehemence" newWord="attitude" score="0.217">attitude</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disapprobation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.26" formerWord="disapprobation" newWord="volume" score="0.26">volume</span>. 
<p>* * * * * 
<p>In the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, soon after Mr. Bennet withdrew to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>, she saw Mr. Darcy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.513" formerWord="rise" newWord="curricle" score="0.513">curricle</span> also and follow him, and her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>agitation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="agitation" newWord="difference" score="0.722">difference</span> on seeing it was extreme. She did not fear her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.509" formerWord="opposition" newWord="justice" score="0.509">justice</span>, but he was going to be made unhappy; and that it should be through her means - - that she, his favourite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, should be distressing him by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>, should be filling him with fears and regrets in disposing of her - - was a wretched <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">billiard-room</span>, and she sat in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span> till Mr. Darcy appeared again, when, looking at him, she was a little relieved by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>smile</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.857" formerWord="smile" newWord="town" score="0.857">town</span>. In a few minutes he approached the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>table</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.548" formerWord="table" newWord="morning" score="0.548">morning</span> where she was sitting with Kitty; and, while pretending to admire her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> said in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>whisper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.411" formerWord="whisper" newWord="furniture" score="0.411">furniture</span>,"Go to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>, he wants you in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>library</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="library" newWord="associate" score="0.219">associate</span>."She was gone directly. 
<p>Her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> was walking about the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, looking <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="grave" newWord="education" score="0.464">education</span> and anxious."Lizzy,"said he,"what are you doing? Are you out of your senses, to be accepting this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>? Have not you always hated him?"
<p>How earnestly did she then wish that her former opinions had been more reasonable, her expressions more moderate! It would have spared her from explanations and professions which it was exceedingly awkward to give; but they were now necessary, and she assured him, with some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.345" formerWord="confusion" newWord="curiosity" score="0.345">curiosity</span>, of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attachment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.684" formerWord="attachment" newWord="deal" score="0.684">deal</span> to Mr. Darcy. 
<p>"Or, in other words, you are determined to have him. He is rich, to be sure, and you may have more fine clothes and fine carriages than Jane. But will they make you happy?"
<p>"Have you any other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>objection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.31" formerWord="objection" newWord="sentiment" score="0.31">sentiment</span>,"said Elizabeth,"than your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>belief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.219" formerWord="belief" newWord="foresight" score="0.219">foresight</span> of my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>?"
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>None</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.986" formerWord="None" newWord="brother" score="0.986">Brother</span> at all. We all know him to be a proud, unpleasant <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="sort" newWord="man" score="0.976">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>; but this would be <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> if you really liked him."
<p>"I do, I do like him,"she replied, with tears in her eyes,"I love him. Indeed he has no improper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span>. He is perfectly amiable. You do not know what he really is; then pray do not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> me by <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span> of him in such terms."
<p>"Lizzy,"said her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>,"I have given him my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>. He is the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, indeed, to whom I should never dare refuse <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span>, which he condescended to ask. I now give it to you, if you are resolved on having him. But let me advise you to think better of it. I know your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disposition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.799" formerWord="disposition" newWord="minute" score="0.799">minute</span>, Lizzy. I know that you could be neither happy nor respectable, unless you truly esteemed your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>; unless you looked up to him as a superior. Your lively talents would place you in the greatest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>danger</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.945" formerWord="danger" newWord="family" score="0.945">family</span> in an unequal <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>. You could scarcely escape discredit and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>misery</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="misery" newWord="time" score="0.917">time</span>. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, let me not have the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.439" formerWord="grief" newWord="horror" score="0.439">horror</span> of seeing you unable to respect your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>partner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="partner" newWord="course" score="0.973">course</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. You know not what you are about."
