<p>Elizabeth, still more affected, was earnest and solemn in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reply</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.811" formerWord="reply" newWord="brother" score="0.811">brother</span>; and at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span>, by repeated assurances that Mr. Darcy was really the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>object</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="object" newWord="day" score="0.974">day</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>choice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="choice" newWord="happiness" score="0.949">happiness</span>, by explaining the gradual <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estimation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.216" formerWord="estimation" newWord="vacancy" score="0.216">vacancy</span> of him had undergone, relating her absolute <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>certainty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.846" formerWord="certainty" newWord="family" score="0.846">family</span> that his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> was not the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>work</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="work" newWord="nothing" score="0.955">nothing</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>, but had stood the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>test</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="test" newWord="parasol" score="0.253">parasol</span> of many months ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>suspense</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.572" formerWord="suspense" newWord="selfishness" score="0.572">selfishness</span>, and enumerating with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>energy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.335" formerWord="energy" newWord="good" score="0.335">good</span> all his good qualities, she did conquer her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>incredulity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.371" formerWord="incredulity" newWord="compliment" score="0.371">compliment</span>, and reconcile him to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>. 
<p>"Well, my dear,"said he, when she ceased <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>,"I have no more to say. If this be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>case</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="case" newWord="brother" score="0.944">brother</span>, he deserves you. I could not have parted with you, my Lizzy, to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anyone</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="anyone" newWord="minute" score="0.361">minute</span> less worthy."
<p>To complete the favourable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impression</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.871" formerWord="impression" newWord="part" score="0.871">part</span>, she then told him what Mr. Darcy had voluntarily done for Lydia. He heard her with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>astonishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.934" formerWord="astonishment" newWord="life" score="0.934">life</span>. 
<p>"This is an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> of wonders, indeed! And so, Darcy did every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>; made up the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>, gave the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span>, paid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fellow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.784" formerWord="fellow" newWord="happiness" score="0.784">happiness</span>'s debts, and got him his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>commission</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.678" formerWord="commission" newWord="talk" score="0.678">talk</span>! So much the better. It will save me a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>economy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.407" formerWord="economy" newWord="word" score="0.407">word</span>. Had it been your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span>'s doing, I must and would have paid him; but these violent young lovers carry every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> their own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>way</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="way" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. I shall offer to pay him to-morrow; he will rant and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>storm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="storm" newWord="noise" score="0.429">noise</span> about his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> for you, and there will be an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>matter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="matter" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>."
<p>He then recollected her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>embarrassment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.369" formerWord="embarrassment" newWord="shortness" score="0.369">shortness</span> a few days before, on his reading Mr. Collins's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; and after laughing at her some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>, allowed her at last to go - - saying, as she quitted the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>,"If any young men come for Mary or Kitty, send them in, for I am quite at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>leisure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.307" formerWord="leisure" newWord="station" score="0.307">station</span>."
<p>Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span> was now relieved from a very heavy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>weight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.744" formerWord="weight" newWord="sense" score="0.744">sense</span>; and, after half an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>'s quiet <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reflection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="reflection" newWord="billiard-room" score="0.253">billiard-room</span> in her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, she was able to join the others with tolerable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>. Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> was too recent for <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gaiety</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.457" formerWord="gaiety" newWord="civility" score="0.457">civility</span>, but the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="evening" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> passed tranquilly away; there was no longer <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>material</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="material" newWord="landing-place" score="0.253">landing-place</span> to be dreaded, and the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ease</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.971" formerWord="ease" newWord="friend" score="0.971">friend</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>familiarity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.279" formerWord="familiarity" newWord="promotion" score="0.279">promotion</span> would come in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span>. 
<p>When her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> went up to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dressing-room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.868" formerWord="dressing-room" newWord="kind" score="0.868">kind</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>night</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.946" formerWord="night" newWord="life" score="0.946">life</span>, she followed her, and made the important <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>communication</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="communication" newWord="friend" score="0.93">friend</span>. Its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> was most extraordinary; for on first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hearing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="hearing" newWord="time" score="0.955">time</span> it, Mrs. Bennet sat quite still, and unable to utter a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>syllable</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.378" formerWord="syllable" newWord="chair" score="0.378">chair</span>. Nor was it under many, many minutes that she could comprehend what she heard; though not in general backward to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>credit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="credit" newWord="love" score="0.817">love</span> what was for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, or that came in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>shape</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.406" formerWord="shape" newWord="round" score="0.406">round</span> of a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lover</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="lover" newWord="return" score="0.676">return</span> to any of them. She began at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>length</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.967" formerWord="length" newWord="everything" score="0.967">everything</span> to recover, to fidget about in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chair</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.793" formerWord="chair" newWord="haste" score="0.793">haste</span>, get up, sit down again, wonder, and bless herself. 
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Good</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.858" formerWord="Good" newWord="mother" score="0.858">Mother</span> gracious! Lord bless me! only think! dear me! Mr. Darcy! Who would have thought it! And is it really true? Oh! my sweetest Lizzy! how rich and how great you will be! What pin-money, what jewels, what carriages you will have! Jane's is <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> to it - - <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> at all. I am so pleased - - so happy. Such a charming <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>! - - so handsome! so tall! - - Oh, my dear Lizzy! pray apologise for my having disliked him so much before. I hope he will overlook it. Dear, dear Lizzy. A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>house</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="house" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>town</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="town" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>! Every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> that is charming! Three daughters married! Ten thousand a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>! Oh, Lord! What will become of me. I shall go distracted."
<p>This was enough to prove that her approbation need not be doubted: and Elizabeth, rejoicing that such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effusion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.447" formerWord="effusion" newWord="fortune" score="0.447">fortune</span> was heard only by herself, soon went away. But before she had been three minutes in her own <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>room</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="room" newWord="course" score="0.972">course</span>, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> followed her. 
<p>"My dearest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>child</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="child" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>,"she cried,"I can think of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else! Ten thousand a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>, and very likely more! ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>Tis</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.53" formerWord="Tis" newWord="minute" score="0.53">Minute</span> as good as a Lord! And a special <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>licence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.254" formerWord="licence" newWord="defect" score="0.254">defect</span>. You must and shall be married by a special <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>licence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.254" formerWord="licence" newWord="defect" score="0.254">defect</span>. But my dearest love, tell me what dish Mr. Darcy is particularly fond of, that I may have it to-morrow."
<p>This was a sad <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>omen</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.205" formerWord="omen" newWord="guide" score="0.205">guide</span> of what her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gentleman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.912" formerWord="gentleman" newWord="marriage" score="0.912">marriage</span> himself might be; and Elizabeth found that, though in the certain <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>possession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="possession" newWord="retirement" score="0.275">retirement</span> of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>warmest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.265" formerWord="warmest" newWord="freshness" score="0.265">freshness</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>secure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.488" formerWord="secure" newWord="tenderness" score="0.488">tenderness</span> of her relations ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span>, there was still <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>something</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.851" formerWord="something" newWord="mind" score="0.851">mind</span> to be wished for. But the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morrow</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.39" formerWord="morrow" newWord="half" score="0.39">half</span> passed off much better than she expected; for Mrs. Bennet luckily stood in such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>awe</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="awe" newWord="child" score="0.491">child</span> of her intended <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>son-in-law</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.215" formerWord="son-in-law" newWord="diligence" score="0.215">diligence</span> that she ventured not to speak to him, unless it was in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to offer him any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>, or mark her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="deference" newWord="way" score="0.729">way</span> for his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opinion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.977" formerWord="opinion" newWord="nothing" score="0.977">nothing</span>. 
<p>Elizabeth had the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>satisfaction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.944" formerWord="satisfaction" newWord="affection" score="0.944">affection</span> of seeing her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> taking pains to get acquainted with him; and Mr. Bennet soon assured her that he was rising every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span> in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>esteem</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.718" formerWord="esteem" newWord="circumstance" score="0.718">circumstance</span>. 
<p>"I admire all my three sons-in-law highly,"said he."Wickham, perhaps, is my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>favourite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="favourite" newWord="lasting" score="0.321">lasting</span>; but I think I shall like your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> quite as well as Jane ' s."
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 60 
<p>
<p>Elizabeth's spirits soon rising to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>playfulness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.258" formerWord="playfulness" newWord="hardness" score="0.258">hardness</span> again, she wanted Mr. Darcy to account for his having ever fallen in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> with her."How could you begin?"said she."I can comprehend your going on charmingly, when you had once made a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beginning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.702" formerWord="beginning" newWord="rest" score="0.702">rest</span>; but what could set you off in the first <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span>?"
<p>"I cannot fix on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.679" formerWord="hour" newWord="mile" score="0.679">mile</span>, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spot</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="spot" newWord="sister" score="0.887">sister</span>, or the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>look</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.925" formerWord="look" newWord="nothing" score="0.925">nothing</span>, or the words, which laid the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>foundation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.319" formerWord="foundation" newWord="suspicion" score="0.319">suspicion</span>. It is too long ago. I was in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>middle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.525" formerWord="middle" newWord="gratitude" score="0.525">gratitude</span> before I knew that I had begun."
<p>"My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> you had early withstood, and as for my manners - - my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to you was at least always bordering on the uncivil, and I never spoke to you without rather wishing to give you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pain</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.981" formerWord="pain" newWord="time" score="0.981">time</span> than not. Now be sincere; did you admire me for my <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span>?"
<p>"For the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>liveliness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.397" formerWord="liveliness" newWord="chair" score="0.397">chair</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="mind" newWord="man" score="0.951">man</span>, I did."
<p>"You may as well call it <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>impertinence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.242" formerWord="impertinence" newWord="deference" score="0.242">deference</span> at once. It was very little less. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fact</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.815" formerWord="fact" newWord="woman" score="0.815">woman</span> is, that you were sick of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span>, of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.729" formerWord="deference" newWord="way" score="0.729">way</span>, of officious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span>. You were disgusted with the women who were always <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speaking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="speaking" newWord="family" score="0.974">family</span>, and looking, and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thinking</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.605" formerWord="thinking" newWord="duty" score="0.605">duty</span> for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>approbation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.232" formerWord="approbation" newWord="paint" score="0.232">paint</span> alone. I roused, and interested you, because I was so unlike them. Had you not been really amiable, you would have hated me for it; but in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of the pains you took to disguise yourself, your feelings were always noble and just; and in your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, you thoroughly despised the persons who so assiduously courted you. There - - I have saved you the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accounting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.237" formerWord="accounting" newWord="avowal" score="0.237">avowal</span> for it; and really, all things considered, I begin to think it perfectly reasonable. To be sure, you knew no actual good of me - - but <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nobody</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="nobody" newWord="family" score="0.938">family</span> thinks of that when they fall in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span>."
<p>"Was there no good in your affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>behaviour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.947" formerWord="behaviour" newWord="family" score="0.947">family</span> to Jane while she was ill at Netherfield?"
<p>"Dearest Jane! who could have done less for her? But make a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>virtue</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.814" formerWord="virtue" newWord="rest" score="0.814">rest</span> of it by all means. My good qualities are under your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>protection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.788" formerWord="protection" newWord="minute" score="0.788">minute</span>, and you are to exaggerate them as much as possible; and, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>return</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="return" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, it belongs to me to find occasions for teasing and quarrelling with you as often as may be; and I shall begin directly by asking you what made you so unwilling to come to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>point</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.974" formerWord="point" newWord="brother" score="0.974">brother</span> at last. What made you so shy of me, when you first called, and afterwards dined here? Why, especially, when you called, did you look as if you did not care about me?"
<p>"Because you were <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>grave</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.464" formerWord="grave" newWord="education" score="0.464">education</span> and silent, and gave me no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>encouragement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.955" formerWord="encouragement" newWord="brother" score="0.955">brother</span>."
<p>"But I was embarrassed."
<p>"And so was I."
<p>"You might have talked to me more when you came to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>dinner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="dinner" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span>."
<p>"A <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>man</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="man" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> who had felt less, might."
<p>"How unlucky that you should have a reasonable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to give, and that I should be so reasonable as to admit it! But I wonder how long you would have gone on, if you had been left to yourself. I wonder when you would have spoken, if I had not asked you! My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>resolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="resolution" newWord="life" score="0.895">life</span> of thanking you for your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kindness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="kindness" newWord="brother" score="0.973">brother</span> to Lydia had certainly great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span>. Too much, I am afraid; for what becomes of the moral, if our <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> springs from a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>breach</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.714" formerWord="breach" newWord="spring" score="0.714">spring</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span>? for I ought not to have mentioned the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span>. This will never do."
<p>"You need not <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>distress</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.96" formerWord="distress" newWord="friend" score="0.96">friend</span> yourself. The moral will be perfectly fair. Lady Catherine's unjustifiable endeavours to separate us were the means of removing all my doubts. I am not indebted for my present <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> to your eager <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> of expressing your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>gratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.969" formerWord="gratitude" newWord="affection" score="0.969">affection</span>. I was not in a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> to wait for any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>opening</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.685" formerWord="opening" newWord="subject" score="0.685">subject</span> of yours. My <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intelligence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.866" formerWord="intelligence" newWord="character" score="0.866">character</span> had given me hope, and I was determined at once to know every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>."
<p>"Lady Catherine has been of infinite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span>, which ought to make her happy, for she loves to be of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>use</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.502" formerWord="use" newWord="suffering" score="0.502">suffering</span>. But tell me, what did you come down to Netherfield for? Was it merely to ride to Longbourn and be embarrassed? or had you intended any more serious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consequence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.902" formerWord="consequence" newWord="situation" score="0.902">situation</span>?"
<p>"My real <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>purpose</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.828" formerWord="purpose" newWord="part" score="0.828">part</span> was to see you, and to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>judge</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.965" formerWord="judge" newWord="friend" score="0.965">friend</span>, if I could, whether I might ever hope to make you love me. My avowed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>one</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.909" formerWord="one" newWord="rest" score="0.909">rest</span>, or what I avowed to myself, was to see whether your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> were still partial to Bingley, and if she were, to make the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>confession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.299" formerWord="confession" newWord="representation" score="0.299">representation</span> to him which I have since made."
<p>"Shall you ever have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span> to announce to Lady Catherine what is to befall her?"
<p>"I am more likely to want more <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.55" formerWord="courage" newWord="thought" score="0.55">thought</span>, Elizabeth. But it ought to be done, and if you will give me a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sheet</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.252" formerWord="sheet" newWord="counter" score="0.252">counter</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="paper" newWord="hearing" score="0.645">hearing</span>, it shall be done directly."
<p>"And if I had not a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> to write myself, I might sit by you and admire the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>evenness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.673" formerWord="evenness" newWord="minute" score="0.673">minute</span> of your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>writing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.628" formerWord="writing" newWord="cause" score="0.628">cause</span>, as another young <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>lady</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.791" formerWord="lady" newWord="husband" score="0.791">husband</span> once did. But I have an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, too, who must not be longer neglected."
<p>From an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>unwillingness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.226" formerWord="unwillingness" newWord="imprudence" score="0.226">imprudence</span> to confess how much her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>intimacy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.911" formerWord="intimacy" newWord="time" score="0.911">time</span> with Mr. Darcy had been over-rated, Elizabeth had never yet answered Mrs. Gardiner's long <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>; but now, having that to communicate which she knew would be most welcome, she was almost ashamed to find that her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>uncle</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.508" formerWord="uncle" newWord="present" score="0.508">present</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span> had already lost three days of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, and immediately wrote as follows: 
<p>"I would have thanked you before, my dear <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>aunt</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="aunt" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, as I ought to have done, for your long, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>, satisfactory, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>detail</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.225" formerWord="detail" newWord="clue" score="0.225">clue</span> of particulars; but to say the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>truth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.952" formerWord="truth" newWord="sister" score="0.952">sister</span>, I was too cross to write. You supposed more than really existed. But now suppose as much as you choose; give a loose rein to your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fancy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.949" formerWord="fancy" newWord="family" score="0.949">family</span>, indulge your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>imagination</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.938" formerWord="imagination" newWord="happiness" score="0.938">happiness</span> in every possible <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>flight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.383" formerWord="flight" newWord="concerto" score="0.383">concerto</span> which the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>subject</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="subject" newWord="friend" score="0.979">friend</span> will afford, and unless you believe me actually married, you cannot greatly err. You must write again very soon, and praise him a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>deal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="deal" newWord="brother" score="0.989">brother</span> more than you did in your last. I thank you, again and again, for not going to the Lakes. How could I be so silly as to wish it! Your <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>idea</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="idea" newWord="time" score="0.988">time</span> of the ponies is delightful. We will go <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>round</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.875" formerWord="round" newWord="minute" score="0.875">minute</span> the Park every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>. I am the happiest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>creature</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.777" formerWord="creature" newWord="woman" score="0.777">woman</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>. Perhaps other people have said so before, but not one with such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>justice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="justice" newWord="family" score="0.959">family</span>. I am happier even than Jane; she only smiles, I laugh. Mr. Darcy sends you all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>love</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="love" newWord="man" score="0.984">man</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span> that he can spare from me. You are all to come to Pemberley at Christmas. Yours, etc."
<p>Mr. Darcy's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> to Lady Catherine was in a different <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>style</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.722" formerWord="style" newWord="love" score="0.722">love</span>; and still different from either was what Mr. Bennet sent to Mr. Collins, in reply to his last. 
<p>"<span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>DEAR</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.249" formerWord="DEAR" newWord="laurel" score="0.249">Laurel</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>SIR</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="SIR" newWord="brother" score="0.966">Brother</span>, 
<p>"I must <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>trouble</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="trouble" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> you once more for congratulations. Elizabeth will soon be the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> of Mr. Darcy. Console Lady Catherine as well as you can. But, if I were you, I would stand by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>. He has more to give. 
<p>"Yours sincerely, etc."
<p>Miss Bingley's congratulations to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>, on his approaching <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, were all that was affectionate and insincere. She wrote even to Jane on the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>occasion</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="occasion" newWord="family" score="0.985">family</span>, to express her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>, and repeat all her former professions of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>regard</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.953" formerWord="regard" newWord="family" score="0.953">family</span>. Jane was not deceived, but she was affected; and though <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>feeling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="feeling" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reliance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.613" formerWord="reliance" newWord="observation" score="0.613">observation</span> on her, could not help writing her a much kinder <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> than she knew was deserved. 
<p>The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span> which Miss Darcy expressed on receiving similar <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>information</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.86" formerWord="information" newWord="situation" score="0.86">situation</span>, was as sincere as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>brother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="brother" newWord="family" score="0.996">family</span>'s in sending it. Four sides of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>paper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.645" formerWord="paper" newWord="hearing" score="0.645">hearing</span> were insufficient to contain all her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span>, and all her earnest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> of being loved by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>. 
<p>Before any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> could arrive from Mr. Collins, or any congratulations to Elizabeth from his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span>, the Longbourn <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> heard that the Collinses were come themselves to Lucas Lodge. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reason</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.676" formerWord="reason" newWord="world" score="0.676">world</span> of this sudden <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>removal</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.867" formerWord="removal" newWord="sister" score="0.867">sister</span> was soon evident. Lady Catherine had been rendered so exceedingly angry by the contents of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nephew</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.93" formerWord="nephew" newWord="thing" score="0.93">thing</span>'s <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, that Charlotte, really rejoicing in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>match</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.653" formerWord="match" newWord="period" score="0.653">period</span>, was anxious to get away till the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>storm</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.429" formerWord="storm" newWord="noise" score="0.429">noise</span> was blown over. At such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>moment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.932" formerWord="moment" newWord="honour" score="0.932">honour</span>, the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>arrival</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="arrival" newWord="family" score="0.989">family</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>friend</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="friend" newWord="brother" score="0.994">brother</span> was a sincere <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> to Elizabeth, though in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> of their meetings she must sometimes think the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span> dearly bought, when she saw Mr. Darcy exposed to all the parading and obsequious <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>civility</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.959" formerWord="civility" newWord="nothing" score="0.959">nothing</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>. He bore it, however, with admirable <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>calmness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.895" formerWord="calmness" newWord="brother" score="0.895">brother</span>. He could even listen to Sir William Lucas, when he complimented him on carrying away the brightest jewel of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>country</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="country" newWord="family" score="0.987">family</span>, and expressed his hopes of their all <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>meeting</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.936" formerWord="meeting" newWord="family" score="0.936">family</span> frequently at St. James ' s, with very decent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>composure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.776" formerWord="composure" newWord="minute" score="0.776">minute</span>. If he did shrug his shoulders, it was not till Sir William was out of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.308" formerWord="sight" newWord="pleasanter" score="0.308">pleasanter</span>. 
<p>Mrs. Phillips's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vulgarity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.448" formerWord="vulgarity" newWord="understood" score="0.448">understood</span> was another, and perhaps a greater, <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>tax</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.283" formerWord="tax" newWord="principle" score="0.283">principle</span> on his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>forbearance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.515" formerWord="forbearance" newWord="sort" score="0.515">sort</span>; and though Mrs. Phillips, as well as her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sister</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="sister" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span>, stood in too much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>awe</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.491" formerWord="awe" newWord="child" score="0.491">child</span> of him to speak with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>familiarity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.279" formerWord="familiarity" newWord="promotion" score="0.279">promotion</span> which Bingley's good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> encouraged, yet, whenever she did <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>speak</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.342" formerWord="speak" newWord="something" score="0.342">something</span>, she must be vulgar. Nor was her respect for him, though it made her more quiet, at all likely to make her more elegant. Elizabeth did all she could to shield him from the frequent <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>notice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.937" formerWord="notice" newWord="her" score="0.937">her</span> of either, and was ever anxious to keep him to herself, and to those of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> with whom he might converse without <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mortification</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.658" formerWord="mortification" newWord="answer" score="0.658">answer</span>; and though the uncomfortable feelings arising from all this took from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>season</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.634" formerWord="season" newWord="card" score="0.634">card</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>courtship</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.635" formerWord="courtship" newWord="nothing" score="0.635">nothing</span> much of its <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasure</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="pleasure" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>, it added to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>future</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="future" newWord="aunt" score="0.943">aunt</span>; and she looked forward with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>delight</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.523" formerWord="delight" newWord="observation" score="0.523">observation</span> to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> when they should be removed from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> so little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pleasing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.321" formerWord="pleasing" newWord="relationship" score="0.321">relationship</span> to either, to all the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>elegance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.916" formerWord="elegance" newWord="brother" score="0.916">brother</span> of their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>party</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="party" newWord="family" score="0.982">family</span> at Pemberley. 
<p>
<p>
<p>Chapter 61 
<p>
<p>Happy for all her maternal feelings was the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>day</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="day" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span> on which Mrs. Bennet got rid of her two most deserving daughters. With what delighted <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pride</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.973" formerWord="pride" newWord="sister" score="0.973">sister</span> she afterwards visited Mrs. Bingley, and talked of Mrs. Darcy, may be guessed. I wish I could say, for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>family</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.996" formerWord="family" newWord="brother" score="0.996">brother</span>, that the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>accomplishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.366" formerWord="accomplishment" newWord="extreme" score="0.366">extreme</span> of her earnest <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>desire</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.856" formerWord="desire" newWord="kindness" score="0.856">kindness</span> in the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>establishment</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.477" formerWord="establishment" newWord="satisfaction" score="0.477">satisfaction</span> of so many of her children produced so happy an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span> as to make her a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sensible</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.798" formerWord="sensible" newWord="conversation" score="0.798">conversation</span>, amiable, well-informed <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>woman</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="woman" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span> for the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>rest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="rest" newWord="nothing" score="0.984">nothing</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>life</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.994" formerWord="life" newWord="family" score="0.994">family</span>; though perhaps it was lucky for her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span>, who might not have relished domestic <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>felicity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="felicity" newWord="brother" score="0.883">brother</span> in so unusual a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>form</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.832" formerWord="form" newWord="aunt" score="0.832">aunt</span>, that she still was occasionally nervous and invariably silly. 
<p>Mr. Bennet missed his second <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> exceedingly; his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for her drew him oftener from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span> than <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>anything</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="anything" newWord="time" score="0.989">time</span> else could do. He delighted in going to Pemberley, especially when he was least expected. 
<p>Mr. Bingley and Jane remained at Netherfield only a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>twelvemonth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.723" formerWord="twelvemonth" newWord="answer" score="0.723">answer</span>. So near a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>vicinity</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.346" formerWord="vicinity" newWord="sketch" score="0.346">sketch</span> to her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mother</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.989" formerWord="mother" newWord="sister" score="0.989">sister</span> and Meryton relations was not desirable even to his easy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span>, or her affectionate <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>heart</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="heart" newWord="friend" score="0.991">friend</span>. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>darling</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.662" formerWord="darling" newWord="hair" score="0.662">hair</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wish</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="wish" newWord="brother" score="0.99">brother</span> of his sisters was then gratified; he bought an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>estate</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.87" formerWord="estate" newWord="woman" score="0.87">woman</span> in a neighbouring <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>county</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.275" formerWord="county" newWord="innocence" score="0.275">innocence</span> to Derbyshire, and Jane and Elizabeth, in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>addition</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.876" formerWord="addition" newWord="mother" score="0.876">mother</span> to every other <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>source</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.883" formerWord="source" newWord="happiness" score="0.883">happiness</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>happiness</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.992" formerWord="happiness" newWord="brother" score="0.992">brother</span>, were within thirty miles of each other. 
<p>Kitty, to her very <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>material</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.253" formerWord="material" newWord="landing-place" score="0.253">landing-place</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>advantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.583" formerWord="advantage" newWord="minute" score="0.583">minute</span>, spent the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>chief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.922" formerWord="chief" newWord="day" score="0.922">day</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>time</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="time" newWord="family" score="0.995">family</span> with her two elder sisters. In <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> so superior to what she had generally known, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>improvement</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.886" formerWord="improvement" newWord="side" score="0.886">side</span> was great. She was not of so ungovernable a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>temper</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.897" formerWord="temper" newWord="woman" score="0.897">woman</span> as Lydia; and, removed from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>influence</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.957" formerWord="influence" newWord="friend" score="0.957">friend</span> of Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>example</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.336" formerWord="example" newWord="rumour" score="0.336">rumour</span>, she became, by proper <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>attention</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.951" formerWord="attention" newWord="brother" score="0.951">brother</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>management</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.65" formerWord="management" newWord="journey" score="0.65">journey</span>, less irritable, less ignorant, and less insipid. From the further <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>disadvantage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.248" formerWord="disadvantage" newWord="security" score="0.248">security</span> of Lydia's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>society</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="society" newWord="time" score="0.979">time</span> she was of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>course</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.993" formerWord="course" newWord="brother" score="0.993">brother</span> carefully kept, and though Mrs. Wickham frequently invited her to come and stay with her, with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>promise</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.894" formerWord="promise" newWord="time" score="0.894">time</span> of balls and young men, her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> would never <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>consent</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.966" formerWord="consent" newWord="brother" score="0.966">brother</span> to her going. 
<p>Mary was the only <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>daughter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.927" formerWord="daughter" newWord="nothing" score="0.927">nothing</span> who remained at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>; and she was necessarily drawn from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>pursuit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.25" formerWord="pursuit" newWord="fireside" score="0.25">fireside</span> of accomplishments by Mrs. Bennet's being quite unable to sit alone. Mary was obliged to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>mix</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.302" formerWord="mix" newWord="gift" score="0.302">gift</span> more with the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>world</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.982" formerWord="world" newWord="man" score="0.982">man</span>, but she could still moralize over every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>morning</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="morning" newWord="day" score="0.987">day</span> <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visit</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="visit" newWord="day" score="0.95">day</span>; and as she was no longer mortified by comparisons between her sisters ' <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>beauty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="beauty" newWord="family" score="0.975">family</span> and her own, it was suspected by her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>father</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.95" formerWord="father" newWord="aunt" score="0.95">aunt</span> that she submitted to the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>change</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.976" formerWord="change" newWord="brother" score="0.976">brother</span> without much <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reluctance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.354" formerWord="reluctance" newWord="stopping" score="0.354">stopping</span>. 
<p>As for Wickham and Lydia, their characters suffered no <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>revolution</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.365" formerWord="revolution" newWord="perfection" score="0.365">perfection</span> from the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> of her sisters. He bore with <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>philosophy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.644" formerWord="philosophy" newWord="cousin" score="0.644">cousin</span> the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>conviction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.962" formerWord="conviction" newWord="friend" score="0.962">friend</span> that Elizabeth must now become acquainted with whatever of his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>ingratitude</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.251" formerWord="ingratitude" newWord="error" score="0.251">error</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>falsehood</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.244" formerWord="falsehood" newWord="hyacinth" score="0.244">hyacinth</span> had before been unknown to her; and in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>thing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="thing" newWord="man" score="0.99">man</span>, was not wholly without hope that Darcy might yet be prevailed on to make his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>fortune</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="fortune" newWord="man" score="0.975">man</span>. The congratulatory <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> which Elizabeth received from Lydia on her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span>, explained to her that, by his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>wife</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.933" formerWord="wife" newWord="man" score="0.933">man</span> at least, if not by himself, such a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hope</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.972" formerWord="hope" newWord="day" score="0.972">day</span> was cherished. The <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>letter</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="letter" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> was to this <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>effect</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="effect" newWord="sister" score="0.961">sister</span>: 
<p>"MY DEAR LIZZY, 
<p>"I wish you <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>joy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.954" formerWord="joy" newWord="brother" score="0.954">brother</span>. If you love Mr. Darcy <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>half</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.77" formerWord="half" newWord="minute" score="0.77">minute</span> as well as I do my dear Wickham, you must be very happy. It is a great <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>comfort</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.892" formerWord="comfort" newWord="day" score="0.892">day</span> to have you so rich, and when you have <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>nothing</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="nothing" newWord="course" score="0.991">course</span> else to do, I hope you will think of us. I am sure Wickham would like a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> at <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>court</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.649" formerWord="court" newWord="society" score="0.649">society</span> very much, and I do not think we shall have quite <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>money</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="money" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> enough to live upon without some <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>help</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.29" formerWord="help" newWord="duration" score="0.29">duration</span>. Any <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> would do, of about three or four hundred a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>year</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.98" formerWord="year" newWord="family" score="0.98">family</span>; but however, do not speak to Mr. Darcy about it, if you had rather not. 
<p>"Yours, etc."
<p>As it happened that Elizabeth had much rather not, she endeavoured in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>answer</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.987" formerWord="answer" newWord="brother" score="0.987">brother</span> to put an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>end</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.984" formerWord="end" newWord="time" score="0.984">time</span> to every <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>entreaty</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.361" formerWord="entreaty" newWord="card" score="0.361">card</span> and <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>expectation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.975" formerWord="expectation" newWord="time" score="0.975">time</span> of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>kind</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="kind" newWord="nothing" score="0.99">nothing</span>. Such <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>relief</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.698" formerWord="relief" newWord="expectation" score="0.698">expectation</span>, however, as it was in her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>power</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.887" formerWord="power" newWord="nothing" score="0.887">nothing</span> to afford, by the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>practice</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.58" formerWord="practice" newWord="horror" score="0.58">horror</span> of what might be called <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>economy</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.407" formerWord="economy" newWord="word" score="0.407">word</span> in her own private expences, she frequently sent them. It had always been evident to her that such an <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>income</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.855" formerWord="income" newWord="time" score="0.855">time</span> as theirs, under the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>direction</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.821" formerWord="direction" newWord="friend" score="0.821">friend</span> of two persons so extravagant in their wants, and heedless of the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>future</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.943" formerWord="future" newWord="aunt" score="0.943">aunt</span>, must be very insufficient to their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>support</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.358" formerWord="support" newWord="phoo" score="0.358">phoo</span>; and whenever they changed their quarters, either Jane or herself were sure of being applied to for some little <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>assistance</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.413" formerWord="assistance" newWord="barouche" score="0.413">barouche</span> towards discharging their bills. Their <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>manner</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.917" formerWord="manner" newWord="kind" score="0.917">kind</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>living</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.833" formerWord="living" newWord="woman" score="0.833">woman</span>, even when the <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>restoration</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.35" formerWord="restoration" newWord="income" score="0.35">income</span> of <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>peace</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.817" formerWord="peace" newWord="anything" score="0.817">anything</span> dismissed them to a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>home</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.985" formerWord="home" newWord="day" score="0.985">day</span>, was unsettled in the extreme. They were always moving from <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>place</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.99" formerWord="place" newWord="family" score="0.99">family</span> to place in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>quest</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.47" formerWord="quest" newWord="behaviour" score="0.47">behaviour</span> of a cheap <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>situation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.988" formerWord="situation" newWord="family" score="0.988">family</span>, and always <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spending</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.569" formerWord="spending" newWord="observation" score="0.569">observation</span> more than they ought. His <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>affection</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.995" formerWord="affection" newWord="brother" score="0.995">brother</span> for her soon sunk into <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>indifference</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.665" formerWord="indifference" newWord="hope" score="0.665">hope</span>; hers lasted a little longer; and in <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>spite</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.961" formerWord="spite" newWord="man" score="0.961">man</span> of her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>youth</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.834" formerWord="youth" newWord="ball" score="0.834">ball</span> and her manners, she retained all the claims to <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>reputation</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.292" formerWord="reputation" newWord="three-and-twenty" score="0.292">three-and-twenty</span> which her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>marriage</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.991" formerWord="marriage" newWord="brother" score="0.991">brother</span> had given her. 
<p>Though Darcy could never receive him at Pemberley, yet, for Elizabeth's <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>sake</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.756" formerWord="sake" newWord="company" score="0.756">company</span>, he assisted him further in his <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>profession</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.956" formerWord="profession" newWord="sister" score="0.956">sister</span>. Lydia was occasionally a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>visitor</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.409" formerWord="visitor" newWord="attendance" score="0.409">attendance</span> there, when her <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>husband</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.979" formerWord="husband" newWord="brother" score="0.979">brother</span> was gone to enjoy himself in London or Bath; and with the Bingleys they both of them frequently staid so long, that even Bingley's good <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>humour</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.929" formerWord="humour" newWord="journey" score="0.929">journey</span> was overcome, and he proceeded so far as to talk of giving them a <span class="color" title="Was: <span class='purple'>hint</span> / Word2Vec similarity: 0.728" formerWord="hint" newWord="town" score="0.728">town</span> to be gone.
